name: Automated Social Media Content Publisher
description: An n8n workflow utilizing OpenAI GPT-4 and LangChain that automates content creation and publishing across Twitter (X), Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Threads, and YouTube Shorts. It dynamically composes prompts and schemas from Google Docs, generates contextual posts with AI, creates matching images using pollinations.ai, and publishes or archives content with approvals and notifications.

name: AI-Powered Automated Research Report Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates research report creation using OpenAI GPT-4 for query refinement and summarization, Wikipedia, NewsAPI, Google Custom Search, SerpApi for scholarly papers, and integrates PDFShift for PDF generation. Reports are sent via Gmail and Telegram, streamlining professional research delivery.

name: Automated Social Media Content Publisher & Prompt Composer
description: An n8n workflow automating content creation and publishing across TikTok (YouTube Shorts), Instagram, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, and Threads using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain for AI content generation, Pollinations.ai for image creation, imgbb API for image hosting, Google Docs for prompts/schema storage, and platform APIs for auto-posting. It supports human approval via Gmail and structures posts per platform specs.

name: AI Social Video Generator & Auto Social Posting
description: An automated n8n workflow leveraging Telegram, GPT-4, Kling AI video API, Cloudinary, and Blotato to create AI videos with voice-over and captions, then auto-publish to Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, Threads, Bluesky, and Pinterest.

name: n8n AI & App Node Reference Library
description: Comprehensive n8n workflow showcasing various AI nodes (OpenAI, Langchain agents, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and app integrations (Google Suite, Dropbox, Bitly, Reddit, YouTube, etc.) designed as a visual reference for automation and AI-enhanced workflow building.

name: AI TikTok/YouTube Shorts Reel Generator
description: Automates creation of POV short-form videos for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI's Flux & Kling for AI image and video generation, Eleven Labs for voiceover, Creatomate for video rendering, plus Google Sheets/Drive for data and file management.

name: AI Social Video Auto-Creation & Multi-Platform Posting
description: Automates video creation from Telegram prompts or images using AI (GPT-4, Piapi, Blotato), merges voice-over and captions, saves metadata to Google Sheets, and auto-publishes videos to 9 social platforms (Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Threads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Bluesky, Pinterest) via Blotato API.

name: AI-Driven Sales Meeting Follow-Up Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow automating sales follow-ups using Google Calendar and Gmail APIs. It retrieves past meetings, checks email interaction, uses OpenAI GPT-4 powered AI agents to suggest and book next meeting slots, with human approval for final booking. Supports calendar management and contextualized follow-ups.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Assistant with Email, Calendar & Tasks
description: An AI assistant on Telegram integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, Gmail, and Baserow for task and contact management. It handles voice/text inputs, transcribes voice notes, fetches and summarizes emails and calendar events, and manages tasks, providing seamless personal assistance.

name: WordPress SEO Content Automation with DeepSeek & DALL-E
description: Automates blog content creation for WordPress using DeepSeek R1 AI for SEO-friendly articles, OpenAI DALL-E 3 for cover images, and Google Sheets for idea input. Integrates WordPress API to publish drafts and update editorial plans seamlessly.

name: Local File AI Sync & Q&A with Qdrant & Mistral
description: Automates local folder monitoring and syncs file data as vector embeddings to Qdrant vector database. Uses Mistral Cloud AI for embeddings and chat model, enabling AI Q&A on updated files. Stack: n8n, Local File Trigger, Qdrant API, Mistral Cloud, Langchain nodes.

name: Automated RFP Response Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates RFP processing by extracting questions from PDF RFP documents using LLMs, generating answers via OpenAI Assistants enriched with company data, and compiling responses into Google Docs. Notifications are sent via Gmail and Slack upon completion.

name: Cybersecurity Ticket Enrichment with MITRE & AI
description: An n8n workflow that enriches Zendesk tickets using MITRE ATT&CK data by embedding it into a Qdrant vector store and querying with OpenAI's GPT-4 and embeddings. It automates extraction of TTPs, remediation steps, and historical context from SIEM alerts using LangChain agents and structured parsers.

name: AI Pre-Meeting Assistant with Gmail, Google Calendar, LinkedIn
description: Automates pre-meeting notifications by checking Google Calendar for upcoming events, extracting attendee info, summarizing recent emails (via Gmail) and LinkedIn activity (via Apify scraper), then sending concise, AI-generated WhatsApp reminders using OpenAI GPT models.

name: Pinterest AI Analysis & Content Suggestion Automation
description: Automates Pinterest pin data collection via Pinterest API, stores data in Airtable, and leverages OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini AI models for trend analysis and content suggestions. Sends summarized marketing insights via Gmail, aiding content calendar planning and audience targeting.

name: Auto-Resolve Long-Lived Jira Issues with AI
description: Automates detection, classification, and resolution of long-lived Jira issues using n8n workflows integrated with OpenAI GPT-4, Jira API, Notion, and Slack. Supports sentiment analysis, AI-driven knowledgebase search, and team notifications to improve customer support efficiency.

name: AI Customer & Sales Support Chatbot
description: An AI-driven customer support and sales assistant for Apple Case products integrating OpenAI GPT-4.1 with Google Sheets for inventory and order management. Handles stock queries, places orders, updates inventory, and interacts via chat with memory and tool calls.

name: AI Brand Voice Content Generator
description: Automates creation of on-brand blog articles by analyzing existing content from n8n.io blog. Uses n8n nodes with OpenAI API for LLM analysis, HTML extraction, Markdown conversion, and Wordpress draft publishing. Captures article style, structure, and voice.

name: LinkedIn Leads Scraper & Enrichment Workflow
description: Automates LinkedIn lead generation and enrichment using Apollo.io API for lead data, OpenAI GPT-3.5 for username extraction and profile/post summaries, RapidAPI LinkedIn & Apify for profile/posts scraping, and Google Sheets for storage and workflow triggers.

name: AI Exam Question Generator from Google Docs
description: Automates creating open and multiple-choice exam questions from Google Docs content using OpenAI embeddings, Google Gemini LLM, and Qdrant vector database for retrieval-augmented generation and question-answering.

name: AI-Driven Instagram Trend Content Creator
description: Automates Instagram content creation by scraping top trending posts with RapidAPI, analyzing images with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision, generating unique AI images via Replicate Flux AI, and posting with Facebook Graph API. Sends Telegram notifications on status updates. Ideal for creators leveraging AI for engaging posts.

name: Hacker News AI Video Content Creator
description: Automates creating summary videos from Hacker News articles using OpenAI for analysis, Leonardo.ai for image generation, RunwayML and Creatomate for video creation, and uploads results to cloud storages and social platforms.

name: AI-Powered Web Data to Vector DB Workflow
description: Automates extraction, formatting, and vectorization of web data using Bright Data API, Google Gemini models, Langchain nodes, and Pinecone vector database for building AI-ready datasets for LLMs.

name: Automated 9:16 AI Image & Video Content Creator
description: This n8n workflow automates creating 9:16 aspect ratio short-form video scripts and AI-generated images using Airtable for content management, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for script generation, and Leonardo.ai for prompt improvement and image generation. Perfect for branding and social media content production.

name: AI-Powered Instagram Trend Content Generator
description: Automates Instagram content creation by scraping top trending posts via RapidAPI Instagram Scraper, filtering images, analyzing with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision, generating captions, creating images using Replicate Flux AI, and publishing via Facebook Graph API with Telegram notifications.

name: AI SQL Query Generator from DB Schema
description: An n8n workflow using MySQL, OpenAI GPT-4o, and LangChain to convert database schema into executable SQL queries via AI chat. It extracts schema from MySQL, stores locally, then generates SQL on chat input, executing queries and returning results seamlessly.

name: AI Chatbot for YouTube Video Summarization
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow that fetches YouTube video details and transcripts via YouTube Data API & youtube-transcript package, then uses OpenAI GPT models for interactive summarization and analysis of video content through chat.

name: LinkedIn Company AI Scoring & CRM Update
description: Automates LinkedIn company search via Ghost Genius API, scores leads with OpenAI GPT-4.1 AI based on customized criteria, and updates a Google Sheets CRM. Ideal for targeted B2B lead enrichment and qualification with batch processing and deduplication.

name: Automated HubSpot Onboarding & Calendar Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow automating new customer onboarding using HubSpot CRM, OpenAI GPT-4 for personalized welcome emails, and Google Calendar for scheduling calls. Integrates HubSpot API, Gmail, and Langchain for AI-powered calendar management and email generation.

name: Hacker News AI Video Content Generator
description: Automates creating AI-generated video summaries from Hacker News articles using OpenAI for analysis, Leonardo.ai for images, RunwayML and Creatomate for video creation, with uploads to cloud storage and posting on social media platforms.

name: AI-Powered SMS Appointment Scheduler
description: Automates PC/laptop repair appointment scheduling via SMS using Twilio, Airtable, OpenAI's GPT, and Cal.com API. Manages sessions, handles booking actions (create/reschedule/cancel), and sends follow-ups with STOP opt-out support.

name: AI-Powered Job Application with CV Parsing
description: n8n workflow automates job applications by processing PDF CV uploads via form triggers, classifying documents with OpenAI, extracting relevant data using LLMs contextualized by job posts, and storing details including PDF in Airtable ATS. Includes multi-step user form with AI-assisted pre-fill.

name: Telegram AI Multi-Format Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow that creates a Telegram chatbot using OpenAI GPT-4o for conversational AI with memory buffer. It handles text and voice messages, transcribes audio with OpenAI API, and responds dynamically via Telegram API, enabling rich multi-format AI conversations.

name: HR & IT Helpdesk Chatbot with Audio Transcription
description: An n8n workflow that builds an AI-powered HR & IT helpdesk chatbot using OpenAI GPT for text and audio transcription, Telegram for messaging, PostgreSQL with PGVector for vector storage, and LangChain tools for knowledge retrieval and chat memory.

name: AI-Powered HR Job Application & Interview Automation
description: Automates job application intake, CV storage, AI-driven candidate scoring, questionnaire generation, interview scheduling, and communication using n8n, Airtable, Google Drive, Google Calendar, and OpenAI GPT models.

name: Voice RAG Chatbot with ElevenLabs & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow integrating ElevenLabs voice agent, OpenAI GPT language model, Qdrant vector store, and Google Drive for Document Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Automates voice Q&A using AI embeddings, vector search, and real-time audio responses.

name: Semantic Web Search Query & Results Re-Ranker
description: An n8n workflow that automates intelligent web search query generation and semantic re-ranking of results using Brave Web Search API and advanced language models (Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT). It refines user questions, ranks top search results, and extracts key info for precise answers.

name: Invoice Data Extraction & Reconciliation
description: Automates invoice processing by watching Gmail for PDF invoices, uploading them to LlamaParse API for parsing, extracting structured invoice data using OpenAI GPT-3.5, and appending results to Google Sheets for reconciliation. Incorporates label management to avoid duplicate processing.

name: Slack IT Support AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API, OpenAI GPT-4, and Confluence API to automate IT support queries via Slack. It verifies webhooks, filters bot messages, acknowledges user queries, fetches knowledge base results, and uses AI to generate tailored IT responses, improving IT helpdesk efficiency.

name: MS Teams Weekly AI Team Activity Report
description: Automates weekly summaries of individual and team activities on Microsoft Teams using OpenAI GPT-4.1 LLM. Fetches last week's channel messages, groups by user, generates personalized and team reports, converts markdown to HTML, and posts back to Teams channel every Monday morning.

name: Meeting Attendee & Company Research Automation
description: Automates research on meeting attendees and their companies upon new Google Calendar event. Utilizes Google Calendar trigger, OpenAI GPT-4o with web search preview for person/company data, aggregates info, formats in Markdown/HTML, and sends report via Gmail API.

name: Automated Support Ticket Creation from Gmail to Linear
description: Workflow automates fetching Gmail support emails, removes duplicates, converts HTML to Markdown, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to triage and label tickets, then creates issues in Linear.app. Tech stack: Gmail API, OpenAI API, Linear API, n8n automation platform.

name: YouTube Video Metadata Auto Generator
description: Automates YouTube metadata creation using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Docs API, and YouTube API. Generates SEO-optimized video titles, descriptions, tags, hashtags, affiliate and promo links for enhanced audience engagement and channel growth.

name: HelloFresh Weekly Recipe Recommendation AI
description: Automates fetching HelloFresh weekly menus, extracts recipe details, stores them in a Qdrant vector store and SQLite DB, and enables AI-powered recipe recommendations via Mistral Cloud embeddings and chat model, using Langchain, Qdrant, and n8n's workflow capabilities.

name: AI Competitor Research & Report Generator
description: Automates competitor analysis by finding similar companies via Exa.ai, scraping Crunchbase, WellFound, LinkedIn, and review sites using Firecrawl and SerpAPI. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o for extracting structured company, product, and review data, and compiles detailed reports into Notion.

name: AI-Powered PDF QA & Appointment Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow that integrates OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic, Pinecone vector store, and Google Calendar API to load PDFs, create embeddings, enable Q&A over documents, categorize emails with AI, and book calendar appointments via chat-based interface.

name: Survey Response Insights Generator
description: Automates detailed insights generation from Google Sheets survey data by vectorizing responses with OpenAI embeddings, clustering with K-means in Qdrant vector store, and summarizing groups via GPT-4. Outputs enriched insights sheet with sentiment analysis.

name: Trustpilot Reviews Insight Generator
description: Automates extraction, clustering, and summarization of Trustpilot reviews using n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Qdrant vector store, and K-means clustering for actionable customer insights. Outputs results to Google Sheets for analysis.

name: IT Support Slack AI Bot
description: Automates IT support in Slack by integrating Slack Events API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Confluence KB via n8n. It filters bot messages, acknowledges queries, uses AI with memory buffer, and fetches contextual info from Confluence for precise IT assistance.

name: Notion AI Assistant Workflow Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using the provided URL. Utilizes Notion API, Langchain AI nodes (Anthropic and OpenAI), JSON validation, and chat triggers for interactive assistant creation.

name: AI Image Caption Generator with Overlay
description: Automates generating descriptive captions for images using Google's Gemini AI model and overlays them on images with n8n's Edit Image node. Utilizes HTTP requests for image fetching, Langchain AI nodes for captioning, and code nodes for positioning text, enabling streamlined visual content creation.

name: Daily Podcast Summary Email Automation
description: Automates daily retrieval of top US podcasts by genre from Taddy API, crops audio via Aspose API, transcribes with OpenAI Whisper, summarizes using GPT-4o-mini, and emails summaries via Gmail for easy daily podcast insights.

name: AI Calendar & Notion Task Manager
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, and Notion APIs to automate scheduling events and managing tasks. It uses LangChain agents, chat triggers, and memory buffers to route user chat inputs to appropriate tools for calendar and task operations.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Bot with Memory
description: Automates Telegram conversations using OpenAI assistant with context memory via Supabase. Integrates Telegram Bot API, OpenAI Threads & Assistants API, and Supabase database for user session tracking, enabling personalized, context-aware chatbot replies.

name: AI Personal Assistant via Telegram
description: An AI-powered Telegram assistant integrating OpenAI GPT-4o, Google Calendar, Gmail, and Baserow APIs for voice/text input processing, event and email summarization, task and contact management, enhancing productivity via conversational interface.

name: Gmail AI Auto Labeling Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that uses Gmail API and OpenAI GPT to automatically read, categorize, and label incoming Gmail messages. It polls Gmail every 5 minutes, analyzes emails using OpenAI, matches or creates Gmail labels accordingly, and assigns labels, optimizing inbox organization.

name: AI-Powered JIRA Stale Issue Auto-Assignment
description: Automates assignment of stale JIRA issues using OpenAI embeddings and Langchain. Utilizes Supabase vector database to find similar resolved issues and identifies best suited team members by workload, auto-assigning and commenting in JIRA to keep backlog manageable.

name: AI-Powered JIRA Support Ticket Triage & Resolution
description: Automates triaging and resolution of JIRA support tickets using scheduled triggers, JIRA API, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for labeling, prioritizing, rewriting, and suggesting fixes by analyzing new and past resolved tickets with comments.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Calendar Assistant
description: Automate Outlook calendar management via Slack with an AI agent using OpenAI for natural language understanding and Microsoft Outlook API for calendar event search, creation, and retrieval. Enables conversational calendar assistance and event handling.

name: Instagram Auto Posting via Google Drive & AI
description: Automates Instagram Reel posting using Google Drive triggers, OpenAI for generating captions, Google Sheets for data management, and Facebook Graph API for publishing. Integrates Google Drive, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Sheets, and Meta APIs to streamline content upload to Instagram.

name: Automated Purchase Order Processing from Outlook XLSX
description: Automates purchase order intake by monitoring Outlook emails with XLSX attachments, converts Excel to markdown, uses OpenAI LLM (gpt-4o-mini) to extract structured PO details, validates entries, and sends automated email confirmations or rejections, saving time on data entry and error checking.

name: LinkedIn Profile Enrichment & Ice Breaker Generator
description: Automates LinkedIn profile enrichment using Bright Data API, generates personalized ice breakers with Anthropic Claude LLM, and updates results in Google Sheets. Uses n8n nodes like HTTP Request, Google Sheets, LangChain LLM, scheduled/manual triggers for seamless workflow automation.

name: Monthly Financial Performance Report Automation
description: Automates monthly financial reporting by querying MySQL ERP data, analyzing budgets vs actuals, projects, employees, and departments. Uses Google Gemini AI and Langchain tools for advanced financial analysis and generates styled HTML reports sent via Microsoft Outlook.

name: Telegram-AI Task Manager with Google Tasks
description: Automates task management via Telegram using AI to interpret messages and voice notes. Integrates Telegram Bot API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for NLP and transcription, LangChain MCP for AI orchestration, and Google Tasks API for task creation and updates.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Email Organizer via Telegram
description: Automates Gmail inbox management by retrieving emails, filtering processed emails, and using OpenRouter GPT-4.1 AI to categorize each email as necessary or unnecessary. Archives unneeded emails, applies labels to others, and reports results via Telegram. Integrates Gmail API, Telegram Bot API, and OpenRouter GPT-4.1.

name: Client Feedback Routing & HubSpot Logging
description: Automates client conversation processing with OpenAI summarization, routes feedback to departments via email, and logs meeting notes in HubSpot using OAuth2. Uses n8n, Langchain, Gmail API, and HubSpot API to streamline client issue management.

name: Automated Email Parsing & HubSpot CRM Update
description: Workflow automates email parsing using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model, extracts contact info, searches/updates contacts in HubSpot CRM, and creates email engagement records. Integrates IMAP email, HubSpot OAuth2 API, and LangChain AI nodes for seamless CRM enrichment.

name: MCP Server for Managing & Executing n8n Workflows
description: An n8n workflow serving as an MCP server to dynamically manage, list, add, remove, and execute tagged workflows. Uses Redis for memory, n8n API to fetch workflows, and integrates OpenAI GPT-4.1-mini model via Langchain to act as an AI agent that interacts with workflows.

name: AI-Powered Hebrew Stock Analysis & Email Reports
description: Automates weekly stock analysis using Chart-img, Twelve Data, Alpha Vantage APIs combined with OpenAI GPT-4o for technical and sentiment insights. Generates detailed Hebrew reports with technical indicators, news sentiment, and sends styled HTML emails with recommendations.

name: Notion RAG Chatbot with OpenAI & Supabase
description: An n8n workflow that enables retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) from live Notion data. It uses Notion API to fetch updated content, OpenAI GPT-4 for embeddings and chat models, and Supabase as a vector store to index knowledge base for context-aware Q&A chatbot.

name: Company Decision Maker Discovery Automation
description: Automates extraction and enrichment of company and decision-maker data using Apollo.io APIs, Google Sheets, Slack, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for department classification and company summarization. Outputs curated contact lists and weekly reports for sales/marketing lead generation.

name: AI WhatsApp Customer Support Assistant
description: An AI-powered customer support chatbot for WhatsApp that dynamically crawls and extracts real-time website info using Langchain tools (list_links, get_page), OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and Postgres memory. Enables brands to deliver on-demand, accurate support directly on WhatsApp.

name: AI Job Hunt POV Video Creator
description: Automates creation of short-form job hunting videos using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI Flux for image generation, Kling for video, ElevenLabs for voiceovers, Creatomate for final rendering, Google Sheets for ideas, and uploads to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn via upload-post.com.

name: YouTube Video Summarizer & Telegram Q&A with GPT-4o-mini
description: Automates extracting YouTube video transcripts, segmenting and summarizing them using GPT-4o-mini, storing transcripts on Google Docs, and enabling interactive Q&A about the video via Telegram chat. Uses n8n with YouTube Transcript API, Google Docs API, Telegram API, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini.

name: AI SQL Agent with Dynamic Charting
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o, Langchain SQL Agent, and Quickchart.io to answer SQL queries and generate dynamic charts. It extracts user questions, runs SQL queries on PostgreSQL, classifies if charts are needed, and creates visualizations using OpenAI structured output and Quickchart.io.

name: Slack AI Chatbot with RAG for Staff
description: An AI-powered Slack chatbot for company staff that uses OpenAI and Anthropic models with Qdrant vector search to retrieve and answer employee queries from internal documents. Integrates Slack API, Google Drive, and Langchain nodes for seamless RAG support and real-time help.

name: AI Auto-Tagging for WordPress Posts
description: Automate blog post tagging in WordPress using n8n with OpenAI for AI-generated tags. Uses RSS feed triggers, WordPress REST API, and Langchain nodes for content analysis to enhance SEO and content categorization without manual input.

name: UTM Link & QR Code Generator with GA Reports
description: Automates creation of UTM tagged links and QR codes, stores them in Airtable, and schedules Google Analytics reports analyzed by OpenAI GPT-4. Integrates n8n with OpenAI, Google Analytics, Airtable, and QuickChart APIs for streamlined marketing campaign tracking and executive reporting.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Lead Outreach
description: Automates social media analysis from LinkedIn and Twitter via RapidAPI, uses OpenAI GPT-4 for personalized cover letter and subject generation, integrates Google Sheets for lead management, and sends customized emails via SMTP. Ideal for marketers and lead gen pros.

name: AI-Powered Google Calendar Reminder via Telegram
description: An n8n workflow that fetches upcoming Google Calendar events (1 hour ahead), uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for generating friendly reminder messages, and sends them via Telegram. Prevents duplicate alerts for stress-free, personalized appointment notifications.

name: Telegram AI Chat & Dall-E Image Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram API with OpenAI GPT-4 and Dall-E 3 for conversational AI and image generation. It uses Langchain modules for context memory and tool execution, enabling interactive chat with image creation inside Telegram chats.

name: Google Drive Audio Transcription & Summary to Notion
description: Automates transcription of audio files uploaded to a Google Drive folder using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes content with GPT-4 Turbo, and sends structured summaries to Notion. Integrates Google Drive, OpenAI API, and Notion for efficient audio documentation workflows.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Voice Message Translator
description: Telegram bot workflow translating voice messages between 55 languages using Telegram API, OpenAI's speech-to-text and chat models, n8n automation. Converts speech to text, auto-detects and translates languages, replies with text and audio in Telegram chat.

name: AI Voice Chatbot with Memory & TTS
description: An AI voice chatbot workflow integrating OpenAI for speech-to-text, Google Gemini for contextual chat, LangChain memory for conversation context, and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech audio generation. Enables real-time voice interactions with maintained conversation memory.

name: Slack to Linear AI Ticket Generator
description: Automates support ticket creation by scanning Slack #n8n-tickets channel for messages tagged with 🎫, uses OpenAI to generate ticket title, summary, priority, and suggestions, and creates tickets in Linear. Utilizes Slack API, OpenAI GPT, and Linear API.

name: WhatsApp AI Sales Agent with Product Brochure
description: Automate customer support on WhatsApp using n8n integrated with OpenAI GPT-4 and vector search. Extracts Yamaha product brochure PDF, creates an in-memory vector store knowledge base, and runs an AI Sales Agent to answer customer queries via WhatsApp text messages.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp API with Google Gemini AI and Langchain tools to handle, analyze, and respond to various message types (audio, video, image, text) in WhatsApp chats using AI transcription, summarization, and multimodal content description.

name: Video Frame Narration & Voiceover Generator
description: Automates video narration by downloading a video, extracting frames using OpenCV in Python, generating a script with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision LLM, creating TTS audio, and uploading results to Google Drive. Integrates HTTP, Python, Langchain, OpenAI APIs, and Google Drive.

name: Automated CV Screening with OpenAI & Supabase
description: n8n workflow to download CV PDFs, extract text, and analyze candidate fit using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini with a structured JSON schema. Stores results in Supabase. Ideal for recruiters to automate initial resume screening and generate fitting scores and insights.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that creates an AI chatbot for WhatsApp using WhatsApp API, Google Gemini (PaLM) for multimodal AI (audio, video, image), Langchain AI Agent, and Wikipedia tool integration. It processes and responds to varied message types intelligently.

name: AI-Powered Job Application Automation
description: This n8n workflow automates job applications by accepting CV PDFs via form upload, using OpenAI LLM and text classification to validate and extract relevant candidate data based on a job posting, and saving to Airtable ATS. It enables a two-step form process with AI-assisted prefill and validation.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduling with Approval
description: Automate appointment requests processing with n8n multi-step forms, OpenAI AI text classification and summarisation, Gmail approval workflow, and Google Calendar integration for scheduling events. Provides user-friendly form UX and admin approval via email.

name: AI-Powered On-Brand Blog Article Generator
description: Automates generating brand-consistent blog drafts using n8n workflows. It scrapes latest articles from a blog, converts content to Markdown, analyzes style and voice with OpenAI LLMs, and creates new drafts saved to Wordpress for review.

name: Real-Time AI Meeting Transcription System
description: An n8n workflow that automates joining virtual meetings (Zoom, Google Meet) using Recall.ai API for real-time transcription, processes dialogue via OpenAI API, stores structured data in Supabase/Postgres, and creates AI-generated notes for meeting insights.

name: Automated Phishing Email Detection & Jira Reporting
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gmail and Microsoft Outlook triggers to capture emails, uses hcti.io API for HTML screenshot generation, OpenAI's ChatGPT-4 for phishing analysis, and auto-creates detailed Jira tickets with email data and screenshot attachments for streamlined phishing incident management.

name: Automated Meeting Task & Event Manager
description: Automates creation of tasks from Fireflies.ai meeting transcripts using OpenAI GPT-4o, stores tasks in Airtable, sends email notifications via Gmail, and schedules Google Meet events. Streamlines post-meeting follow-ups and client communications with AI-powered processing.

name: Cybersecurity Incident Analysis with MITRE & AI
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, MITRE ATT&CK data from Google Drive, and Qdrant vector DB to analyze and enrich Zendesk security tickets. Automates TTP extraction, remediation advice, and historical pattern detection using Langchain agents and embeddings.

name: Telegram Voice/Text to SEO Social Content AI
description: Automates Telegram incoming messages (voice or text), transcribes voice via OpenAI Whisper, researches topics with SerpAPI, generates SEO-optimized social media posts and photorealistic image prompts, then creates images via HuggingFace Stable Diffusion integration.

name: Chinese Vocabulary Flashcard Generator
description: Automates vocabulary learning by translating English words to Chinese, generating pinyin and example sentences via OpenAI, retrieving images from Pexels API, and updating Google Sheets and Drive. Uses Google Translate, Langchain AI, Pexels API, and Google Workspace APIs.

name: Discord AI Spam Moderation Workflow
description: Automates spam detection and moderation on Discord using AI text classification (Langchain) and OpenAI GPT model. Retrieves messages, groups by user, flags spam, notifies moderators with human-in-the-loop decisions, and executes moderation actions with Discord bot integration.

name: SEO-Optimized WordPress Blog Generator
description: Automates SEO-optimized blog post creation for WordPress using Perplexity.ai for research, OpenAI GPT-4 mini for writing and HTML generation, WordPress API for publishing, and Telegram for success notifications. Ideal for content marketers and bloggers.

name: CoinMarketCap Crypto AI Agent
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating CoinMarketCap APIs with OpenAI GPT-4o Mini for live cryptocurrency data analysis, including prices, metadata, market rankings, conversions, and global metrics. Enables advanced crypto queries using natural language and session memory.

name: Automated Email Appointment Scheduler
description: This n8n workflow automates detection and management of appointment requests from unread Gmail messages using OpenAI GPT-4 and Google Calendar APIs. It classifies emails, checks calendar availability, proposes meeting times, and replies, streamlining email scheduling tasks.

name: Automated Email Reply & Feedback Logger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on receiving emails from specific senders, generates AI-powered replies using OpenAI GPT, sends email responses via Gmail, and logs both original emails and replies into Google Sheets. It also collects user feedback through webhooks to improve response quality.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Email Categorizer
description: Automates email categorization and prioritization in Microsoft Outlook using OpenAI GPT-4 model, Monday.com CRM, Airtable for rules and categories, and n8n workflow automation to organize and flag emails intelligently.

name: AI Invoice & Document Parser with LlamaParse
description: Automates extraction, classification, and summarization of documents from Gmail using LlamaParse API, OpenAI GPT models, and Google Drive/Sheets. Extracts invoice details as JSON, saves files, sends Telegram notifications, and organizes data for streamlined accounting and insights.

name: WhatsApp AI Chatbot with RAG Knowledge Base
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp Business API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain agent, Qdrant vector DB, and Google Drive to build an AI-powered chatbot for electronics stores. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to provide accurate product info & support via WhatsApp.

name: Weekly Online Marketing Report Generator
description: Automates weekly retrieval, analysis, and reporting of online marketing data using Google Analytics, Google Ads API, Meta Ads (Facebook Graph API), and OpenAI GPT-4 for AI-powered insights and summaries. Sends detailed HTML email and Telegram report.

name: Slack to Google Calendar Event Automator
description: Automates event creation and attendee management by monitoring Slack channel invites with calendar emoji, using OpenAI, SerpAPI, and Google Calendar APIs to parse event details, create events, and sync attendee reactions efficiently.

name: n8n Ultimate Selenium Web Scraper
description: Automates advanced web scraping with Selenium and OpenAI GPT-4 integration. Uses Selenium Chrome container, residential proxies, Google search, cookie injection for session-based scraping, and AI-driven info extraction from screenshots and text for data on dynamic or login-protected websites.

name: Daily AI Email Summary and Action Extractor
description: Automates daily email retrieval from Gmail, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to summarize key email info and extract action items, then emails a styled HTML report. Tech stack: Gmail API, OpenAI API, n8n workflow automation, with scheduling and aggregation nodes. Ideal for teams needing concise daily email digests.

name: AI-Powered WordPress Blog Post Optimizer
description: Automates WordPress blog content creation and SEO optimization using Google Sheets, OpenAI (DeepSeek), WordPress API, and Langchain. Generates titles, articles, images, drafts posts, and SEO meta tags, updating all data back to Google Sheets seamlessly.

name: CoinMarketCap AI Crypto Analyst Bot
description: An n8n AI workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o Mini with CoinMarketCap APIs via modular agents for real-time crypto market analytics, token data, exchange insights, and decentralized DEX liquidity. Outputs interactive replies through Telegram.

name: Animated Story Creation with GPT-4o-mini, Midjourney, Kling & Creatomate
description: Automates creation of animated story videos using GPT-4o-mini for story prompts, Midjourney for images, Kling for video generation, and Creatomate for final video editing. Ideal for generating engaging animated content from text prompts via APIs.

name: Outlook AI Email Categorizer & Prioritizer
description: Automates email categorization and prioritization in Microsoft Outlook. Integrates Microsoft 365, Monday.com CRM, Airtable, and OpenAI GPT-4 AI to analyze, categorize, and set priorities on incoming emails based on custom rules and contact data.

name: Voiceflow Chatbot & Calendar Integrator
description: An n8n workflow integrating Voiceflow conversational agents with Google Calendar and Qdrant RAG system. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for LLM tasks, Qdrant for vector search, Google Drive for document handling, and webhooks for multi-channel chatbot, appointment, and order tracking automation.

name: Video Frame Extraction and AI Narration
description: Automates video downloading, frame extraction using OpenCV, script generation with GPT-4 multimodal LLM, and text-to-speech audio creation via OpenAI API. The workflow batches image frames, creates narration scripts, synthesizes voiceovers, and uploads results to Google Drive.

name: AI SEO Keyword Research Automation
description: Automates SEO keyword research using OpenAI GPT for topic expansion and competitor analysis, integrates DataForSEO API for keyword metrics, and manages workflow with NocoDB and Slack notifications. Generates actionable SEO strategies and content briefs for targeted content creation.

name: AI-Powered Weekly Tech Newsletter
description: Automates fetching tech news from multiple RSS feeds, processes with OpenAI embeddings and GPT-4 summarization, and sends a personalized weekly newsletter via Gmail. Uses n8n, OpenAI API, RSS feeds, and Gmail integration to deliver curated tech updates based on user interests.

name: AI-Powered Email Summarization & Reply Automation
description: An n8n workflow integrating IMAP email triggers, Gmail, OpenAI GPT models, and Qdrant vector DB to summarize incoming emails, generate context-aware professional replies, classify human feedback, and send emails after review. Supports Gmail, Outlook, Google Drive docs, and uses LangChain components for advanced AI processing.

name: Notion DB AI Assistant Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using URLs. Utilizes Notion API, Anthropic and OpenAI language models, LangChain agents, and advanced JSON validation. Automates creating custom AI chatbots for dynamic Notion DB schemas.

name: Google Drive to Pinecone RAG with OpenRouter & Gemini
description: Automates document ingestion from Google Drive, splits text contextually, generates embeddings using Google Gemini, and stores vectors in Pinecone. Uses OpenRouter chat model and Langchain for AI context-aware chunking to enhance retrieval-based generation workflows.

name: WordPress Content Chatbot with OpenAI & Supabase
description: An n8n workflow integrating WordPress API, OpenAI embeddings & GPT-4o-mini, and Supabase vector DB. It fetches, filters, converts WP posts/pages to markdown, embeddings for search, and enables AI chat with website content using stored vectors and Postgres memory.

name: WooCommerce AI Chatbot for Post-Sales Support
description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating WooCommerce, OpenAI, Qdrant vector DB, and Google Drive for secure, verified post-sales support. It automates order and tracking inquiries, FAQ answers, and escalates complex issues via Telegram for a seamless customer service experience.

name: AI Email Auto-Responder with Approval Workflow
description: Automates email processing by reading IMAP messages, converting to Markdown, summarizing content, retrieving data from Qdrant vector DB, composing replies with OpenAI GPT and DeepSeek models, and sends responses after a YES/NO approval via Gmail. Tech: IMAP, Qdrant, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Gmail API.

name: AI SQL Query Generator from Database Schema
description: This n8n workflow uses MySQL to extract database schemas, stores them locally, and combines with OpenAI's GPT-4o via LangChain AI Agent to generate SQL queries based only on the schema and user chat input. It automates SQL generation without executing queries directly.

name: WordPress Automated SEO Content & Image Creator
description: Automates SEO-friendly WordPress blog posts creation using Google Sheets for ideas, DeepSeek AI for article and title generation, OpenAI DALL-E 3 for cover images, and WordPress API for publishing and media uploading. Ideal for blog content managers.

name: AI Agent with Long-Term Memory & Tools Router
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Google Docs for AI agent long-term memory storage and retrieval. It dynamically routes tasks like saving memories, retrieving them, and sending notifications via Gmail and Telegram to enhance AI chatbot contextual understanding and multi-channel communication.

name: Parents Smart Assistant Bot
description: An intelligent personal assistant for busy parents using Telegram, OpenAI (GPT-3.5, embeddings, audio transcription), Qdrant vector DB, Tavily web search, and Wikipedia API. It routes requests to specialized agents for calendar, email, contacts, content creation, and calculations, responding warmly in Hebrew.

name: Multi-AI Chatbot for Postgres & QuickCharts
description: An n8n workflow featuring multi-agent AI chatbot integration with Postgres/Supabase for SQL querying and QuickChart for dynamic chart generation. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models and Langchain nodes to provide interactive data analysis and visualization within chat.

name: AI Email Summarizer & Auto Responder
description: Automates email processing by reading IMAP emails, converting HTML to Markdown, summarizing content via DeepSeek/OpenAI, classifying and replying professionally using GPT-4o-mini, and storing context in Qdrant vector DB. Integrates IMAP, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Qdrant, Google Drive, SMTP.

name: AI Lead Generator: Google Maps & Website Scraper
description: Automates business lead generation by scraping Google Maps and business websites using Apify actors, enhanced by OpenAI GPT-4o and SerpAPI for fallback data enrichment. Stores organized contact info and business data into Google Sheets for easy access and analysis.

name: AI Chatbot with Long-Term Memory & Telegram
description: An advanced AI agent chatbot using OpenAI and LangChain in n8n workflow. It integrates Telegram for messaging, Google Docs for storing long-term memories and notes, and uses context windows for personalized, contextual conversations with memory management.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduling with Approval
description: Automate appointment requests with multi-step n8n forms, AI enquiry classification and summarization (OpenAI), Gmail approval workflow, and Google Calendar event creation. Enhances user experience with terms acceptance and conditional scheduling.

name: AI-Powered n8n Workflow Credential Explorer
description: An n8n workflow that extracts credentials info from all workflows via n8n API, stores them in SQLite, and enables querying via an AI agent using OpenAI's Chat API. Simplifies searching which workflows use specific app credentials.

name: AI-Powered Meeting Transcript Summarizer & Scheduler
description: Automates retrieval and AI summarization of Google Meet transcripts using Google APIs and OpenAI. Extracts meeting insights, suggests next steps, and auto-creates follow-up Google Calendar events with attendees for streamlined post-meeting management.

name: LinkedIn Lead Automation & Enrichment
description: Automates LinkedIn lead generation, data enrichment, and outreach using HDW LinkedIn API, OpenAI GPT-4 for ICP parsing and content summarization, and Google Sheets for data storage. Includes lead scoring, company research, and automated messaging workflows.

name: AI-Powered Company Data Enrichment Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates company research by leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, and web scraping (ScrapingBee). It enriches Google Sheets rows with structured info like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, API availability, market type, and integrations, running on schedule or manual trigger.

name: Automated AI CV Screening & Notification
description: This n8n workflow automates candidate CV screening using Google Gemini (PaLM) AI for resume analysis and ratings, sends email confirmations to applicants and notifications to HR, and logs candidate data in Google Sheets. It integrates Gmail, Google Sheets, PDF extraction, and LangChain AI models to streamline HR processes.

name: AI Email Autoresponder with Approval
description: Automates email handling using IMAP trigger, OpenAI GPT and DeepSeek models for summarization and response generation, Qdrant vector DB for business info retrieval, and Gmail for draft approval before sending. Ideal for professional, concise business email replies.

name: AI Topic Monitoring with RSS, OpenAI, Slack
description: Automates topic monitoring by fetching RSS feeds from Google Sheets URLs, classifying relevance with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, scraping content via Jina AI, summarizing articles for Slack, and storing metadata in Google Sheets. Ideal for professionals tracking AI-related news.

name: WooCommerce Customer Order Chat Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating WooCommerce API, DHL tracking, and OpenAI GPT-4 to provide customers with secure, real-time order and shipping info via chat. Features encrypted email handling, order querying, DHL status checks, and AI-powered conversational support.

name: WordPress AI Content Creator with Multi-Level Rewrites
description: Automates creating WordPress blog drafts using OpenAI GPT models for structured content generation and rewriting at Grade 2, 5, and 9 reading levels. Integrates Pollinations.ai for featured image creation, Google Drive for backups, and Telegram for notifications.

name: Automated GitHub PR Code Review
description: n8n workflow automates GitHub pull request code review using OpenAI GPT-4 for inline comments. It triggers on PR events, fetches code diffs, creates AI review prompts, posts comments, optionally adds labels, and references Google Sheets for best practices.

name: Automated Phishing Email Detection & Jira Reporting
description: This n8n workflow automates phishing email detection by integrating Gmail and Outlook triggers, uses hcti.io API to create email body screenshots, applies OpenAI's GPT-4o model for phishing analysis, and auto-generates Jira tickets with detailed reports and attachments for security teams.

name: Automated Blog Writer & Publisher
description: An n8n workflow automating blog content creation and publishing. Uses Google Sheets for scheduling/configuration, OpenAI (via OpenRouter) for AI content generation, and WordPress XML-RPC API for posting. Includes data preprocessing, content merging, and status logging to Sheets.

name: BambooHR AI Chatbot for Company Policies
description: An AI-powered chatbot built with n8n using BambooHR API, OpenAI's GPT models, LangChain nodes, and Supabase for vector storage. It helps employees query company policies, benefits, and find employee or department contacts efficiently.

name: AI-Powered Interview Scheduling Assistant
description: An automated interview scheduler using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Google Calendar APIs. It checks calendar availability, generates 30-min weekday slots (9am-5pm EST), interacts via AI chat to gather candidate info, and books interviews without double booking.

name: AI Document Note Generator from Folder
description: Automates note creation by monitoring a folder for new docs (PDF, DOCX, TEXT), extracting and summarizing content using Mistral Cloud LLM, LangChain text splitter, and Qdrant vector store. Generates study guides, timelines, and briefings, then exports files locally.

name: Movie Recommender Chatbot with Qdrant & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow to build a movie recommendation chatbot using GitHub-hosted IMDB movie data, OpenAI embeddings and GPT-4o-mini chat model, and Qdrant vector database for vector similarity search. It processes user requests, embeds them, queries Qdrant, and returns top-3 personalized movie recommendations.

name: AI-Powered HubSpot Chat Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating HubSpot Conversations with OpenAI Assistants and Airtable. Automates receiving chat messages, processing via OpenAI APIs, invoking external business data APIs, and replying in HubSpot, enabling intelligent chat automation and CRM interaction.

name: Telegram AI Chat Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram and OpenAI's Chat API via Langchain to create a responsive AI assistant that listens to Telegram messages and replies with helpful, emoji-enhanced answers in real-time.

name: Google Drive Document QA with Pinecone & OpenAI
description: Automates Q&A on documents fetched from Google Drive by indexing text chunks into Pinecone vector DB using OpenAI embeddings. Supports chat queries with contextual answers and citations. Tech stack: Google Drive API, Pinecone vector DB, OpenAI embeddings & chat models, n8n automation.

name: Audio Transcription and Summary with OpenAI & Google Drive
description: Automates audio file transcription and summarization using OpenAI's API, stores raw and processed transcripts as JSON and markdown in Google Drive, and sends notifications via Gmail and Telegram. Includes optional user approval and advanced transcript structuring.

name: WhatsApp AI Chatbot with Qdrant RAG
description: An AI-powered WhatsApp Business chatbot leveraging Meta Webhooks, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Qdrant vector database, and Google Drive for document retrieval. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system to answer customer queries about electronics products with contextual knowledge base support.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Reply Draft Automation
description: Automates email reply drafting by fetching Gmail threads with specific labels, sending email content to OpenAI Assistant for a reply, generating HTML, and saving drafts in Gmail. Utilizes Gmail API, OpenAI API, and n8n automation platform.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduler Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Microsoft Outlook API, and LangChain to create an intelligent personal assistant chatbot. It handles calendar availability, books meetings, and manages enquiries with timezone-aware scheduling and email notifications for a seamless appointment booking experience.

name: Fastmail Email Auto-Reply with GPT-4
description: Automates email reply drafts in Fastmail using IMAP email triggers, Fastmail JMAP API, and OpenAI GPT-4. Extracts incoming email content, generates personalized responses, and uploads replies as drafts for review and sending.

name: Slack AI Assistant with Google Gemini
description: An n8n workflow that receives Slack messages via webhook, processes them with Google Gemini AI and Langchain memory, and sends contextual AI-powered replies back to Slack channels, enabling interactive and persistent AI assistance within Slack.

name: Trustpilot Reviews Insight Generator
description: Automates scraping Trustpilot reviews, stores embeddings in Qdrant vector DB, clusters reviews using K-means, summarizes insights via OpenAI GPT-4, and exports results to Google Sheets. Stack: n8n (automation), Trustpilot (reviews), Qdrant (vector DB), OpenAI (LLM), Google Sheets.

name: Slack to Linear AI Ticket Creator
description: Automates support ticket creation by monitoring Slack with ticket emoji, uses OpenAI GPT for summarizing, titling, prioritizing issues, and creates tickets in Linear. Tech: Slack API, Linear API, OpenAI (ChatGPT) via n8n nodes.

name: YouTube Video Comment Analysis & Reporting
description: Automates analysis of YouTube video details and up to 100 comments using YouTube Data API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and n8n. Generates detailed creator reports with sentiment, themes, engagement, and content suggestions. Saves reports to Google Drive and sends via Gmail.

name: Telegram AI Assistant with Baserow Memory
description: An AI-powered Telegram assistant integrating OpenAI GPT-4o mini, Baserow databases for long-term memory and notes, Postgres chat memory, with voice, photo processing, and personalized responses. Automates note-taking, memory recall, and multi-modal input handling.

name: Telegram AI Study Assistant for Signal Processing
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram API, OpenAI (including transcription and GPT models), Google Gemini, Airtable, and Langchain tools to build an AI-powered interactive tutor for signal processing students via Telegram, featuring memory, calculator, Wikipedia lookup, and content/email agent tools.

name: AI Chatbot for BambooHR Policies & Benefits
description: An AI-powered chatbot built in n8n using BambooHR API, OpenAI LLMs, Supabase vector DB, Langchain tools, and text splitting to assist employees with company policies, benefits, and contact info by searching documents and BambooHR employee data.

name: AI-Powered Incident Management with NocoDB
description: Automates incident ticketing by integrating NocoDB for data storage, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for AI-driven incident categorization, Slack and SMTP for notifications. Streamlines issue reporting, AI prioritization, and timely alerts for clients and assignees.

name: AI-Powered Email Automation & Management
description: Automates email reading, summarization, reply drafting, and approval using IMAP, Gmail, OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Qdrant vector DB, Google Drive, and DeepSeek AI. Enhances business email workflows with AI-driven summarization, classification, retrieval, and human feedback integration.

name: Daily Email Summarizer with OpenAI
description: Automates fetching Gmail emails from the past 24 hours, summarizes key points and action items using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and sends a styled HTML summary email daily at 7 AM. Integrates Gmail API, n8n scheduling, data aggregation, and OpenAI for AI-powered email digest.

name: AI Summary Automation for WordPress Posts
description: Automates creating AI-generated summary blocks for WordPress posts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, WordPress REST API, Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. It fetches posts, checks summary existence, generates summaries in HTML bullet format, updates posts, logs data, and alerts teams.

name: AI Lead Processing & Email Notification System
description: Automates analysis of incoming lead notes, categorizes inquiries, finds appropriate contacts from a database, and generates email notifications. Integrates ERPNext for lead data, OpenAI for NLP analysis, Google Sheets for contact lookup, and Microsoft Outlook API to format/send emails.

name: YouTube Trend Analyzer AI
description: An n8n workflow using LangChain AI, OpenAI GPT, YouTube API, and custom memory management to help YouTube creators discover trending videos and content patterns in their niche from the last 2 days. It provides insightful analytics with video stats and channels links.

name: AI-Powered RAG Chatbot with Google Drive & Qdrant
description: An advanced n8n workflow that creates a Retrieval-Augmented Generation chatbot integrating Google Drive, Google Gemini AI, Qdrant vector store, OpenAI embeddings, and Telegram for notifications. It processes documents, extracts metadata, stores vectors, enables conversational search, and supports secure vector data management with human confirmation.

name: AI Stock Analysis Bot via Telegram
description: An n8n workflow that enables real-time stock technical analysis through Telegram. It uses Telegram APIs for message interaction, OpenAI GPT-4 for chat and audio transcription, Chart-img API for generating stock charts, Airtable for saving tickers, plus LangChain tools to orchestrate AI agent processes and chat memory.

name: AI Event Banner Generator with BannerBear
description: Automates creating event banners by capturing details via n8n form, generating images with OpenAI DALL·E 3, optimizing uploads on Cloudinary, designing banners using BannerBear templates, and posting to Discord channels. Uses n8n workflow for seamless event promotion.

name: ChatGPT Image Generation to Google Drive & Sheets
description: n8n workflow integrates OpenAI GPT-image-1 API for image generation from chat prompts, saves images to Google Drive, and logs images with thumbnails and cost details in Google Sheets for tracking and analysis.

name: Multi-Agent AI Chat Conversation
description: An n8n workflow enabling conversations with multiple AI agents concurrently using OpenRouter API for models like GPT-4o, Claude, and Gemini. It supports customized agent personalities, dynamic selection via @mentions, session memory, and aggregated responses for scalable multi-agent chats.

name: Automated Email Appointment Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow that uses Gmail API, Google Calendar, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to detect appointment requests in incoming emails, check calendar availability, compose precise meeting proposals, and automatically reply and mark emails as read.

name: AI Chat Agent with Memory and Search
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini chat model, SerpAPI for web search, and a memory buffer to create an AI chat agent that handles incoming chat messages, performs real-time web queries, and maintains context for conversational interactions.

name: AI Conversational Agent with External Tools
description: An AI chatbot workflow using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini, integrated with SerpAPI and Wikipedia for enhanced real-time info retrieval. It stores recent chat history in a 20-message buffer to maintain context, enabling dynamic, informed human-like conversations.

name: Automated Lead Qualification and Deal Creation
description: This n8n workflow automates cold email response analysis using Gmail, OpenAI GPT-4, and Pipedrive CRM. It checks replies for interest in meetings, qualifies leads with AI, and creates deals in Pipedrive for interested prospects, streamlining sales outreach processes.

name: RAG AI Agent with Milvus & Cohere
description: Automates Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) using Cohere embeddings, Milvus vector DB, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Google Drive. Upload PDFs to Drive, auto-embed and store in Milvus, then query via an AI chat agent for contextual AI responses.

name: Social Media Post Generator & Twitter Poster
description: Automates social media post creation by fetching content ideas from Google Sheets, generating posts using OpenAI GPT-4, posting to Twitter via Twitter API, and updating Google Sheets with posting info. Integrates Google Sheets, OpenAI, and Twitter APIs.

name: Daily AI News Summary & Translation to Telegram
description: An automated workflow fetching daily AI news from NewsAPI and GNews, summarizing and translating top articles into Traditional Chinese using GPT-4, and delivering the digest via Telegram bot. Integrates NewsAPI, GNews, OpenAI GPT-4, and Telegram API for seamless news updates.

name: Notion-Triggered AI SEO Content Publisher
description: Automates creation and publishing of SEO-optimized blog posts by detecting Notion database updates. Integrates Notion API, Langchain AI, WordPress API, Gmail, and DeepSeek AI to write, publish, notify, and log content seamlessly.

name: Blotato Multi-Platform Social Media Publisher
description: Automates publishing of videos and images to Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Threads, and Bluesky using Blotato API. Integrates Airtable for content management and OpenAI GPT-4 for optimizing YouTube titles, enabling streamlined multi-channel social media scheduling.

name: Crypto News Sentiment Telegram Bot
description: Telegram bot leveraging OpenAI GPT-4o, integrated with multiple crypto news RSS feeds. It analyzes user queries, fetches relevant articles, summarizes news and market sentiment for cryptocurrencies or companies, and delivers concise AI-generated insights via Telegram messages.

name: AI Company Research & Data Enrichment
description: Automates company info research using n8n with OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, ScrapingBee, and Google Sheets. Extracts data like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, plans, APIs, integrations, and case studies for B2B/B2C markets, enabling scalable enrichment workflows.

name: Auto Video Upload & Caption for Social Media
description: Automates uploading videos from a Google Drive folder to TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube using upload-post.com API. Extracts audio with OpenAI to generate engaging captions, sending error alerts via Telegram. Tech: Google Drive, OpenAI, upload-post.com API, Telegram.

name: YouTube to SEO Blog Post Automator
description: Automate SEO blog post creation from YouTube videos using Dumpling AI for transcripts and image generation, OpenAI's GPT-4o for content writing, and Gmail for emailing the finished post. Converts video content into optimized, structured blog-ready HTML with engaging images.

name: Discord AI Management Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Discord bot API and OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model to manage Discord server channels with AI-driven message responses. Features workflow & chat triggers, context memory, and multi-channel posting for automated, stylish Discord communication.

name: AI Meeting Summary & Follow-Up Scheduler
description: Automates extraction of Google Meet transcripts, uses OpenAI-powered AI agent to summarize meetings, identify key points, and schedule follow-up Google Calendar events with attendees. Integrates Google Calendar, Google Drive, Google Meet APIs, and OpenAI Langchain AI agent.

name: AI-Powered Calendar Assistant with PDF Q&A
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o, Pinecone vector store, Google Calendar API, and Langchain to automate appointment booking with Max Tkacz, classify emails, and enable chat-based Q&A on PDFs like the BTC whitepaper, all via a chat interface and Slack notifications.

name: AI Meeting Task & Scheduling Assistant
description: Automates meeting transcript processing from Fireflies using OpenAI GPT-4 to create Airtable tasks, notify clients via Gmail, and schedule follow-up calls in Google Calendar. Streamlines project management by converting meeting notes into actionable workflows.

name: AI Real-Time Meeting Transcription & Notes
description: Automates real-time meeting transcription and note-taking using Recall.ai for transcription, OpenAI GPT-4 for AI insights, and Supabase/Postgres for data storage. Captures, structures, and analyzes meeting dialogue for productivity boosts.

name: Supabase File AI Chatbot Integration
description: Automates document processing from Supabase storage by fetching files, extracting text/PDF content, vectorizing data with OpenAI embeddings, storing vectors in Supabase, and enabling conversational queries via an AI chat interface using Langchain and OpenAI APIs.

name: AI Chat Agent for Supabase DB
description: N8N workflow integrating OpenAI and Supabase PostgreSQL to create an AI-powered chat assistant for database queries. It dynamically generates SQL based on user input, retrieves schema info, runs queries, and returns data via conversational AI.

name: AI Google Calendar Assistant with OpenAI
description: n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o and Google Calendar API to create and retrieve calendar events. It uses Langchain for AI agent management, supports natural language chat input, and dynamic memory buffer for session context.

name: Airtable PDF Data Extractor with LLM Automation
description: Automates extraction of data from PDFs stored in Airtable using dynamic prompts and OpenAI LLM. Utilizes Airtable webhooks, PDF extraction, LangChain LLM nodes, and HTTP requests for real-time AI-based field updates in Airtable records.

name: AI Voice Chat with OpenAI, Gemini & ElevenLabs
description: An AI voice chat system that transcribes speech using OpenAI, generates conversational responses with Google Gemini Chat model, manages context via LangChain memory nodes, and creates speech audio using ElevenLabs API. Integrates webhook for real-time voice interaction.

name: Voice RAG Chatbot with ElevenLabs & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow creating a voice-interactive RAG chatbot using ElevenLabs voice agents, OpenAI language models & embeddings, Qdrant vector store, and Google Drive for document ingestion. Enables answering user questions via voice by integrating speech & AI-driven document retrieval.

name: AI-Driven HR Job Application Workflow
description: Automates job applications with a custom form, uploads CVs to Google Drive, stores data in Airtable, uses OpenAI GPT for candidate scoring, generates interview questions, emails candidates, schedules interviews via Google Calendar, and tracks hiring stages.

name: Movie Recommender Chatbot with Qdrant & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow that builds a conversational movie recommendation chatbot using GitHub-stored IMDb data, OpenAI embeddings and chat models, and a Qdrant vector database for similarity search to deliver personalized movie recommendations.

name: YouTube AI Assistant Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates YouTube content insight extraction using YouTube Data API, OpenAI, Apify, and PostgreSQL. It supports channel and video details retrieval, comment analysis, video transcription, thumbnail evaluation, and integrates AI agent conversational tools to help creators optimize and plan content.

name: YouTube RSS Feed Notifier with Email & Telegram
description: Automates monitoring of YouTube channels via RSS feeds, fetching video details using YouTube Data API, and delivers custom notifications via Gmail (individual or digest emails) and Telegram. Includes OpenAI for generating responsive HTML email cards. Ideal for content creators and marketers.

name: Telegram AI Bot with Human-in-the-Loop Handoff
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram, Redis, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for a state-driven chatbot that collects customer info, performs AI onboarding and after-sales support, and seamlessly hands off dialogs to human agents using human-in-the-loop with session memory and conversation summaries.

name: UTM Link & QR Generator with GA Reports
description: Automates UTM link creation with custom parameters, stores links in Airtable, generates QR codes via QuickChart, and schedules Google Analytics reports analyzed by OpenAI GPT-4. Integrates OpenAI, Airtable, Google Analytics, Gmail, and QuickChart APIs for marketing campaign tracking.

name: AI Instagram Caption Generator with Airtable
description: Automates creation of Instagram captions by integrating Airtable editorial plans with OpenAI's GPT-4 via n8n. Uses Airtable for briefing and background info on target audience, then generates creative, CTA-focused captions tailored for social media posts.

name: AI SQL Agent with Dynamic Charting
description: An n8n workflow that integrates OpenAI GPT-4 with a SQL database to answer user data queries. It dynamically determines if a chart is needed, generates Chart.js definitions via OpenAI, and produces visual charts using Quickchart.io for enhanced data analysis and visualization.

name: AI Workplace Discrimination Analysis
description: Automates extraction and analysis of workplace discrimination patterns by scraping Glassdoor reviews using ScrapingBee, analyzing demographic ratings with OpenAI, and visualizing disparities via QuickChart. Identifies biased experiences across demographic groups with statistical insights.

name: Semantic Web Search & Result Re-Ranking
description: An n8n workflow that uses Brave Search API for web queries combined with advanced LLMs (OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini) to generate, refine, and semantically re-rank search results for precise info retrieval. Ideal for research with AI-powered query optimization and detailed result extraction.

name: OpenSea NFT Insights via AI & Telegram
description: An n8n workflow that integrates Telegram, OpenAI GPT-4o Mini, and OpenSea API agent workflows to deliver AI-powered real-time NFT market analysis, collection stats, listings, and ownership insights directly via Telegram chat.

name: AI-Powered Autonomous Research Workflow
description: An advanced n8n workflow automating deep research by generating search queries via LLM (OpenRouter), querying SerpAPI (Google Search), analyzing content with Jina AI, referencing Wikipedia, and synthesizing a comprehensive report using LangChain agents and memory buffers.

name: WordPress RAG & GenAI Content Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating WordPress API, OpenAI embeddings (text-embedding-3-small), GPT-4o-mini chat model, Supabase vector DB, and Postgres for chat memory. It automates content embedding, updates, and provides a semantic search chatbot using website content.

name: AI-Powered WordPress Post Creator
description: Automates creation of SEO-friendly WordPress draft posts from keywords using OpenAI GPT-4 for text and DALL-E for featured images, integrates Wikipedia for fact-checking, and uploads content and images via WordPress API.

name: Clockify Time Logging Assistant for Slack
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating Clockify API and Slack to manage time entries via conversational chat. Uses OpenAI GPT for natural language processing, supports creating, updating, deleting time logs with user confirmation, and includes tools for date conversion and calculations.

name: AI Knowledge Base Article Generator
description: Automates creating and editing knowledge base articles using Langchain AI agents, Perplexity API for deep research, and OpenAI GPT models. Ensures high-quality content with iterative editorial feedback and publishes directly to Contentful CMS.

name: AI Chatbot with Jina.ai Webpage Scraper
description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating Langchain and OpenAI's gpt-4o-mini model with Jina.ai's real-time web scraping tool. It scrapes live website data from user-supplied URLs, retains conversation memory, and delivers accurate, context-aware answers dynamically, ideal for research and support.

name: SEO Blog Generator with GPT-4o & Telegram
description: Automates SEO blog post creation using OpenAI GPT-4o, integrated with Perplexity AI for research and Telegram for notifications. It generates blog drafts, SEO-friendly titles, slugs, metas, and merges content for streamlined content marketing workflows.

name: AI-Powered Topic Monitoring & Summarization
description: Automates monitoring of RSS feeds with AI using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for relevance classification and article summarization, Jina AI for content extraction, Google Sheets for data storage, and Slack for delivering formatted summaries. Keeps teams informed about relevant topics efficiently.

name: AI-Powered Scheduled WordPress Blog Publisher
description: Automates generation, scheduling, and publishing of SEO-optimized WordPress blog posts using GPT-4o for content, Pexels API for images, and Google Sheets for data management. Features randomized delay for natural posting cadence.

name: AI-powered GitHub Trending Auto Social Poster
description: Automates curation of trending GitHub projects from Hacker News, fetching project details, generating tailored Twitter and LinkedIn posts using OpenAI GPT-4, and posting via X (Twitter) and LinkedIn APIs. Includes Airtable tracking and Telegram notifications.

name: HR & IT Helpdesk Chatbot with Voice Support
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram, OpenAI for text and audio transcription, PostgreSQL vector DB, and Langchain AI agent to build an interactive HR & IT helpdesk chatbot that answers employee queries with internal policy data from PDFs.

name: AI WhatsApp Chatbot: Text, Voice, Image, PDF
description: An AI-powered WhatsApp chatbot built with n8n integrates WhatsApp API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for chat, image analysis, audio transcription, and PDF extraction. It processes text, voice, images, and PDFs to generate intelligent, context-aware replies for versatile user interactions.

name: AI-Powered Google Calendar Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4 via Langchain with Google Calendar API to create, update, get, and delete calendar events intelligently. Handles single and attendee events, using AI to interpret user queries and manage schedules seamlessly.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Assistant
description: An AI-driven email management workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o with Gmail API to automate composing, sending, replying, drafting, labeling, and managing emails efficiently. Designed for professional HTML emails signed as 'Nate'.

name: AI Chatbot with Long Term Memory & Telegram
description: An AI chatbot workflow integrating OpenAI GPT models with long-term memory and note storage in Google Docs. It processes Telegram messages, retrieves and saves user memories and notes, and provides personalized, context-aware responses via Telegram.

name: Automated Social Media Insights for Meetings
description: Daily fetches Google Calendar meetings, enriches attendees via Clearbit, retrieves LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, summarizes social activities using OpenAI GPT-4, and emails personalized summaries via Gmail. Tech: Google Calendar, Clearbit, RapidAPI LinkedIn & Twitter APIs, OpenAI GPT-4, Gmail.

name: WooCommerce Order Support Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating WooCommerce API, DHL tracking, and OpenAI GPT-4 to provide secure, AI-driven customer service chat. Supports encrypted user email, order lookup, shipping status retrieval, and interactive chat embedding for WooCommerce stores.

name: GitLab Merge Request AI Code Reviewer
description: Automates code review for GitLab merge requests by analyzing diffs and providing AI-generated feedback using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini. Integrates GitLab API, n8n workflow, and LangChain for automated, high-quality code review comments.

name: AI WordPress Post Creator
description: Automates creating SEO-friendly WordPress draft posts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for article and chapter generation, Wikipedia for fact verification, and DALL-E for featured image creation in n8n workflow.

name: Email Promo to Podcast Audio Automation
description: Automates conversion of Gmail CATEGORY_PROMOTIONS emails into concise audio podcasts. Uses Gmail API to fetch emails, OpenAI for text summarization, TikTok TTS API for speech synthesis, and Telegram API to send audio messages. Streamlines promo content consumption.

name: AI Speech Coach via Telegram
description: This n8n workflow integrates Telegram, Google Gemini (PaLM) API, OpenAI Whisper transcription, and LangChain to provide AI-powered speech coaching. It processes text and voice messages, offers feedback, generates refined speeches, and manages conversation memory for iterative improvement—all via Telegram chat.

name: Gmail Email Reply Draft with OpenAI
description: Automates drafting email replies in Gmail by using OpenAI Assistant. It fetches emails with specific labels, sends message content to OpenAI, generates reply drafts, converts Markdown to HTML, creates RFC-compliant encoded drafts, and adds them back to Gmail threads. Utilizes Gmail API and OpenAI API within an n8n workflow.

name: Automated AI Graphic Design Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates graphic design from prompt to final image review using Ideogram API, OpenAI GPT-4 for image prompt evaluation, Google Drive and Sheets for storage and logging, and Gmail for notifications. Tailored for creative teams producing audience-optimized visuals.

name: Zoom AI Meeting Assistant
description: Automates Zoom meeting data retrieval, transcript extraction, and participant info to generate formal meeting summaries using OpenAI GPT-4. Integrates with ClickUp for task creation and Microsoft Outlook for scheduling follow-ups. Sends summary emails via SMTP.

name: Survey Response Insights Generator
description: Automates in-depth survey analysis by importing Google Sheets responses, vectorizing with OpenAI embeddings, clustering via K-means in Qdrant, and summarizing insights with GPT-4. Exports detailed sentiment and trends back to Sheets for actionable survey insights.

name: Auto Video Upload & Description for TikTok/Instagram
description: Automates video processing by monitoring a Google Drive folder, extracting audio with OpenAI, generating social media descriptions, and uploading to TikTok and Instagram via upload-post.com API. Includes Telegram error alerts.

name: Gmail AI Auto-Responder Draft Creator
description: Automates Gmail replies by detecting if an incoming email needs a response using OpenAI GPT-4o, then drafts professional replies in the thread via Gmail API. Utilizes n8n workflow with Gmail OAuth2, LangChain nodes, and OpenAI GPT models for smart email management.

name: Daily Meeting Summarizer with Gemini AI & Slack
description: Automates daily retrieval and summarization of Google Calendar meetings using Google Gemini AI model and Langchain Calendar AI Agent, then posts concise summaries back to a Slack channel. Integrates Google Calendar API, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI, Slack API, and n8n automation.

name: PDF to WordPress Blog Creator with Human Approval
description: Automates converting PDFs into SEO-friendly WordPress blog drafts using OpenAI GPT for content, Pollinations.ai for images, with Gmail for human approval and Telegram notifications for publishing updates.

name: Auto SEO Blog Writer with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
description: Automates full SEO blog content creation: collects fresh research via Perplexity API, generates SEO-optimized articles with GPT-4o, publishes to WordPress, sends Gmail & Slack notifications, and logs to Notion. Integrates OpenAI, Perplexity, WordPress, Gmail, Slack, and Notion via n8n.

name: Automate LinkedIn Posts from Notion with AI
description: n8n workflow automates daily LinkedIn posts by fetching content and images from Notion databases, enhancing text using OpenAI's GPT, and publishing to LinkedIn. Includes scheduled triggers, OpenAI API, Notion API, and LinkedIn OAuth integration for seamless social media management.
