name: AI Web Search Agent with Memory
description: An n8n workflow combining OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini, SearchAPI.io, and LangChain to create an AI agent that performs web searches on demand. It uses SearchAPI as a tool and retains recent chat context with a sliding memory buffer for smarter responses.

name: Automated WordPress Blog Creator with GPT
description: An n8n workflow automating WordPress blog posts using OpenAI GPT-4 for content and titles, PostgreSQL to track category usage, and WordPress REST API to publish posts and upload media automatically on a schedule.

name: AI-Powered Content Generator & Organizer
description: Automates content creation using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI API, organizing outputs in Google Drive and Google Sheets. Collects user inputs via web form, generates and formats article outlines and sections, uploads docs to Drive, and tracks with Sheets.

name: AI Lead Qualification & Notification Automation
description: Automates lead processing by integrating ERPNext, OpenAI GPT, Google Sheets/Docs, and Microsoft Outlook. Uses an AI agent to analyze lead notes, validate inquiries, find relevant contacts, and generate notification emails summarizing customer requests for prompt action.

name: Telegram AI Audio Translator (55 Languages)
description: Automates translation of Telegram voice messages using OpenAI's speech-to-text and chat models. Supports 55 languages, converting speech to text, auto-detecting language, translating between native and target languages, and replying with translated text and audio. Tech: Telegram API, OpenAI API, n8n.

name: YouTube Video Chapter Generator
description: Automates generating YouTube video chapters by extracting captions via YouTube API, processing transcripts with Google Gemini AI, and updating video descriptions. Integrates n8n, YouTube OAuth2 API, Google Gemini PaLM model, and Langchain nodes for structured output.

name: AI Social Media Publisher from WordPress
description: Automates social media posting from WordPress content using AI-generated, platform-tailored captions and images. Integrates WordPress, Google Sheets, OpenRouter (Gemini 2.0), OpenAI, and APIs for X (Twitter), Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for multi-platform publishing.

name: Selenium Web Scraper with OpenAI Analysis
description: An advanced n8n workflow integrating Selenium via Docker, Google Search, and OpenAI GPT-4 to extract, analyze, and retrieve web data even behind login or restricted access. Supports cookie injection, screenshots, proxy use, and AI-based info extraction for dynamic web scraping.

name: Telegram AI Personal Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram, OpenAI GPT-4o, Tavily web search API, and specialized agent workflows for email, calendar, contacts, and content creation. It processes user commands via chat, routes requests to proper agents, transcribes voice messages, and replies seamlessly.

name: Notion to Linear Issue Importer
description: Automates issue creation in Linear from Notion blocks. Uses Notion API to fetch tasks, OpenAI GPT-4 to shorten titles, and Linear GraphQL API to create issues and assign team members based on extracted data. Ideal for integrating task management between Notion and Linear.

name: AI Pitch Deck Analyzer & Q&A Chatbot
description: Automates pitch deck ingestion from Airtable, converts PDFs to images using Stirling PDF API, transcribes pages to markdown via AI Vision (OpenAI GPT-4o), extracts structured startup data, updates Airtable records, and builds a Qdrant vector store for AI-powered pitch deck Q&A chatbot.

name: AI Chat Assistant for Airtable Data
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Chat (including LangChain) with Airtable API to enable conversational querying, data retrieval, filtering, aggregation, and analysis of Airtable bases. Includes tools for dynamic search filter generation, code processing, and map image creation.

name: Automated AI-Powered JIRA Issue Resolver
description: An n8n workflow automates the management of unresolved JIRA issues using OpenAI GPT-4 models, Jira and Notion APIs, and Slack integration. It classifies issues, attempts AI-based resolution via knowledgebase search, performs sentiment analysis, posts comments, closes tickets, and notifies Slack channels, enhancing customer support efficiency.

name: AI Phone Agent with RetellAI & RAG
description: An AI phone agent workflow using RetellAI for voice calls, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for transcript summarization, RAG with Qdrant vector DB for knowledge retrieval, and Google Calendar for appointment booking. Sends summaries via Telegram and automates customer support calls effectively.

name: CallForge Sales Call AI Insights
description: Automates extraction of structured insights from sales call transcripts using n8n with Azure OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models. Provides detailed marketing, sales, and product feedback analysis, competitor comparison, and integration status to support sales, marketing, and product teams.

name: Email to Notion Automation
description: Automates processing of incoming Gmail emails using OpenAI GPT-4, extracts tasks and summaries, and creates detailed pages in Notion databases. Uses Airtable to manage routing and labels to prevent duplicate processing.

name: AI-Powered Calendar Appointment Scheduler
description: An intelligent n8n workflow using OpenAI GPT-4, Microsoft Outlook API, and Langchain to handle customer chat, check calendar availability, suggest free slots within UK business hours, and book appointments or escalate to human support with detailed email notifications.

name: Airtable PDF Data Extractor with AI
description: Automates extraction of data from PDFs in Airtable using dynamic prompts and AI/LLM. Utilizes Airtable API, n8n nodes, and OpenAI models to update records based on webhook-triggered events. Ideal for enriching Airtable data with AI-powered document processing.

name: Automated Factoid Email Subscription Service
description: An n8n workflow that automates sending personalized educational fact emails using Airtable for subscriber data, LangChain AI for content and image generation (Groq and OpenAI APIs), Gmail for delivery, and web forms for subscription management.

name: AI Meeting Prep & WhatsApp Notification
description: Automates meeting preparation by checking upcoming Google Calendar events, extracting attendee details from invites, summarizing recent Gmail and LinkedIn correspondence using OpenAI GPT-4, and sending concise WhatsApp pre-meeting notifications. Integrates Google Calendar, Gmail, Apify web scraping, and WhatsApp API.

name: AI-Powered User Interview Workflow
description: Automates user interviews with AI-driven question generation and session management using n8n forms, Langchain AI agent (Groq Chat Model), Redis for session storage, and Google Sheets for transcript saving. Efficient tool for scalable qualitative research.

name: n8n DeepResearcher Automated Research
description: Automates deep multi-step research using OpenAI (o3-mini) and Google Gemini LLMs, Apify web scraping, and Notion API to recursively generate, refine, and compile research insights into detailed reports in Notion. Ideal for complex topic exploration with configurable depth and breadth.

name: Line Chatbot with CBT AI Therapist
description: An n8n workflow integrating Line Messaging API with Azure OpenAI to create a conversational CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) chatbot. Uses Langchain AI Agent powered by Azure OpenAI, handles text messages, provides therapy guidance, and sends replies via Line API with user-friendly loading animations.

name: Inbound Order Email Parser to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of purchase orders from Gmail emails using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini via n8n LangChain AI Agent; parses PO number, delivery date, SKUs, quantities, then stores structured data into Google Sheets for order management.

name: AI-Based SEO Seed Keyword Generator
description: Generates 15-20 targeted SEO seed keywords based on an Ideal Customer Profile using AI (Anthropic Claude 3.5). Utilizes n8n workflow nodes, Langchain AI agent, and requires user-defined ICP data and AI/database connections to automate SEO focus keyword creation.

name: Notion Knowledge Base AI Assistant
description: Automates search and summarization of knowledge from a Notion database using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. Utilizes Notion API for querying database contents and LangChain for managing AI agent memory and tool integration, enabling concise, fact-based Q&A from company knowledge bases.

name: Fastmail AI Email Draft Assistant
description: Automates drafting email replies for Fastmail using OpenAI GPT-4. Monitors IMAP inbox for new emails, extracts content, generates replies with GPT-4, and uploads drafts via Fastmail's JMAP API. Integrates IMAP, Fastmail API, and OpenAI in n8n workflow.

name: Batch Processing with Anthropic Claude API
description: Automates sending and retrieving multiple batched prompts to Anthropic Claude AI via its Batch API. Uses n8n with HTTP Request nodes, JavaScript code processing, and Langchain memory management for parallel prompt execution and result aggregation.

name: CSRD Email Audit & Summary Automation
description: Automates review of CSRD XHTML report emails received in Gmail. Uses Gmail API to trigger, extracts XHTML attachments, audits content for sustainability disclosures, and employs AI (LangChain + OpenAI GPT-4o-mini) to generate professional audit summary emails. Improves ESG compliance communication.

name: n8n AI-Enhanced FAQ Generator from Google Sheets
description: Automates FAQ creation by reading service data from Google Sheets, generating Q&A templates, enhancing answers using OpenAI GPT-4, and saving results as JSON in Google Drive. Supports native, credential-only, and non-native integrations for CMS publishing.

name: Venafi Slack CertBot Automation
description: Automates SSL certificate requests via Slack using Venafi TLS Protect Cloud, VirusTotal for domain risk analysis, and OpenAI for risk summarization, enabling auto or manual CSR issuance with Slack modal interactions and security validation workflows.

name: Image Embedding for Vector Search
description: An n8n workflow that downloads an image from Google Drive, extracts color channel info, generates semantic keywords using OpenAI Vision model, combines data into an embedding document, and inserts it into an in-memory vector store for efficient image vector search.

name: Supabase Vector DB Q&A Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Drive, OpenAI embeddings and chat models, Supabase vector database for embedding storage/retrieval, and LangChain for recursive text splitting and QA. Enables document upload, vector embedding insertion/updating, and conversational Q&A on custom knowledge bases.

name: HN Comments Insight Generator
description: Automates extracting, vectorizing, clustering Hacker News story comments using HN API, OpenAI embeddings, Qdrant vector DB, and K-means in Python. Summarizes clustered feedback with GPT-4 and exports insights to Google Sheets.

name: Twilio AI Chat with Redis Buffer
description: Automates SMS chat replies using Twilio for messages, Redis to buffer incoming texts, and OpenAI's Chat Model via LangChain agent to generate a single aggregated AI response after a 5-second pause, improving conversational flow for bursty user input.

name: AI-Powered SMS Appointment Scheduling Bot
description: Automates SMS-based appointment scheduling for PC/Laptop repairs using Twilio SMS, Airtable for session management, OpenAI GPT for conversational AI, and Cal.com API for booking. Includes follow-ups and STOP command handling to manage engagement effectively.

name: AI Texas Tax Code Assistant Chatbot
description: Automates extraction and querying of Texas tax codes using n8n. Downloads tax code PDFs, extracts sections, creates Mistral.ai embeddings, stores in Qdrant vector database, and enables an AI chatbot via OpenAI and Langchain to answer tax-related queries.

name: AI Rental Payment Reconciliation
description: Automates reconciliation of rental payments by watching local bank statement CSV files, querying tenant and property data from an Excel file, and using OpenAI GPT-4 to identify payment discrepancies, generating actionable reports all within n8n self-hosted workflows.

name: AI-Powered Product Photo Data Enrichment
description: Automates enrichment of product info from photos in Airtable using OpenAI vision & chat models, SERPAPI reverse image search, and Firecrawl web scraper. Designed for building surveyors to identify and update product attributes efficiently.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Link Scraper
description: An autonomous AI workflow using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Supabase to crawl websites from a database, extract all social media profile URLs, and store them in a structured format. It leverages HTML parsing, HTTP requests, LangChain tools, and data cleaning.

name: Daily Digest Email for n8n.io Templates
description: Automates daily email newsletters by fetching the latest n8n.io workflow templates from selected categories stored in Excel. Uses Microsoft Excel, HTTP Request for n8n API, OpenAI GPT-4 for summaries, and Microsoft Outlook to send personalized digests to subscribers.

name: Automated RFP Q&A Generator
description: Automates RFP responses by extracting questions from PDF RFPs using n8n with Langchain AI (OpenAI), creates Google Docs for answers, and sends notifications via Gmail and Slack. Enables efficient, AI-powered RFP answering and improves sales team productivity.

name: Automated Invoice Data Extraction & Reconciliation
description: Automates extraction of invoice data from Gmail PDF attachments using LlamaParse PDF parser, OpenAI GPT-3.5 LLM for structured data extraction, and exports results to Google Sheets. Workflow manages email labeling to prevent duplicates and handles processing status polling.

name: AI Resume Parsing & Client Usage Billing
description: Self-hosted n8n workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain Code node to parse uploaded resume PDFs into structured JSON. Tracks token usage and costs per client, logs data to Google Sheets, and auto-generates monthly invoices via Gmail. Enables cost monitoring & billing automation for AI document extraction services.

name: Qdrant MCP Server for Review Analysis
description: An n8n workflow implementing a customized MCP server to extend Qdrant's vector database features with review database management. Utilizes OpenAI for embeddings and Qdrant API for advanced search, grouping, and recommendation functionalities to handle, search, compare, and recommend customer reviews.

name: AcuityScheduling Support Chatbot with RAG
description: An n8n workflow that creates a support chatbot for AcuityScheduling.com using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and LangChain agent. It integrates with Acuity's support search API for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to provide accurate, up-to-date answers by querying existing knowledgebase articles, optimizing token usage.

name: PayCaptain Employee MCP Server
description: n8n workflow creates an MCP server for PayCaptain payroll, enabling employee search, lookup, and updates via the PayCaptain API. Uses MCP Server Trigger, HTTP Request, Google Sheets (for logs), and LangChain tool workflows. Ideal for payroll automation with audit logging.

name: Restaurant Order Chatbot to Google Sheets
description: Automates restaurant order taking via AI chat using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain. Extracts item names, quantities, and table numbers from chats, verifies input, then logs each order item with timestamp into Google Sheets for POS integration.

name: Voice-to-Email Reply Assistant
description: An n8n workflow automating email reply drafting by analyzing incoming Gmail messages, assessing response need via OpenAI GPT chat, sending email details to Telegram, accepting voice note replies on Telegram, transcribing audio with OpenAI Whisper, and drafting polished replies in Gmail threads.

name: Automated Arabic Kids Story Generator
description: An n8n workflow that uses OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo for crafting, translating, and summarizing kids' stories to Arabic, generating DALL·E images and audio narration, and distributing content via Telegram. Ideal for educational content creators and language learning apps.

name: Reddit Business Lead Finder & Summarizer
description: Automates extraction of Reddit posts from Entrepreneur subreddit using Reddit API, filters posts by engagement and recency, uses OpenRouter GPT-4.1 AI to identify business opportunities and summarize them, then appends results to Google Sheets for lead management.

name: Chat Message Batch Consolidator with LangChain
description: This n8n workflow buffers chat messages per context using Redis, waits for inactivity or message count thresholds, and uses OpenAI GPT-4.1-nano via LangChain to consolidate messages into a single summary paragraph. Ideal for chat apps needing batch processing and deduplication.

name: Automated Product Photo Enhancement & Storage
description: An n8n workflow that downloads product images from Google Sheets, uses OpenAI GPT models to analyze and create AI-generated professional product photography prompts, edits images with OpenAI's image editing API, then uploads results to Google Drive and updates the sheet. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI GPT-4 & GPT-4O, OpenAI Image Edit API, Google Sheets, Google Drive.

name: EU Sustainability News Daily Digest
description: Automates daily scraping of EU news, classifies sustainability articles using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain, records results in Google Sheets, and sends a curated HTML email digest via Gmail. Integrates HTTP Request, HTML parsing, AI classification, Sheets, and Gmail nodes for sustainable news curation.

name: EU Sustainability Legislative Scraper & Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes EU parliamentary legislative procedures from an official site, uses OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo to classify sustainability-related items, records filtered results in Google Sheets, and creates Google Tasks for study reminders. Tech stack: HTTP request, HTML parsing, OpenAI API, Google Sheets, Google Tasks.

name: Automated Alt Text Generator for Web Images
description: n8n workflow extracts images and alt texts from a webpage, then uses OpenAI GPT-4O to generate improved alt text for images with short descriptions. Results are stored and updated in Google Sheets for accessibility enhancement and SEO improvement.

name: Google Drive File Search & Content Extractor
description: An n8n workflow acting as a Google Drive MCP server to search, download, and extract content from files (PDF, CSV, images, audio, video) using Google Drive API and OpenAI. Enables AI-rich file understanding and text extraction for MCP clients.

name: SMS Course Assistant with Twilio & Airtable
description: An automated SMS chatbot workflow using Twilio for SMS triggers, OpenAI (GPT-4) for natural language understanding, and Airtable as a course database. It fetches and answers course queries, logs interactions, and provides up-to-date academic info for Northvale Institute students.

name: PostgreSQL MCP Server for DB Management
description: An n8n workflow acting as a PostgreSQL MCP server enabling secure database management operations (select, insert, update) via MCP clients like Claude Desktop. Uses n8n nodes (Postgres, LangChain MCP Trigger/Tools), avoids raw SQL for security and supports schema introspection.

name: Amazon Reviews Analysis & Creative Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates scraping Amazon product reviews using Bright Data API, stores data in Google Sheets, summarizes reviews with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, generates Ads images, and emails media buyers. It leverages Bright Data API, Google Sheets, OpenAI GPT, and Gmail for competitive review analysis and marketing creative generation.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Ad Copy Generator
description: n8n workflow scraping Trustpilot competitor reviews via Bright Data API, storing results in Google Sheets, filtering negative reviews, summarizing with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and emailing ad copy suggestions for marketing campaigns.

name: Glassdoor Job Listings Scraper with Bright Data
description: Automates job prospecting by scraping Glassdoor job listings via Bright Data API, processes data with OpenAI GPT-4 and LangChain, and stores results in Google Sheets. Includes customizable queries via form triggers for targeted job search automation.

name: Indeed Job Listing Scraper with Bright Data & LLM
description: Automates job search by scraping Indeed listings using Bright Data API. Integrates n8n for workflow, Google Sheets for storage, and OpenAI GPT-4 mini model to assess applicant-job fit. Uses form trigger for search parameters and polls for data readiness.

name: Telegram Meal Nutrient Logger
description: Automates logging meal nutrients from Telegram messages (text or voice). Uses Telegram API, OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) for transcription and nutrition analysis, Langchain for structured parsing, and stores data in Google Sheets.

name: AI-Powered Daily Israeli News Digest
description: Automates fetching and processing of Israeli news from Calcalist and Mako RSS feeds, uses GPT-4o to select top 5 executive-relevant articles, and generates a formatted HTML email digest sent daily via SMTP.

name: Google Keep Notes to Google Sheets via AI
description: Automates exporting Google Keep notes stored as JSON files in Google Drive, filters, processes content with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model via LangChain AI, and appends extracted data to Google Sheets. Uses Google Drive, Google Sheets APIs, and OpenAI for text extraction and data structuring.

name: Ghost Blog to LinkedIn Post Generator
description: Automates extracting latest blog posts from Ghost CMS, cleans content, and uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain AI agent to create professional LinkedIn promotional messages. Outputs results to Google Sheets for easy tracking and sharing.

name: Lemlist Reply Auto-Categorizer & Slack Alerts
description: Automate classification of Lemlist email replies using OpenAI GPT-4o and send structured Slack notifications. Features include auto-unsubscribe and marking interested leads via Lemlist API integration. Workflow uses n8n with Lemlist, OpenAI, Slack APIs.

name: AI Travel Planner with MongoDB & Google Gemini
description: An AI-powered travel assistant built with n8n using Google Gemini for chat, MongoDB Atlas for chat memory and vector search, and OpenAI embeddings. It ingests points of interest, enabling intelligent travel recommendations based on up-to-date vectorized data.

name: AI Children’s Storytelling on Telegram
description: Automates creation and sharing of children’s stories on Telegram using OpenAI GPT-3.5 for story and image prompts, DALL·E for images, and OpenAI-generated audio. Scheduled to run every 12 hours, integrates Telegram API for direct story, audio, and image delivery.

name: Qdrant Vector DB Embedding Pipeline
description: Automates embedding of JSON documents from FTP into Qdrant vector DB using OpenAI embeddings. Uses FTP for file retrieval, OpenAI 'text-embedding-ada-002' for embeddings, Qdrant Vector Store for storage, and Langchain nodes for splitting and loading. Ideal for semantic search setups.

name: Pipedrive Organization Data Enrichment
description: Automates enrichment of Pipedrive organizations by scraping their website using ScrapingBee, summarizing company info with OpenAI GPT-4o, adding a detailed note in Pipedrive, and sending Slack notifications. Utilizes Pipedrive API, ScrapingBee API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Slack integration.

name: LLM Output Comparison with OpenRouter & Sheets
description: An n8n workflow to compare outputs of two language models via OpenRouter API, displaying results side-by-side in chat and logging them into Google Sheets. Features isolated model memory, supports OpenAI and Vertex AI, enabling manual or automated evaluation.

name: Thai Line ChatBot with Google Sheets Memory
description: An automated Thai-language chatbot for LINE using Google Gemini AI and Google Sheets to store and retrieve user conversation history as context memory. Built with n8n, integrating LINE Messaging API, LangChain AI Agent, and Google Sheets API.

name: AI T-Shirt Design Redesign from Image URL
description: This n8n workflow uses OpenAI APIs (GPT-4o, image analysis, and image generation) combined with Langchain AI Agent to analyze a T-shirt mockup image URL, creatively refine its design prompt, and generate a new high-quality T-shirt artwork image. Automates apparel redesign with AI.

name: AI-Powered Dynamic Clarification Form
description: This n8n workflow uses OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model to analyze open-ended form responses and dynamically generate follow-up questions to avoid redundancy, optimizing data capture. It combines n8n forms, Langchain output parsing, and filtering to create adaptive multi-step forms for AI consultancy lead qualification.

name: Web Data Search & Summarization with Gemini AI
description: Automates web data retrieval and summarization using Bright Data's scraping API, Perplexity search, and Google Gemini AI models. Extracts data snapshots, processes and summarizes content via LangChain integration, then sends results to webhooks for notifications.

name: OpenSea NFT Data AI Agent
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating OpenSea API and GPT-4o Mini to retrieve, analyze, and process NFT collections, user profiles, contracts, NFTs, payment tokens, and traits. Enables real-time structured NFT insights with advanced query support and session memory.

name: LINE Chatbot with Google Calendar & Gmail AI
description: An n8n workflow integrating LINE messaging with Google Calendar and Gmail using OpenAI & LangChain AI. It enables conversational AI responses, calendar event creation/reading, and email reading via LINE chatbot, enhancing productivity and user assistance.

name: OpenSea NFT Analytics Agent
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and the OpenSea API to fetch and analyze NFT collection stats, wallet events, and market trends. Provides real-time NFT insights, supports multiple endpoints, and ensures compliant, structured NFT data retrieval.

name: Custom AI Chat Agent with LangChain & Gemini
description: An n8n workflow that creates a self-hosted AI chat agent using LangChain and Google Gemini API. Features include conversation memory buffer, custom prompt engineering for a Chinese-speaking persona, and webhook-triggered chat interface.

name: AI Gmail Auto Labeler
description: Automates Gmail email labeling by analyzing message content with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain in n8n. It triggers on new emails, fetches content, assigns AI-driven labels like 'Inquiry', 'Partnership', 'Notification', and updates Gmail labels accordingly for organized inbox management.

name: YouTube Trending Content Insight Generator
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI and YouTube APIs to help creators find and analyze trending YouTube videos by niche. It uses Langchain agent, YouTube Data API, and OpenAI language models to provide insightful, data-driven content trends from recent videos.

name: Colombian Electronic Invoice Processor
description: Automates extraction and organization of Colombian electronic invoices from Gmail ZIP attachments. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain to parse PDF and XML invoice data, validates totals, saves PDFs to Google Drive, and logs details in Google Sheets for easy tracking.

name: Discord AI Chat Agent with MCP Integration
description: An n8n workflow that enables natural language chat interaction in Discord via MCP protocol, using OpenAI GPT-4o model as AI agent. It listens to chat messages, processes with Langchain AI agent, and interacts with a customizable MCP server for powerful Discord bot capabilities.

name: Gmail Invoice Attachments to Google Drive & Sheets
description: Automates processing of unread Gmail emails with PDF invoices by saving attachments to Google Drive, extracting invoice data using OpenAI's GPT-4, and appending results to Google Sheets for reconciliation. Integrates Gmail API, Google Drive API, Google Sheets API, and OpenAI GPT-4.

name: Weekly News Scraper & Summarizer
description: Automates weekly scraping of news posts from Colt's website without RSS feed. Uses CSS selectors for extracting titles, dates, and links, then summarizes and extracts keywords via OpenAI GPT-4 API. Stores results in a NocoDB SQL database for further processing.

name: Automated Image Metadata Tagging
description: An n8n workflow that automatically tags images uploaded to a specific Google Drive folder by analyzing their content with OpenAI's GPT-4o vision model and embedding keywords into the image's metadata. Integrates Google Drive and OpenAI APIs for seamless image content analysis and metadata updates.

name: YouTube Comment Sentiment Analyzer
description: Automated workflow to extract YouTube video URLs from Google Sheets, fetch video comments via YouTube Data API v3, analyze sentiment using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model, and log results and timestamps back to Google Sheets for tracking and analysis.

name: Obsidian Notes Automation via Google Drive & OpenAI
description: Automates creation/update of Markdown notes in an Obsidian Vault by saving workflow outputs to Google Drive. Uses n8n, Google Drive API, and OpenAI for AI-powered Zettelkasten note generation and YAML frontmatter metadata. Enables real-time, structured knowledge management.

name: Email to Todoist Task Automation
description: Automates converting Gmail emails into Todoist tasks using n8n workflow with Gmail API, Todoist API, and OpenAI's GPT-4 mini model. Summarizes email content, proposes actions, and manages task lifecycle for efficient email-task integration.

name: AI-Powered Contact Manager with Airtable
description: Automates contact management combining OpenAI GPT-4o and Airtable APIs. Uses AI agent for intelligent querying, adding, and updating contacts seamlessly, ideal for CRM automation and productivity enhancement.

name: YouTube Transcript Summarizer & Telegram Notifier
description: Automates extraction, summarization, and analysis of YouTube video transcripts using YouTube API, a custom YouTube transcripter, and GPT-4o mini. Sends structured summaries and video info to a Telegram channel. Built with n8n workflow automation.

name: DeepSeek Chat & Reasoning Agent
description: An n8n workflow integrating DeepSeek's AI models (deepseek-chat & deepseek-reasoner) and Ollama local model for advanced conversational AI with reasoning. Uses Langchain nodes, HTTP requests, memory buffer, and OpenAI-compatible APIs to manage chat interactions and multi-turn memory.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Long Term Memory
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API with DeepSeek AI (compatible with OpenAI API) and Google Docs for long-term memory storage. It validates Telegram user identity, routes message types, processes chats with AI, and saves user-specific memories to enable personalized, context-aware conversations.

name: Telegram Resume Extractor & PDF Generator
description: Automates resume processing via Telegram: downloads PDFs, uses OpenAI GPT-4 to parse resumes into structured JSON, formats data into HTML, converts to PDF using Gotenberg, then sends PDF back to users. Integrates Telegram API, OpenAI API, and Gotenberg.

name: Google Drive PDF Chat with Pinecone & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow that downloads a PDF from Google Drive, splits it into chunks, inserts embeddings into Pinecone vector DB, and enables chat queries with citation-based answers using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model. Integrates Google Drive, Pinecone API, and OpenAI API.

name: AI Support Agent with Email Verification & Slack Alert
description: An AI agent workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and LangChain framework in n8n. It checks user input for an email, prompts for it if missing, or alerts a Slack channel for human support. Integrates chat triggers, memory buffer, and conditional logic for support escalation.

name: AI-Powered SQL Query Chatbot with PostgreSQL
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini with a PostgreSQL database via Langchain AI Agent. It enables conversational SQL queries using chat input with in-memory context, ideal for interactive database exploration and querying.

name: AI Agent for Google Sheets Customer Queries
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Google Sheets API to create an AI agent that answers complex customer data queries by selectively retrieving column names, column values, or customer rows from a Google Sheet. Supports dynamic data fetching to handle large datasets efficiently.

name: YouTube Video Transcript Summarizer with LangChain
description: An n8n workflow that uses searchapi.io to fetch YouTube video transcripts and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain to generate detailed summaries and example Q&A, helping users quickly understand and interact with video content.

name: AI-Powered Webpage Fetch and Markdown Converter
description: An n8n workflow integrating Langchain AI Agent with OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini and HTTP requests to fetch, sanitize, simplify, and convert webpage HTML content into Markdown. Handles errors, limits length, and offers a simplified or full content mode.

name: Blockchain DEX Screener Insights Agent
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to provide real-time insights on decentralized exchange (DEX) data via DexScreener API endpoints. It processes user queries from Telegram, fetching token profiles, boosts, pairs, orders, and pools to deliver detailed blockchain DEX analytics.

name: Printify Product Title & Description Updater
description: An automation workflow integrating Printify API, Google Sheets, and OpenAI to update product titles and descriptions. It uses AI to generate engaging ecommerce content following custom brand guidelines, syncing updates when sheet rows change.

name: AI-Driven Personalized Marketing Emails
description: An n8n workflow that automates personalized marketing email campaigns using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4-mini. It analyzes customer purchase and feedback data, generates tailored email content, and conditionally adds coupons. Includes email HTML templating and SMTP sending via n8n.

name: Podcast Transcript Summarizer & Digest Sender
description: Automates summarizing a podcast transcript with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, extracts key topics and questions, enriches them via Wikipedia research, formats the content in HTML, and emails a digest using Gmail. Utilizes n8n, LangChain modules, OpenAI API, and Wikipedia tool.

name: AI Email Auto-Reply and Feedback Logger
description: Automates email replies using OpenAI GPT via Gmail trigger; stores incoming emails, generated replies, and feedback in Google Sheets for fine-tuning. Utilizes Gmail OAuth2, OpenAI API, and Google Sheets OAuth2 for seamless AI-driven email handling and feedback recording.

name: Gmail PDF Attachment Filter & Google Drive Upload
description: Automates filtering PDF email attachments by text content using OpenAI, then uploads matched PDFs to a Google Drive folder. Integrates Gmail, OpenAI, and Google Drive via n8n. Ideal for processing invoices, payslips, or contracts received by email automatically.

name: n8n Creators Leaderboard Reporting Workflow
description: Automates daily reporting of the top n8n community creators and workflows using GitHub data sources, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Google Gemini LLM for insights. Generates markdown reports, saves to Google Drive, and distributes via Gmail and Telegram, highlighting community trends and top contributors.

name: Telegram Bot: AI Text, Audio & Image Handler
description: An automated Telegram bot workflow using n8n. It sets up Telegram webhooks and processes incoming messages with AI capabilities: transcribes voice to text, analyzes images with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, classifies text messages, and routes them accordingly. Integrates Telegram API, Langchain OpenAI nodes, and n8n automation.

name: LM Studio Multi-LLM Testing & Analysis
description: Automates testing and comparison of multiple local LLMs via LM Studio server. Uses HTTP requests, LangChain nodes, OpenAI API credentials, and Google Sheets for logging. Analyzes response metrics like readability, word count, and timing for informed LLM evaluation.

name: n8n AI Agent for Creator Leaderboard Stats
description: Aggregates n8n community data from GitHub JSONs to generate detailed AI-powered Markdown reports on top creators and their workflows. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request nodes, merges datasets, filters by username, and employs OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for insightful community analytics and trending workflow stats.

name: Perplexity AI Article Formatter
description: n8n workflow integrating Perplexity.ai API with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to convert structured article data into professional, single-line HTML content. Uses AI for research, content enhancement, and HTML formatting to automate article generation with rich metadata and hashtags.

name: n8n Workflow Documentation System
description: This n8n workflow generates, views, edits, and saves Markdown documentation for n8n workflows using Docsify, Mermaid.js, and OpenAI GPT-4 API. It auto-creates workflow docs with interactive Mermaid diagrams, live Markdown editor, and serves HTML/Markdown content via webhooks.

name: n8n Automated Error Analysis & Email Alert
description: Automates error detection in n8n workflows via n8n API, analyzes errors using OpenAI GPT-4o with LangChain, generates detailed diagnosis and resolution, and sends formatted email alerts via Gmail. Ideal for improving workflow reliability with AI-powered insights.

name: Email PDF Attachment Filter & Upload
description: Automates filtering of PDF attachments from Gmail using OpenAI to detect relevant documents (e.g., payslips), then uploads matched PDFs to Google Drive. Uses Gmail API, OpenAI API, and Google Drive API within n8n workflow for document management automation.

name: OpenAI File Retrieval with Citation Formatter
description: Automates citation-rich content retrieval using OpenAI assistant with vector store for file search. Integrates OpenAI API, HTTP requests, and n8n Langchain memory nodes to format text with dynamic citations in Markdown or HTML, enhancing accuracy and traceability.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Long-Term Memory
description: An AI-powered Telegram bot using DeepSeek and LangChain for conversational interaction with long-term memory stored in Google Docs. It validates users, routes message types, and uses DeepSeek's AI models for context-aware, personalized responses.

name: Spotify Control via Telegram and AI
description: Automate Spotify music control by sending messages through Telegram. Uses Telegram API for message triggers, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to parse artist and track info from chat, and Spotify API to search, play, and manage tracks. Ideal for hands-free Spotify interaction.

name: SQL Query Agent with Conversational Memory
description: An n8n workflow that enables conversational AI to query a local SQLite database using OpenAI's GPT-4-turbo model via LangChain. It fetches, extracts, and stores the Chinook sample SQLite DB, then allows interactive SQL queries with memory of previous interactions for better context.

name: YouTube Video Summarizer with AI
description: Automates summarization of YouTube videos by extracting transcripts via Apify API, then using OpenAI's language model with n8n Langchain nodes to produce concise summaries. Ideal for content creators, researchers, and professionals seeking quick insights.

name: Auto Google Doc Summarizer to Sheets
description: Automates summarizing new Google Docs uploaded to a Drive folder using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI and logs summaries with metadata into Google Sheets for easy management. Integrates Google Drive, Docs, Sheets APIs and Langchain AI tools for streamlined document insights.

name: AI Event Banner Generator with n8n
description: Create event banners using n8n forms, OpenAI DALL·E 3 for AI image generation, Cloudinary for image hosting and optimization, BannerBear for templated design, and Discord for automated event posting. Streamlines banner creation and sharing via automation.

name: Hey Siri AI Agent with n8n and OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow integrating Apple Shortcuts with OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model, enabling voice-driven AI interactions via Siri. It uses webhook triggers, LangChain agents, and responds with voice-optimized AI answers, perfect for hands-free intelligent assistant tasks on iOS/macOS.

name: Linear Issue Sentiment Monitoring & Alerts
description: Automates sentiment analysis on updated Linear.app issue comments using OpenAI, stores insights in Airtable, and sends Slack alerts on negative sentiment transitions, enabling proactive support issue management. Tech stack: Linear GraphQL API, OpenAI, Airtable, Slack, n8n.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Sentiment Analyzer
description: Automates scraping of Trustpilot reviews using DeepSeek API, extracts detailed review info, analyzes sentiment with OpenAI, and stores results in Google Sheets. Ideal for companies monitoring customer feedback and sentiment analysis.

name: BambooHR Webhook Testing with PostBin & Slack
description: This n8n workflow enables testing BambooHR webhooks without changing webhook URLs by using PostBin for request capturing and Slack for notifications. It integrates BambooHR API, PostBin API, Slack API, and OpenAI to monitor HR data changes and send welcome messages.

name: Auto Remove PII from Google Drive CSV
description: An n8n workflow that monitors a Google Drive folder for new CSV files, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to detect PII columns in tabular data, removes those PII columns, and uploads sanitized CSVs to another Drive folder. Integrates Google Drive API and OpenAI API.

name: Printify Product Title & Description Updater
description: An n8n workflow automating product title and description updates for Printify shops using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini. Integrates Printify API, Google Sheets for trigger and record keeping, and AI-powered content generation to enhance eCommerce product listings efficiently.

name: AI-Driven Rental Payment Reconciliation
description: An n8n self-hosted workflow automating rental payment reconciliation by monitoring local CSV bank statements, querying tenant & property data from an Excel file, using OpenAI GPT-4 for AI analysis, and updating reports in XLSX format. Stack: n8n, localFileTrigger, OpenAI API, SheetJS.

name: GitHub Prompt Loader and Dynamic AI Prompting
description: n8n workflow fetches markdown prompts from a GitHub repo, dynamically replaces variables set in the workflow, verifies missing variables, and sends the prepared prompt to LangChain AI agent and Ollama chat model for processing and content generation.

name: Automated Lead Qualification & CRM Deal Creation
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gmail, Pipedrive CRM, and OpenAI GPT-4 to automatically assess email replies from cold campaigns, identify interested leads, and create deals in Pipedrive. It enables scalable, AI-powered sales pipeline automation with multi-inbox support.

name: Lead Qualification in Google Sheets via GPT-4
description: Automates lead qualification by monitoring Google Sheets for new entries, using OpenAI GPT-4 (chat model) to evaluate leads based on business criteria, and updating the sheet with a rating. Integrates Google Sheets API and OpenAI's GPT-4 for seamless lead scoring.

name: Tavily API Search & Extract with AI Summary
description: An n8n workflow integrating Tavily API for intelligent web search and content extraction, combined with OpenAI to summarize content. Automates fetching relevant web data and summarizing it for research or content enrichment using Tavily's search/extract endpoints and OpenAI's LLM.

name: RetellAI Automated Lead Call & Scheduling
description: Automates outbound lead qualification calls and inbound appointment scheduling using RetellAI. Integrates Google Sheets (lead tracking), Twilio (SMS reminders), OpenAI GPT-4 (call summarization), and Gmail (email notifications) to streamline call workflows and post-call updates.

name: AI Chatbot for Google Search Console Data
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o and Google Search Console API with Postgres chat memory. Enables conversational querying of Search Console properties and data insights via a secure webhook, providing markdown-formatted responses based on natural language inputs.

name: AI Personal Shopper with RAG & WooCommerce
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI LLM, Qdrant vector database, Google Drive, and WooCommerce to build a personal shopper chatbot. It extracts user intents and product details from chat, queries WooCommerce for products, and uses RAG with store docs for general queries.

name: AI-Powered Air Quality & Pollen Advisor
description: Automates daily air quality and pollen data retrieval via Ambee API, then uses OpenAI GPT-4 and Langchain AI to generate personalized, easy-to-understand environmental health summaries and care suggestions emailed to users based on location and health profile.

name: Text Automations for Apple Shortcuts with OpenAI
description: This n8n workflow integrates Apple Shortcuts with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini API to automate text tasks: translating (English/Spanish), grammar correction, and content length adjustments. Users select text on iOS/macOS, invoke shortcuts linked to a webhook, and receive AI-processed text updates.

name: Linear Issue Sentiment Monitoring & Alerting
description: Automates monitoring of Linear app issues using GraphQL, performs sentiment analysis on issue comments via OpenAI's Chat Model, stores results in Airtable, and sends Slack alerts on negative sentiment transitions. Enables proactive issue management with n8n automation.

name: Invoice Parser: Google Drive to Airtable
description: Automates invoice data extraction from Google Drive using LlamaParse API, OpenAI GPT-4 for line item extraction, then stores structured invoice and line item data in Airtable. Utilizes Google Drive trigger, HTTP requests, and webhook integrations for seamless, real-time processing.

name: Social Media Lead Analyzer & Email Generator
description: Automates lead outreach by extracting LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, analyzes data using OpenAI GPT-4, and generates personalized HTML cover letters sent via SMTP. Integrates Google Sheets for lead data and tracking, ideal for marketers and sales pros.

name: YouTube Video Metadata Automation
description: Automates fetching latest YouTube videos, extracting transcripts via Apify API, generating SEO-optimized descriptions and tags with OpenAI GPT-4 and Google Gemini models, and updating video metadata. Enables scheduling and batch processing of videos using YouTube OAuth2 API within n8n.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Sentiment Analyzer
description: Automates scraping Trustpilot reviews using DeepSeek API, extracts detailed review info, analyzes sentiment via OpenAI, and stores results on Google Sheets for easy tracking and analysis.

name: Airtop AI Web Automation Agent
description: An intelligent n8n workflow integrating Airtop browser tooling and Anthropic Claude 3.5 AI to automate complex web browsing tasks. It uses Langchain AI Agent to query, click, type, load URLs and manage browser sessions, enabling natural language driven web interaction and data extraction.

name: French-To-English Audio Translator
description: Automates French text-to-speech with ElevenLabs, transcribes speech via OpenAI Whisper, translates text using OpenAI GPT, and generates English speech again with ElevenLabs. Useful for multilingual audio content creation and language learning.

name: Company Data Enrichment with OpenAI & Google Sheets
description: Workflow enriches company data from Google Sheets using ScrapingBee for homepage scraping and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for extracting business insights. It updates sheets with company business areas, offers, models, and ideal customer profiles automatically.

name: Text Automation via Apple Shortcuts & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow integrating Apple Shortcuts with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models to automate text tasks: translate (English/Spanish), grammar correction, and text length adjustments. Sends text via webhook, processes through OpenAI, responds to Shortcut for in-app editing.

name: Telegram PDF RAG Chatbot with Pinecone
description: An n8n workflow that automates processing PDFs sent via Telegram by extracting, chunking, embedding with OpenAI, and storing in Pinecone vector DB. Enables retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) chat using Groq LLaMA-3.1-70b model for precise answers from uploaded documents.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Image Generation
description: An automated Telegram bot leveraging n8n workflows, OpenAI GPT-4 for chatbot replies, and DALL·E for image creation. It supports multi-language chat, welcome messages, text-to-image commands, and error handling for unsupported commands.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Voice & Text
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and LangChain to build a multi-format chatbot. It handles text and voice messages, transcribing audio via OpenAI, maintaining conversation memory, and replying with rich HTML formatting on Telegram.

name: AI-Powered A/B Split Testing Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow that implements A/B split testing for chatbot prompts using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model, Supabase for session management, and Postgres for chat memory. Enables testing of different prompt variants for chat sessions to optimize AI responses.

name: AI-Powered HR CV Processing & Evaluation
description: Automates HR recruitment by extracting candidate info from PDF CVs via LangChain AI, evaluating fit against job criteria, and storing results in Google Sheets. Uses n8n workflow, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Drive, and Sheets APIs for streamlined candidate management.

name: AI Chatbot for Kadampa Book Q&A
description: An n8n workflow that downloads an EPUB of a Kadampa Buddhist book from Google Drive, processes it with LangChain loaders and OpenAI embeddings, stores data in Supabase vector DB, and provides a chatbot for Q&A using OpenAI's chat model and vector retrieval.

name: Automated Arabic Kids Story Creator
description: This n8n workflow automates creating, translating, and sharing kids' stories in Arabic using OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo for story generation and translation, DALL·E for image creation, audio generation, and Telegram for distribution. It fosters educational storytelling with visual and audio content.

name: Gmail PDF Invoice Classifier & Drive Uploader
description: n8n workflow using Gmail, Google Drive, and OpenAI GPT-4.1-mini to scan emails for PDF invoices/receipts, classify via AI, upload matched PDFs to Drive folders by date, and optionally email them. Customizable with token limits and search terms.

name: AI-Driven Google Sheets Data Analyst
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain AI Agent, and Google Sheets API to analyze and query transaction data via chat. It filters by date, status, and product using Google Sheets OAuth, enabling dynamic, AI-powered data insights and calculations.

name: Slack Water Drinking Reminder with AI Motivate
description: Automates water intake reminders via Slack using Google Sheets for logging, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for personalized motivational messages, and iOS shortcuts integration. Encourages healthy hydration with friendly AI-generated advice and tracks drinking habits.

name: CallForge AI Sales Call Processor
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gong API, Notion, Google Sheets, and OpenAI to automate extraction, enrichment, and processing of sales call transcripts for actionable insights and error correction in Gong calls.

name: AI-Powered Prompt Generator & Categorizer
description: An n8n workflow leveraging Google Gemini (PaLM) LLM to generate, categorize, name, and store AI prompts. Uses LangChain nodes to parse output and Airtable API to save prompts in a structured Prompt Library for seamless AI prompt management.

name: AI Fact-Checker for Articles with Ollama
description: An n8n workflow that uses Ollama LLM models and Langchain nodes to split articles into sentences, fact-check each statement against given facts, and summarize factual inaccuracies. Integrates code splitting, merging, filtering, and aggregation nodes to automate article verification.

name: Invoice Parsing & Database Entry Automation
description: Automates invoice processing: triggers on new Google Drive files, sends files to LlamaParse API for extraction, receives parsed data via webhook, then creates invoices and line items in a database. Uses Google Drive, webhook, LlamaParse API, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for data extraction and structuring.

name: OpenAI API Usage Examples Workflow
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating various OpenAI API integrations: text completion, chat (ChatGPT), text editing, audio transcription (Whisper), and image generation (DALLE-2). Shows prompts for summaries, translations, HTML SVG generation, and quick email replies.

name: Google Calendar MCP Server Integration
description: An n8n workflow integrating MCP Server with Google Calendar API to manage events via create, read, update, and delete operations. Utilizes Google Calendar OAuth2, n8n MCP Trigger & Client tools, and OpenAI GPT-4o model for AI-driven calendar management workflows.

name: AI-Driven SEO Seed Keyword Generator
description: An n8n workflow that uses AI (Anthropic Claude model) and Langchain to generate 15-20 SEO seed keywords based on an Ideal Customer Profile (ICP). It aggregates ICP data, prompts the AI agent, and outputs keywords for SEO strategies. Requires connection to AI API and database.

name: AI Prompt Optimizer with Telegram Delivery
description: An n8n workflow that refines user input prompts via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model with LangChain AI Agent, improving clarity, specificity, and formatting. The optimized prompt is split for Telegram messages and sent back using Telegram API for seamless prompt enhancement and reuse.

name: Line MiniBear Bot: Namecard & Task Automation
description: Automates Line messaging by processing texts, images, and audio. Uses Line Messaging API, OpenRouter GPT-4o model, and Microsoft suite (Teams, To Do, OneDrive) to extract namecard info, create tasks, save messages, and manage files with AI-driven content recognition.

name: Hacker News Historical Headline Summarizer
description: Automates fetching Hacker News front-page headlines from multiple years on the same day, categorizes and summarizes key tech trends using Google Gemini (PaLM) LLM, and publishes markdown reports via Telegram. Utilizes HTTP requests, HTML parsing, date calculations, and Langchain LLM integration.

name: HN Who is Hiring Job Scraper
description: Automates extraction of 'Ask HN: Who is hiring?' posts from Hacker News using Algolia Search API and Hacker News API. Leverages OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to structure job listing data and stores results in Airtable. Ideal for tracking tech job opportunities monthly.

name: Landing Page Conversion Rate Optimizer
description: Automates analysis of landing pages by scraping URLs, then uses OpenAI's GPT-powered Langchain Agent to roast and provide 10 personalized, creative, and actionable Conversion Rate Optimization recommendations. Ideal for marketers and founders wanting data-driven CRO insights.

name: Google Calendar Event Manager
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Calendar API for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and checking availability of calendar events via automated webhook triggers. Utilizes Google OAuth2 for authentication and Langchain MCP trigger for AI-driven interactions.

name: Pinterest Data Analysis & AI Content Suggestions
description: Automates weekly Pinterest data retrieval via Pinterest API, stores it in Airtable, and uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for AI-powered trend analysis and pin content suggestions. Summarized insights are emailed to marketing managers to optimize content calendars.

name: YouTube Auto Upload & Metadata Generator
description: Automates uploading new videos from Google Drive to YouTube, generating SEO titles, detailed video descriptions, and relevant tags using OpenAI GPT-4.1 and Google Gemini models. Also scrapes video transcripts via Apify for content context and updates YouTube metadata automatically.

name: Image Analysis & Embedding from Google Drive
description: This n8n workflow downloads an image from Google Drive, extracts color data, generates semantic keywords using OpenAI vision models, creates a combined embedding document, and stores it in an in-memory vector store for image search. Utilizes Google Drive, OpenAI API, and n8n LangChain nodes.

name: YouTube Video Transcript Analyzer & Summarizer
description: Automates YouTube video analysis by extracting transcripts via youtube-transcript.io API, summarizes content using AI models (OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, DeepSeek, OpenRouter), and emails a structured summary. Ideal for creators and marketers to quickly digest video content.

name: Obsidian Notes to Podcast Feed Automation
description: Automates turning Obsidian notes into a podcast feed using OpenAI TTS for audio, Cloudinary for storage, and Google Sheets for episode metadata. Generates an RSS podcast feed compatible with major platforms. Integrates Obsidian, OpenAI, Cloudinary, Google Sheets, and n8n.

name: OAuth2 Configuration Finder AI
description: AI-powered n8n workflow to identify OAuth2 settings (authorization URI, token URI, audience) for APIs from a service name. Uses OpenRouter Chat Model with Llama 3.3, LangChain AI integration, and structured JSON parsing with confidence scoring for reliable API OAuth2 setups.

name: Autonomous Social Media Profile Crawler
description: n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, Supabase DB, and built-in HTTP/HTML nodes to autonomously crawl company websites, extract and standardize social media profile URLs into JSON format, and store results back to a database. Highly customizable multi-page crawler.

name: AI-powered Gmail Auto-labeler
description: Automatically categorizes Gmail messages into labels (Partnership, Inquiry, Notification) using OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo and n8n automation. Integrates Gmail API for triggers, label management, and message updates. Enhances inbox organization with AI-driven content classification.

name: Automated Blog Post Creator for WordPress
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Sheets, OpenAI (OpenRouter), and WordPress XML-RPC API to automate blog post drafting, updating, and publishing based on a scheduled spreadsheet. Uses dynamic prompts and manages status logs for seamless content creation.

name: n8n AI Agent for Creator Leaderboard Reports
description: Automates daily aggregation and reporting of top n8n community creators and workflows using GitHub data, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Gemini LLM, and integrated with Gmail, Google Drive, and Telegram for distributed sharing and local saving. Enables insightful leaderboard summaries and trend analysis.

name: AI Chat Agent with Chart Generation
description: An AI agent powered by OpenAI's GPT-4o model integrated in n8n, generating dynamic Chart.js charts via structured OpenAI outputs and Quickchart.io URLs. Enables conversational chart creation using HTTP requests, LangChain, and memory buffers for contextual chat.

name: Clinic Appointment & Reminder Assistant
description: Automates clinic appointment management and reminders using OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, Google Tasks, Telegram, WhatsApp (Evolution API), and Postgres. Handles patient rescheduling, confirmation, shopping lists, and escalations for a streamlined healthcare workflow.

name: YouTube Video Transcript to Airtable
description: Automates extracting YouTube video transcripts via a RapidAPI service, summarizes content with LangChain LLM, and updates Airtable entries with main ideas and key takeaways. Keeps content ideas fresh using Airtable, RapidAPI, and n8n scheduling for workflow automation.

name: Telegram PDF Q&A with Pinecone & AI
description: Automates Telegram document handling by converting PDFs to vector embeddings using OpenAI, storing them in Pinecone, and enabling AI-powered Q&A with Groq and LangChain, providing instant responses within Telegram chats.

name: Paul Graham Essays Vector Search with Milvus
description: Automates scraping latest Paul Graham essays, extracts and cleans text, creates embeddings with OpenAI, and stores them in Milvus vector database. Enables querying via chat with AI-powered citation retrieval using OpenAI GPT-4 model and LangChain integration.

name: Perplexity Research to TailwindCSS HTML
description: An n8n workflow that automates research on a user-provided topic using Perplexity API and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models, improves the prompt, generates structured article content, and converts it into a single-line, responsive, Tailwind CSS-styled HTML page, optionally sending summaries via Telegram.

name: DeepResearcher: AI-Powered Notion Research
description: Automates deep topic research by querying web SERPs, extracting key learnings via OpenAI GPT and Google Gemini, and organizing findings into Notion. Integrates OpenAI and Google Gemini chat models with Notion API for structured expert-level research synthesis.

name: AI Travel Planner with Couchbase & Gemini 2.0
description: An AI-powered travel planning assistant using Google Gemini 2.0 Flash for chat, OpenAI text-embedding-3-small for embeddings, and Couchbase vector search for storing and retrieving points of interest. Enables conversational trip planning with vector similarity search.

name: Human-in-the-Loop AI Email Assistant
description: Automates email reading via IMAP, summarizes with LangChain and OpenAI GPT models, drafts replies, and sends emails after human approval. Integrates IMAP, SMTP, LangChain AI nodes, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for professional business email handling.

name: Notion AI Knowledge Base Assistant
description: This n8n workflow creates an AI agent that queries and summarizes data from a Notion knowledge base using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. It integrates Notion API for database search and content retrieval, Langchain for AI memory and tool use, enabling concise, fact-based answers from Notion data.

name: LinkedIn Profile Finder with Bright Data & GPT-4o-mini
description: Automates LinkedIn profile discovery by processing user form input with Bright Data for Google scraping and GPT-4o-mini for NLP. Extracts and filters LinkedIn search results, generates personalized outreach emails, and sends via SMTP. Ideal for sales prospecting automation.

name: Odoo Sales AI Chatbot with Opportunity Summary
description: AI-powered chatbot for Odoo sales module using OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, and Odoo API to fetch, summarize, and interactively discuss sales opportunities with live context and memory management.

name: Doctor Appointment Booking Assistant
description: An AI-powered virtual assistant workflow that automates medical appointment scheduling for Dr. Hakim using OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, and Google Sheets. It handles patient interaction, checks availability, books slots, and logs data efficiently.

name: eCommerce Contact Form Text Classifier
description: Automates classification of contact form messages for eCommerce using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for text classification, Google Sheets for data storage, and SMTP for email notifications to respective departments (quotes, orders, etc.).

name: Confluence AI Chatbot with OpenAI & Telegram
description: An n8n workflow that integrates Confluence REST API (basic auth) to fetch page content, converts HTML to Markdown, and uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain for AI-powered Q&A. Supports context memory, responds via Telegram bot.

name: Graphic Wallpaper Generator with Midjourney & GPT-4o-mini
description: Automates creation of cinematic sci-fi wallpapers using PiAPI's Midjourney image generation, GPT-4o-mini for creative prompts, and Canvas API for final design. Produces visually rich, emotionally resonant graphic wallpapers tailored by user-defined themes, scenarios, and styles.

name: OpenAI Citation Formatter for File Retrieval RAG
description: An n8n workflow using OpenAI assistant with vector store for file retrieval augmented generation (RAG). It retrieves chat thread content and file metadata via OpenAI API, formats text with citations, and optionally outputs Markdown or HTML for clean, referenced AI responses.

name: Gmail Email Classification & Labeling
description: Automate Gmail email classification using Google Gemini and LangChain AI. Categorizes emails into High Priority, School Related, Promotion, or Other, then applies Gmail labels via OAuth2. Ideal for organizing and prioritizing inbox with AI-driven text classification.

name: AI Business Model Canvas Generator
description: An n8n workflow that uses Ollama LLM (LLaMA 3.1) via Langchain nodes to generate a complete Business Model Canvas from user input. Outputs all 9 blocks plus business title as a downloadable HTML file, automating strategic business planning.

name: Email Chatbot with Semantic + Structured RAG via Telegram
description: An advanced chatbot integrating Telegram, OpenAI, Ollama embeddings, and Postgres PGVector for hybrid semantic and SQL-based email retrieval. It handles natural language queries over email data, combining vector search and SQL for precise and contextual answers.

name: LINE Chatbot Assistant with Google Calendar & Gmail
description: An AI-powered LINE chatbot integrated with Google Calendar and Gmail APIs, using LangChain and OpenAI GPT models for natural language understanding and memory. It handles user queries, manages calendar events, and retrieves emails to provide intelligent, context-aware responses.

name: AI-Powered Airtable MCP Server
description: This n8n workflow builds an MCP server integrating Airtable with AI tools from Langchain and OpenAI GPT-4o. It enables chat-triggered intelligent CRUD operations on Airtable records using AI agents, memory buffers, and real-time SSE endpoints. Ideal for automated database interactions.

name: CoinMarketCap Crypto Exchange & Sentiment Agent
description: An n8n workflow integrating CoinMarketCap APIs with OpenAI GPT-4o Mini to provide detailed cryptocurrency exchange data, asset holdings, market sentiment via Fear & Greed Index, and the CMC 100 index. Designed for crypto analysts seeking automated, structured insights.

name: Google Drive AI Document Summarizer & Emailer
description: Automates downloading documents from Google Drive, summarizes content using Mistral AI language model with n8n LangChain integration, and emails the summary via Gmail. Ideal for quick document insights using Google Drive, Mistral Cloud API, and Gmail OAuth2.

name: YouTube Video Transcriber Bot
description: Automates transcription of YouTube videos via Supadata API and OpenAI GPT-4O for punctuation and formatting. Validates YouTube URLs, fetches raw transcripts, and refines text for easy reading in Portuguese, streamlining video content consumption and study.

name: AI-Powered Resume Review & Google Sheets Logging
description: Automates resume submission, extraction, and evaluation using a form, Google Drive, PDF text extraction, OpenAI GPT-4, and Google Sheets for record keeping. It extracts personal info and qualifications, summarizes candidate profiles, assigns HR ratings, and logs results for streamlined hiring.

name: CoinMarketCap DEXScan AI Agent
description: n8n workflow integrating CoinMarketCap's DEXScan API with GPT-4o Mini AI to provide real-time and historical data on decentralized exchanges, including liquidity, trading volume, OHLCV, spot pairs, and trades. Uses HTTP requests, OpenAI API, and memory buffers for intelligent query handling.

name: Multi-LLM Testing & Analysis with LM Studio
description: An n8n workflow to test multiple local LLMs via LM Studio API, analyze readability and language metrics, and save results to Google Sheets. Uses LM Studio server API, n8n LangChain nodes, and Google Sheets integration to track and compare LLM outputs effectively.

name: AI Health Insurance Chatbot System
description: This n8n workflow automates an AI-powered chatbot for health insurance inquiries using OpenAI assistants, PostgreSQL for chat memory, MySQL for product queries, and external APIs. It dynamically personalizes responses based on user data to recommend insurance plans and access knowledge bases.

name: AI Website Screenshot Analyzer
description: Automate website screenshot capture using URLbox API, then analyze the image content with OpenAI's vision capabilities in n8n workflow. Combines URL capture, AI image analysis, and data merging for concise website summaries. Requires URLbox & OpenAI API keys.

name: AI Chat Agent with Wikipedia & Web Search Tools
description: An n8n workflow creating a conversational AI agent using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, integrated with LangChain memory buffer, Wikipedia and SerpAPI search tools. It processes manual chat inputs and leverages external knowledge sources to answer queries contextually.

name: OpenAI Travel Assistant with Google Drive Docs
description: Builds a custom OpenAI-powered travel assistant integrated with Google Drive to upload and convert travel agency documents to PDF, updating assistant knowledge. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain memory buffer, and Google Drive API for contextual chat interaction.

name: Podcast Transcript Summarizer & Digest Generator
description: Automates summarization of podcast transcripts using n8n with LangChain, OpenAI GPT-3.5 & GPT-4, and Wikipedia API. Extracts key topics, generates questions, researches explanations, formats as HTML, and emails a comprehensive episode digest.

name: AI Social Media Auto-Poster from Hacker News
description: Automates curation and posting of trending GitHub projects from Hacker News to Twitter and LinkedIn using OpenAI GPT-4, Airtable, Telegram, and n8n. Extracts GitHub links, generates engaging content, schedules posts, and prevents duplicates.

name: AI Email Auto-responder & Summarizer
description: Automates email response by reading IMAP emails, converting content to markdown, summarizing with DeepSeek and OpenAI models, classifying, and generating concise replies reviewed and sent automatically. Integrates Google Drive for document vectorization with Qdrant and uses OpenAI and DeepSeek APIs.

name: Children's Storytelling Automation on Telegram
description: Automates creating and sharing children’s English stories on Telegram using OpenAI GPT-3.5 for story and character generation, DALL-E for illustrations, and Telegram API for delivery every 12 hours.

name: AI Social Media Caption Creator
description: Automates generating creative Instagram captions using n8n workflow with OpenAI GPT-4 and Airtable. It triggers on new Airtable records with briefing data, enriches context via background info, crafts captions via a Langchain AI Agent, and updates Airtable editorial plans seamlessly.

name: AI Data Extraction for Baserow PDFs
description: Automates extraction of data from PDFs uploaded to Baserow tables using dynamic user-defined prompts and OpenAI's LLM API. It integrates Baserow webhook events, Baserow API, PDF extraction, and LangChain LLM nodes within n8n to auto-fill table fields based on PDF content and field descriptions.

name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates sentiment classification of customer feedback using an OpenAI API with form input, then logs categorized responses into Google Sheets for easy tracking and analysis.

name: Stock Market Q&A AI Workflow
description: An n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI embeddings, Qdrant vector store, and Google Drive PDFs to enable Q&A over stock market documents. It extracts data via Google Drive, processes with OpenAI and LangChain, and answers queries through a webhook API.

name: AI Agent with Hacker News Data Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow integrating LangChain AI agent with OpenAI chat and Hacker News API to fetch and process top posts data. Enables querying Hacker News popular posts through AI chat, combining AI and real-time data fetch for interactive insights.

name: AI-Assisted Human-in-Loop Email Reply System
description: Automates email handling by using IMAP to read emails, converts content to Markdown, summarizes it with Langchain OpenAI models, generates professional replies via AI, and integrates human approval before sending replies via SMTP. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI GPT-4, Langchain, IMAP/SMTP.

name: AI-Powered HR CV Processing & Evaluation
description: Automates job application processing: candidates submit CVs via a form, PDFs are extracted, AI extracts qualifications and personal data using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, evaluates fit against a company profile, and logs results to Google Sheets. Integrates Google Drive and Sheets APIs.

name: AI Chat Agent with Wiki & Weather Tools
description: An n8n workflow integrating Ollama LLM chat model, Wikipedia and Open-Meteo APIs, plus LangChain memory, to create a conversational AI assistant. It uses buffered chat history, fetches weather by coordinates, and retrieves Wikipedia info to answer user queries interactively.

name: AI Chat Agent for Google Search Console Data
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o and Google Search Console API via OAuth2, using Postgres for chat memory. Enables natural language chat to query, retrieve, and display Search Console insights with a friendly AI agent, supporting customizable date ranges and dimensions.

name: Airtable AI Assistant Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Airtable API to process user chat requests, query Airtable bases and tables, and perform data aggregation and visualization. Enables dynamic, AI-driven interactions for managing Airtable data.

name: AI Agent for Webpage Content Extraction
description: An n8n workflow combining LangChain AI (ReAct agent) and OpenAI GPT-4 to fetch, clean, and convert webpage HTML content to Markdown. It uses HTTP requests, regex for HTML body extraction, and options to simplify or fully preserve content for intelligent web data retrieval and processing.

name: AI Chat Agent with SerpAPI Search
description: An n8n workflow combining OpenAI GPT-4o-mini chat model, SerpAPI for live search, and a window buffer memory to create an AI Agent that responds to chat messages dynamically with up-to-date information from the web.

name: AI Summary Generator for WordPress Posts
description: Automates adding AI-generated summaries to WordPress posts using OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. Converts post HTML to Markdown, classifies summarized content, updates posts via WP REST API, and logs activity efficiently.

name: Amazon Ads AI Optimization Workflow
description: Automate Amazon Ads report processing with Google Drive, Excel/CSV data extraction, and GPT-4o AI analysis to generate actionable optimization recommendations. Uses n8n nodes, Google Drive API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Gmail to email insights for bid, budget, and keyword strategies.

name: Hugging Face Paper Auto-Import to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of research papers from Hugging Face, uses HTML scraping, OpenAI GPT-4O for abstract analysis, and stores enriched metadata in Notion. Integrates Hugging Face API, OpenAI API, and Notion API for academic paper management.

name: OpenAI Image Generator via Web Form

name: Google Drive to Pinecone FAISS Chatbot
description: Automates document ingestion from Google Drive, splits text for processing, generates OpenAI embeddings, stores/retrieves in Pinecone vector DB, enabling chatbot Q&A with LangChain in n8n workflows.

description: Automates WordPress blog post categorization using OpenAI's language model integrated via n8n. Fetches posts, classifies by predefined taxonomy, and updates categories natively in WordPress. Ideal for content strategists seeking efficient organization and SEO improvements.

description: Automates weekly Google Analytics data retrieval (last 7 days & same period previous year), AI-generated summary & analysis (OpenAI GPT-4O), and report delivery via email (SMTP) and Telegram. Scheduled every Monday at 7 AM for actionable insights.

name: OpenAI Text-to-Speech Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that converts text to speech using OpenAI's TTS API. It sets input text and voice, then sends a request to OpenAI's API to produce an MP3 audio output. Ideal for automating TTS tasks with OpenAI's tts-1 model.

It filters issues that need triage, classifies bugs by team responsibility (customizable), updates Linear tickets, and notifies Slack if classification fails. Tech: Linear API, OpenAI GPT-4, Slack API, n8n automation.

description: This n8n workflow enables interactive chat with a PostgreSQL database using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model and LangChain agent. It automatically generates and executes SQL queries based on user prompts, fetching schema and table info dynamically for accurate DB responses.

name: AI Chat with Memory and Calculator Tools
description: This n8n workflow enables an AI chat assistant using OpenAI's API with session memory management and a calculator tool via LangChain nodes, allowing interactive and context-aware conversations with users through a webhook trigger.

name: GitHub API Chatbot with RAG & Pinecone
description: An n8n RAG workflow that fetches GitHub OpenAPI specs, generates embeddings using OpenAI, indexes info in Pinecone vector DB, and enables chat queries with GPT-4o-mini. Provides contextual API guidance via conversational AI.

name: AI Agent for Interactive Google Sheets Chat
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-3.5-turbo with Google Sheets via API, enabling users to query spreadsheet data conversationally. It includes custom tools to list columns, fetch rows, and get column values dynamically, making complex sheet data accessible through natural language.

description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating OpenAI assistants, PostgreSQL chat memory, MySQL product querying, and external APIs for personalized health insurance advice. Designed to capture user data, maintain session context, query product offers, and respond via chat with dynamic knowledge base access.

name: OpenAI Travel Assistant with Google Drive Docs

name: n8n AI Creator Leaderboard Stats

description: This n8n workflow uses Langchain's chat trigger, OpenAI GPT-4o model, and Twitter API to create engaging Twitter threads. It employs a conversational AI agent that drafts informative, friendly tweets and replies, forming coherent, natural threads with memory context for flow.

Enables robust user chat experience via Telegram API.

name: AI-Powered Google Calendar MCP Server

It supports creating, updating, deleting, and searching events, plus additional AI utilities like text case conversion, joke retrieval, and random user data generation.

description: This n8n workflow automates resume screening by downloading CV PDFs, extracting text, sending data with job descriptions to OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for detailed candidate evaluation, then storing structured results in Supabase. Ideal for recruiters and HR teams to speed up hiring.
