description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Telegram messages, processes them using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain AI Agent, and responds with helpful, emoji-rich replies. It integrates Telegram API and OpenAI API for interactive chat automation.

description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Assistant API with Langchain memory buffer and calculator tool to create a chat assistant supporting contextual memory and calculation capabilities. Enables conversational AI with session persistence and computation.

description: An n8n workflow that downloads a document from Google Drive, splits the text into chunks, and uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain to generate automated summaries. Integrates Google Drive API and OpenAI API for efficient document summarization.

Filters bot messages and posts AI replies in Slack channels.

description: An n8n workflow that loads files from Google Drive, splits text content, embeds chunks using OpenAI embeddings, and inserts them into a Pinecone vector index. Enables chat interactions by retrieving relevant data chunks from Pinecone and answering via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model.

description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain nodes for AI chat and a custom Wikipedia tool for research. It executes LLM chains and AI agents on manual trigger, enabling natural language queries and knowledge retrieval.

name: AI Chat Agent for Supabase PostgreSQL
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI and Supabase PostgreSQL to create an AI assistant that dynamically generates and executes SQL queries based on user chat input, enabling conversational database interaction and smart data retrieval without SQL expertise.

name: YouTube Transcript Summarizer & Telegram Notifier

Tech stack: Gmail API, Google Sheets API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain integration.

description: Workflow integrates OpenAI GPT-4o-mini with an AI agent specialized in SQL for supply chain analytics on BigQuery. It processes user chat input, generates SQL, executes it on Google BigQuery, and returns structured shipment performance results.

name: MediaMarkt Deals Email Notifier
description: Automates retrieval of MediaMarkt Spain deals using BrightData proxy, extracts and classifies deal info with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, generates HTML emails via n8n Document Generator, and emails personalized top deals based on user-selected categories. Tech stack: BrightData API, OpenAI API, SMTP email, n8n workflow automation.

name: n8n AI Assistant for Tool Discovery
description: An n8n workflow integrating Langchain chat triggers, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and n8n Multi-Channel Platform API to provide an AI assistant. It interacts with users' chat queries about n8n, dynamically looks up and executes relevant tools, delivering tailored, actionable responses on n8n usage and resources.

name: Telegram Chinese Vocabulary Tutor Bot
description: An n8n workflow automating a Telegram bot to tutor users in Chinese vocabulary using Google Sheets for word lists, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain for interactive MCQs, with session memory and feedback. Ideal for language learners.

name: Real Estate Appointment Voice Reminder
description: An automated workflow using Google Calendar API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for message creation, ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech API to generate voice reminders, and Gmail for sending MP3 voice appointment reminders. Designed for real estate agents to remind clients professionally.

name: WordPress Article Text-to-Speech Automation
description: Automates retrieval of WordPress articles, generates summaries or transcriptions with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, converts text to speech using Eleven Labs API, uploads MP3 to WordPress, and updates the post. Integrates WordPress API, LangChain, OpenAI, and Eleven Labs TTS.

name: AI Linux SysAdmin via SSH Automation
description: An n8n workflow that enables an AI agent (GPT-4o via OpenAI API) to act as a Linux system administrator. It receives chat commands, interprets user intent for Linux VPS management, generates safe SSH commands, and executes them remotely using SSH node, enhancing VPS management automation.

name: Google Drive PII Remover
description: Automates removal of personally identifiable information (PII) from CSV files in Google Drive. Uses Google Drive API to monitor and process files, extracts data, identifies PII columns via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, removes sensitive data, and uploads sanitized files back to Drive.

name: YouTube Video Summarizer
description: Automates summarization of YouTube videos by extracting transcripts via Apify API and generating concise summaries using OpenAI's GPT via LangChain in n8n workflows. Ideal for content creators and researchers to quickly get key insights from long videos.

name: LangChain n8n Workflow with OpenAI & Wikipedia
description: This n8n workflow integrates LangChain with OpenAI language models and a custom Wikipedia tool. It demonstrates creating LLM chains, chat interactions, and agent-based queries combining LLM and external knowledge via LangChain tools for flexible AI responses.

name: Automated Company Review & News Insights
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, SerpApi, and Notion API to automate gathering and analyzing company reviews, news, and product offerings. It scrapes review sites, summarizes pros/cons, tracks sentiment, and updates Notion for competitive analysis.

name: LinkedIn Profile & Company Scraper with Bright Data & AI
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes LinkedIn person and company profiles using Bright Data MCP API, processes the data with LangChain's info extractor and Google Gemini AI to generate detailed company stories, and saves results locally and via webhook.

name: Lemlist & HubSpot Email Reply Automation
description: Automates lead reply categorization and follow-up creation using Lemlist API, HubSpot CRM, and OpenAI GPT-3 for reply analysis. It unsubscribes, tags replies as interested or out-of-office, and creates deals/tasks in HubSpot, enhancing sales workflows.

name: Summarize Google Sheets Feedback with GPT-4
description: Automates feedback summarization from Google Sheets form responses using n8n workflow. Integrates Google Sheets API to fetch data, OpenAI GPT-4 to generate summaries, Markdown-to-HTML conversion, and Gmail API to send summary reports via email.

name: Daily Podcast Summary & Email Automation
description: Automates daily retrieval of top US podcasts by genre using Taddy API, crops audio via Aspose API, transcribes using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes with GPT-4o-mini, and emails results via Gmail OAuth2. Provides concise podcast episode summaries delivered to your inbox.

name: Slack AI Chatbot with n8n Slash Commands
description: This n8n workflow enables creating a Slack AI chatbot using slash commands, integrating Slack Webhook and Slack API with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini through LangChain nodes. It automates command handling, AI response generation, and posting messages back to Slack channels.

name: AI Expense Tracker with Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI's GPT via LangChain to parse natural language expense entries from chat, convert them to structured JSON, and append them to a Google Sheets expense tracker. Integrates AI chat triggers, memory, and Google Sheets API for seamless expense logging.

name: YouTube Videos AI Summary & Discord Alert
description: Automates summarizing YouTube video captions using YouTube API and ChatGPT (OpenAI), then posts engaging summaries to Discord via webhook. Triggered by new videos from a channel's RSS feed, it fetches English captions, converts them, creates bullet-point summaries, and shares them instantly to Discord.

name: Wikipedia Data Extraction & Summarization
description: Automates extraction of Wikipedia content using Bright Data API and summarizes it using Google Gemini AI models. Utilizes HTTP requests, Langchain chains for data extraction and concise summarization, and webhook for notifications.

name: Email Sales Opportunity Summarizer & Odoo Creator
description: Automates capturing sales emails via Gmail API, summarizes inquiry details using OpenAI GPT-3.5, and creates sales opportunities in Odoo CRM. Integrates Gmail, OpenAI language model, and Odoo ERP to streamline lead management and enhance sales pipeline efficiency.

name: AI-Powered Weather Forecast Chatbot via Open-Meteo API
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI's GPT-based AI agent with the Open-Meteo geocoding and weather APIs. It enables users to chat and receive accurate, multi-day weather forecasts by city name through AI-managed sequential API calls, ideal for travel planning and weather info retrieval.

name: PDF Image Extraction & GPT-4o Analysis
description: Automates extraction of images from PDFs via ConvertAPI and Google Drive, then analyzes images with OpenAI GPT-4o. Combines image URLs and AI analysis into a text file for easy review. Uses n8n workflow with ConvertAPI, Google Drive API, and OpenAI GPT-4o model.

name: Telegram Image Analyzer with OpenAI
description: Automates image analysis in Telegram chats using n8n, OpenAI for image processing, and Telegram API for communication. Detects received images, analyzes them with OpenAI's base64 image capabilities, and sends back insightful text responses. Enhances moderation, tagging, and feedback workflows.

name: Text-to-Speech Audio Generator with OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow that converts text to audio using OpenAI's text-to-speech API. It features a POST webhook to receive text input, processes it with OpenAI audio generation, and responds with the audio binary. Useful for automating audio content creation.

name: Google Drive Doc Summarizer to Sheet
description: Automates fetching the latest Google Docs file from a specified Drive folder, summarizes its contents using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and appends the summary with metadata to a Google Sheet for easy organization and quick reference.

name: AI-Powered Image Metadata Tagging via Google Drive
description: Automates tagging of images in a Google Drive folder using AI image content analysis via OpenAI. Downloads new images, analyzes content, writes descriptive keywords into EXIF metadata, and updates files. Utilizes Google Drive, OpenAI API, and n8n EXIF community node.

name: AI-Generated LinkedIn Advice Contributor
description: Automates weekly Google search for LinkedIn advice articles, extracts article info, generates unique AI advice with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, then posts results to Slack and stores contributions in NocoDB. Integrates Google Search, HTML parsing, OpenAI, Slack, and NocoDB.

name: Telegram Image Auto-Analyzer with OpenAI
description: Automates image analysis on Telegram using n8n workflow with Telegram and OpenAI APIs. It triggers on image messages, analyzes images via OpenAI, and sends textual analysis back to Telegram chats, enabling real-time content moderation, categorization, and feedback.

name: PDF to AI Q&A with Supabase & Qdrant
description: An n8n workflow that fetches PDFs from Google Drive, splits and indexes their content into Qdrant vector store via Supabase for fast semantic search, and answers user queries using OpenAI GPT-4o Mini model. Integrates Google Drive API, Qdrant vector DB, Supabase, and OpenAI.

name: AI-Powered Linear Bug Ticket Team Classifier
description: This n8n workflow automates bug ticket triage in Linear by using OpenAI GPT-4 to classify tickets and assign them to the correct team. It integrates Linear API, OpenAI API, and Slack to streamline issue management and team notifications.

name: OpenAI API Text & Image Processing Demo
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating various OpenAI API uses: text summarization, translation, chat completions, HTML & SVG generation, Whisper audio transcription, and DALLE-2 image creation. It integrates OpenAI models (davinci-003, GPT-3.5-turbo, Whisper, DALLE-2) for multi-modal AI tasks.

name: Instagram ChatGPT Auto-Responder Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating ManyChat and OpenAI's ChatGPT to automate Instagram messaging. It receives messages from Instagram via ManyChat webhook, processes them with AI using custom prompts and memory context, and replies automatically in the influencer's style.

name: Auto Post New YouTube Videos to X
description: Automates posting engaging tweets about new YouTube videos using YouTube API, OpenAI's GPT-3.5 for content generation, and X (Twitter) API for posting. Runs every 30 minutes to promote latest video with AI-generated short posts.

name: Gmail to Notion Automated Email Processing
description: Automates converting Gmail emails into structured Notion pages using Gmail API, Airtable for route management, OpenAI GPT-4o for email summarization and task extraction, and Notion API. Filters and labels emails to prevent duplicates, sends error notifications, and manages active workflows.

name: Audio Transcription & Summarization to Notion
description: Automates transcription of audio files from Google Drive using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes content via GPT-4 Turbo, and stores structured summaries in Notion. Utilizes Google Drive Trigger, OpenAI API, and Notion API for seamless audio content management.

name: Automated Viral Tweet Scheduler for X
description: An n8n workflow that automates tweeting every 6 hours with randomized posting times using OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo to generate viral tweets tailored by niche, style, and inspiration. It validates tweet length and posts to X via OAuth2 API.

name: Jira Epic Retrospective Report Generator
description: Automates creation of Agile retrospective reports by fetching Jira Epic issues and comments, summarizing with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and generating actionable lessons learned documents in Google Docs. Uses Jira API, n8n workflows, Langchain AI agent, and Google Docs integration.

name: Google Drive to PGVector Loader
description: Automates loading of documents from Google Drive into a Postgres PGVector database with OpenAI embeddings. Supports PDF, text, and JSON files, uses Langchain nodes for processing, enabling vector search-ready storage and management.

name: LinkedIn Profile Lead Collector via SerpAPI
description: Automates extraction of LinkedIn profiles by keyword and location using SerpAPI for Google search, OpenAI API for data enrichment, and NocoDB for storage. Outputs an Excel file and database-ready lead list for sales or marketing use. Ideal for lead generation with no-code tools.

name: n8n Workflow Documentation Generator
description: Automates documentation for n8n workflows using OpenAI GPT-4, Mermaid.js for diagrams, and Docsify for Markdown rendering. Supports viewing, editing, auto-generating, and saving workflow docs stored as Markdown files.

name: 3D Model to Spinning Video Generator
description: Automates creation of 3D spinning videos from AI-generated images using PiAPI's Midjourney, GPT-4o-image, and Kling APIs. Workflow includes image generation, transformation to 3D figurines, and final video rendering with status checks and waits, all orchestrated in n8n.

name: OpenRouter LLM Chatbot via LangChain
description: An n8n workflow integrating multiple LLM models through OpenRouter API using LangChain nodes to handle chat triggers, memory, and agent logic. Enables customizable large language model interactions with session memory and dynamic prompt input.

name: Venafi Slack CertBot: Automated Cert Requests
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API, Venafi TLS Protect Cloud, VirusTotal, and OpenAI to automate Certificate Signing Requests. Uses Slack modals for inputs, VirusTotal for domain risk analysis, AI for report generation, and conditionally auto-issues or requests manual approval.

name: HubSpot Chatbot AI Assistant Integration
description: An n8n workflow integrating HubSpot Conversations with OpenAI Assistants to automate chatbot interactions. It handles message retrieval, OpenAI thread management, action execution, and response posting using HubSpot API, OpenAI API (assistants v1), Airtable for thread mapping, and external company data APIs (listafirme.ro).

name: Etsy Data Mining Automation with Bright Data & AI
description: Automates Etsy product data extraction using Bright Data's Web Unlocker API for scraping, enriched by Google Gemini and OpenAI for AI-driven information extraction and pagination handling. Outputs structured product info and supports webhook notifications and disk storage.

name: Reddit Business Opportunity Analyzer with AI
description: Automates fetching and filtering Reddit posts from r/smallbusiness, analyzes business-related content using GPT-4o-mini (OpenAI API) for sentiment, summarization, and solution ideation, then categorizes results into Gmail drafts and logs insights to Google Sheets.

name: AI Telegram Bot with Supabase Memory
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API, OpenAI Assistants (via HTTP API), and Supabase database to create a context-aware AI chatbot. It stores user sessions and conversation threads to maintain memory for personalized, continuous conversations in Telegram.

name: Bitrix24 Open Channel RAG Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Bitrix24 Open Channels with a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot. It uses Bitrix24 APIs, Google Gemini chat model, Ollama embeddings, Qdrant vector store, and LangChain nodes to process messages, manage chatbot lifecycle, handle files, and answer queries based on uploaded documents.

name: AI Workplace Discrimination Pattern Detector
description: This n8n workflow uses ScrapingBee to extract Glassdoor reviews, employs OpenAI's LLMs to analyze demographic rating disparities, calculates statistical measures like z-scores & effect sizes, and visualizes results with QuickChart, helping identify workplace discrimination patterns.

name: Website Security Scanner & Audit Report
description: An n8n workflow to scan a given website URL for client-side security vulnerabilities and misconfigurations. Uses HTTP Requests to fetch page and headers, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models for detailed security analysis of HTTP headers and page content, merges AI insights, and emails a comprehensive, HTML report via Gmail. Ideal for developers wanting automated website security assessments.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Survey Bot with Redis & Google Sheets
description: Conducts structured product satisfaction surveys via Telegram bot. Uses Redis for session state, Google Sheets for questions and answers storage, and OpenAI GPT models for generating follow-ups and conversational AI. Enables guided, multi-turn survey chats with dynamic follow-up questions.

name: Startup Funding News Data Extractor
description: Automates extraction and structuring of funding news data from TechCrunch and VentureBeat sitemaps using n8n with Langchain AI (Anthropic Claude, OpenRouter Perplexity), HTML/XML parsing, and Airtable for storage. Enables comprehensive company funding research.

name: Telegram Voice/Text to Todoist Task Creator
description: An n8n workflow that converts Telegram voice or text messages into structured Todoist tasks. It uses Telegram API for input, OpenAI Whisper for voice transcription, GPT-4o-mini for AI task decomposition, and Todoist API for task creation.

name: Baserow PDF Data Extraction with AI
description: Automates extraction of data from PDFs into Baserow tables using webhooks, Baserow API, n8n workflow, and OpenAI language models. Supports dynamic prompts per field and updates rows on events like row updates and field changes.

name: AI-Powered US Grants Tracking & Alerts
description: Automates fetching, AI summarizing, eligibility analysis, and tracking of latest US AI grants from Grants.gov. Uses n8n workflows with OpenAI API for summaries, Airtable as database, and Gmail for email alerts to subscribers.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with LangChain & Dall-E
description: An AI-powered Telegram chatbot using n8n with LangChain nodes, OpenAI GPT-4o for conversation, Dall-E-3 for image generation, and Telegram API integration. It handles user chat, generates images on request, and replies with text or images, maintaining session context.

name: Slack AI Chatbot via Slash Commands
description: Creates an AI chatbot integrated with Slack using n8n workflows, Slack slash commands, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini. Handles webhook triggers, command routing with switch nodes, AI response generation via Langchain/OpenAI, and sends messages back to Slack channels for interactive chatbot functionality.

name: Notion Pages to Supabase Vectors with OpenAI
description: Automates storing Notion page texts as vector embeddings in Supabase using OpenAI API. Triggers on new Notion pages, fetches and filters content, summarizes text, generates embeddings, and saves them in a Supabase vector column for efficient semantic search.

name: AI Tweet Generator with Hashtag & Airtable
description: Generates short tweets including random tech hashtags using OpenAI's text-davinci-001 API, then stores results in Airtable. Uses n8n for workflow orchestration with manual trigger, function nodes, HTTP request, and Airtable node.

name: AI Image Caption Generator & Overlay
description: Automates generating descriptive captions for images using Google Gemini AI and overlays them on images via n8n's Edit Image node. Utilizes HTTP requests, Langchain with Gemini-1.5 Flash model, and custom code for positioning captions. Ideal for content creation and watermarking.

name: Logo Sheet AI Extractor to Airtable
description: This n8n workflow automates extracting product/tool data from uploaded logo sheet images using OpenAI GPT-4 with Langchain AI agent. It parses tools and their attributes, maps similarities, and upserts structured records into Airtable. Ideal for cataloging software tools from visual data.

name: Telegram Resume Extractor and PDF Generator
description: Automates resume extraction via Telegram using OpenAI GPT-4 turbo-preview for parsing, formats sections into HTML, converts to PDF with Gotenberg, and sends back through Telegram. It integrates Telegram API, OpenAI API, and Gotenberg PDF conversion.

name: Dynamic HTML Generator with OpenAI Structured Output
description: This n8n workflow uses OpenAI's GPT-4o API with Structured Output to generate HTML pages dynamically from user queries. It converts JSON UI components styled with Tailwind CSS into HTML, then serves it via webhook. Tech stack: OpenAI API, Tailwind CSS, n8n webhook.

name: AI Chatbot for PostgreSQL Database Queries
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4 with PostgreSQL to enable natural language chat-based querying. Uses Langchain agent with AI tools for schema exploration, table definition, and SQL execution to provide intelligent DB insights and responses in real-time.

name: Airtable Product Data Enricher with AI Vision & Web Agent
description: This n8n workflow automates enrichment of product data in Airtable from photos using OpenAI's GPT-4o vision model, SERP API for reverse image search, and Firecrawl.dev for web scraping. It intelligently analyzes images, performs internet research, and updates Airtable records with detailed product attributes.

name: Pipedrive Org Data Enrichment with GPT-4 and ScrapingBee
description: Automates enriching new Pipedrive organizations by scraping their website with ScrapingBee, summarizing company info via OpenAI GPT-4o, creating detailed Pipedrive notes, and sending formatted Slack alerts. Integrates Pipedrive API, ScrapingBee API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Slack API.

name: Automated Q&A Generator for n8n Integrations
description: This n8n workflow automates the creation of FAQ templates for various service integrations using Google Sheets, OpenAI GPT-4, and Google Drive. It reads integration data from Sheets, generates and enhances Q&A pairs with AI, and saves results to Drive for CMS use (e.g., Wordpress, Webflow, Strapi).

name: Twilio SMS AI Chat Buffering Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Twilio, Redis, and OpenAI to buffer rapid SMS messages into a single AI-generated reply. Uses Redis for message stacking, LangChain memory nodes for chat history, and OpenAI's conversational agent for summarizing user inputs, improving chat flow and response quality.

name: Automated AI-Powered Fact Emailer
description: An n8n workflow that uses Airtable as subscriber DB, AI agents (Groq llama-3.3-70b, LangChain, OpenAI) to generate unique factoids and images, and Gmail for sending scheduled personalized educational emails with subscription management via n8n forms.

name: Notion to Supabase Vector Storage with OpenAI
description: Automates storing textual content from new Notion pages as vector documents in Supabase using OpenAI embeddings. Integrates Notion (page trigger, content retrieval), OpenAI (text embeddings), and Supabase (vector column storage) to enable efficient semantic search and organization.

name: Telegram to Spotify Track Control
description: Automate Spotify playback via Telegram using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for track identification. This n8n workflow triggers from Telegram messages, fetches track info using OpenAI, searches Spotify, and controls playback (add, next, resume). Integrates Telegram, OpenAI, and Spotify APIs.

name: Telegram AI Study Assistant for Signal Processing
description: An AI-powered Telegram bot for interactive signal processing study help. Integrates Telegram API, OpenAI API, Google Gemini, Airtable, Wikipedia, and LangChain tools like calculator and memory. Guides users through problems, explains theory, and records memory for personalized learning.

name: Glassdoor Company Summary with Google Gemini & Bright Data
description: Automates extraction and summarization of Glassdoor company info using Bright Data Web Scraper API and Google Gemini (PaLM) language model. Retrieves up-to-date company data, checks scrape status, then summarizes with Langchain AI to provide concise insights.

name: Dynamically Switch Between LLMs
description: An n8n workflow that dynamically selects and switches between multiple OpenAI language models (gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4o, o1) to generate polite customer support responses. It validates answers via sentiment analysis and handles errors to improve response quality.

name: Telegram AI Chat with Message Buffering
description: This n8n workflow integrates Telegram, Supabase PostgreSQL, and OpenAI GPT-4 to buffer multiple user messages, aggregate them, and reply with a single AI-generated response. It enhances chatbot conversation quality by combining rapid-fire inputs into coherent replies.

name: PDF to Blog Post Automation
description: Transforms uploaded PDFs into SEO-optimized blog posts by extracting text with n8n and generating structured content via OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini. Publishes drafts directly to Ghost CMS using Ghost Admin API.

name: Discord AI Helpdesk Ticket Sorter
description: An n8n workflow integrating Discord Webhooks and OpenAI GPT-4 to automatically categorize user feedback into success stories, urgent issues, or regular tickets for targeted departmental routing, enhancing support efficiency with AI-powered message classification.

name: AI-Powered Fact-Checking Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that uses Ollama LLM models and custom code to split text into sentences, evaluate factual accuracy against provided facts, and summarize errors. Utilizes JavaScript, Ollama API, and LangChain integration to automate fact verification and summary generation.

name: OpenAI Assistant with File Upload & Chat
description: Automates creating a custom OpenAI Assistant by uploading a Google Drive document and enabling chat interaction. Uses Google Drive API, OpenAI API (file upload, assistant creation, GPT-4 Turbo). Ideal for building knowledge-based chatbots from documents.

name: AI Logo Sheet Extractor to Airtable
description: Automates extraction of tools and attributes from uploaded AI logo sheets using OpenAI GPT-4o and LangChain AI agent, then stores and updates records in Airtable with hashed IDs and links. Enables easy cataloging of product comparisons from images via form submissions.

name: Automated Credit Card Spend Extractor
description: This n8n workflow automates extraction of credit card transaction details from Gmail labeled emails using Gmail API, PDF extraction, HTML parsing, and AI NLP models (Google Gemini, Groq LLaMA, LangChain) to structure spend data, then logs it into Google Sheets for finance tracking.

name: AI-Powered US Grants Tracker & Notifier
description: Automates fetching, AI summarization, eligibility analysis, tracking, and emailing of new AI-focused US grants using Grants.gov API, OpenAI, Airtable, and Gmail. Helps organizations quickly discover and review relevant grant opportunities daily.

name: Agent Access Control with Telegram & Airtable
description: An n8n workflow implementing an AI agent access control system using Telegram Bot, Airtable for user permissions, and OpenAI GPT-4 models. It verifies user roles and allowed tools before executing actions and supports sub-agents like a weather assistant with real-time API data.

name: AI Agent for Web Scraping & API Data Fetch
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Langchain agents with API tools like Firecrawl for web scraping and Bored API for activity suggestions. Enables AI-driven data retrieval, parsing, and dynamic interaction via custom HTTP calls to enhance automation tasks.

name: GitHub Prompt Loader with Dynamic AI Query
description: An n8n workflow that fetches prompt templates from GitHub, dynamically replaces variables using set parameters, validates variable presence, and sends the completed prompt to an AI agent (Langchain & Ollama). Ideal for automated prompt management in AI workflows.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Email Reply Assistant
description: Automates email replies by integrating Microsoft Outlook and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via n8n. Filters emails from specific sender, generates personalized replies in your style, and drafts or sends replies automatically, enhancing email productivity.

name: AI Movie Recommendation Agent with MongoDB
description: An AI-driven movie recommendation chatbot using OpenAI GPT and MongoDB aggregation. It receives user chat input, queries a MongoDB movies collection with AI-generated aggregation pipelines, provides recommendations, and allows saving favorite movies. Built with n8n, OpenAI API, and MongoDB.

name: YouTube Video Transcript Summarizer
description: Automates summarization of YouTube video transcripts using SearchApi.io for transcript retrieval and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model via Langchain in n8n. Converts video_id input into concise video content summaries for easy consumption.

name: Gmail Automation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating Gmail operations like sending, replying, getting emails, and waiting for responses using Gmail OAuth2 API. Integrates n8n's langchain MCP trigger for AI-driven email handling and dynamic message management.

name: YouTube Video AI Summaries to Discord
description: Automates fetching new YouTube videos from a channel's RSS feed, retrieves English captions via YouTube API with OAuth2, summarizes transcript content using OpenAI's GPT-3.5, and posts concise bullet-point summaries with video links to a Discord channel via webhook.

name: Google Drive PDF RAG with AI Chat
description: Automates Google Drive folder monitoring to download PDFs, extract and clean text, generate embeddings with Google Gemini, store them in Pinecone vector DB, and enable AI chat queries with context via OpenRouter and Langchain nodes for retrieval-augmented generation.

name: Confluence Knowledge Base Query Tool
description: Automates IT support by transforming Slack user queries using OpenAI GPT-4, then searching Confluence via its API to return relevant KB article titles, links, and excerpts. Integrates n8n, OpenAI, and Confluence APIs for efficient knowledge retrieval.

name: DeepSeek V3 Chat & Reasoning AI Agent
description: An n8n workflow integrating DeepSeek API and Ollama local model with LangChain nodes to create a conversational AI agent featuring reasoning capabilities and memory. Utilizes OpenAI-compatible DeepSeek models and local LLMs for advanced chat interactions.

name: Auto Post YouTube Videos to X
description: Automates posting new YouTube videos to X (Twitter) every 30 min using YouTube API, OpenAI GPT-3.5 for post generation, and X API for publishing engaging tweets linking the latest video.

name: AI-Powered Weather Forecast with Open-Meteo API
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI's GPT chat model with Open-Meteo geolocation and weather APIs for interactive, AI-driven weather forecasts. Users input a city name via chat, AI fetches coordinates, then retrieves and returns a 7-day forecast using HTTP requests, enabling smart travel planning.

name: Hugging Face Paper Summarizer to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of new research papers from Hugging Face, analyzes abstracts using OpenAI GPT-4O, and stores structured summaries in Notion. Tech stack includes Hugging Face API, HTML extraction, OpenAI API (GPT-4O), and Notion API integration.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Image Response
description: An n8n workflow that uses Telegram API and OpenAI's image generation to receive text messages, generate AI images from the text, and send these images back via Telegram, enabling AI-enhanced visual communication.

name: Crypto Price Telegram Bot
description: An n8n workflow that integrates Telegram, OpenAI GPT-4o mini, and CoinMarketCap API to provide real-time cryptocurrency prices via chat. It uses Langchain agents with memory buffer to manage sessions and respond dynamically to user queries on Telegram.

name: AI Personal Shopper with RAG & WooCommerce
description: An intelligent assistant workflow using OpenAI chat models, Qdrant vector store, and WooCommerce API to handle store inquiries and product search. Integrates Google Drive for document storage and uses RAG for general store info and LangChain for memory and tools.

name: AI-Enhanced Structured Output Parser
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Chat models with LangChain for parsing structured data. It processes prompts, validates and auto-fixes AI outputs to extract formatted information like US states and cities with populations, ensuring reliable structured data generation.

name: OpenAI Image Generation Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates image creation via OpenAI Image Generation API, using prompts, quality, size, and quantity parameters. It converts base64 responses to files, enabling easy image generation automation with HTTP Request and file conversion nodes.

name: OpenAI Model Fine-tuning Automation
description: Automates fine-tuning of OpenAI GPT models using training data from Google Drive. Integrates Google Drive API, OpenAI file upload, and fine-tuning job creation with n8n automation platform to streamline custom AI model creation and deployment.

name: On-Page SEO Audit Automation
description: Automates on-page SEO audits by scraping a landing page URL and using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model to generate detailed technical and content SEO audits. Outputs a structured audit report and emails it via Gmail. Built with n8n, HTTP Request, Langchain, OpenAI, and Gmail API.

name: Reddit n8n Posts Classification & Summary
description: Automates fetching recent n8n-related Reddit posts, filters by upvotes and date, classifies relevance with OpenAI, then summarizes content. Uses Reddit API and OpenAI API, aiming to monitor and categorize discussions about n8n.io efficiently.

name: Daily Gratitude Reminder via LINE
description: An automated daily reminder system that sends personalized gratitude prompts at 9 PM via LINE. Utilizes Azure OpenAI for varied message generation and reformats output for LINE Push API. Helps build positive habits using n8n workflow and AI.

name: Daily Calvin & Hobbes Comic Auto Poster
description: Automates fetching daily Calvin and Hobbes comic images via HTTP request, extracts the image URL using LangChain info extractor, translates dialogues to English and Korean with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and posts the results to Discord daily using a webhook. Uses n8n, OpenAI API, and Discord webhook.

name: YogiAI Daily Yoga Pose Reminder
description: Automates daily yoga pose reminders via Line using Azure OpenAI and Google Sheets. Fetches weighted random poses from Sheets, formats messages with AI, creates Line Flex messages with images, and sends scheduled notifications. Tech: n8n, Azure OpenAI, Google Sheets, Line Messaging API.

name: OpenAI Image Generation Webhook
description: This n8n workflow exposes a webhook that triggers OpenAI's image generation API using a user-provided prompt via URL query. It returns the generated image directly in the browser. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI API, webhook, URL query parameters.

name: Generate llms.txt from Screaming Frog CSV
description: Automate creation of llms.txt files from Screaming Frog website crawl CSVs. Uses n8n nodes, optional OpenAI GPT-4o-mini text classifier, and file processing to filter, format, and generate AI-ready text files describing site content for LLM training or analysis.

name: Ollama Chat Integration with Llama 3.2
description: n8n workflow integrating Ollama API with Llama 3.2 model for chat message processing. Uses LangChain nodes including chat trigger, LLM chain, and structured response formatting to handle and respond to chat prompts as JSON objects.

name: Paul Graham Essays Scraper & Summarizer
description: Automates scraping of Paul Graham's latest essays from his website using HTTP and HTML nodes, then summarizes the top 3 essays with GPT-4 via OpenAI API and LangChain nodes in n8n workflow.

name: OpenAI Chat Assistant with Country Capitals Tool
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Assistant via LangChain to enable interactive chat. It includes custom tools for returning fictional countries' capitals and listing them, plus a date/time tool. It automates conversational AI with dynamic data retrieval using JavaScript code nodes and summarization.

name: Paul Graham Essays Scraper & QA Chat
description: Automates scraping of Paul Graham's essays from his website, processes texts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and stores embeddings in Milvus vector DB. Enables QA chat with the indexed essays via LangChain nodes in n8n workflow.

name: 3-View Orthographic to Dynamic Video Converter
description: Automates conversion of three orthographic views into a rotating 3D-style video. Uses GPT-4o for front and side image generation and PiAPI's Kling model for dynamic video synthesis with rotation. Ideal for 3D visualization and animation workflows.

name: n8n Supabase AI Agent Manager
description: Automates management of AI agent interactions using n8n with Supabase as a vector store and data backend, integrating OpenAI embeddings for knowledge retrieval and Langchain MCP triggers for agent workflows.

name: Generate & Save CSV User Lists with GPT-4
description: An n8n workflow that uses GPT-4 (OpenAI API) to generate mock user data in JSON, parses it, converts to CSV in batches, fixes UTF BOM issues, and saves files locally. Ideal for creating randomized CSV datasets quickly.

name: News Web Scraper with AI Summarization
description: Automates weekly scraping of news from Colt telecom site using HTML extraction and CSS selectors. Utilizes OpenAI GPT-4 API to generate concise summaries and technical keywords. Stores results in a NocoDB SQL database for easy management.

name: Ollama LLM Chat Processor
description: An n8n workflow that processes chat messages using Ollama's Llama 3.2 model via LangChain integration. It receives chat inputs, processes them through an LLM chain, and returns structured JSON responses. Requires Ollama API credentials and n8n.

name: Line + DALL·E Lego Style Image Transformer
description: An n8n workflow that uses LINE Messaging API and OpenAI's DALL·E to receive images via LINE, generate LEGO-style prompts with GPT-4o-mini, create LEGO-style images, and send them back to users. Integrates LINE webhook, HTTP requests, and OpenAI API for image manipulation.

name: n8n Workflow Magic Positioning AI
description: Automates dynamic positioning of nodes in n8n workflows using AI. Integrates n8n core nodes, OpenAI APIs (Chat and Embeddings), LangChain AI Agents, and a custom IA2S positioning API. Enables effortless and smart workflow layout management.

name: Youtube Podcast Discord AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow that creates a Discord AI assistant using Google Gemini chat and Langchain memory. It responds to user questions with context-aware answers about 'Presting Podcasts' YouTube videos, integrating webhook input and formatting replies for Discord.

name: AI Financial Chart Analyzer Backend
description: An n8n workflow backend for a Chrome extension that uses OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model to analyze stock or cryptocurrency chart images sent via webhook. It provides simple, novice-friendly technical market analysis with disclaimers. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI API, webhook integration.

name: Keyword IT Service Identifier
description: An n8n workflow that reads keywords from a Google Sheet, uses OpenAI GPT-4 via Langchain to identify if keywords include known IT software or services, then updates the sheet with 'yes' or 'no' results. It features batch processing and rate-limiting wait nodes for API stability.

name: Airtable Query & AI Response in Obsidian
description: This n8n workflow links Airtable data with Obsidian notes using OpenAI GPT-4 through an AI Agent. It automates querying Airtable and sends AI-processed answers back into Obsidian via webhook, enhancing note-taking with dynamic database insights.

name: Book Info Scraper to Google Sheets
description: This n8n workflow scrapes book data from a website using HTTP request with Jina AI, extracts details via OpenAI-powered Langchain, and saves structured info (title, price, availability, image, link) into Google Sheets. Tech stack: n8n, Jina AI, OpenAI, Google Sheets API.

name: Todoist Task Categorizer with AI Priority Update
description: Automates categorizing Todoist inbox tasks into projects using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini, then updates their priority in Todoist accordingly. Uses n8n workflow with Todoist and OpenAI APIs, scheduled trigger, and filters to streamline task management.

name: Paul Graham Essays Scraper & Summarizer
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes the latest essays from paulgraham.com, extracts titles and full texts, and summarizes them using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model with Langchain nodes. Automates content aggregation and summarization of Paul Graham's essays.

name: LangChain Q&A with Workflow Content Retriever
description: An n8n workflow using LangChain integration with OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) to perform question-answering on dynamically retrieved workflow data. It uses a manual trigger, a subworkflow retriever, and a set node to input queries, enabling smart Q&A on saved workflow content.

name: Chatbot with Mistral-7B via Hugging Face
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on chat message input and generates polite, emoji-rich replies using an open-source Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.1 model via Hugging Face API. Utilizes LangChain nodes to manage LLM chaining for conversational AI.

name: French to English Audio Translation Workflow
description: This n8n workflow converts French text to spoken audio using ElevenLabs TTS, transcribes it with OpenAI Whisper, translates to English with GPT-4o-mini, and generates English speech via ElevenLabs. Integrates ElevenLabs TTS API and OpenAI APIs for a full audio translation cycle.

name: AI Activity Suggestion Chatbot
description: An n8n AI agent workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Bored API to suggest personalized activity ideas based on user input on activity type and participants. Includes memory buffer for chat context and a sub-workflow for API calls.

name: HTML Page Generator with OpenAI Structured Output
description: An n8n workflow that uses OpenAI GPT-4o to generate structured JSON UI components styled with Tailwind CSS from user queries, converts JSON to formatted HTML, and serves dynamic web pages via webhook.

name: Todoist Task Prioritization with OpenAI
description: Automates task prioritization in Todoist using a scheduled n8n workflow. It fetches inbox tasks, categorizes them to projects via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and updates their priority accordingly. Utilizes Todoist API, OpenAI API, and n8n automation platform.

name: Daily Calvin & Hobbes Comic with AI Translation
description: Automates daily retrieval of Calvin & Hobbes comics using HTTP requests to GoComics, extracts comic images with LangChain, translates dialogues to Korean & English via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and posts results on Discord via webhook. Uses n8n scheduler for daily automation.

name: Line to LEGO Style Image via DALL·E
description: Transforms images sent via LINE messaging app into LEGO-style isometric images using a LINE webhook, LINE Messaging API, and OpenAI's DALL·E and GPT models for prompt creation and image generation.

name: 3D Figurine Views Generator with AI APIs
description: Automates creation of 3D figurine orthographic views using Midjourney for initial 3D-style image generation and GPT-4o-Image API to produce front, side, and back views on a turnaround sheet. Built with n8n workflow automation handling HTTP requests and image URL parsing.

name: Paul Graham Essays Milvus AI Agent
description: n8n workflow scrapes Paul Graham essays, extracts and processes text, loads to Milvus vector database, and enables AI chat with OpenAI GPT-4o mini model. Tech stack: HTTP requests, HTML parsing, LangChain tools, Milvus vector store, and OpenAI embeddings and chat APIs.

name: Book Data Scraper to Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes book details from a website using HTTP request to Jina.ai endpoint, extracts structured info with OpenAI-powered Langchain nodes, and appends data (title, price, availability, image, link) into Google Sheets. Automates product price tracking.

name: LangChain Workflow Retriever with OpenAI QA
description: An n8n workflow integrating LangChain and OpenAI API to retrieve and query data from another n8n workflow by ID. It uses LangChain's Workflow Retriever and Retrieval QA Chain with an OpenAI Chat model to answer questions based on workflow data.

name: Automated Website Change Spy & Email Alerts
description: An n8n workflow that automates detecting changes on specified websites using Firecrawl scraping API, compares content over a day, uses OpenAI GPT-4 models to analyze differences, and conditionally sends detailed Gmail alerts. Integrates OpenAI, Firecrawl, and Gmail for spy-like website monitoring.

name: Telegram Meetup Scheduler AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API, Google Sheets, and OpenRouter AI to provide meetup scheduling assistance. It fetches schedule data from Google Sheets, converts it to markdown, and uses LangChain with OpenRouter for AI-powered chat responses on Telegram.

name: AI-Powered Random Color Selector
description: An n8n workflow using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to return a random color excluding specified ones. It integrates a code tool for color selection and AI agent for processing chat inputs via webhook, ideal for AI-driven color choice automation.

name: License Plate Number Extractor from Image
description: An n8n workflow that extracts license plate numbers from uploaded car images using OpenRouter's GPT-4o model within LangChain. Users upload an image via a form, and the AI processes the image prompt to return the license plate text, automating vehicle identification.

name: Reddit n8n Post Classifier
description: n8n workflow that fetches recent Reddit posts about 'n8n', filters by upvotes and date, classifies relevance using OpenAI, and summarizes content. Integrates Reddit API and OpenAI. Useful for monitoring community discussions about n8n.

name: Fictional Country Capitals Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Langchain nodes to create a chat assistant that returns capitals of fictional countries like Wakanda or Narnia. Uses OpenAI API for chat, JavaScript code nodes for data mapping, and conditional logic to handle queries or list countries.

name: Automated Social Media Content Publisher
description: An n8n workflow utilizing OpenAI GPT-4 and LangChain that automates content creation and publishing across Twitter (X), Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Threads, and YouTube Shorts. It dynamically composes prompts and schemas from Google Docs, generates contextual posts with AI, creates matching images using pollinations.ai, and publishes or archives content with approvals and notifications.

name: AI Social Video Generator & Auto Social Posting
description: An automated n8n workflow leveraging Telegram, GPT-4, Kling AI video API, Cloudinary, and Blotato to create AI videos with voice-over and captions, then auto-publish to Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, Threads, Bluesky, and Pinterest.

name: YouTube Video Summaries & Transcripts via Gemini API
description: Automate extraction of YouTube video transcripts, summaries, scene descriptions, and social media clips using Google Gemini API and n8n automation. Easily customize prompts and output for versatile video content analysis and marketing.

name: AI Social Video Auto-Creation & Multi-Platform Posting
description: Automates video creation from Telegram prompts or images using AI (GPT-4, Piapi, Blotato), merges voice-over and captions, saves metadata to Google Sheets, and auto-publishes videos to 9 social platforms (Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Threads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Bluesky, Pinterest) via Blotato API.

name: Automated Social Media Content Publisher & Prompt Composer
description: An n8n workflow automating content creation and publishing across TikTok (YouTube Shorts), Instagram, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, and Threads using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain for AI content generation, Pollinations.ai for image creation, imgbb API for image hosting, Google Docs for prompts/schema storage, and platform APIs for auto-posting. It supports human approval via Gmail and structures posts per platform specs.

name: Instagram Auto Posting via Google Drive & AI
description: Automates Instagram Reel posting using Google Drive triggers, OpenAI for generating captions, Google Sheets for data management, and Facebook Graph API for publishing. Integrates Google Drive, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Sheets, and Meta APIs to streamline content upload to Instagram.

name: Telegram Voice/Text to SEO Social Content AI
description: Automates Telegram incoming messages (voice or text), transcribes voice via OpenAI Whisper, researches topics with SerpAPI, generates SEO-optimized social media posts and photorealistic image prompts, then creates images via HuggingFace Stable Diffusion integration.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Lead Outreach
description: Automates social media analysis from LinkedIn and Twitter via RapidAPI, uses OpenAI GPT-4 for personalized cover letter and subject generation, integrates Google Sheets for lead management, and sends customized emails via SMTP. Ideal for marketers and lead gen pros.

name: Social Media Multi-Platform Publisher
description: Automates posting photos/videos on TikTok, X, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Threads, LinkedIn via Upload-Post.com API. Uses n8n form trigger for uploads, then posts media with captions. Includes success/error feedback forms to users.

name: AI Job Hunt POV Video Creator
description: Automates creation of short-form job hunting videos using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI Flux for image generation, Kling for video, ElevenLabs for voiceovers, Creatomate for final rendering, Google Sheets for ideas, and uploads to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn via upload-post.com.

name: Weekly Online Marketing Report Generator
description: Automates weekly retrieval, analysis, and reporting of online marketing data using Google Analytics, Google Ads API, Meta Ads (Facebook Graph API), and OpenAI GPT-4 for AI-powered insights and summaries. Sends detailed HTML email and Telegram report.

name: AI-Powered Instagram Trend Content Generator
description: Automates Instagram content creation by scraping top trending posts via RapidAPI Instagram Scraper, filtering images, analyzing with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision, generating captions, creating images using Replicate Flux AI, and publishing via Facebook Graph API with Telegram notifications.

name: AI-Driven Instagram Trend Content Creator
description: Automates Instagram content creation by scraping top trending posts with RapidAPI, analyzing images with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision, generating unique AI images via Replicate Flux AI, and posting with Facebook Graph API. Sends Telegram notifications on status updates. Ideal for creators leveraging AI for engaging posts.

name: Automated 9:16 AI Image & Video Content Creator
description: This n8n workflow automates creating 9:16 aspect ratio short-form video scripts and AI-generated images using Airtable for content management, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for script generation, and Leonardo.ai for prompt improvement and image generation. Perfect for branding and social media content production.

name: Hacker News AI Video Content Generator
description: Automates creating AI-generated video summaries from Hacker News articles using OpenAI for analysis, Leonardo.ai for images, RunwayML and Creatomate for video creation, with uploads to cloud storage and posting on social media platforms.

name: Automated Social Media Insights for Meetings
description: Daily fetches Google Calendar meetings, enriches attendees via Clearbit, retrieves LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, summarizes social activities using OpenAI GPT-4, and emails personalized summaries via Gmail. Tech: Google Calendar, Clearbit, RapidAPI LinkedIn & Twitter APIs, OpenAI GPT-4, Gmail.

name: AI Instagram Caption Generator with Airtable
description: Automates creation of Instagram captions by integrating Airtable editorial plans with OpenAI's GPT-4 via n8n. Uses Airtable for briefing and background info on target audience, then generates creative, CTA-focused captions tailored for social media posts.

name: Auto Video Upload & Description for TikTok/Instagram
description: Automates video processing by monitoring a Google Drive folder, extracting audio with OpenAI, generating social media descriptions, and uploading to TikTok and Instagram via upload-post.com API. Includes Telegram error alerts.

name: AI Social Media Publisher from WordPress
description: Automates social media posting from WordPress content using AI-generated, platform-tailored captions and images. Integrates WordPress, Google Sheets, OpenRouter (Gemini 2.0), OpenAI, and APIs for X (Twitter), Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for multi-platform publishing.

name: Automate LinkedIn Posts from Notion with AI
description: n8n workflow automates daily LinkedIn posts by fetching content and images from Notion databases, enhancing text using OpenAI's GPT, and publishing to LinkedIn. Includes scheduled triggers, OpenAI API, Notion API, and LinkedIn OAuth integration for seamless social media management.

name: Auto-Post to 9 Social Platforms
description: Automates video publishing across Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, Threads, Twitter, Bluesky, and Pinterest using n8n, Google Sheets, and Blotato API. Scheduled to fetch video data, upload it, then post simultaneously to all platforms without manual effort.

name: Auto Video Upload & Caption for Social Media
description: Automates uploading videos from a Google Drive folder to TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube using upload-post.com API. Extracts audio with OpenAI to generate engaging captions, sending error alerts via Telegram. Tech: Google Drive, OpenAI, upload-post.com API, Telegram.

name: Blotato Multi-Platform Social Media Publisher
description: Automates publishing of videos and images to Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Threads, and Bluesky using Blotato API. Integrates Airtable for content management and OpenAI GPT-4 for optimizing YouTube titles, enabling streamlined multi-channel social media scheduling.

name: AI-powered GitHub Trending Auto Social Poster
description: Automates curation of trending GitHub projects from Hacker News, fetching project details, generating tailored Twitter and LinkedIn posts using OpenAI GPT-4, and posting via X (Twitter) and LinkedIn APIs. Includes Airtable tracking and Telegram notifications.

name: Social Media Post Generator & Twitter Poster
description: Automates social media post creation by fetching content ideas from Google Sheets, generating posts using OpenAI GPT-4, posting to Twitter via Twitter API, and updating Google Sheets with posting info. Integrates Google Sheets, OpenAI, and Twitter APIs.

name: AI News Summary & Auto Post to X
description: Automates fetching the latest AI news using Perplexity AI API and posts concise headlines with article links to X (formerly Twitter) every 21 hours. Uses n8n for scheduling, HTTP requests, and Twitter OAuth2 API integration for social media automation.

name: Client Feedback AI Summary & Social Post
description: Automates client feedback processing using n8n workflow with Deepseek AI API for analysis, email for report delivery, and Telegram for social media draft sharing. Summarizes positives, suggests improvements, and drafts social posts from feedback.

name: Auto Post YouTube Videos to X
description: Automates posting new YouTube videos to X (Twitter) every 30 min using YouTube API, OpenAI GPT-3.5 for post generation, and X API for publishing engaging tweets linking the latest video.

name: Auto Post New YouTube Videos to X
description: Automates posting engaging tweets about new YouTube videos using YouTube API, OpenAI's GPT-3.5 for content generation, and X (Twitter) API for posting. Runs every 30 minutes to promote latest video with AI-generated short posts.

name: Threads to Notion Post Archiver
description: Automates fetching recent Instagram Threads posts and comments using Threads API, filters and formats media and text content, then archives them into a Notion database with media embeds. Uses n8n, Threads API, and Notion API for seamless social media content archival.

name: AI Motion Illustration Video Generator
description: Generates motion illustration videos by combining Midjourney AI image generation and Kling API video creation. Uses PiAPI with HTTP requests, automating from image prompt to final video output for content creators and social media professionals.

name: Twitter Thread Generator with AI Agent
description: This n8n workflow uses Langchain's chat trigger, OpenAI GPT-4o model, and Twitter API to create engaging Twitter threads. It employs a conversational AI agent that drafts informative, friendly tweets and replies, forming coherent, natural threads with memory context for flow.

name: Automated Social Media Digest for Meetings
description: An n8n workflow that fetches attendees' LinkedIn posts and Twitter tweets using RapidAPI, enriches company data via Clearbit, and emails a daily digest before meetings. Integrates Google Calendar, Gmail, LinkedIn and Twitter APIs to streamline meeting prep with social insights.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Link Scraper
description: An autonomous AI workflow using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Supabase to crawl websites from a database, extract all social media profile URLs, and store them in a structured format. It leverages HTML parsing, HTTP requests, LangChain tools, and data cleaning.

name: Autonomous Social Media Profile Crawler
description: n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, Supabase DB, and built-in HTTP/HTML nodes to autonomously crawl company websites, extract and standardize social media profile URLs into JSON format, and store results back to a database. Highly customizable multi-page crawler.

name: Social Media Lead Analyzer & Email Generator
description: Automates lead outreach by extracting LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, analyzes data using OpenAI GPT-4, and generates personalized HTML cover letters sent via SMTP. Integrates Google Sheets for lead data and tracking, ideal for marketers and sales pros.

name: Twitter Sentiment ETL Pipeline
description: Automates fetching #OnThisDay tweets via Twitter API, storing texts in MongoDB, analyzing sentiment with Google Cloud Natural Language, saving results in Postgres, and alerting via Slack if sentiment score is high. Built with n8n for daily ETL workflow automation.

name: Facebook Long-Lived Access Token Generator
description: Automates the retrieval of long-lived Facebook user and page access tokens using Facebook Graph API and n8n. Takes client ID, secret, user token, and optional app-scoped user ID to securely extend token validity for apps and integrations.

name: Twitter Mention Alert to Slack
description: Automates monitoring Twitter for mentions of a specified company every 10 minutes using Twitter API; formats tweet info and posts alerts to Slack channel. Utilizes n8n, Twitter OAuth1 API, Slack API.

name: Twitter New Followers Banner Updater
description: Automates fetching latest Twitter followers, processes their profile images by resizing and cropping into circular icons, composites them onto a customizable banner template, and updates your Twitter profile banner using Twitter API and n8n image editing nodes.

name: Twitter Sentiment Filter & Strapi Sync
description: Automates fetching recent English tweets about Strapi or n8n.io every 30 mins, filters out retweets/old tweets, analyzes sentiment using Google Cloud Natural Language API, and stores only positive sentiment tweets and form submissions into a Strapi CMS collection.

name: AI Social Media Auto-Poster from Hacker News
description: Automates curation and posting of trending GitHub projects from Hacker News to Twitter and LinkedIn using OpenAI GPT-4, Airtable, Telegram, and n8n. Extracts GitHub links, generates engaging content, schedules posts, and prevents duplicates.

name: AI Social Media Caption Creator
description: Automates generating creative Instagram captions using n8n workflow with OpenAI GPT-4 and Airtable. It triggers on new Airtable records with briefing data, enriches context via background info, crafts captions via a Langchain AI Agent, and updates Airtable editorial plans seamlessly.

name: WooCommerce New Product Announcement to Twitter & Telegram
description: Automates announcing new WooCommerce products on Twitter and Telegram. Uses WooCommerce webhook trigger, Twitter API, and Telegram API to post customized new product messages instantly, enhancing social media marketing and customer engagement.

name: Twitter Sentiment ETL Pipeline
description: Automates daily extraction of #OnThisDay tweets via Twitter API, stores raw tweets in MongoDB, analyzes sentiment using Google Cloud Natural Language API, saves enriched data in PostgreSQL, and sends positive sentiment alerts to Slack. Built with n8n integration platform.

name: Facebook Lead Ads to KlickTipp Automation
description: Automates lead capture from Facebook Lead Ads into KlickTipp CRM. Utilizes Facebook Lead Ads Trigger and KlickTipp API nodes in n8n to sync lead data with mapped custom fields and tags for personalized email campaigns and segmentation.

name: Automated Tweets Scheduler from Google Sheets
description: n8n workflow automates posting tweets by fetching texts from a Google Sheets document every 6 hours and posting them on X (Twitter) via API. It uses Google Sheets OAuth2 for reading and deleting rows and Twitter OAuth2 for posting tweets, enabling scheduled social media updates.

name: Automated Viral Tweet Creator & Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow automating creation and scheduled posting of viral tweets every 6 hours using OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo for content generation and Twitter API for posting. Customizable influencer niche, style, and inspiration ensure on-brand, engagement-focused tweets.

name: Twitter Search to Mattermost Alerts
description: Automates Twitter search for 'n8n_io' using Twitter API every minute, filters new tweets, formats data, and sends detailed notifications to Mattermost channels. Utilizes Twitter OAuth1, n8n Cron, Function, Set, and Mattermost API nodes for real-time monitoring and alerting.

name: Twitter Mentions to RocketChat Alert
description: Automates monitoring of @n8n_io Twitter mentions using Twitter API, filters new tweets, and posts notifications to RocketChat. Built with n8n nodes: Cron, Twitter, Function, Set, and RocketChat for real-time social media alerts.

name: Automated YouTube to X Post Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates fetching the latest YouTube videos, uses OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI to generate engaging X (Twitter) posts under 220 characters, and posts them automatically via the X API. It also logs posts in Google Sheets and supports Slack, Discord, and Gmail notifications.

name: Strava Activity Auto-Tweet
description: Automates tweeting new Strava activities using Strava API trigger and Twitter API. When a new activity is created on Strava, it tweets the activity name and distance automatically using OAuth2 and OAuth1 authentication.

name: Twitter Banner Auto-Updater
description: Automates updating your Twitter profile banner by downloading an image from Unsplash and uploading it to Twitter using OAuth1 authentication. Utilizes HTTP Request nodes in n8n for image retrieval and Twitter API interaction, triggered manually.

name: Telegram to Facebook Ad Interest Exporter
description: Automates extraction of Facebook ad interests from Telegram messages using Telegram API, Facebook Graph API v17.0, and n8n. Extracts hashtagged interests, queries Facebook, formats data into CSV, and sends back via Telegram.

name: Multi-Image Upload to Instagram & TikTok
description: Automates uploading multiple images to Instagram and TikTok using the Upload-Post API. It fetches images, renames binary data for upload, merges files, and sends multipart-form requests with API key authorization, simplifying cross-platform social media posts.

name: Twitter New Tweets to Airtable
description: Automates fetching the latest tweets about 'verstappen' using Twitter API and appends only new tweets to Airtable database. Uses n8n with Twitter and Airtable nodes to filter out duplicates and update records seamlessly.

name: Facebook Page Comments Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that uses the Facebook Graph API to fetch latest posts and their comments from a specified Facebook Page. It processes, filters, and organizes Facebook post and comment data, leveraging nodes like Set, Split Out, Filter, Merge, and Code to structure the output.

name: Twitter Followers Banner Updater
description: Automates updating Twitter profile banner with latest followers' avatars. Uses Twitter API v2 to fetch followers, downloads and edits avatars and a background image, composites them, and updates banner via Twitter API v1.1 with OAuth1.0 authentication.

name: Shopify Product Launch Social Broadcaster
description: Automates social media announcements for new Shopify products by posting customizable messages to Twitter and Telegram using Shopify Trigger, Twitter API, and Telegram API integration in n8n workflow.

name: Facebook Profile Update to Mattermost Alert
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Facebook user profile updates using Facebook Graph API and sends a formatted notification message to a specified Mattermost channel via Mattermost API, enabling real-time alerts on profile changes.

name: Daily Image Joke Twitter Poster
description: Automates posting a daily image joke on Twitter at 17:00. Uses the Blablagues API to fetch joke images and text, retrieves the image file, then tweets with text and image using Twitter OAuth1 API. Scheduled via n8n Cron node.

name: Nostr Damus Hashtag AI Analytics
description: Automated social media analytics that monitors Nostr's #damus hashtag, uses Google Gemini AI to analyze themes and generate reports, then sends insights via Gmail and Telegram. Tech: Nostr API, Google Gemini AI, Gmail, Telegram. Perfect for tracking decentralized social trends.

name: Fetch Facebook User Name via API
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves the first and last name of a Facebook user using the Facebook Graph API. Initiated manually, it integrates n8n automation with Facebook API credentials to fetch user profile data efficiently.

name: Twitter Auto Poster with Loop Control
description: This n8n workflow posts "Hello from n8n!" to Twitter using Twitter OAuth1 API credentials. It triggers manually, then loops posting tweets until the run count reaches 4, controlled by an IF node. Includes a NoOp node for alternate flow.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Assistant with Email, Calendar & Tasks
description: An AI assistant on Telegram integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, Gmail, and Baserow for task and contact management. It handles voice/text inputs, transcribes voice notes, fetches and summarizes emails and calendar events, and manages tasks, providing seamless personal assistance.

name: AI-Driven Sales Meeting Follow-Up Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow automating sales follow-ups using Google Calendar and Gmail APIs. It retrieves past meetings, checks email interaction, uses OpenAI GPT-4 powered AI agents to suggest and book next meeting slots, with human approval for final booking. Supports calendar management and contextualized follow-ups.

name: Client Feedback Routing & HubSpot Logging
description: Automates client conversation processing with OpenAI summarization, routes feedback to departments via email, and logs meeting notes in HubSpot using OAuth2. Uses n8n, Langchain, Gmail API, and HubSpot API to streamline client issue management.

name: Weekly Online Marketing Report Generator
description: Automates weekly retrieval, analysis, and reporting of online marketing data using Google Analytics, Google Ads API, Meta Ads (Facebook Graph API), and OpenAI GPT-4 for AI-powered insights and summaries. Sends detailed HTML email and Telegram report.

name: AI Outlook Email Auto Categorizer
description: Automates categorization of Microsoft Outlook emails using n8n workflows integrated with Ollama's qwen2.5 AI model. Cleans email content, classifies into categories (action, junk, receipt, SaaS, community, business), updates Outlook labels and moves emails accordingly.

name: Raw Material Inventory & Approval Automation
description: An n8n workflow automating raw material receipt, stock updates, issue requests, and approvals. Integrates webhooks, Google Sheets, Supabase DB, and Gmail to streamline inventory management and send low stock alerts with email notifications.

name: Automated HubSpot Onboarding & Calendar Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow automating new customer onboarding using HubSpot CRM, OpenAI GPT-4 for personalized welcome emails, and Google Calendar for scheduling calls. Integrates HubSpot API, Gmail, and Langchain for AI-powered calendar management and email generation.

name: AI-Powered Hebrew Stock Analysis & Email Reports
description: Automates weekly stock analysis using Chart-img, Twelve Data, Alpha Vantage APIs combined with OpenAI GPT-4o for technical and sentiment insights. Generates detailed Hebrew reports with technical indicators, news sentiment, and sends styled HTML emails with recommendations.

name: Automated Email Parsing & HubSpot CRM Update
description: Workflow automates email parsing using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model, extracts contact info, searches/updates contacts in HubSpot CRM, and creates email engagement records. Integrates IMAP email, HubSpot OAuth2 API, and LangChain AI nodes for seamless CRM enrichment.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Email Organizer via Telegram
description: Automates Gmail inbox management by retrieving emails, filtering processed emails, and using OpenRouter GPT-4.1 AI to categorize each email as necessary or unnecessary. Archives unneeded emails, applies labels to others, and reports results via Telegram. Integrates Gmail API, Telegram Bot API, and OpenRouter GPT-4.1.

name: Daily AI Email Summary and Action Extractor
description: Automates daily email retrieval from Gmail, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to summarize key email info and extract action items, then emails a styled HTML report. Tech stack: Gmail API, OpenAI API, n8n workflow automation, with scheduling and aggregation nodes. Ideal for teams needing concise daily email digests.

name: Automated Purchase Order Processing from Outlook XLSX
description: Automates purchase order intake by monitoring Outlook emails with XLSX attachments, converts Excel to markdown, uses OpenAI LLM (gpt-4o-mini) to extract structured PO details, validates entries, and sends automated email confirmations or rejections, saving time on data entry and error checking.

name: AI-Powered Personalized Sales Email Generator
description: Automates personalized sales email drafting using HubSpot CRM data, Gmail email correspondence, and Google Gemini AI models. It analyzes customer emails to build detailed personas, then crafts tailored outreach emails saved as Gmail drafts for review.

name: AI Personal Assistant via Telegram
description: An AI-powered Telegram assistant integrating OpenAI GPT-4o, Google Calendar, Gmail, and Baserow APIs for voice/text input processing, event and email summarization, task and contact management, enhancing productivity via conversational interface.

name: Daily Podcast Summary Email Automation
description: Automates daily retrieval of top US podcasts by genre from Taddy API, crops audio via Aspose API, transcribes with OpenAI Whisper, summarizes using GPT-4o-mini, and emails summaries via Gmail for easy daily podcast insights.

name: Email Validation and CRM Lead Automation
description: Automates email verification via CaptainVerify API, creates leads in SuiteCRM with validated data, syncs contacts with Brevo, and sends notifications to NextCloud Discussions about lead creation, invalid emails, and low credits. Triggered by Tally Forms submissions.

name: YouTube Video Analysis with Google Gemini AI
description: n8n workflow that analyzes YouTube videos using Google Generative Language API (Gemini-1.5-flash) to create summaries, transcripts, timestamps, scene descriptions, and viral clip suggestions. It fetches video metadata via YouTube API and stores outputs in Google Drive and email.

name: AI-Powered Email Summarization & Reply Automation
description: An n8n workflow integrating IMAP email triggers, Gmail, OpenAI GPT models, and Qdrant vector DB to summarize incoming emails, generate context-aware professional replies, classify human feedback, and send emails after review. Supports Gmail, Outlook, Google Drive docs, and uses LangChain components for advanced AI processing.

name: Gmail Email Reply Draft with OpenAI
description: Automates drafting email replies in Gmail by using OpenAI Assistant. It fetches emails with specific labels, sends message content to OpenAI, generates reply drafts, converts Markdown to HTML, creates RFC-compliant encoded drafts, and adds them back to Gmail threads. Utilizes Gmail API and OpenAI API within an n8n workflow.

name: AI Email Auto-Responder with Approval Workflow
description: Automates email processing by reading IMAP messages, converting to Markdown, summarizing content, retrieving data from Qdrant vector DB, composing replies with OpenAI GPT and DeepSeek models, and sends responses after a YES/NO approval via Gmail. Tech: IMAP, Qdrant, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Gmail API.

name: Parents Smart Assistant Bot
description: An intelligent personal assistant for busy parents using Telegram, OpenAI (GPT-3.5, embeddings, audio transcription), Qdrant vector DB, Tavily web search, and Wikipedia API. It routes requests to specialized agents for calendar, email, contacts, content creation, and calculations, responding warmly in Hebrew.

name: AI Email Summarizer & Auto Responder
description: Automates email processing by reading IMAP emails, converting HTML to Markdown, summarizing content via DeepSeek/OpenAI, classifying and replying professionally using GPT-4o-mini, and storing context in Qdrant vector DB. Integrates IMAP, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Qdrant, Google Drive, SMTP.

name: Gmail Automation MCP Server
description: An n8n workflow serving as an MCP (multi-command processor) for Gmail. It integrates Gmail OAuth2 API with multiple nodes to perform email operations (get, search, reply, delete, label management, drafts, threads) via a webhook SSE server, enabling AI-driven email management.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Email Categorizer
description: Automates email categorization and prioritization in Microsoft Outlook using OpenAI GPT-4 model, Monday.com CRM, Airtable for rules and categories, and n8n workflow automation to organize and flag emails intelligently.

name: Automated Email Reply & Feedback Logger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on receiving emails from specific senders, generates AI-powered replies using OpenAI GPT, sends email responses via Gmail, and logs both original emails and replies into Google Sheets. It also collects user feedback through webhooks to improve response quality.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduling with Approval
description: Automate appointment requests processing with n8n multi-step forms, OpenAI AI text classification and summarisation, Gmail approval workflow, and Google Calendar integration for scheduling events. Provides user-friendly form UX and admin approval via email.

name: Automated Phishing Email Detection & Jira Reporting
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gmail and Microsoft Outlook triggers to capture emails, uses hcti.io API for HTML screenshot generation, OpenAI's ChatGPT-4 for phishing analysis, and auto-creates detailed Jira tickets with email data and screenshot attachments for streamlined phishing incident management.

name: Email Phishing Detection & Jira Reporting
description: Automates detection of phishing emails from Gmail and Outlook using ChatGPT AI, captures email content and headers, generates email screenshots via hcti.io API, and logs detailed tickets with attachments in Jira for security review.

name: Automated Meeting Task & Event Manager
description: Automates creation of tasks from Fireflies.ai meeting transcripts using OpenAI GPT-4o, stores tasks in Airtable, sends email notifications via Gmail, and schedules Google Meet events. Streamlines post-meeting follow-ups and client communications with AI-powered processing.

name: Automated Zoom Meeting & Stripe Payment Setup
description: Automates event creation by integrating Zoom for meeting scheduling, Stripe for secure payment processing, and Google Sheets for data management. Sends email notifications via Gmail for presenters and participants, streamlining event setup and participant tracking with no-code automation.

name: YouTube Subscription Video Email Notifier
description: Automate email notifications for new YouTube videos from your subscriptions. Uses YouTube Data API v3 for subscriptions, YouTube RSS for latest videos, filters out shorts, and sends thumbnail-rich emails via SMTP. Runs hourly by default.

name: Automated Email Appointment Scheduler
description: This n8n workflow automates detection and management of appointment requests from unread Gmail messages using OpenAI GPT-4 and Google Calendar APIs. It classifies emails, checks calendar availability, proposes meeting times, and replies, streamlining email scheduling tasks.

name: Email Promo to Podcast Audio Automation
