description: Automates conversion of Gmail CATEGORY_PROMOTIONS emails into concise audio podcasts. Uses Gmail API to fetch emails, OpenAI for text summarization, TikTok TTS API for speech synthesis, and Telegram API to send audio messages. Streamlines promo content consumption.

name: Outlook AI Email Categorizer & Prioritizer
description: Automates email categorization and prioritization in Microsoft Outlook. Integrates Microsoft 365, Monday.com CRM, Airtable, and OpenAI GPT-4 AI to analyze, categorize, and set priorities on incoming emails based on custom rules and contact data.

name: WooCommerce Order Support Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating WooCommerce API, DHL tracking, and OpenAI GPT-4 to provide secure, AI-driven customer service chat. Supports encrypted user email, order lookup, shipping status retrieval, and interactive chat embedding for WooCommerce stores.

name: Fastmail Email Auto-Reply with GPT-4
description: Automates email reply drafts in Fastmail using IMAP email triggers, Fastmail JMAP API, and OpenAI GPT-4. Extracts incoming email content, generates personalized responses, and uploads replies as drafts for review and sending.

name: Google Calendar to Outlook Sync
description: Automates syncing Google Calendar events to Microsoft Outlook. Uses Google Calendar triggers for event creation/cancellation and Outlook API to create/delete events, including email notifications on cancellations. Integrates Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook APIs via n8n.

name: URL & IP Threat Intel Scan and Report
description: An n8n workflow integrating VirusTotal and Greynoise APIs to scan URLs and IPs for threat intelligence. It accepts URLs/IPs via webhook or form, performs DNS lookups, submits to VirusTotal for URL scanning, queries Greynoise for IP context, merges results, and sends detailed reports via Slack and email.

name: LinkedIn Interaction to Email Campaign Automation
description: Automates creating email campaigns from LinkedIn post interactions using Phantombuster to scrape likers and commenters, Dropcontact for contact enrichment, Airtable for contact management, and Lemlist plus Hubspot for campaign and CRM integration.

name: Automated Email Appointment Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow that uses Gmail API, Google Calendar, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to detect appointment requests in incoming emails, check calendar availability, compose precise meeting proposals, and automatically reply and mark emails as read.

name: Automated Lead Qualification and Deal Creation
description: This n8n workflow automates cold email response analysis using Gmail, OpenAI GPT-4, and Pipedrive CRM. It checks replies for interest in meetings, qualifies leads with AI, and creates deals in Pipedrive for interested prospects, streamlining sales outreach processes.

name: Lead Qualification & Slack Notification
description: Automates lead capture from a form, verifies email via Hunter API, scores leads using MadKudu API, and sends qualified lead alerts to Slack. Utilizes n8n form trigger, Hunter email verifier, MadKudu lead scoring, and Slack API integration for streamlined lead management.

name: Email Expense Extractor to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of expense data from email receipts using Gmail IMAP and Mindee Receipt OCR API, then appends data to Google Sheets. Ideal for streamlining expense tracking with n8n automation workflow.

name: AI Triathlon Coach with Strava & Gemini
description: Automates personalized triathlon coaching by analyzing Strava activity data using Google Gemini (PaLM) AI. Generates detailed, motivational feedback and improvement plans for swimming, cycling, and running, then formats and sends insights via email or WhatsApp.

name: AI Lead Processing & Email Notification System
description: Automates analysis of incoming lead notes, categorizes inquiries, finds appropriate contacts from a database, and generates email notifications. Integrates ERPNext for lead data, OpenAI for NLP analysis, Google Sheets for contact lookup, and Microsoft Outlook API to format/send emails.

name: WooCommerce Customer Order Chat Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating WooCommerce API, DHL tracking, and OpenAI GPT-4 to provide customers with secure, real-time order and shipping info via chat. Features encrypted email handling, order querying, DHL status checks, and AI-powered conversational support.

name: Automated Phishing Email Detection & Jira Reporting
description: This n8n workflow automates phishing email detection by integrating Gmail and Outlook triggers, uses hcti.io API to create email body screenshots, applies OpenAI's GPT-4o model for phishing analysis, and auto-generates Jira tickets with detailed reports and attachments for security teams.

name: Automated Phishing Email Detection & Jira Reporting
description: This n8n workflow automates phishing email detection by monitoring Gmail and Outlook inboxes, extracting email content and headers, generating email screenshots via hcti.io API, analyzing with ChatGPT-4, and creating detailed Jira tickets with reports and attachments for streamlined security incident management.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Reply Draft Automation
description: Automates email reply drafting by fetching Gmail threads with specific labels, sending email content to OpenAI Assistant for a reply, generating HTML, and saving drafts in Gmail. Utilizes Gmail API, OpenAI API, and n8n automation platform.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduler Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Microsoft Outlook API, and LangChain to create an intelligent personal assistant chatbot. It handles calendar availability, books meetings, and manages enquiries with timezone-aware scheduling and email notifications for a seamless appointment booking experience.

name: AI Email Autoresponder with Approval
description: Automates email handling using IMAP trigger, OpenAI GPT and DeepSeek models for summarization and response generation, Qdrant vector DB for business info retrieval, and Gmail for draft approval before sending. Ideal for professional, concise business email replies.

name: Email to Notion Automation
description: Automates processing of incoming Gmail emails using OpenAI GPT-4, extracts tasks and summaries, and creates detailed pages in Notion databases. Uses Airtable to manage routing and labels to prevent duplicate processing.

name: Automated Factoid Email Subscription Service
description: An n8n workflow that automates sending personalized educational fact emails using Airtable for subscriber data, LangChain AI for content and image generation (Groq and OpenAI APIs), Gmail for delivery, and web forms for subscription management.

name: Telegram AI Study Assistant for Signal Processing
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram API, OpenAI (including transcription and GPT models), Google Gemini, Airtable, and Langchain tools to build an AI-powered interactive tutor for signal processing students via Telegram, featuring memory, calculator, Wikipedia lookup, and content/email agent tools.

name: AI-Powered Gmail Assistant
description: An AI-driven email management workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o with Gmail API to automate composing, sending, replying, drafting, labeling, and managing emails efficiently. Designed for professional HTML emails signed as 'Nate'.

name: Suspicious Login Detection Workflow
description: An n8n workflow for detecting suspicious logins using GreyNoise API for IP threat intelligence, IP-API for geolocation, UserParser for user agent analysis, and Postgres for login history. It prioritizes alerts and notifies via Slack and email for security response.

name: Real Estate Market Scanner & Alert System
description: Automates real estate property scanning using BatchData API. Schedules hourly searches, compares new and changed listings, filters high-equity absentee owner properties, and sends detailed email and Slack alerts to sales teams. Built with n8n, BatchData API, email SMTP, and Slack API.

name: YouTube RSS Feed Notifier with Email & Telegram
description: Automates monitoring of YouTube channels via RSS feeds, fetching video details using YouTube Data API, and delivers custom notifications via Gmail (individual or digest emails) and Telegram. Includes OpenAI for generating responsive HTML email cards. Ideal for content creators and marketers.

name: AI-Powered Calendar Appointment Scheduler
description: An intelligent n8n workflow using OpenAI GPT-4, Microsoft Outlook API, and Langchain to handle customer chat, check calendar availability, suggest free slots within UK business hours, and book appointments or escalate to human support with detailed email notifications.

name: Email Header Authentication & IP Analysis
description: Automates email header analysis using Microsoft Graph API and IPQualityScore API to extract and evaluate SPF, DKIM, DMARC authentication and IP reputation, enabling detection of spam, phishing, and email spoofing threats.

name: Telegram AI Personal Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram, OpenAI GPT-4o, Tavily web search API, and specialized agent workflows for email, calendar, contacts, and content creation. It processes user commands via chat, routes requests to proper agents, transcribes voice messages, and replies seamlessly.

name: Gmail AI Auto-Responder Draft Creator
description: Automates Gmail replies by detecting if an incoming email needs a response using OpenAI GPT-4o, then drafts professional replies in the thread via Gmail API. Utilizes n8n workflow with Gmail OAuth2, LangChain nodes, and OpenAI GPT models for smart email management.

name: Automated AI CV Screening & Notification
description: This n8n workflow automates candidate CV screening using Google Gemini (PaLM) AI for resume analysis and ratings, sends email confirmations to applicants and notifications to HR, and logs candidate data in Google Sheets. It integrates Gmail, Google Sheets, PDF extraction, and LangChain AI models to streamline HR processes.

name: Daily Email Summarizer with OpenAI
description: Automates fetching Gmail emails from the past 24 hours, summarizes key points and action items using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and sends a styled HTML summary email daily at 7 AM. Integrates Gmail API, n8n scheduling, data aggregation, and OpenAI for AI-powered email digest.

name: AI-Powered Email Automation & Management
description: Automates email reading, summarization, reply drafting, and approval using IMAP, Gmail, OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Qdrant vector DB, Google Drive, and DeepSeek AI. Enhances business email workflows with AI-driven summarization, classification, retrieval, and human feedback integration.

name: Gmail Email to Vector Embeddings Pipeline
description: Automates extraction of Gmail emails, structuring metadata in PostgreSQL and generating vector embeddings with Ollama's nomic-embed-text model stored in PGVector for semantic search and analysis. Built with n8n, Gmail API, PostgreSQL, and Ollama embeddings.

name: Automated Customer Email Sender via Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow automating personalized Gmail email sending by retrieving customer message details from Google Sheets, filtering data by status and current date, sending emails using Gmail API, and updating the sheet with send status for organized outreach campaigns.

name: B2B Lead Qualification & Email Response
description: An n8n workflow to capture business leads via a form, enrich contact and company data using Clearbit API, filter for B2B companies with over 499 employees, then send tailored Gmail responses. Tech stack includes n8n, Clearbit API, and Gmail SMTP.

name: AI Support Agent with Email Verification & Slack Alert
description: An AI agent workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and LangChain framework in n8n. It checks user input for an email, prompts for it if missing, or alerts a Slack channel for human support. Integrates chat triggers, memory buffer, and conditional logic for support escalation.

name: Daily Airtable Order Summary Email
description: Automates collecting orders stored via webhook into Airtable, then sends a daily 7PM email summary with all today's orders in HTML table format using Airtable API and Gmail. Helps businesses track and review daily sales efficiently.

name: TTS Voice & Email Verification Automation
description: Automates sending TTS voice calls via ClickSend API and email verification through SMTP for secure user verification. Features form input, code generation, voice & email code verification, and user feedback. Tech: n8n, ClickSend API, SMTP, JavaScript.

name: Email Lead Validation and Enrichment
description: n8n workflow that triggers from a form submission, verifies email validity using Hunter API, enriches person and company data via Clearbit, and adds valid leads to HubSpot CRM. Integrates Form Trigger, Hunter, Clearbit, and HubSpot with OAuth2 for smart lead collection.

name: AI-Driven Personalized Marketing Emails
description: An n8n workflow that automates personalized marketing email campaigns using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4-mini. It analyzes customer purchase and feedback data, generates tailored email content, and conditionally adds coupons. Includes email HTML templating and SMTP sending via n8n.

name: LinkedIn Email Finder & Enricher via Google Sheets
description: Automates enriching LinkedIn profile data by fetching contact details using Prospeo.io LinkedIn Email Finder API, triggered on schedule, reading/writing Google Sheets for scalable contact info updates with fields like email, name, gender, job title, skills, education, and picture.

name: Lemlist Reply Auto-Categorizer & Slack Alerts
description: Automate classification of Lemlist email replies using OpenAI GPT-4o and send structured Slack notifications. Features include auto-unsubscribe and marking interested leads via Lemlist API integration. Workflow uses n8n with Lemlist, OpenAI, Slack APIs.

name: CRM Lead & Company Enrichment Automation
description: Automates lead enrichment and management by integrating ConvertKit form subscriptions with Clearbit for email and company data enrichment, and HubSpot CRM for searching, creating, updating companies and contacts. Filters out personal emails for targeted B2B outreach.

name: AI Gmail Auto Labeler
description: Automates Gmail email labeling by analyzing message content with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain in n8n. It triggers on new emails, fetches content, assigns AI-driven labels like 'Inquiry', 'Partnership', 'Notification', and updates Gmail labels accordingly for organized inbox management.

name: Automated Weekly Google Analytics Reporting
description: An n8n workflow that automates weekly Google Analytics reporting by fetching and comparing this week vs prior week data on page engagement, country views, and Google Search Console metrics. Uses Google Analytics API and Gmail to format and email HTML reports.

name: Zalando Price Monitor & Alert System
description: An n8n workflow that monitors Zalando product prices by scraping product pages, logging price history, updating product info in Google Sheets, and sending email alerts via Gmail when prices drop below user-defined thresholds. Uses Google Sheets API, HTTP Request, and Gmail API.

name: GitHub Release Email Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that daily fetches the latest release info from a GitHub repo, converts release notes from markdown to HTML, and emails the formatted update via Gmail. Utilizes GitHub API, markdown conversion, and Gmail OAuth2 for automated release notifications.

name: Automated Invoice Data Extraction & Reconciliation
description: Automates extraction of invoice data from Gmail PDF attachments using LlamaParse PDF parser, OpenAI GPT-3.5 LLM for structured data extraction, and exports results to Google Sheets. Workflow manages email labeling to prevent duplicates and handles processing status polling.

name: AI Email Auto-Reply and Feedback Logger
description: Automates email replies using OpenAI GPT via Gmail trigger; stores incoming emails, generated replies, and feedback in Google Sheets for fine-tuning. Utilizes Gmail OAuth2, OpenAI API, and Google Sheets OAuth2 for seamless AI-driven email handling and feedback recording.

name: Gmail to Notion Email Archiver
description: Automates archiving labeled Gmail emails to a Notion database by creating pages for new emails and removing labels when marked done. Uses Gmail API and Notion API, triggered every minute for timely email management and productivity.

name: Lemlist & HubSpot Email Reply Automation
description: Automates lead reply categorization and follow-up creation using Lemlist API, HubSpot CRM, and OpenAI GPT-3 for reply analysis. It unsubscribes, tags replies as interested or out-of-office, and creates deals/tasks in HubSpot, enhancing sales workflows.

name: Gmail PDF Attachment Filter & Google Drive Upload
description: Automates filtering PDF email attachments by text content using OpenAI, then uploads matched PDFs to a Google Drive folder. Integrates Gmail, OpenAI, and Google Drive via n8n. Ideal for processing invoices, payslips, or contracts received by email automatically.

name: LINE Chatbot with Google Calendar & Gmail AI
description: An n8n workflow integrating LINE messaging with Google Calendar and Gmail using OpenAI & LangChain AI. It enables conversational AI responses, calendar event creation/reading, and email reading via LINE chatbot, enhancing productivity and user assistance.

name: Fastmail AI Email Draft Assistant
description: Automates drafting email replies for Fastmail using OpenAI GPT-4. Monitors IMAP inbox for new emails, extracts content, generates replies with GPT-4, and uploads drafts via Fastmail's JMAP API. Integrates IMAP, Fastmail API, and OpenAI in n8n workflow.

name: Daylight Saving Time Change Notifier
description: Automates detection of Daylight Saving Time changes for specified timezones. Uses n8n with JavaScript code for timezone handling, Slack API for notifications, and SMTP for email alerts. Helps users adjust schedules by notifying upcoming DST shifts.

name: HN Learning Resources Recommender via Google Gemini
description: Automates finding top learning resources by scraping 'Ask HN' posts on HackerNews, analyzing comments with Google Gemini AI, categorizing by resource type and difficulty, then emailing recommendations. Uses HackerNews API, Google PaLM API, and SMTP for email delivery.

name: Email Sales Opportunity Summarizer & Odoo Creator
description: Automates capturing sales emails via Gmail API, summarizes inquiry details using OpenAI GPT-3.5, and creates sales opportunities in Odoo CRM. Integrates Gmail, OpenAI language model, and Odoo ERP to streamline lead management and enhance sales pipeline efficiency.

name: Summarize Google Sheets Feedback with GPT-4
description: Automates feedback summarization from Google Sheets form responses using n8n workflow. Integrates Google Sheets API to fetch data, OpenAI GPT-4 to generate summaries, Markdown-to-HTML conversion, and Gmail API to send summary reports via email.

name: Gmail to Notion Automated Email Processing
description: Automates converting Gmail emails into structured Notion pages using Gmail API, Airtable for route management, OpenAI GPT-4o for email summarization and task extraction, and Notion API. Filters and labels emails to prevent duplicates, sends error notifications, and manages active workflows.

name: Google Drive to Airtable File Sync & Share
description: Automates syncing new files from a specific Google Drive folder by sharing them via email and logging metadata (file ID, name, timestamps) into Airtable. Uses Google Drive Trigger and API plus Airtable API for streamlined file management and tracking.

name: AI-Powered US Grants Tracking & Alerts
description: Automates fetching, AI summarizing, eligibility analysis, and tracking of latest US AI grants from Grants.gov. Uses n8n workflows with OpenAI API for summaries, Airtable as database, and Gmail for email alerts to subscribers.

name: Gmail Email Header Authentication Analyzer
description: Automates email header analysis using Gmail webhook or trigger in n8n. Extracts originating IP, queries IPQualityScore and IP-API for reputation and geolocation, evaluates SPF, DKIM, DMARC headers, and compiles authentication results for webhook integration.

name: EDI Order Email Processor with Google Sheets
description: Automates processing of EDI order emails via Gmail API, parses EDI messages using JavaScript code, filters orders by type, and appends detailed order data into separate sheets in Google Sheets for return and outbound orders. Utilizes n8n, Gmail Trigger, JS parsing, and Google Sheets API.

name: Todoist Weekly Completed Tasks Review
description: Automates weekly retrieval of completed Todoist tasks using Todoist API. Filters out unwanted projects, formats tasks by completion date into an HTML email, and sends a summary every Friday. Built with n8n automation, HTTP Request, JavaScript code, and email nodes.

name: Email to Todoist Task Automation
description: Automates converting Gmail emails into Todoist tasks using n8n workflow with Gmail API, Todoist API, and OpenAI's GPT-4 mini model. Summarizes email content, proposes actions, and manages task lifecycle for efficient email-task integration.

name: Error Logging with Rate-Limited Alerts
description: An n8n workflow that captures workflow errors, logs them into a PostgreSQL database (via NocoDB schema), and limits alert notifications (email and push) to one every 5 minutes to avoid overload. Includes manual cleanup and extensible error handling hooks.

name: Lead Capture & Validation Workflow
description: Automates capturing form leads with n8n Form Trigger, validates emails via Hunter API, updates Google Sheets, and notifies via Gmail and Discord webhook. Ensures authentic lead data management with seamless integration of form, email verification, spreadsheet, and messaging services.

name: Email To-Do ➔ Google Tasks Automation
description: Automates task creation by capturing Gmail emails labeled 'To-Do' using Gmail API and creating Google Tasks via Google Tasks API. Utilizes n8n workflow with OAuth2 credentials for seamless integration, helping users turn emails into actionable tasks effortlessly.

name: Weekly Notion Task Summary Email & Push
description: Automates weekly retrieval of tasks from Notion, filters and sorts by deadlines, generates styled HTML emails grouping overdue and upcoming tasks, and sends updates via email and Pushover push notifications. Uses Notion API, SMTP, and Pushover within n8n.

name: Shopify Customers to Google Sheets Exporter
description: Automates fetching Shopify customers via Shopify API, handles pagination, and appends/upserts customer data (email, first name, last name, ID) to a Google Sheets document. Uses n8n with Shopify API, Google Sheets OAuth2, JavaScript for pagination parsing.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Email Auto Categorizer
description: Automate Outlook email management by categorizing and organizing emails into folders using Ollama AI's qwen2.5:14b model with n8n workflow. Employs Microsoft Outlook API, Markdown conversion, and advanced AI parsing for efficient inbox sorting.

name: OpenAI API Usage Examples Workflow
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating various OpenAI API integrations: text completion, chat (ChatGPT), text editing, audio transcription (Whisper), and image generation (DALLE-2). Shows prompts for summaries, translations, HTML SVG generation, and quick email replies.

name: RetellAI Automated Lead Call & Scheduling
description: Automates outbound lead qualification calls and inbound appointment scheduling using RetellAI. Integrates Google Sheets (lead tracking), Twilio (SMS reminders), OpenAI GPT-4 (call summarization), and Gmail (email notifications) to streamline call workflows and post-call updates.

name: Automated Lead Qualification & CRM Deal Creation
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gmail, Pipedrive CRM, and OpenAI GPT-4 to automatically assess email replies from cold campaigns, identify interested leads, and create deals in Pipedrive. It enables scalable, AI-powered sales pipeline automation with multi-inbox support.

name: Real Estate Lead Enrichment & CRM Automation
description: Automates property lead discovery by querying BatchData API with custom filters, enriches leads via skip tracing for owner contacts, scores leads, exports to Excel, and pushes to HubSpot CRM with email notifications. Uses n8n HTTP, code, spreadsheet, and email nodes.

name: Email PDF Attachment Filter & Upload
description: Automates filtering of PDF attachments from Gmail using OpenAI to detect relevant documents (e.g., payslips), then uploads matched PDFs to Google Drive. Uses Gmail API, OpenAI API, and Google Drive API within n8n workflow for document management automation.

name: AI Email Summarizer & Messenger Notifier
description: Automates reading emails via IMAP, summarizes content using Openrouter.ai's LLaMA model, and sends concise summaries or important alerts with deadlines to LINE messenger. Integrates IMAP, Openrouter API, and LINE Messaging API for streamlined email management.

name: Email Verification Waitlist Automation
description: Automates user registration with email verification for a waitlist using n8n. Integrates Google Sheets for data storage, SMTP for sending verification codes, and n8n Forms for user input and validation, ensuring secure and organized waitlist management.

name: Social Media Lead Analyzer & Email Generator
description: Automates lead outreach by extracting LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, analyzes data using OpenAI GPT-4, and generates personalized HTML cover letters sent via SMTP. Integrates Google Sheets for lead data and tracking, ideal for marketers and sales pros.

name: Docker Registry Image Cleaner
description: Automates cleanup of Docker registry by listing images and tags, identifying old tags beyond latest 10, removing them via Docker Registry HTTP API, running garbage collection via SSH, and sending email notifications. Uses HTTP Request, SSH, Code nodes in n8n.

name: Dartagnan to Braze Email Template Sync
description: An n8n workflow automating synchronization of email templates from Dartagnan to Braze. It fetches auth tokens, lists and compares campaigns and email templates, processes HTML content including image embedding, and updates or creates templates via Dartagnan and Braze REST APIs. Runs on schedule.

name: Automated Email Categorizer & Responder
description: This n8n workflow automates email handling by triggering on new Gmail messages, classifying them using Google Gemini NLP, and sending tailored responses (guest posts, YouTube inquiries, courses) via SMTP. Contacts are updated in Brevo. Tech used: Gmail API, Google Gemini, SMTP, Brevo API.

name: HubSpot Email Validation & Alert Workflow
description: Automates validation of new HubSpot contact emails using HubSpot APIs and OneSimple API; sends Slack alerts for suspicious emails. Ensures contact email quality by checking deliverability, domain validity, and disposability, improving CRM data integrity.

name: Webpage Change Monitor & Notifier
description: Automates monitoring of webpage content changes using n8n's HTTP Request, HTML extraction, Crypto hashing, Google Drive & Sheets APIs, and Gmail. Tracks changes via hashes, logs updates, saves snapshots, and sends email alerts for updated webpages.

name: Gmail PDF Invoice Classifier & Drive Uploader
description: n8n workflow using Gmail, Google Drive, and OpenAI GPT-4.1-mini to scan emails for PDF invoices/receipts, classify via AI, upload matched PDFs to Drive folders by date, and optionally email them. Customizable with token limits and search terms.

name: Personal Resume AI Chatbot with Google Gemini
description: An AI chatbot that answers questions about a personal resume/CV using Google Gemini (PaLM) for embeddings and chat, Pinecone vector DB for data storage, Google Drive for document triggering, and NocoDB for conversation logging. Sends daily email summaries via Gmail.

name: Amazon Product Price Tracker
description: Automates tracking Amazon product prices using ScrapeOps API, logging data to Google Sheets, calculating price changes, and sending alert emails when prices cross thresholds. Utilizes n8n workflow with Google Sheets, ScrapeOps HTTP API, and SMTP email integration.

name: Training Feedback Automation with Airtable & Usertask
description: Automates training feedback management using Airtable to trigger workflows, Usertask API for task creation, LinkedIn for positive feedback posting, and SMTP email notifications. It routes poor feedback to urgent tasks and celebrates good feedback on LinkedIn.

name: Human-in-the-Loop AI Email Assistant
description: Automates email reading via IMAP, summarizes with LangChain and OpenAI GPT models, drafts replies, and sends emails after human approval. Integrates IMAP, SMTP, LangChain AI nodes, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for professional business email handling.

name: Inbound Order Email Parser to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of purchase orders from Gmail emails using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini via n8n LangChain AI Agent; parses PO number, delivery date, SKUs, quantities, then stores structured data into Google Sheets for order management.

name: Email Invoice & Payment Extractor with LLM
description: Automates extraction of transaction details from labeled Gmail invoices and payment emails using n8n. Uses Gmail API triggers, PDF extraction, HTML parsing, Google Gemini and Groq LLMs with structured output parsers, then logs data to Google Sheets for finance management.

name: CSRD Email Audit & Summary Automation
description: Automates review of CSRD XHTML report emails received in Gmail. Uses Gmail API to trigger, extracts XHTML attachments, audits content for sustainability disclosures, and employs AI (LangChain + OpenAI GPT-4o-mini) to generate professional audit summary emails. Improves ESG compliance communication.

name: Daily Digest Email for n8n.io Templates
description: Automates daily email newsletters by fetching the latest n8n.io workflow templates from selected categories stored in Excel. Uses Microsoft Excel, HTTP Request for n8n API, OpenAI GPT-4 for summaries, and Microsoft Outlook to send personalized digests to subscribers.

name: AI-Powered Daily Israeli News Digest
description: Automates fetching and processing of Israeli news from Calcalist and Mako RSS feeds, uses GPT-4o to select top 5 executive-relevant articles, and generates a formatted HTML email digest sent daily via SMTP.

name: EU Sustainability News Daily Digest
description: Automates daily scraping of EU news, classifies sustainability articles using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain, records results in Google Sheets, and sends a curated HTML email digest via Gmail. Integrates HTTP Request, HTML parsing, AI classification, Sheets, and Gmail nodes for sustainable news curation.

name: HubSpot Client LinkedIn & Post Monitor
description: Automates tracking of HubSpot owners' clients by fetching client data via HubSpot API, searching LinkedIn profiles through RapidAPI, monitoring LinkedIn posts and positions, and updating a Google Sheet. Sends email alerts using Gmail when client updates occur.

name: Voice-to-Email Reply Assistant
description: An n8n workflow automating email reply drafting by analyzing incoming Gmail messages, assessing response need via OpenAI GPT chat, sending email details to Telegram, accepting voice note replies on Telegram, transcribing audio with OpenAI Whisper, and drafting polished replies in Gmail threads.

name: AI Style Transfer Image Generator
description: Automates image style transfer using Google Gemini 2.0 for visual style analysis and Imagen 3.0 for image generation. Inputs taken via a form, images uploaded to Cloudinary, optional email delivery via Gmail. Enables creative AI-driven logo and image remixing.

name: n8n Automated Error Analysis & Email Alert
description: Automates error detection in n8n workflows via n8n API, analyzes errors using OpenAI GPT-4o with LangChain, generates detailed diagnosis and resolution, and sends formatted email alerts via Gmail. Ideal for improving workflow reliability with AI-powered insights.

name: Email Header IP & Spoofing Analyzer
description: n8n workflow analyzing email headers for IP reputation and spoofing threats using IP Quality Score and IP-API, plus SPF/DKIM/DMARC authentication checks via JavaScript. Provides comprehensive email security insights via webhook responses.

name: DMARC Report Email Parser & DB Logger
description: Automates processing of DMARC reports by monitoring IMAP email for XML attachments, unzipping and parsing them into JSON, mapping the data into a MySQL database, and sending notifications via Slack/email on SPF or DKIM failures. Uses n8n automation with email, compression, XML, MySQL, and Slack nodes.

name: WordPress Form Lead Capture to Mautic
description: Automates capturing leads from WordPress forms via webhook, normalizes data (name, email, mobile), validates emails, and creates contacts in Mautic CRM. Built using n8n workflow with WordPress webhook and Mautic API integration.

name: Email Chatbot with Semantic + Structured RAG via Telegram
description: An advanced chatbot integrating Telegram, OpenAI, Ollama embeddings, and Postgres PGVector for hybrid semantic and SQL-based email retrieval. It handles natural language queries over email data, combining vector search and SQL for precise and contextual answers.

name: Slack Notify & Jira Ticket for Quarantined Emails
description: Automates incident response by notifying quarantined email recipients via Slack using Slack API and Sublime Security API, and creates Jira tickets for opened suspicious emails. Integrates Sublime Security webhook, Slack user lookup, and Jira Software Cloud for security alert management.

name: Gmail Email Classification & Labeling
description: Automate Gmail email classification using Google Gemini and LangChain AI. Categorizes emails into High Priority, School Related, Promotion, or Other, then applies Gmail labels via OAuth2. Ideal for organizing and prioritizing inbox with AI-driven text classification.

name: eCommerce Contact Form Text Classifier
description: Automates classification of contact form messages for eCommerce using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for text classification, Google Sheets for data storage, and SMTP for email notifications to respective departments (quotes, orders, etc.).

name: Email to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates saving incoming Gmail emails into Google Sheets as new rows, capturing sender, subject, and snippet. Uses Gmail Trigger and Google Sheets API via OAuth2. Ideal for email logging, lead tracking, and structured email record-keeping.

name: AI-Powered CV Screening Automation
description: Automates CV submission and screening for Software Engineer roles using n8n, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI for resume analysis, Gmail for notifications, and Google Sheets for candidate tracking. Streamlines HR processes with AI-driven candidate compatibility ratings and email alerts.

name: Typeform Issue Reporting & Notification
description: Automates capturing user feedback from Typeform, logs entries to Google Sheets, filters high-severity issues (severity >7), then sends alerts via Slack and email. Integrates Typeform API, Google Sheets API, Slack API, and SMTP for notifications, simplifying issue tracking.

name: Automated Email Reply Handling & CRM Sync
description: This n8n workflow automates email reply categorization using OpenAI, managing leads in Lemlist and HubSpot, and notifying teams via Slack. It integrates Lemlist API, HubSpot CRM, Slack API, and OpenAI GPT for lead status updates, unsubscribes, deal creation, and follow-ups.

name: Email Validation & Mailing List Automation
description: Automates email capture and validation using n8n with Hunter.io for email verification and SendGrid to add valid emails to a mailing list, streamlining subscriber management via a custom form trigger.

name: Google Sheets to Mailchimp Subscriber Sync
description: Automates syncing email addresses from a Google Sheets range to a Mailchimp mailing list. Utilizes Google Sheets and Mailchimp APIs within n8n, triggered at set intervals to keep subscriber lists updated seamlessly.

name: Bulk Email Verification with Icypeas & Google Sheets
description: Automates bulk email verification using Icypeas API, Google Sheets for input data, and n8n for workflow orchestration. Reads emails from Google Sheets, authenticates via HMAC SHA1, and posts verification requests to Icypeas, streamlining large-scale email validation.

name: Daily Company News Email Reminder
description: Automates sending daily emails with latest news about companies from your calendar meetings. Uses Google Calendar API to fetch meetings, NewsAPI to gather recent articles, and Gmail API to email formatted news summaries.

name: Lead Qualification via Email Verification & Scoring
description: Automates lead qualification by collecting business emails via n8n form trigger, verifying email validity with Hunter API, scoring leads with MadKudu API, and sending Gmail alerts for high-fit leads. Integrates n8n, Hunter, MadKudu, and Gmail for smart lead management.

name: Hourly RSS Feed Email Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that checks multiple RSS feeds every hour for new posts published in the last hour and sends email notifications via Gmail. It uses RSS Feed Read, conditional date filtering, batching, and Gmail OAuth2 to keep users updated on fresh content automatically.

name: Gmail Inbox Starred Email Archiver
description: Automates Gmail inbox management by archiving all non-starred emails daily on workdays. Utilizes Gmail API via OAuth2 in n8n workflow to fetch emails, filter starred ones, and archive others, keeping inbox tidy and prioritized.

name: Daily Show HN Trending Email Alert
description: Automates daily scraping of Hacker News front page using HTTP Request and HTML Extract nodes in n8n. Filters for 'Show HN:' posts, formats results in a Function node, and sends summary emails via Send Email node every day at 13:00. Useful for tech enthusiasts.

name: n8n Default Error Handler Workflow
description: An n8n workflow for automated error handling: detects workflow failures, fetches error workflow info via n8n API, updates workflows lacking error handlers, and sends failure notifications via Gmail OAuth2 email. Runs daily via schedule trigger.

name: Auto Save Email Attachments to Google Drive
description: This n8n workflow monitors Gmail for new emails with attachments, downloads them, and automatically uploads the files to Google Drive. It uses the Gmail Trigger node, a Function node to manage binary data, and Google Drive API integration to streamline file saving and organization.

name: Elastic Alert Email Notifier
description: Automates monitoring of PRISM Elastic alerts and sends email notifications via Microsoft Graph API using OAuth2. Utilizes n8n nodes: Schedule Trigger, HTTP Request, If, and Email API integration for real-time alert management and communication.

name: GitHub Release Notifier via Email
description: Automates daily checks for the latest GitHub repo release using GitHub API, converts the release notes from Markdown to HTML, and sends an email notification via SMTP if a new release occurred in the last day.

name: Daily Server Update Notification Emailer
description: Automates daily checks of upgradable packages on a VPS via SSH, formats the list into HTML, and sends email notifications through SMTP to alert server admins about pending updates. Utilizes SSH node, JavaScript code node, and SMTP email in n8n.

name: VPS Resource Monitor and Alert System
description: Automates VPS resource checks (CPU, RAM, Disk) every 15 minutes via SSH commands. Uses n8n schedule trigger, SSH node for system stats, SQL merge and IF node for threshold comparison, and sends email alerts via SMTP if usage exceeds 80%.

name: Shopify Orders to Google Sheets Sync
description: Automates retrieving Shopify store orders using Shopify API, handles pagination with page_info, and appends/upserts order data (id, note, email, processed_at) into Google Sheets via Google Sheets API. Includes scheduling and manual triggers.

name: Outlook Draft Email with Attachment Automation
description: Automate creating, attaching files, and sending draft emails via Microsoft Outlook using n8n workflow. Integrates Microsoft Outlook API and HTTP Request node to fetch attachments, enabling streamlined email drafting and sending.

name: Shopify to Mautic New Customer Sync
description: Automates syncing new Shopify customers to Mautic as contacts using Shopify webhook and Mautic API integration in n8n. Ensures first name, last name, and email transfer seamlessly for marketing automation.

name: Weekly Missing Project Budget Alert
description: Automates weekly monitoring of open external projects with zero budgeted cost from a MySQL database. Uses n8n's MySQL, Switch node for cost center routing, and Microsoft Outlook API to send tailored HTML email alerts to respective cost center teams for timely budget updates.

name: Sync Shopify Customers to Zendesk Contacts
description: Automates syncing updated customer data from Shopify to Zendesk by matching email addresses, creating new Zendesk users or updating existing ones including phone numbers. Uses Shopify webhook triggers and Zendesk API integration in n8n workflow.

name: Email Attachment Organizer to Google Drive
description: Automates saving unread Gmail attachments from a specific sender (ray.thomas@charter.com) to a designated Google Drive folder. Utilizes Gmail Trigger, file size switch-based filtering, and Google Drive API, helping to manage and categorize attachments efficiently.

name: Gumroad Sales to MailerLite & CRM Automation
description: Automates post-purchase workflows by capturing Gumroad sales, adding customers to MailerLite email groups for automated sequences, and logging sales data to Google Sheets CRM. Uses Gumroad webhook, MailerLite API, and Google Sheets API to streamline customer onboarding and sales tracking.

name: Website Screenshot Capture & Email Sender
description: Automates capturing website screenshots (full and partial) via Uproc API, uploads them to Dropbox, and emails them using AWS SES. Triggered manually, it efficiently combines web automation, cloud storage, and email services for easy screenshot sharing.

name: Calendly to Notion Contact Logger
description: Automates capturing new Calendly invitee info and logs it into a Notion database. Uses Calendly API webhook to trigger on invitee creation and Notion API to add pages with invitee name, email, and status for streamlined contact management.

name: Automated Recipe Finder and Email Sender
description: This n8n workflow uses Edamam API to fetch recipes based on customizable criteria like diet, health, calories, and cooking time. It runs daily at 10am, selects random diet/health filters if set to random, compiles recipes, and emails them using Gmail SMTP.

name: YCombinator News Scraper & Emailer
description: Automates fetching latest news from YCombinator using HTTP Request and HTML Extract nodes, merges data, exports to spreadsheet, and sends via email. Built with n8n workflow automation, utilizes web scraping and SMTP email delivery.

name: Netlify Form Submission to Airtable
description: Automates capturing Netlify form submissions and appends extracted name, email, and role data to Airtable. Uses Netlify Trigger webhook, n8n's Set node for data mapping, and Airtable API integration for database storage.

name: Google Drive File Creation Email Alert
description: Workflow monitors a specific Google Drive folder for new files and sends an email notification upon creation. Uses Google Drive Trigger and SMTP email nodes in n8n to automate instant alerts for file updates.

name: Email Enrichment & Lemlist Lead Import
description: Automates lead enrichment using Dropcontact API with data from Google Sheets, then imports enriched leads into Lemlist for email campaigns. Uses Google Sheets OAuth2, Dropcontact for contact verification, and Lemlist API to streamline B2B outreach.

name: CRM Contacts Sync Pipedrive & HubSpot
description: Automates syncing and updating contacts between Pipedrive CRM and HubSpot using n8n automation platform. Utilizes Pipedrive and HubSpot APIs to fetch, compare, and update person/contact records based on email and name data on a scheduled basis.

name: Sync Contacts from Pipedrive to HubSpot
description: Automates syncing of contact records from Pipedrive CRM to HubSpot CRM using n8n workflow. Utilizes Pipedrive and HubSpot APIs to fetch all contacts, merge them by email to avoid duplicates, and update HubSpot contacts every minute via a cron trigger.

name: Slack-Triggered GDPR Data Deletion
description: An n8n workflow automating GDPR data deletion requests via Slack slash commands. It validates tokens, parses 'delete <email>' commands, triggers deletion workflows for Paddle, Customer.io, Zendesk, logs results in Airtable, and responds back on Slack. Integrates Slack API, Airtable, and custom workflows.

name: Automated Timesheet Report Generator
description: An n8n workflow to generate timesheet reports with user avatars and task summaries. It fetches data, sorts tasks, retrieves avatars via HTTP, creates a styled Markdown report converted to HTML, and optionally emails the report. Uses n8n nodes: Function, HTTP Request, Markdown, and Email Send.

name: Pipedrive Lead Enrichment & Email Finder
description: Automates lead enrichment and email discovery using Pipedrive CRM and Datagma API. It enriches new organizations with funding, traffic, and industry data, finds ideal sales contacts, verifies emails, and updates Pipedrive records for streamlined sales prospecting.

name: Automated Weekly Stock Portfolio Reporter
description: This n8n workflow fetches stock data from Baserow, scrapes live prices from Tradegate.de, calculates portfolio value changes, builds an HTML report, and sends it via SendGrid email. Integrates Baserow API, HTTP requests, HTML extraction, and SendGrid for automation.

name: MediaMarkt Deals Email Notifier
description: Automates retrieval of MediaMarkt Spain deals using BrightData proxy, extracts and classifies deal info with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, generates HTML emails via n8n Document Generator, and emails personalized top deals based on user-selected categories. Tech stack: BrightData API, OpenAI API, SMTP email, n8n workflow automation.

name: HubSpot Contact Enrichment with ExactBuyer
description: Automates enriching new HubSpot contacts using ExactBuyer API with OAuth2 authentication. On contact creation, it fetches the contact, uses email to get additional data from ExactBuyer, then updates HubSpot contact with enriched info like social profiles, job, and location.

name: Automated Resume Screener from Gmail to Sheets
description: This n8n workflow automates screening resumes received as email attachments in Gmail. It extracts PDF text, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain to analyze and score resumes, extracts contact info, and saves results to a Google Sheets document. Tech stack: Gmail API, Google Sheets API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain integration.

name: Gmail Automation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating Gmail operations like sending, replying, getting emails, and waiting for responses using Gmail OAuth2 API. Integrates n8n's langchain MCP trigger for AI-driven email handling and dynamic message management.

name: Daily Podcast Summary & Email Automation
description: Automates daily retrieval of top US podcasts by genre using Taddy API, crops audio via Aspose API, transcribes using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes with GPT-4o-mini, and emails results via Gmail OAuth2. Provides concise podcast episode summaries delivered to your inbox.

name: Obsidian Note to Gmail Email Sender
description: Automate sending Obsidian notes as emails via Gmail using n8n. Integrates Obsidian's Post Webhook plugin, parses YAML metadata for email fields, handles attachments with base64 encoding, and sends emails with or without attachments seamlessly.

name: Book Data Scraper to CSV & Email via Dumpling AI
description: Automates scraping book data from web pages using Dumpling AI, extracts titles and prices with HTML nodes, sorts by price, converts to CSV, and emails via Gmail. Integrates Google Sheets trigger, HTTP request, HTML parsing, sorting, file conversion, and Gmail APIs for end-to-end scraping and delivery.

name: QR Code Coupon Lead Gen & Validation
description: An n8n workflow automating unique QR code coupon assignment, lead creation, and coupon validation using SuiteCRM API, Google Sheets, SMTP email, and QuickChart API. Designed for managing discounts in lead generation campaigns.

name: Automated Daily Digest Email Creator
description: An n8n workflow that aggregates top news from Times of India RSS, recent Gmail emails, and Todoist tasks into a styled daily summary email. Utilizes RSS Feed, Gmail API, Todoist API, and custom JavaScript for formatting and sends digest automatically via Gmail.

name: Invoice PDF Generator with JSReport & n8n
description: Automates invoice creation from form input using n8n workflows, JSReport API for PDF generation, and Gmail to email invoices. Integrates form-trigger, HTTP POST to JSReport (document template API), and Gmail OAuth2 for sending, streamlining billing tasks.

name: Weekly SEO Report Email Automation
description: An n8n workflow that automates weekly retrieval of SEO data from Google Search Console via its API, generates a summarized report of top search queries, and emails it using Gmail. Scheduled every Monday at 7AM for streamlined SEO performance monitoring.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Email Reply Assistant
description: Automates email replies by integrating Microsoft Outlook and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via n8n. Filters emails from specific sender, generates personalized replies in your style, and drafts or sends replies automatically, enhancing email productivity.

name: Lemlist Reply Automation with Slack & OpenAI
description: Automates handling of Lemlist email replies using OpenAI GPT-4 for classification and sends categorized alerts to Slack. Also manages unsubscribe and interested lead statuses via Lemlist API. Integrates Lemlist, OpenAI GPT-4, Slack, and n8n automation.

name: Client Feedback AI Summary & Social Post
description: Automates client feedback processing using n8n workflow with Deepseek AI API for analysis, email for report delivery, and Telegram for social media draft sharing. Summarizes positives, suggests improvements, and drafts social posts from feedback.

name: Send Files to Kindle via Telegram Bot
description: Automates sending files received from a Telegram bot to a Kindle device via email using Microsoft Outlook API. Ensures files are present, renames attachments, sends to Kindle email, and notifies user. Integrates Telegram Bot API and Outlook mail services.

name: Facebook Lead Ads to KlickTipp Automation
description: Automates lead capture from Facebook Lead Ads into KlickTipp CRM. Utilizes Facebook Lead Ads Trigger and KlickTipp API nodes in n8n to sync lead data with mapped custom fields and tags for personalized email campaigns and segmentation.

name: Weekly Book Recommendation via Open Library
description: Automates finding and emailing a random book recommendation weekly using Open Library API and n8n automation. Fetches book count, selects a random book, retrieves detailed info, formats the author links, and sends the recommendation via SMTP email.

name: Automated Gmail Campaign Manager with Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow automating email campaigns using Gmail API and Google Sheets. It sends sequences of personalized emails with placeholders, follows up based on thread replies, and updates contact status in Sheets. Supports scheduling, weekend skipping, and multi-step email sequencing.

name: Google Sheets Email Validation Workflow
description: Automates email validation by monitoring a Google Sheets for new entries, removing duplicate emails, verifying each email's deliverability through the Effibotics API, and updating the sheet with verification results. Utilizes Google Sheets API, HTTP request node, and email validation service.

name: AI Triathlon Coach Using Strava & Gemini AI
description: Automates triathlon coaching by analyzing Strava activity data with Google Gemini AI. It provides personalized, data-driven training insights and motivational feedback for swimming, cycling, and running. Sends structured HTML reports via Email or WhatsApp. Tech stack: Strava API, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI, Gmail, WhatsApp API.

name: Weekly Google Analytics Report Automation
description: Automates weekly Google Analytics data retrieval (last 7 days & same period previous year), AI-generated summary & analysis (OpenAI GPT-4O), and report delivery via email (SMTP) and Telegram. Scheduled every Monday at 7 AM for actionable insights.

name: AI Email Summarizer to Messenger
description: Automates reading emails via IMAP, summarizes content using Openrouter.ai's LLaMA 3.1 model, and sends concise, prioritized summaries with deadlines to LINE messenger using HTTP APIs. Useful for managing important email info in chat apps.

name: Document Analysis & Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates document submission, parsing (via LlamaIndex API), translation, analysis, and Q&A chatbot interaction using Google Gemini models, Mistral embeddings, Pinecone vector DB, and Gmail for email delivery.

name: MailerLite Subscriber Management Workflow
description: n8n workflow integrates with MailerLite API to create, update, and retrieve email subscribers. It automates managing subscriber data including custom fields like city using MailerLite nodes triggered manually. Ideal for email marketing automation.

name: Gmail to Telegram Keyword Alert
description: This n8n workflow monitors Gmail for incoming emails and forwards only those with specific keywords (e.g., 'Urgent', 'Server Down') in the subject to a Telegram chat. It uses Gmail API for email triggers and Telegram API for messaging, enabling real-time filtered notifications.

name: OpenAI Email Classifier & Extractor
description: An n8n workflow automating email processing: reads emails via IMAP, extracts PDF attachments, classifies emails into categories using OpenAI GPT-4o, and extracts applicant details with LangChain nodes. Ideal for automating job application and inquiry triage.

name: Automizy Contact List Management
description: This n8n workflow uses Automizy's API to create a contact list, add a new contact, update contact tags, and retrieve all contacts in the list. It automates email marketing contact management seamlessly.

name: Typeform to Airtable with Slack Alert
description: Automates form submission handling by triggering on Typeform responses, extracting name and email, appending them to Airtable, and sending a Slack notification. Uses Typeform API, Airtable API, and Slack API for seamless data flow and real-time alerts.

name: Invoice Email Alert & Approval Automation
description: Automates invoice detection from Gmail using IMAP, extracts total amounts with Mindee Invoice API, sends Slack alerts, and emails finance manager for high-value invoices above $1000. Integrates Gmail, Mindee, Slack, and SMTP for seamless invoice workflow.

name: GetResponse to Airtable Subscriber Logger
description: Automates capturing new GetResponse email subscribers via webhook and appends their name and email to an Airtable base. Uses GetResponse API webhook triggers and Airtable API integration to streamline email list management.

name: QuickBooks Invoice Automation Workflow
description: Automates customer creation, invoice generation, and email sending in QuickBooks using OAuth2 API integration within n8n workflow. Streamlines accounting tasks by chaining customer creation, invoice creation, and invoice emailing efficiently.

name: Email Threat Analysis Automation
description: Automates email threat detection by reading IMAP emails, creating cases in TheHive, analyzing attachments with Cortex analyzers, and updating observables like domain, IP, and email using TheHive and Cortex APIs for cybersecurity incident response.

name: Google Trends Data Extract & Summarize
description: Automates extraction of Google Trends data using Bright Data proxy and web unlocker, followed by structured data extraction and summarization via Google Gemini AI (PaLM). Outputs summaries via email and webhook, enabling insightful trend analysis.

name: Automated RSS News Aggregator & Trello Notifier
description: n8n workflow aggregating news from multiple RSS feeds, filtering recent articles, formatting them in Markdown, and posting summaries as Trello card comments with email notifications. Integrates RSS, Trello API, and Gmail via OAuth2 for streamlined team updates.

name: Email Natural Language to SQL Query
description: An n8n workflow that converts natural language questions about a PostgreSQL email metadata database into SQL queries using the Ollama language model. It automates schema extraction, enforces strict schema adherence, and returns query results from the emails_metadata table.

name: Amazon Ads AI Optimization Workflow
description: Automate Amazon Ads report processing with Google Drive, Excel/CSV data extraction, and GPT-4o AI analysis to generate actionable optimization recommendations. Uses n8n nodes, Google Drive API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Gmail to email insights for bid, budget, and keyword strategies.

name: AI Email Auto-responder & Summarizer
description: Automates email response by reading IMAP emails, converting content to markdown, summarizing with DeepSeek and OpenAI models, classifying, and generating concise replies reviewed and sent automatically. Integrates Google Drive for document vectorization with Qdrant and uses OpenAI and DeepSeek APIs.

name: AI-Assisted Human-in-Loop Email Reply System
description: Automates email handling by using IMAP to read emails, converts content to Markdown, summarizes it with Langchain OpenAI models, generates professional replies via AI, and integrates human approval before sending replies via SMTP. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI GPT-4, Langchain, IMAP/SMTP.

name: Sign-in IPs Report & Email Automation
description: Automates retrieval of sign-in events via SaaS Alerts API, deduplicates IP data, converts to CSV, encodes base64, and emails the report using SMTP2Go. Includes an auth form for API key and email input for last 24h sign-in IP info delivery.

name: Google OAuth2 Credentials Auto-Creator
description: Automates creation of OAuth2 credentials for multiple Google services (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Drive, Gmail, Calendar, Contacts) in n8n using Google JSON client info and user email. Simplifies tedious manual setup with n8n API integration.

name: Uber Eats Email Expense Logger
description: Automates extraction of Uber Eats order details from Gmail emails and sends formatted expense info to Slack with Moze app links, using Gmail and Slack APIs within n8n workflow for seamless delivery expense tracking.

name: Automated Website Change Spy & Email Alerts
description: An n8n workflow that automates detecting changes on specified websites using Firecrawl scraping API, compares content over a day, uses OpenAI GPT-4 models to analyze differences, and conditionally sends detailed Gmail alerts. Integrates OpenAI, Firecrawl, and Gmail for spy-like website monitoring.

name: Autopilot to Airtable Contact Sync
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new Autopilot contacts, extracts their first name, last name, and email, and appends them to an Airtable base. Utilizes Autopilot API for contact events and Airtable API to store contact data for easy CRM management.

name: Lemlist to Mattermost Reply Notifier
description: Automates notifications in Mattermost when a recipient replies to a Lemlist email campaign. Utilizes Lemlist API webhook triggers and Mattermost API to post personalized reply messages to a specified channel, streamlining sales and outreach follow-up.

name: Workflow Error Notification via Mailgun
description: An n8n workflow that captures runtime errors using an Error Trigger and sends detailed error reports via Mailgun email API, including error message and stack trace, to specified recipients for quick debugging.

name: Airtable to Lemlist Lead Sync
description: Automates lead syncing by fetching contacts from Airtable and adding them to a Lemlist email campaign. Utilizes Airtable API for data retrieval and Lemlist API to manage leads and campaigns, streamlining outreach and lead management workflows.

name: Mautic Contact Email Validation Alert
description: Automates validation of new Mautic contacts' emails using One Simple API. Triggers on new contact creation, verifies email quality and domain, and sends alerts to Slack for suspicious addresses. Integrates Mautic, One Simple API, and Slack for lead quality control.

name: Email Verification with Hunter API
description: Automates email verification using Hunter API in an n8n workflow. Triggered manually, it validates the format and existence of an email address to reduce bounce rate and improve outreach accuracy.

name: Email Bounce & Open Event Receiver
description: An n8n workflow using Postmark API webhook to receive real-time notifications for email bounce and open events, enabling users to track email engagement and delivery status automatically.

name: n8n Keyword-Based Community Topic Tracker
description: Automates tracking of new topics matching a keyword on the n8n community forum using n8n workflows. Integrates HTTP API requests to n8n community search, Google Sheets for data storage, and optional Slack and email notifications. Ideal for monitoring community discussions.

name: Email Open Tracking Transparent Pixel
description: This n8n workflow creates and serves a 1x1 transparent PNG tracking pixel via webhook to detect email opens. It uses n8n nodes to decode base64 image data, convert to binary, and respond with the image. Includes logging placeholder and supports capturing userId via query parameter.

name: Icypeas Email Verification (Single)
description: n8n workflow to verify a single email using Icypeas API. It authenticates with API key, secret, and user ID using HMAC-SHA1 signature, then sends a POST request to Icypeas email verification endpoint. Useful for integrating email validation in automation.

name: Email to HTML Webpage via GitHub & Telegram
description: Automates converting incoming IMAP emails into private GitHub Gist HTML pages and sends a Telegram notification with a link. Uses IMAP for email, GitHub API for gist creation/deletion, and Telegram Bot API for notifications and message lifecycle management.

name: Gmail JSON Email to CSV Exporter
description: Automates extraction of the latest JSON email from Gmail using OAuth2, processes its binary data, and exports content into a CSV spreadsheet file using n8n's Gmail and spreadsheet nodes. Ideal for email-driven data workflows.

name: Send Gmail Email with Embedded Image
description: An n8n workflow using Gmail API, HTTP Request, and base64 encoding to send an email with embedded images. Fetches an image from a URL, converts it to base64, composes MIME email with inline image, and sends via Gmail OAuth2.

name: Mautic CRM User Sync & Tagging
description: Automates user management in Mautic CRM via webhook-triggered workflow. Processes student data, finds or creates contacts, updates details, handles subscription tags, and manages marketing email opt-in status using Mautic OAuth2 API integration.

name: Monthly Absence Summary Email Automation
description: Automates monthly extraction of absence data (holidays & illness) from Google Calendar, summarizes days absent per person, and emails payroll. Built with n8n using Google Calendar API, cron scheduler, JavaScript code nodes, and SMTP email.

name: Zammad User Role Update via Excel
description: Automates updating user roles in Zammad helpdesk by processing Excel data sourced via HTTP. Utilizes n8n workflow nodes including HTTP Request, Excel extraction, and data merging to sync user roles based on email matching. Requires Zammad API with Bearer token.

name: Icypeas Bulk Email Search Automation
description: Automates bulk email search with Icypeas API using Google Sheets. Reads names and companies from a sheet, authenticates via custom JS with API key/secret, and triggers POST requests for email search results. Tech: n8n, Google Sheets API, Icypeas API, Node.js crypto.

name: Monthly Event Scraper & Email Newsletter
description: Automates scraping of monthly event listings from a location-specific website using HTTP requests and HTML extraction; processes event data, formats it into an HTML email, and sends via Gmail. Ideal for keeping informed about local events monthly.

name: Fastmail Masked Email Management
description: An n8n workflow leveraging Fastmail API to manage masked email addresses: create, update, delete, and list. It uses HTTP Request nodes with Fastmail JMAP API, a webhook secured by basic auth, and generates an interactive HTML table for email states.

name: PayPal Payment Capture & Template Delivery
description: An n8n workflow to handle PayPal NVP SOAP webhook for payment captures, fetch order details using PayPal API with OAuth2, filter specific product purchases, convert JSON template to file, and email the purchased workflow template to customers. Tech stack includes PayPal API, HTTP Requests, webhooks, and email node.

name: Automated Price Tracker and Notifier
description: This n8n workflow automates monitoring product prices across multiple web pages using HTTP requests and CSS selectors for data extraction. It compares current prices with stored data and sends email alerts via SMTP for price drops or extraction issues.

name: PG&E Daily Energy Cost Email Reporter
description: Automates daily login to PG&E's mobile website to extract electricity and gas cost data, formats it into an HTML email, and sends it via Gmail. Uses n8n's AirTop nodes for browser automation and Gmail API for emailing.

name: Google Maps Email Scraper
description: An n8n workflow automating email extraction from Google Maps business listings. It uses HTTP requests to search Google Maps for queries, scrapes URLs and emails with regex, filters duplicates and irrelevant data, and saves results to Google Sheets.

name: MailerLite Subscriber to Airtable Logger
description: Automates capturing new MailerLite subscriber additions to a group and stores their name and email in Airtable. Uses MailerLite webhook trigger and Airtable API via n8n to keep subscriber data synced in real-time for easy CRM or marketing use.

name: n8n Invite Users from Google Sheets
description: Automates inviting users to an n8n instance by syncing email addresses from a Google Sheet with existing n8n users. Uses Google Sheets API, n8n API, and supports pagination and scheduled or manual triggers for updates.

name: Email Existence Verification Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that verifies if an email address exists using Uproc's checkEmailExists API. It triggers manually, creates the email item, checks its deliverability status, and branches accordingly. Useful for validating emails in automation.

name: ConvertKit Subscriber & Tag Automation
description: Automates adding subscribers to ConvertKit forms, creating tags, and associating subscribers with tags using ConvertKit API in n8n. Enables streamlined email marketing list management by linking subscribers and tags automatically.

name: GitHub PR to Pipedrive Note Automation
description: Automates adding notes to Pipedrive persons when a GitHub pull request is created. Uses GitHub webhook trigger, HTTP request to GitHub API, and Pipedrive API. Checks PR sender email in Pipedrive, adds PR URL as a note if person exists.

name: Copper CRM Person Create-Update-Get Flow
description: n8n workflow automates Copper CRM interactions by creating a person with email, updating phone number, then retrieving the person data, using Copper API and manual trigger node for streamlined CRM data management.

name: IP-Based Location Email Sender
description: n8n workflow using Uproc API to get geographic location from IP, then sends a customized welcome email in Spanish or English via AWS SES based on user country (Spain or not). Automates localized email outreach using IP geolocation and email automation.

name: Clearbit Email Person Lookup
description: An n8n workflow that uses Clearbit API to fetch and enrich person details by email input. It triggers manually and retrieves person data like name, job, and company using Clearbit's person resource for streamlined data enrichment.

name: Airtable Email Validation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that fetches email records from Airtable, validates them using Mailcheck API to check MX record existence, and updates Airtable records with validation results. Tech stack includes Airtable API and Mailcheck API integration for data integrity.

name: Fastmail Masked Email Generator
description: An n8n workflow that creates disposable masked email addresses via Fastmail's JMAP API. Triggered by a webhook, it authenticates using HTTP header credentials, processes input state and description, generates a masked email, and responds with the details. Ideal for privacy and testing integrations.

name: Invoice Email to Nextcloud Uploader
description: Automates fetching invoices from an IMAP 'Invoices' email folder, processes each attachment by sanitizing filenames, and uploads them to dated folders in Nextcloud. Utilizes IMAP Email node, custom JavaScript for filename sanitization, and Nextcloud API integration.

name: User Signup & Notion Semester Tracker
description: Automates user signup via a secure HTTP webhook, extracts user name and email, checks existence in Notion database, creates new user if absent, and updates their associated semester info. Uses n8n with Notion API and basic auth for secure, streamlined academic user management.

name: Strava Activity Reminder & Encouragement
description: Automates daily activity checks using Strava API to track moving time. If activity is below threshold, sends encouragement emails to accountability partners via SMTP. Built with n8n, integrates Strava OAuth2 and email sending.

name: Add Subscriber and Send Email Campaign
description: Automates adding an email subscriber to a Sendy list and sends a welcome email campaign using Sendy API triggered manually in n8n workflow.

name: Iterable User Management Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating with Iterable API to create, update, and retrieve user data by email. It automates user profile management in Iterable marketing platform using n8n's Iterable nodes triggered manually.

name: Random User Data to Sheets & Email
description: Automates fetching random user data from randomuser.me API, formats it, appends to Google Sheets via OAuth2, converts data to CSV and JSON files, saves locally, and emails JSON file using Gmail API. Integrates HTTP Request, Google Sheets, File, and Gmail nodes in n8n.

name: Gmail Label Manage: Fetch, Remove, Add
description: Automates Gmail email management by fetching messages with a specific label, removing that label, and applying a new one using Gmail API via OAuth2 in n8n workflow. Ideal for organizing emails automatically.

name: Email Invite with iCalendar Attachment
description: Automates sending an email with an iCalendar event invite using n8n. Utilizes n8n manual trigger, iCal node for calendar event creation, and SMTP email node (Outlook). Ideal for sending event invites with calendar attachments.

name: Customer Data Invoice & Email Automation
description: Automates fetching customer data, sorting, generating invoices and customer lists using n8n, a custom Customer Datastore API, Document Generator for templates, and SMTP for email delivery. Enables sending individual invoice emails and summarized new customer report emails.

name: Icypeas Real-Time Email Search Listener
description: Automates real-time retrieval of email search results from Icypeas via webhook, extracting emails and names. Uses n8n webhook and Set nodes to process data for integration with services like Lemlist. Ideal for bulk email/domain scans with instant notifications.

name: Calendly to Mautic Contact Sync
description: Automates contact creation/update in Mautic when a new Calendly event is created using Calendly webhook and Mautic API integration. Keeps contact info up-to-date by syncing invitee email and first name upon scheduling events.

name: Email Validation & Domain Extraction Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that validates email addresses and extracts domains using native functions. It uses n8n's manual trigger, random data generator for sample emails, and set node for processing. Ideal for quick email checks in automated processes.

name: Gmail Error Notification Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on errors in other workflows and sends an email alert via Gmail API with error details. Set up with Gmail OAuth2 credentials and target email to receive notifications about workflow failures for quick troubleshooting.

name: SendGrid Contact Management Workflow
description: Automates creating, updating, and retrieving contacts using SendGrid API within n8n. Utilizes manual trigger, SendGrid node for contact resource operations including adding first and last names, and fetching contact by email. Ideal for managing email lists.

name: Phantombuster Data to Airtable Logger
description: Automates retrieval of data from Phantombuster API and stores structured results (name, email, company) into Airtable. Utilizes n8n workflow with Phantombuster connector, manual trigger, data mapping, and Airtable API for seamless data capture and storage.

name: Fastmail JMAP Unread Email Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow integrating with Fastmail's JMAP API using HTTP requests and header auth to retrieve mailbox info and fetch the latest unread emails. Designed to automate email monitoring leveraging Fastmail's API and n8n's HTTP Request nodes.

name: Batch Email Sender with CSV and Image Attachments
description: Automates batch email sending using n8n with CSV parsing, batch processing, and SMTP email sending. Reads CSV data, processes in batches of 5, attaches personalized PNGs per recipient, and sends certificate emails via SMTP.

name: Email XML Order Processing and API Submission
description: Automates order processing by reading emails via IMAP, extracting XML attachments, converting them to JSON, and sending data via HTTP POST to a sales order API. Uses n8n nodes: IMAP Email, XML, Set, HTTP Request, and Move Binary Data for seamless integration.

name: Email to Nextcloud Deck Card
description: Automates creation of Nextcloud Deck cards from emails using IMAP for email retrieval, JavaScript function to strip HTML, and Nextcloud Deck API via HTTP request for card creation. Ideal for task management workflows.

name: TwentyCRM Event Notifications to Email & Slack
description: An n8n workflow that receives event triggers from TwentyCRM via webhook, filters and logs event data to Google Sheets, and sends notifications to Gmail or Slack channels based on event type (e.g. deletion events emailed, others sent to Slack).

name: Manage e-goi Subscribers: Create, Update, Retrieve
description: An n8n workflow using the e-goi API to create, update, and fetch subscriber details. It automates subscriber management by chaining operations with manual trigger, utilizing e-goi's contact list API for email marketing and audience handling.

name: Emelia Campaign & Contact Management
description: An n8n workflow using Emelia API to create an email campaign, add a contact to it with name and email, and retrieve campaign info. Automates email marketing campaign setup and contact management using Emelia API within n8n.

name: Icypeas Email Search Automation
description: Automates performing single email searches using the Icypeas API via n8n. Utilizes API key, secret, and user ID for authentication, generates HMAC signatures, and executes secured HTTP POST requests to fetch email data based on lastname, firstname, and company/domain inputs.

name: Freshdesk Ticket Fetcher by Email
description: An n8n workflow that fetches open Freshdesk tickets for a requester based on their email. Uses Freshdesk API integrated into n8n with a manual trigger to initiate the process. Ideal for customer support automation and ticket management.

name: Email Body Parser Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that extracts structured data from raw email bodies by parsing labeled fields using a custom JavaScript snippet. It uses n8n's Manual Trigger, Set, and FunctionItem nodes to process emails with labels like Name, Email, Subject, and Message.

name: n8n GitHub Release Notifier
description: Automates monitoring of n8n GitHub releases via RSS, filters new releases published within last 4 hours mentioning 'n8n@' and '.0', then sends notifications via Telegram and AWS SES email. Uses n8n nodes: Cron, RSS Feed Read, Function, IF, Telegram API, AWS SES.

name: Autopilot Email List & Contact Management
description: An n8n workflow using Autopilot API to list email lists, add contacts to lists, update contact details, and retrieve all contacts from a list. Automates email marketing list and contact management with step-by-step Autopilot API integration.

name: IMAP Email Fetcher
description: Workflow to fetch emails from an IMAP server using n8n's Email Read IMAP node. It connects to an email inbox via IMAP protocol, enabling automated email retrieval for further processing or automation tasks. Uses n8n automation platform with IMAP credentials.

name: n8n Workflow Error Email Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on workflow errors and sends detailed error reports via Gmail API. It captures error messages, execution details, and stack traces, emailing them to specified recipients to facilitate quick debugging and monitoring.

name: Automated Email Excuse Responder
description: This n8n workflow automatically reads emails from a specific IMAP inbox, filters emails from a particular sender, generates randomized excuses using data from an Excel spreadsheet, replies to the sender via SMTP, and sends notifications to Slack channels. It integrates Email (IMAP/SMTP), Excel parsing, Slack API, and custom JavaScript logic to automate personalized email replies.

name: AWS SES Email Sender Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to send emails via AWS SES. Triggered manually to send predefined messages to multiple recipients using AWS SES API, useful for automated email notifications or testing email sending automation.

name: Mailchimp Email Subscriber Add
description: An n8n workflow that automates adding subscribers to a Mailchimp email list via API. Uses Mailchimp node triggered manually to subscribe an email with merge field data. Ideal for simple email marketing subscriber management.

name: Website Email Scraper API via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes emails from any website URL passed as a query parameter to a webhook. It uses HTTP Request to fetch website HTML, regex to extract emails, removes duplicates, and returns the emails in the webhook response. No external API needed.

name: Email Domain Extractor
