description: An advanced chatbot integrating Telegram, OpenAI, Ollama embeddings, and Postgres PGVector for hybrid semantic and SQL-based email retrieval. It handles natural language queries over email data, combining vector search and SQL for precise and contextual answers.

name: WooCommerce to Telegram Order Alerts
description: Automates sending Telegram notifications for WooCommerce orders moved to processing status. Utilizes WooCommerce Webhooks, n8n workflow, JavaScript for message formatting, and Telegram Bot API to instantly alert store owners with detailed order info.

name: SSL Certificate Expiry Alert System
description: Automates weekly monitoring of SSL certificates for URLs listed in Google Sheets using SSL-Checker.io API. Updates sheet with validity and expiry info, and sends alerts via Gmail and Telegram for expiring or invalid certificates, ensuring proactive SSL management.

name: Perplexity Research to TailwindCSS HTML
description: An n8n workflow that automates research on a user-provided topic using Perplexity API and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models, improves the prompt, generates structured article content, and converts it into a single-line, responsive, Tailwind CSS-styled HTML page, optionally sending summaries via Telegram.

name: AI Prompt Optimizer with Telegram Delivery
description: An n8n workflow that refines user input prompts via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model with LangChain AI Agent, improving clarity, specificity, and formatting. The optimized prompt is split for Telegram messages and sent back using Telegram API for seamless prompt enhancement and reuse.

name: Hacker News Historical Headline Summarizer
description: Automates fetching Hacker News front-page headlines from multiple years on the same day, categorizes and summarizes key tech trends using Google Gemini (PaLM) LLM, and publishes markdown reports via Telegram. Utilizes HTTP requests, HTML parsing, date calculations, and Langchain LLM integration.

name: n8n AI Agent for Creator Leaderboard Reports
description: Automates daily aggregation and reporting of top n8n community creators and workflows using GitHub data, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Gemini LLM, and integrated with Gmail, Google Drive, and Telegram for distributed sharing and local saving. Enables insightful leaderboard summaries and trend analysis.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Survey Bot with Redis & Google Sheets
description: Conducts structured product satisfaction surveys via Telegram bot. Uses Redis for session state, Google Sheets for questions and answers storage, and OpenAI GPT models for generating follow-ups and conversational AI. Enables guided, multi-turn survey chats with dynamic follow-up questions.

name: Client Feedback AI Summary & Social Post
description: Automates client feedback processing using n8n workflow with Deepseek AI API for analysis, email for report delivery, and Telegram for social media draft sharing. Summarizes positives, suggests improvements, and drafts social posts from feedback.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with LangChain & Dall-E
description: An AI-powered Telegram chatbot using n8n with LangChain nodes, OpenAI GPT-4o for conversation, Dall-E-3 for image generation, and Telegram API integration. It handles user chat, generates images on request, and replies with text or images, maintaining session context.

name: Children's Storytelling Automation on Telegram
description: Automates creating and sharing children’s English stories on Telegram using OpenAI GPT-3.5 for story and character generation, DALL-E for illustrations, and Telegram API for delivery every 12 hours.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Multi-Session Management
description: An AI-powered Telegram chatbot workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain for conversational AI, integrated with Google Sheets for multi-session management, command handling (/new, /current, /resume, /summary, /question), and context-based memory. Enables robust user chat experience via Telegram API.

name: Telegram Files to Google Drive Auto-Saver
description: Automates saving files received via Telegram messages directly to Google Drive using Telegram API and Google Drive API in an n8n workflow. Ideal for backing up or organizing documents sent on Telegram automatically.

name: Telegram AI Messaging Agent (Text/Audio/Image)
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API and OpenAI to handle Telegram messages via webhook. It processes text, voice (audio), and images with AI models for transcription, classification, and analysis, enabling intelligent interaction and automation.

name: WooCommerce New Product Announcement to Twitter & Telegram
description: Automates announcing new WooCommerce products on Twitter and Telegram. Uses WooCommerce webhook trigger, Twitter API, and Telegram API to post customized new product messages instantly, enhancing social media marketing and customer engagement.

name: Telegram Chinese Vocabulary Tutor Bot
description: An n8n workflow automating a Telegram bot to tutor users in Chinese vocabulary using Google Sheets for word lists, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain for interactive MCQs, with session memory and feedback. Ideal for language learners.

name: Jira to Telegram Issue Notification
description: Automates sending Jira issue updates to specific Telegram users. Uses Jira webhooks, processes events like issue creation, updates, and assignee changes, and sends formatted messages via Telegram Bot API. Ideal for teams tracking Jira tasks via Telegram.

name: OnThisDay Hacker News Highlights Digest
description: Automates daily collection of Hacker News front-page headlines for the same calendar day across multiple years, analyzes tech trends using Google Gemini LLM, and sends a categorized Markdown summary with source links via Telegram. Uses n8n, HTTP requests, HTML extraction, and Google PaLM API.

name: YouTube Transcript Summarizer & Telegram Notifier
description: Automates retrieval of YouTube video transcripts, extracts and summarizes the content using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain, then sends summarized insights via Telegram. Utilizes YouTube API, OpenAI, LangChain, and Telegram API for content analysis and notification.

name: Telegram AI Image Processor
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram and OpenAI APIs to receive text prompts via Telegram, generate AI images with OpenAI, and send images back to the user on Telegram. Enhances real-time interactive communication with AI-powered image generation.

name: Weekly Workflow Failure Reporter via Telegram
description: Automates weekly reports of failed n8n workflow executions using n8n's API and Telegram Bot API. Fetches last 7 days' failed executions, compiles messages, and sends alerts to Telegram chat for prompt monitoring.

name: Telegram Error Alert Workflow
description: An n8n error handling workflow that sends a Telegram alert with the failed workflow's name and execution link. Utilizes n8n errorTrigger, Set node, and Telegram API to notify via chat, ideal for monitoring automated workflows effectively.

name: Lead Qualification & Notification via Form
description: Automates lead capture from a web form using n8n Form Trigger, validates emails via Hunter API, scores leads with MadKudu API, and notifies qualified leads through Telegram. Ideal for smart B2B lead management and instant alerts.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with OpenAI GPT
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Telegram messages, processes them using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain AI Agent, and responds with helpful, emoji-rich replies. It integrates Telegram API and OpenAI API for interactive chat automation.

name: Crypto 24h Price Alert via Telegram
description: Automates crypto price monitoring by fetching Binance's 24h ticker data, filters coins with ±15% changes, and sends aggregated alerts to a Telegram channel. Uses Binance HTTP API, n8n nodes, and Telegram Bot API for real-time market updates.

name: Daily Vegan Recipes Telegram Bot
description: Automates sending one random vegan recipe daily via Telegram using Spoonacular API. Integrates Airtable to manage subscriber chat IDs, n8n cron for scheduling, and Telegram nodes for messaging. Welcomes new users and sends recipe image and URL automatically.

name: YouTube Channel Video Alerts to Telegram
description: Automates fetching latest videos from a specific YouTube channel using YouTube API every 30 minutes, filters new videos, and sends notifications with video title and URL to Telegram via bot. Utilizes n8n, YouTube API, and Telegram API for workflow automation.

name: Automated Tech RSS to Telegram Alerts
description: An n8n workflow that fetches multiple tech-related RSS feeds every 10 minutes, filters out new entries, categorizes content by keywords and URLs, and sends tailored alerts to distinct Telegram channels using Telegram API credentials. Automates timely tech news delivery.

name: Readwise to Telegram Sync
description: An n8n workflow syncing Readwise articles updated after last sync to Telegram. It reads last sync time from a file, fetches new articles via Readwise API, filters articles, sends summaries to Telegram, and updates sync time. Uses Readwise API, Telegram Bot API, file system.

name: Telegram Receipt OCR to Airtable
description: n8n workflow automates receipt processing by uploading images from Telegram to AWS S3, extracting text via AWS Textract, and appending the data to Airtable. Integrates Telegram Bot API, AWS S3 and Textract, Airtable API to digitize and store receipt info seamlessly.

name: Telegram AI Agent with LangChain & DALL·E Integration
description: An n8n workflow creating a Telegram AI chatbot using LangChain nodes and OpenAI's GPT-4o for conversational AI, with DALL·E-3 for image generation. It listens to Telegram messages, maintains context memory, generates AI responses, and sends text or AI-generated images back to users.

name: Daily NASA Astronomy Picture to Telegram
description: Automates daily sending of NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day to a Telegram channel using NASA API, n8n Cron scheduling, and Telegram Bot API for photo delivery with captions.

name: AI Social Media Auto-Poster from Hacker News
description: Automates curation and posting of trending GitHub projects from Hacker News to Twitter and LinkedIn using OpenAI GPT-4, Airtable, Telegram, and n8n. Extracts GitHub links, generates engaging content, schedules posts, and prevents duplicates.

name: Crypto Price Telegram Bot
description: An n8n workflow that integrates Telegram, OpenAI GPT-4o mini, and CoinMarketCap API to provide real-time cryptocurrency prices via chat. It uses Langchain agents with memory buffer to manage sessions and respond dynamically to user queries on Telegram.

name: USDT ERC-20 Wallet Balance Monitor with Telegram
description: Automates monitoring of USDT ERC-20 wallet balances using Etherscan API. Sends Telegram notifications on balance changes. Utilizes n8n workflow with Cron triggers, HTTP request node for Etherscan API, JavaScript code for change detection, and Telegram node for alerts.

name: Telegram Image Analyzer with OpenAI
description: Automates image analysis in Telegram chats using n8n, OpenAI for image processing, and Telegram API for communication. Detects received images, analyzes them with OpenAI's base64 image capabilities, and sends back insightful text responses. Enhances moderation, tagging, and feedback workflows.

name: RSS to Telegram Media Broadcaster
description: Automates fetching Instagram and Weibo RSS feeds, filters duplicates, extracts images from posts, and sends them as photos or text messages to Telegram channels. Uses n8n with RSS Feed, Function, If, and Telegram nodes integrating RSSHub API and Telegram Bot API.

name: Telegram Refund & Complaint Automator
description: Automates customer refund and complaint handling via Telegram, Freshdesk, and Monday.com. Uses Telegram trigger, Freshdesk API for ticket creation, conditional branching for refund or complaint, and Monday.com for task organization. Enables quick response and tracking.

name: Telegram Error Notification for n8n
description: An n8n workflow to send real-time error alerts via Telegram bot. Uses n8n's Error Trigger node linked to a Telegram node with bot token and chat ID. Notifies workflow name, execution time, error details, and last executed node for easy monitoring.

name: Send Files to Kindle via Telegram Bot
description: Automates sending files received from a Telegram bot to a Kindle device via email using Microsoft Outlook API. Ensures files are present, renames attachments, sends to Kindle email, and notifies user. Integrates Telegram Bot API and Outlook mail services.

name: GitHub Issues to Telegram Notifier
description: Automates fetching open GitHub issues labeled 'Bug' from a specified repo every 10 minutes, filters by comments count, and sends new issue alerts via Telegram bot. Utilizes GitHub API, n8n automation, and Telegram API for real-time notifications.

name: Daily Google Calendar Meetings to Telegram
description: Automates sending a daily list of Google Calendar meetings via Telegram using Google Calendar and Telegram APIs in n8n. Triggered every morning at 6 AM, it retrieves today's meetings, formats details, and messages them to your Telegram user.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Image Response
description: An n8n workflow that uses Telegram API and OpenAI's image generation to receive text messages, generate AI images from the text, and send these images back via Telegram, enabling AI-enhanced visual communication.

name: Telegram Image Auto-Analyzer with OpenAI
description: Automates image analysis on Telegram using n8n workflow with Telegram and OpenAI APIs. It triggers on image messages, analyzes images via OpenAI, and sends textual analysis back to Telegram chats, enabling real-time content moderation, categorization, and feedback.

name: Agent Access Control with Telegram & Airtable
description: An n8n workflow implementing an AI agent access control system using Telegram Bot, Airtable for user permissions, and OpenAI GPT-4 models. It verifies user roles and allowed tools before executing actions and supports sub-agents like a weather assistant with real-time API data.

name: Telegram Resume Extractor and PDF Generator
description: Automates resume extraction via Telegram using OpenAI GPT-4 turbo-preview for parsing, formats sections into HTML, converts to PDF with Gotenberg, and sends back through Telegram. It integrates Telegram API, OpenAI API, and Gotenberg PDF conversion.

name: Telegram AI Study Assistant for Signal Processing
description: An AI-powered Telegram bot for interactive signal processing study help. Integrates Telegram API, OpenAI API, Google Gemini, Airtable, Wikipedia, and LangChain tools like calculator and memory. Guides users through problems, explains theory, and records memory for personalized learning.

name: Telegram AI Chat with Message Buffering
description: This n8n workflow integrates Telegram, Supabase PostgreSQL, and OpenAI GPT-4 to buffer multiple user messages, aggregate them, and reply with a single AI-generated response. It enhances chatbot conversation quality by combining rapid-fire inputs into coherent replies.

name: Weekly Google Analytics Report Automation
description: Automates weekly Google Analytics data retrieval (last 7 days & same period previous year), AI-generated summary & analysis (OpenAI GPT-4O), and report delivery via email (SMTP) and Telegram. Scheduled every Monday at 7 AM for actionable insights.

name: Google Calendar to Telegram Event Notifier
description: Automates posting new Google Calendar events to Telegram chats using Google Calendar API and Telegram Bot API. Sends event details like name, description, location, and time to keep you updated instantly via Telegram.

name: Telegram AI Meetup Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram bot with OpenRouter LLM and Google Sheets API to provide AI-driven meetup scheduling assistance. It processes chat inputs, retrieves schedules from Google Sheets, converts them to markdown, and responds intelligently via Telegram.

name: Telegram to Spotify Track Control
description: Automate Spotify playback via Telegram using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for track identification. This n8n workflow triggers from Telegram messages, fetches track info using OpenAI, searches Spotify, and controls playback (add, next, resume). Integrates Telegram, OpenAI, and Spotify APIs.

name: Gmail to Telegram Keyword Alert
description: This n8n workflow monitors Gmail for incoming emails and forwards only those with specific keywords (e.g., 'Urgent', 'Server Down') in the subject to a Telegram chat. It uses Gmail API for email triggers and Telegram API for messaging, enabling real-time filtered notifications.

name: Telegram to Facebook Ad Interest Exporter
description: Automates extraction of Facebook ad interests from Telegram messages using Telegram API, Facebook Graph API v17.0, and n8n. Extracts hashtagged interests, queries Facebook, formats data into CSV, and sends back via Telegram.

name: Telegram Meetup Scheduler AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API, Google Sheets, and OpenRouter AI to provide meetup scheduling assistance. It fetches schedule data from Google Sheets, converts it to markdown, and uses LangChain with OpenRouter for AI-powered chat responses on Telegram.

name: Telegram Toxic Language Filter
description: n8n workflow integrating Telegram API and Google Perspective API to detect and respond to toxic language in Telegram chats by automatically replying with a warning message when profanity is detected above a threshold.

name: Multilingual Telegram Welcome Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram API and NocoDB to manage multilingual user interactions. It welcomes new users, provides help, and updates user language preferences, using Telegram Trigger, HTTP requests, and language dictionaries.

name: Telegram Weather Bot with R Visualization
description: An automated Telegram bot workflow built in n8n that fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap API for major European cities, processes it into CSV, runs an R script to generate ggplot2 weather charts, and sends the image back to users on Telegram.

name: Nostr #damus AI Report with Gmail & Telegram
description: Automates analysis of Nostr #damus hashtag threads using Google Gemini LLM, aggregates themes, and generates detailed AI reports sent via Gmail and Telegram for community insights and engagement.

name: Telegram Sticker Info Responder
description: An n8n workflow automating Telegram bot interactions to detect and respond with sticker info. Uses Telegram Trigger node and conditional logic to reply with sticker details or a no-sticker message, enhancing Telegram bot user engagement easily.

name: Brave Search via Telegram Bot
description: This n8n workflow integrates Brave Search API with Telegram using MCP community nodes. Users send /brave commands to a Telegram bot, triggering Brave search queries and receiving results directly in chat. Tech stack: n8n, MCP client for Brave API, Telegram node, JavaScript code for query cleaning.

name: Telegram Tron USDT Wallet Blacklist Checker
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram and Tronscan API to verify if a TRON USDT wallet address is blacklisted. Users send wallet addresses via Telegram; the system validates format, queries the Tronscan stablecoin blacklist API, and replies with the blacklist status.

name: Email to HTML Webpage via GitHub & Telegram
description: Automates converting incoming IMAP emails into private GitHub Gist HTML pages and sends a Telegram notification with a link. Uses IMAP for email, GitHub API for gist creation/deletion, and Telegram Bot API for notifications and message lifecycle management.

name: Telegram Links to Readeck & Hoarder Bookmark Sync
description: Automates fetching links from a specific Telegram channel using the Telegram Bot API and syncs new links to Readeck and Hoarder bookmark management platforms via their APIs, ensuring links are saved without duplication. Built with n8n workflow automation.

name: Bulk Telegram Message Sender from Google Sheets
description: Automates sending messages via Telegram bot to multiple chat IDs listed in a Google Sheets column. Utilizes Google Sheets API for data retrieval, Telegram API for messaging, batching with SplitInBatches, and timed delays to avoid flooding. Ideal for broadcast messaging.

name: Telegram Image Description with GROQ LLAVA
description: Automates image description by sending photos received via Telegram to the GROQ LLAVA V1.5-7B API for detailed analysis and returns text descriptions back to Telegram users. Uses Telegram Bot API, base64 image encoding, and GROQ AI vision API.

name: Daily Telegram Journal Reminder
description: Automates daily 6 AM journal prompts via Telegram by generating a reminder message with yesterday's date. Uses n8n Cron for scheduling, JavaScript function for message formatting, and Telegram API for notification delivery. Helps maintain consistent journaling habit.

name: Daily Cocktail Recipe via Telegram Bot
description: Automates sending a daily random cocktail recipe with image and instructions to a Telegram chat using TheCocktailDB API, n8n HTTP Request node, and Telegram Bot integration triggered every day at 8 PM via Cron node.

name: News Change Alert via Telegram
description: Automates monitoring of Hacker News front page by fetching the page every 5 minutes, comparing the content, and sending a Telegram alert if changes are detected. Uses HTTP Request nodes, Cron trigger, Wait node, IF condition, and Telegram API integration.

name: SSL Certificate Expiry Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that checks the SSL certificate validity of a specified domain (default: n8n.io) using the Uproc API and sends an alert to a Telegram chat if the certificate has expired. Integrates manual trigger, function item, Uproc and Telegram nodes.

name: Daily Poem Telegram Bot
description: Automates daily delivery of a random poem via Telegram using Poemist API for poem retrieval and LingvaNex for translation to English. Triggered by Cron at 10 AM, it sends translated poems to a specified Telegram chat. Useful for daily literary inspiration.

name: Telegram Toxic Language Filter
description: This n8n workflow monitors Telegram messages and uses Google Perspective API to detect toxic language (profanity, identity attack, threat). Offending messages trigger an automatic Telegram reply warning users. Integrates Telegram API and Google Perspective API for real-time content moderation.

name: Automated MySQL Cleanup with Telegram Alerts
description: This n8n workflow automates the cleanup of old package records from two MySQL databases at 8 AM daily using Cron, then sends Telegram notifications to specific chats. It leverages MySQL, Cron, Telegram API, and a webhook trigger for manual invocations.

name: Shopify Product Launch Social Broadcaster
description: Automates social media announcements for new Shopify products by posting customizable messages to Twitter and Telegram using Shopify Trigger, Twitter API, and Telegram API integration in n8n workflow.

name: Website Screenshot to Telegram Channel
description: Automates capturing a full-page website screenshot via uProc API and sends it as a photo to a specified Telegram channel using Telegram Bot API, triggered manually in n8n workflow.

name: Telegram Controlled N8N Workflow Activator
description: Automates activation/deactivation of n8n workflows via Telegram bot commands. Uses Telegram API for command input and n8n API for workflow control. Enables quick management of marketing and sales workflows remotely through '/start' and '/stop' commands.

name: Telegram Welcome and Farewell Bot - Spanish
description: An n8n workflow automating greetings and farewells in a Spanish Telegram group using Telegram API. It detects new or leaving members and sends personalized welcome or goodbye messages in Spanish to the group @comunidadn8n.

name: Daily Telegram Text Affirmations
description: Automates sending daily positive affirmations at 9 AM via Telegram using n8n with a Cron trigger, affirmations.dev API for content, and Telegram API for delivery to user Daniel.

name: Telegram Nocode Tool Info Bot
description: An n8n workflow creating a Telegram bot that retrieves no-code tool info from a Strapi API and sends translated descriptions and images. Utilizes Telegram API, Strapi REST API, and local translation CLI, enabling multilingual responses for no-code enthusiasts.

name: Telegram GitHub Release Info Bot
description: Automates GitHub release retrieval via Telegram commands. Uses Telegram API to trigger workflow on messages containing '/deploy', extracts version, then fetches GitHub release data using GitHub OAuth2 API. Ideal for quick release info checks.

name: Automated Torrent Search & Download
description: An n8n workflow automating torrent search using 'torrent-search-api' on KickassTorrents and Rarbg, integrates with Transmission RPC to start downloads, and uses Telegram bot for notifications. Enables POST webhook input with movie title to trigger torrent fetching and download.

name: Telegram Weather Info Bot
description: An n8n workflow that uses Telegram API and OpenWeatherMap API to provide current weather updates on-demand via Telegram messages. It triggers on Telegram messages, fetches weather for Berlin, and replies with detailed conditions and temperature info.

name: Telegram Journal Reply to Google Sheets
description: Automates saving Telegram reply messages as journal entries into a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Utilizes Telegram Trigger to capture replies, a Function node to parse message content, and Google Sheets API to append entries. Ideal for personal journaling via Telegram.

name: Telegram Cocktail Image Bot
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Telegram messages, fetches a random cocktail from TheCocktailDB API, and replies with the drink's image and name. Utilizes Telegram Bot API and HTTP Request node for API integration to provide fun cocktail suggestions.

name: Telegram Message Relay via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow using a webhook and Telegram API to forward incoming HTTP requests as Telegram messages. It receives a query parameter, sends it to a predefined chat ID via Telegram Bot API, and confirms message delivery. Tech stack: n8n, Telegram Bot API.

name: Telegram Echo Bot for Debugging
description: An n8n workflow that listens to all Telegram bot messages and echoes back the full JSON content to the sender. Utilizes Telegram API triggers and message nodes, ideal for debugging Telegram bot incoming data and learning the Telegram JSON structure.

name: n8n GitHub Release Notifier
description: Automates monitoring of n8n GitHub releases via RSS, filters new releases published within last 4 hours mentioning 'n8n@' and '.0', then sends notifications via Telegram and AWS SES email. Uses n8n nodes: Cron, RSS Feed Read, Function, IF, Telegram API, AWS SES.

name: Nostr Damus Hashtag AI Analytics
description: Automated social media analytics that monitors Nostr's #damus hashtag, uses Google Gemini AI to analyze themes and generate reports, then sends insights via Gmail and Telegram. Tech: Nostr API, Google Gemini AI, Gmail, Telegram. Perfect for tracking decentralized social trends.

name: AI-Powered Automated Research Report Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates research report creation using OpenAI GPT-4 for query refinement and summarization, Wikipedia, NewsAPI, Google Custom Search, SerpApi for scholarly papers, and integrates PDFShift for PDF generation. Reports are sent via Gmail and Telegram, streamlining professional research delivery.

name: AI-Powered Company Data Enrichment Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates company research by leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, and web scraping (ScrapingBee). It enriches Google Sheets rows with structured info like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, API availability, market type, and integrations, running on schedule or manual trigger.

name: AI Company Research & Data Enrichment
description: Automates company info research using n8n with OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, ScrapingBee, and Google Sheets. Extracts data like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, plans, APIs, integrations, and case studies for B2B/B2C markets, enabling scalable enrichment workflows.

name: SEO-Optimized WordPress Blog Generator
description: Automates SEO-optimized blog post creation for WordPress using Perplexity.ai for research, OpenAI GPT-4 mini for writing and HTML generation, WordPress API for publishing, and Telegram for success notifications. Ideal for content marketers and bloggers.

name: Automated YouTube & Google Keyword Research
description: An n8n workflow integrating NocoDB, DataForSEO API, and Social Flood API for automated multi-source keyword generation, filtering, and monthly search volume tracking for YouTube and Google. Ideal for SEO and content marketing automation.

name: LinkedIn Lead Automation & Enrichment
description: Automates LinkedIn lead generation, data enrichment, and outreach using HDW LinkedIn API, OpenAI GPT-4 for ICP parsing and content summarization, and Google Sheets for data storage. Includes lead scoring, company research, and automated messaging workflows.

name: AI-Powered Autonomous Research Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating deep research by generating multiple search queries with LLMs, fetching data via SerpAPI and Jina AI, extracting relevant info, and compiling comprehensive markdown reports. Integrates OpenRouter LLM, SerpAPI, Jina AI, and Wikipedia.

name: Meeting Attendee & Company Research Automation
description: Automates research on meeting attendees and their companies upon new Google Calendar event. Utilizes Google Calendar trigger, OpenAI GPT-4o with web search preview for person/company data, aggregates info, formats in Markdown/HTML, and sends report via Gmail API.

name: AI Competitor Research & Report Generator
description: Automates competitor analysis by finding similar companies via Exa.ai, scraping Crunchbase, WellFound, LinkedIn, and review sites using Firecrawl and SerpAPI. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o for extracting structured company, product, and review data, and compiles detailed reports into Notion.

name: AI SEO Keyword Research Automation
description: Automates SEO keyword research using OpenAI GPT for topic expansion and competitor analysis, integrates DataForSEO API for keyword metrics, and manages workflow with NocoDB and Slack notifications. Generates actionable SEO strategies and content briefs for targeted content creation.

name: SEO Blog Generator with GPT-4o & Telegram
description: Automates SEO blog post creation using OpenAI GPT-4o, integrated with Perplexity AI for research and Telegram for notifications. It generates blog drafts, SEO-friendly titles, slugs, metas, and merges content for streamlined content marketing workflows.

name: AI Knowledge Base Article Generator
description: Automates creating and editing knowledge base articles using Langchain AI agents, Perplexity API for deep research, and OpenAI GPT models. Ensures high-quality content with iterative editorial feedback and publishes directly to Contentful CMS.

name: AI-Powered Autonomous Research Workflow
description: An advanced n8n workflow automating deep research by generating search queries via LLM (OpenRouter), querying SerpAPI (Google Search), analyzing content with Jina AI, referencing Wikipedia, and synthesizing a comprehensive report using LangChain agents and memory buffers.

name: Semantic Web Search & Result Re-Ranking
description: An n8n workflow that uses Brave Search API for web queries combined with advanced LLMs (OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini) to generate, refine, and semantically re-rank search results for precise info retrieval. Ideal for research with AI-powered query optimization and detailed result extraction.

name: Auto SEO Blog Writer with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
description: Automates full SEO blog content creation: collects fresh research via Perplexity API, generates SEO-optimized articles with GPT-4o, publishes to WordPress, sends Gmail & Slack notifications, and logs to Notion. Integrates OpenAI, Perplexity, WordPress, Gmail, Slack, and Notion via n8n.

name: n8n DeepResearcher Automated Research
description: Automates deep multi-step research using OpenAI (o3-mini) and Google Gemini LLMs, Apify web scraping, and Notion API to recursively generate, refine, and compile research insights into detailed reports in Notion. Ideal for complex topic exploration with configurable depth and breadth.

name: AI Chatbot with Jina.ai Webpage Scraper
description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating Langchain and OpenAI's gpt-4o-mini model with Jina.ai's real-time web scraping tool. It scrapes live website data from user-supplied URLs, retains conversation memory, and delivers accurate, context-aware answers dynamically, ideal for research and support.

name: AI-Powered User Interview Workflow
description: Automates user interviews with AI-driven question generation and session management using n8n forms, Langchain AI agent (Groq Chat Model), Redis for session storage, and Google Sheets for transcript saving. Efficient tool for scalable qualitative research.

name: Perplexity Research to TailwindCSS HTML
description: An n8n workflow that automates research on a user-provided topic using Perplexity API and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini models, improves the prompt, generates structured article content, and converts it into a single-line, responsive, Tailwind CSS-styled HTML page, optionally sending summaries via Telegram.

name: Icypeas Bulk Domain Scan from Google Sheets
description: Automate bulk domain scans using Icypeas API by reading company data from Google Sheets. Uses Google Sheets node, custom JavaScript for API auth with HMAC-SHA1 signing, and HTTP POST request for domain search tasks. Ideal for bulk domain research and verification.

name: YouTube Search and Transcript MCP Server
description: n8n workflow using Apify API for YouTube video search, transcript retrieval, and usage metrics via an MCP server trigger. Enables integration with MCP clients like Claude Desktop to automate YouTube content research with no official rate limits.

name: AI Research Reports via Jina DeepSearch
description: Automates deep research using Jina AI DeepSearch API and n8n. Users input queries via chat, triggering the API to generate structured, fact-based reports. Includes automated Markdown formatting and cleanup for readable, insightful analysis. No API key needed.

name: Tavily API Search & Extract with AI Summary
description: An n8n workflow integrating Tavily API for intelligent web search and content extraction, combined with OpenAI to summarize content. Automates fetching relevant web data and summarizing it for research or content enrichment using Tavily's search/extract endpoints and OpenAI's LLM.

name: DeepResearcher: AI-Powered Notion Research
description: Automates deep topic research by querying web SERPs, extracting key learnings via OpenAI GPT and Google Gemini, and organizing findings into Notion. Integrates OpenAI and Google Gemini chat models with Notion API for structured expert-level research synthesis.

name: Ahrefs Keyword Research Automation
description: Automates SEO keyword research using Ahrefs API via RapidAPI, Google Gemini AI for query extraction and response formatting, and custom JS for data extraction. Enables chat-triggered keyword insights with detailed metrics on main and related keywords for content optimization.

name: Perplexity AI Article Formatter
description: n8n workflow integrating Perplexity.ai API with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini to convert structured article data into professional, single-line HTML content. Uses AI for research, content enhancement, and HTML formatting to automate article generation with rich metadata and hashtags.

name: Podcast Transcript Summarizer & Digest Sender
description: Automates summarizing a podcast transcript with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, extracts key topics and questions, enriches them via Wikipedia research, formats the content in HTML, and emails a digest using Gmail. Utilizes n8n, LangChain modules, OpenAI API, and Wikipedia tool.

name: Google Ads SEO Keyword Volume Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow using Google Ads API to fetch SEO keyword monthly search volumes, historical trends, difficulty scores, and competition metrics. Ideal for keyword research automation with up to 20 keywords input and customizable database integration.

name: Startup Funding News Data Extractor
description: Automates extraction and structuring of funding news data from TechCrunch and VentureBeat sitemaps using n8n with Langchain AI (Anthropic Claude, OpenRouter Perplexity), HTML/XML parsing, and Airtable for storage. Enables comprehensive company funding research.

name: Google SERP Keyword Rank Tracker
description: Automates SEO keyword ranking tracking using ScrapingRobot API and n8n. Fetches Google SERP data for custom keyword lists, processes organic results, assigns ranking positions, and prepares output for databases like Airtable. Ideal for SEO research and competitor analysis.

name: Hugging Face Paper Summarizer to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of new research papers from Hugging Face, analyzes abstracts using OpenAI GPT-4O, and stores structured summaries in Notion. Tech stack includes Hugging Face API, HTML extraction, OpenAI API (GPT-4O), and Notion API integration.

name: Airtable Product Data Enricher with AI Vision & Web Agent
description: This n8n workflow automates enrichment of product data in Airtable from photos using OpenAI's GPT-4o vision model, SERP API for reverse image search, and Firecrawl.dev for web scraping. It intelligently analyzes images, performs internet research, and updates Airtable records with detailed product attributes.

name: Hugging Face Paper Auto-Import to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of research papers from Hugging Face, uses HTML scraping, OpenAI GPT-4O for abstract analysis, and stores enriched metadata in Notion. Integrates Hugging Face API, OpenAI API, and Notion API for academic paper management.

name: Perplexity AI Research Assistant
description: An n8n workflow integrating Perplexity AI's Sonar model via HTTP API to answer research queries. It formats user prompts, sends them to Perplexity AI, and extracts clean, in-depth responses for knowledge discovery and content research automation.

name: Web Scraper & Product Extractor with GPT-4
description: Automates scraping product data via Brightdata API, cleans HTML, and extracts structured info using OpenRouter GPT-4.1 and Langchain parsers, storing results in Google Sheets. Ideal for e-commerce and market research workflows.

name: SEO Keyword Generator Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that generates SEO keywords using Google Autocomplete API, processes XML response, aggregates and formats keyword suggestions into a clean array. Utilizes HTTP Request, XML parsing, and webhook nodes for dynamic keyword research automation.

name: LangChain AI Chat & Wikipedia Research
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain nodes for AI chat and a custom Wikipedia tool for research. It executes LLM chains and AI agents on manual trigger, enabling natural language queries and knowledge retrieval.

name: ProspectLens Company Research Automation
description: Automates company data enrichment by integrating Google Sheets with ProspectLens API using n8n. Retrieves detailed company profiles and updates sheets with firmographic info, funding, traffic, and location, streamlining business research workflows.

name: Company Lookup by Name & Country
description: Automates company data retrieval using n8n and Uproc API. Inputs company name and country, fetches detailed info via 'getCompanyByName' tool, checks if the company exists. Useful for CRM enrichment and business research.

name: Zotero Collection Items Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow to fetch and paginate items from a Zotero user's specified collection using Zotero API with HTTP header authentication. It includes looping for pagination, filtering, and optional field editing, automating retrieval of research references.

name: AI Social Video Generator & Auto Social Posting
description: An automated n8n workflow leveraging Telegram, GPT-4, Kling AI video API, Cloudinary, and Blotato to create AI videos with voice-over and captions, then auto-publish to Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, Threads, Bluesky, and Pinterest.

name: AI TikTok/YouTube Shorts Reel Generator
description: Automates creation of POV short-form videos for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI's Flux & Kling for AI image and video generation, Eleven Labs for voiceover, Creatomate for video rendering, plus Google Sheets/Drive for data and file management.

name: AI Social Video Auto-Creation & Multi-Platform Posting
description: Automates video creation from Telegram prompts or images using AI (GPT-4, Piapi, Blotato), merges voice-over and captions, saves metadata to Google Sheets, and auto-publishes videos to 9 social platforms (Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Threads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Bluesky, Pinterest) via Blotato API.

name: YouTube Video Summaries & Transcripts via Gemini API
description: Automate extraction of YouTube video transcripts, summaries, scene descriptions, and social media clips using Google Gemini API and n8n automation. Easily customize prompts and output for versatile video content analysis and marketing.

name: Animated Story Creation with GPT-4o-mini, Midjourney, Kling & Creatomate
description: Automates creation of animated story videos using GPT-4o-mini for story prompts, Midjourney for images, Kling for video generation, and Creatomate for final video editing. Ideal for generating engaging animated content from text prompts via APIs.

name: AI Chatbot for YouTube Video Summarization
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow that fetches YouTube video details and transcripts via YouTube Data API & youtube-transcript package, then uses OpenAI GPT models for interactive summarization and analysis of video content through chat.

name: Hacker News AI Video Content Generator
description: Automates creating AI-generated video summaries from Hacker News articles using OpenAI for analysis, Leonardo.ai for images, RunwayML and Creatomate for video creation, with uploads to cloud storage and posting on social media platforms.

name: Gemini AI Video Content Analyzer
description: Automate video analysis using Google's Gemini 2.0 API in an n8n workflow. Downloads video from URL, uploads it to Gemini cloud for AI-based detailed visual description generation, useful for marketing, content moderation, accessibility, and cataloging.

name: YouTube Video Summarizer & Telegram Q&A with GPT-4o-mini
description: Automates extracting YouTube video transcripts, segmenting and summarizing them using GPT-4o-mini, storing transcripts on Google Docs, and enabling interactive Q&A about the video via Telegram chat. Uses n8n with YouTube Transcript API, Google Docs API, Telegram API, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini.

name: YouTube Video Analysis with Google Gemini AI
description: n8n workflow that analyzes YouTube videos using Google Generative Language API (Gemini-1.5-flash) to create summaries, transcripts, timestamps, scene descriptions, and viral clip suggestions. It fetches video metadata via YouTube API and stores outputs in Google Drive and email.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that creates an AI chatbot for WhatsApp using WhatsApp API, Google Gemini (PaLM) for multimodal AI (audio, video, image), Langchain AI Agent, and Wikipedia tool integration. It processes and responds to varied message types intelligently.

name: Video Frame Extraction and AI Narration
description: Automates video downloading, frame extraction using OpenCV, script generation with GPT-4 multimodal LLM, and text-to-speech audio creation via OpenAI API. The workflow batches image frames, creates narration scripts, synthesizes voiceovers, and uploads results to Google Drive.

name: Automated 9:16 AI Image & Video Content Creator
description: This n8n workflow automates creating 9:16 aspect ratio short-form video scripts and AI-generated images using Airtable for content management, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for script generation, and Leonardo.ai for prompt improvement and image generation. Perfect for branding and social media content production.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp API with Google Gemini AI and Langchain tools to handle, analyze, and respond to various message types (audio, video, image, text) in WhatsApp chats using AI transcription, summarization, and multimodal content description.

name: Video Frame Narration & Voiceover Generator
description: Automates video narration by downloading a video, extracting frames using OpenCV in Python, generating a script with OpenAI GPT-4 Vision LLM, creating TTS audio, and uploading results to Google Drive. Integrates HTTP, Python, Langchain, OpenAI APIs, and Google Drive.

description: Automate email notifications for new YouTube videos from your subscriptions. Uses YouTube Data API v3 for subscriptions, YouTube RSS for latest videos, filters out shorts, and sends thumbnail-rich emails via SMTP. Runs hourly by default.

name: AutoClip: Auto Video Clip Creator & YouTube Uploader

Uses n8n with Google Drive, Google Sheets, FFmpeg for video processing, and YouTube API for upload. Perfect for creators automating content production.

description: Automates creation of short-form job hunting videos using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI Flux for image generation, Kling for video, ElevenLabs for voiceovers, Creatomate for final rendering, Google Sheets for ideas, and uploads to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn via upload-post.com.

name: Auto Quote Video Creator with PiAPI & ElevenLabs
description: Automates creating cinematic vertical videos with quotes. Uses Google Sheets for input, PiAPI for AI image & video generation, ElevenLabs for ambient audio, FFmpeg for video merging, and uploads final clips to YouTube.

name: YouTube AI Assistant Workflow

It supports channel and video details retrieval, comment analysis, video transcription, thumbnail evaluation, and integrates AI agent conversational tools to help creators optimize and plan content.

name: Auto Video Upload & Caption for Social Media
description: Automates uploading videos from a Google Drive folder to TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube using upload-post.com API. Extracts audio with OpenAI to generate engaging captions, sending error alerts via Telegram. Tech: Google Drive, OpenAI, upload-post.com API, Telegram.

name: Hacker News AI Video Content Creator
description: Automates creating summary videos from Hacker News articles using OpenAI for analysis, Leonardo.ai for image generation, RunwayML and Creatomate for video creation, and uploads results to cloud storages and social platforms.

name: YouTube to SEO Blog Post Automator

description: An n8n workflow using LangChain AI, OpenAI GPT, YouTube API, and custom memory management to help YouTube creators discover trending videos and content patterns in their niche from the last 2 days. It provides insightful analytics with video stats and channels links.

description: Automates analysis of YouTube video details and up to 100 comments using YouTube Data API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and n8n. Generates detailed creator reports with sentiment, themes, engagement, and content suggestions. Saves reports to Google Drive and sends via Gmail.

description: Automates video publishing across Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, Threads, Twitter, Bluesky, and Pinterest using n8n, Google Sheets, and Blotato API. Scheduled to fetch video data, upload it, then post simultaneously to all platforms without manual effort.

name: YouTube Video Chapter Generator
description: Automates generating YouTube video chapters by extracting captions via YouTube API, processing transcripts with Google Gemini AI, and updating video descriptions. Integrates n8n, YouTube OAuth2 API, Google Gemini PaLM model, and Langchain nodes for structured output.

name: Auto Video Upload & Description for TikTok/Instagram
description: Automates video processing by monitoring a Google Drive folder, extracting audio with OpenAI, generating social media descriptions, and uploading to TikTok and Instagram via upload-post.com API. Includes Telegram error alerts.

name: YouTube RSS Feed Notifier with Email & Telegram

description: Automates creating motivational video clips by combining random quotes, video backgrounds, and music stored on Google Drive and Sheets. description: Automates creating cinematic vertical videos with quotes. Uses Google Sheets for input, PiAPI for AI image & video generation, ElevenLabs for ambient audio, FFmpeg for video merging, and uploads final clips to YouTube.
