name: LinkedIn Lead Automation & Enrichment
description: Automates LinkedIn lead generation, data enrichment, and outreach using HDW LinkedIn API, OpenAI GPT-4 for ICP parsing and content summarization, and Google Sheets for data storage. Includes lead scoring, company research, and automated messaging workflows.

name: Vision-Based AI Webpage Scraper with Sheets
description: An advanced n8n workflow integrating Google Sheets, ScrapingBee API, and Google's Gemini-1.5-Pro AI model for vision-based scraping. It extracts structured e-commerce data from webpage screenshots and falls back to HTML scraping if needed, saving data back to Sheets.

name: AI Lead Generator: Google Maps & Website Scraper
description: Automates business lead generation by scraping Google Maps and business websites using Apify actors, enhanced by OpenAI GPT-4o and SerpAPI for fallback data enrichment. Stores organized contact info and business data into Google Sheets for easy access and analysis.

name: Automated Email Reply & Feedback Logger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on receiving emails from specific senders, generates AI-powered replies using OpenAI GPT, sends email responses via Gmail, and logs both original emails and replies into Google Sheets. It also collects user feedback through webhooks to improve response quality.

name: Google Ads Keyword Generator with Search Volumes
description: Automates generation of SEO keywords with monthly search volumes using Google Ads API v18. Integrates n8n with Google Sheets for data storage. Helps SEO and marketing teams find valuable keywords for campaigns with competition and bid metrics.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Lead Outreach
description: Automates social media analysis from LinkedIn and Twitter via RapidAPI, uses OpenAI GPT-4 for personalized cover letter and subject generation, integrates Google Sheets for lead management, and sends customized emails via SMTP. Ideal for marketers and lead gen pros.

name: AI Agent for Automated CV Screening & Sorting
description: Automates screening, sorting, and rating of candidate CV resumes against job descriptions using n8n with Google Drive, Google Docs, Google Sheets, Gmail, and Groq Llama 4 AI model integration. Moves CVs to folders, updates trackers, and sends notifications.

name: Automated Zoom Meeting & Stripe Payment Setup
description: Automates event creation by integrating Zoom for meeting scheduling, Stripe for secure payment processing, and Google Sheets for data management. Sends email notifications via Gmail for presenters and participants, streamlining event setup and participant tracking with no-code automation.

name: Chinese Vocabulary Flashcard Generator
description: Automates vocabulary learning by translating English words to Chinese, generating pinyin and example sentences via OpenAI, retrieving images from Pexels API, and updating Google Sheets and Drive. Uses Google Translate, Langchain AI, Pexels API, and Google Workspace APIs.

name: Telegram Pomodoro Productivity Bot
description: Automates Pomodoro technique sessions via Telegram bot. Uses n8n workflow integrating Telegram API for commands, Google Sheets API for tracking sessions, and JavaScript code for managing user states. Helps schedule focused work and breaks, logging data for productivity insights.

name: AI-Powered Visual Regression Testing Workflow
description: Automates website visual regression testing using Google Sheets for URLs, Apify for screenshots, Google Drive for storage, and Google Gemini AI Vision model for comparing changes. Results generate detailed reports in Linear.app.

name: Invoice Data Extraction & Reconciliation
description: Automates invoice processing by watching Gmail for PDF invoices, uploading them to LlamaParse API for parsing, extracting structured invoice data using OpenAI GPT-3.5, and appending results to Google Sheets for reconciliation. Incorporates label management to avoid duplicate processing.

name: Survey Response Insights Generator
description: Automates detailed insights generation from Google Sheets survey data by vectorizing responses with OpenAI embeddings, clustering with K-means in Qdrant vector store, and summarizing groups via GPT-4. Outputs enriched insights sheet with sentiment analysis.

name: AI Lead Processing & Email Notification System
description: Automates analysis of incoming lead notes, categorizes inquiries, finds appropriate contacts from a database, and generates email notifications. Integrates ERPNext for lead data, OpenAI for NLP analysis, Google Sheets for contact lookup, and Microsoft Outlook API to format/send emails.

name: AI-Powered Dynamic User Interview Workflow
description: Automates AI-driven user interviews using n8n forms, Groq LLM, Redis session management (via Upstash), and Google Sheets for transcript storage. It dynamically asks interview questions, records answers in sessions, and displays transcripts on completion.

name: Auto-Post to 9 Social Platforms
description: Automates video publishing across Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, Threads, Twitter, Bluesky, and Pinterest using n8n, Google Sheets, and Blotato API. Scheduled to fetch video data, upload it, then post simultaneously to all platforms without manual effort.

name: Automated Blog Writer & Publisher
description: An n8n workflow automating blog content creation and publishing. Uses Google Sheets for scheduling/configuration, OpenAI (via OpenRouter) for AI content generation, and WordPress XML-RPC API for posting. Includes data preprocessing, content merging, and status logging to Sheets.

name: Google Sheets to Google Calendar Event Automation
description: Automates creation of Google Calendar events from new rows in Google Sheets using n8n. Integrates Google Sheets API for event data retrieval and Google Calendar API for event creation, including date formatting, event details, and color-coding for efficient event management.

name: Automated GitHub PR Code Review
description: n8n workflow automates GitHub pull request code review using OpenAI GPT-4 for inline comments. It triggers on PR events, fetches code diffs, creates AI review prompts, posts comments, optionally adds labels, and references Google Sheets for best practices.

name: AI Summary Automation for WordPress Posts
description: Automates creating AI-generated summary blocks for WordPress posts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, WordPress REST API, Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. It fetches posts, checks summary existence, generates summaries in HTML bullet format, updates posts, logs data, and alerts teams.

name: AI Company Research & Data Enrichment
description: Automates company info research using n8n with OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, ScrapingBee, and Google Sheets. Extracts data like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, plans, APIs, integrations, and case studies for B2B/B2C markets, enabling scalable enrichment workflows.

name: Tech Radar AI Insight & Sync
description: Automates syncing Tech Radar data from Google Sheets into MySQL and Google Docs, enriches it using Google Gemini embeddings and Pinecone vector store, and provides AI-powered querying via RAG and SQL agents for strategic tech adoption insights across multiple companies.

name: Email Expense Extractor to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of expense data from email receipts using Gmail IMAP and Mindee Receipt OCR API, then appends data to Google Sheets. Ideal for streamlining expense tracking with n8n automation workflow.

name: Event Attendee Automation with Mattermost & Google
description: Automates attendee registration for events using Typeform, Google Sheets, Mattermost chat, Google Calendar, and Gmail. It registers attendees, creates Mattermost accounts, adds them to teams/channels, updates event calendars, and sends confirmation emails.

name: Social Media Post Generator & Twitter Poster
description: Automates social media post creation by fetching content ideas from Google Sheets, generating posts using OpenAI GPT-4, posting to Twitter via Twitter API, and updating Google Sheets with posting info. Integrates Google Sheets, OpenAI, and Twitter APIs.

name: Telegram Receipt Expense Logger
description: Automates expense tracking by parsing receipt images sent via Telegram using Mindee API, logs details to Google Sheets, confirms via Telegram, and sends SMS notification via Twilio. Streamlines receipt management and bookkeeping.

name: AI-Powered Company Data Enrichment Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates company research by leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, and web scraping (ScrapingBee). It enriches Google Sheets rows with structured info like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, API availability, market type, and integrations, running on schedule or manual trigger.

name: ChatGPT Image Generation to Google Drive & Sheets
description: n8n workflow integrates OpenAI GPT-image-1 API for image generation from chat prompts, saves images to Google Drive, and logs images with thumbnails and cost details in Google Sheets for tracking and analysis.

name: Trustpilot Reviews Insight Generator
description: Automates scraping Trustpilot reviews, stores embeddings in Qdrant vector DB, clusters reviews using K-means, summarizes insights via OpenAI GPT-4, and exports results to Google Sheets. Stack: n8n (automation), Trustpilot (reviews), Qdrant (vector DB), OpenAI (LLM), Google Sheets.

name: AI Topic Monitoring with RSS, OpenAI, Slack
description: Automates topic monitoring by fetching RSS feeds from Google Sheets URLs, classifying relevance with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, scraping content via Jina AI, summarizing articles for Slack, and storing metadata in Google Sheets. Ideal for professionals tracking AI-related news.

name: Survey Response Insights Generator
description: Automates in-depth survey analysis by importing Google Sheets responses, vectorizing with OpenAI embeddings, clustering via K-means in Qdrant, and summarizing insights with GPT-4. Exports detailed sentiment and trends back to Sheets for actionable survey insights.

name: AI-Powered User Interview Workflow
description: Automates user interviews with AI-driven question generation and session management using n8n forms, Langchain AI agent (Groq Chat Model), Redis for session storage, and Google Sheets for transcript saving. Efficient tool for scalable qualitative research.

name: AI-Powered Resume & Interview Screening
description: Automates hiring by extracting data from resumes submitted via forms, scoring candidates using Google Gemini LLM, ElevenLabs AI voice interviews, and updating Notion ATS & Google Sheets for holistic candidate evaluation and interview management.

name: AI-Powered WooCommerce Product Import & SEO
description: This n8n workflow automates WooCommerce product creation from Google Sheets, leveraging OpenRouter AI to generate SEO-optimized meta titles and descriptions per product. It updates WooCommerce via API and notifies progress via Telegram.

name: AI-Powered Topic Monitoring & Summarization
description: Automates monitoring of RSS feeds with AI using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for relevance classification and article summarization, Jina AI for content extraction, Google Sheets for data storage, and Slack for delivering formatted summaries. Keeps teams informed about relevant topics efficiently.

name: Shopify to Google Sheets Product Sync
description: Automates syncing Shopify product data (title, tags, description, price) to Google Sheets using Shopify GraphQL API and Google Sheets API. Includes pagination, cursor tracking, daily schedule, and incremental updates for efficient product management.

name: Google Maps Data Scraper with SERPAPI & Sheets
description: Automate scraping of Google Maps data using SERPAPI API in n8n, processing results, removing duplicates, and updating a Google Sheets document with detailed place info like phone, website, ratings, and reviews. Includes scheduling and error handling.

name: Automated API Schema Crawler & Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that automates researching API documentation for services, scraping relevant pages using Apify, extracting REST API operations with Google Gemini LLM, storing data via Qdrant vector DB, and saving results in Google Sheets and Drive. Tech stack: Google Sheets, Google Drive, Apify web scraper, Qdrant vector store, Google Gemini LLM, n8n orchestrator.

name: AI Social Media Publisher from WordPress
description: Automates social media posting from WordPress content using AI-generated, platform-tailored captions and images. Integrates WordPress, Google Sheets, OpenRouter (Gemini 2.0), OpenAI, and APIs for X (Twitter), Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for multi-platform publishing.

name: TechFin Customer Support Automation
description: Automates customer support by integrating Voiceflow, Zendesk, Google Sheets, Google Calendar, and Airtable via n8n workflows. It fetches customer data, creates Zendesk tickets, schedules meetings, and logs transcripts for product analysis, streamlining tech customer success processes.

name: AI Lead Qualification & Notification Automation
description: Automates lead processing by integrating ERPNext, OpenAI GPT, Google Sheets/Docs, and Microsoft Outlook. Uses an AI agent to analyze lead notes, validate inquiries, find relevant contacts, and generate notification emails summarizing customer requests for prompt action.

name: AI-Powered Content Generator & Organizer
description: Automates content creation using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI API, organizing outputs in Google Drive and Google Sheets. Collects user inputs via web form, generates and formats article outlines and sections, uploads docs to Drive, and tracks with Sheets.

name: Spotify Track Archiving & AI Playlist Classifier
description: Automate monthly archiving of Spotify liked tracks into Google Sheets, enrich with Spotify audio features, and classify tracks into playlists using Anthropic Claude 3.5 AI. Integrates Spotify API, Google Sheets, and AI for seamless music organization and historical tracking.

name: WP CF7 Contact Form Auto Response & Classification
description: Automates classification and drafting of responses to WordPress Contact Form 7 inquiries using Google Gemini AI and Gmail API. Saves categorized responses to Google Sheets, streamlining customer support for businesses handling diverse requests.

name: Automated AI CV Screening & Notification
description: This n8n workflow automates candidate CV screening using Google Gemini (PaLM) AI for resume analysis and ratings, sends email confirmations to applicants and notifications to HR, and logs candidate data in Google Sheets. It integrates Gmail, Google Sheets, PDF extraction, and LangChain AI models to streamline HR processes.

name: AI-Powered Scheduled WordPress Blog Publisher
description: Automates generation, scheduling, and publishing of SEO-optimized WordPress blog posts using GPT-4o for content, Pexels API for images, and Google Sheets for data management. Features randomized delay for natural posting cadence.

name: Inbound Order Email Parser to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of purchase orders from Gmail emails using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini via n8n LangChain AI Agent; parses PO number, delivery date, SKUs, quantities, then stores structured data into Google Sheets for order management.

name: Gmail Attachments to Organized Google Drive
description: Automates downloading attachments from filtered Gmail emails, checks and creates company and date-based folders in Google Drive using Google Sheets for whitelist verification. Tech stack: Gmail API, Google Drive API, Google Sheets API via n8n nodes.

name: AI Resume Parsing & Client Usage Billing
description: Self-hosted n8n workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain Code node to parse uploaded resume PDFs into structured JSON. Tracks token usage and costs per client, logs data to Google Sheets, and auto-generates monthly invoices via Gmail. Enables cost monitoring & billing automation for AI document extraction services.

name: Amazon Reviews Analysis & Creative Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates scraping Amazon product reviews using Bright Data API, stores data in Google Sheets, summarizes reviews with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, generates Ads images, and emails media buyers. It leverages Bright Data API, Google Sheets, OpenAI GPT, and Gmail for competitive review analysis and marketing creative generation.

name: n8n AI-Enhanced FAQ Generator from Google Sheets
description: Automates FAQ creation by reading service data from Google Sheets, generating Q&A templates, enhancing answers using OpenAI GPT-4, and saving results as JSON in Google Drive. Supports native, credential-only, and non-native integrations for CMS publishing.

name: Telegram Bot Integration with Payment & Registration
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API to handle various message types (text, photo, file, voice), commands, user registration, and payments via Google Sheets and sub-workflows for registration and payment processing.

name: Ghost Blog to LinkedIn Post Generator
description: Automates extracting latest blog posts from Ghost CMS, cleans content, and uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain AI agent to create professional LinkedIn promotional messages. Outputs results to Google Sheets for easy tracking and sharing.

name: HN Comments Insight Generator
description: Automates extracting, vectorizing, clustering Hacker News story comments using HN API, OpenAI embeddings, Qdrant vector DB, and K-means in Python. Summarizes clustered feedback with GPT-4 and exports insights to Google Sheets.

name: LinkedIn Profile ICP Scoring Automation
description: Automates extraction and scoring of LinkedIn profiles using Airtop AI API and Google Sheets. Extracts detailed personal, professional info and calculates ICP score based on AI interest, technical depth, and seniority. Updates scores back into Google Sheets for easy lead management.

name: Glassdoor Job Listings Scraper with Bright Data
description: Automates job prospecting by scraping Glassdoor job listings via Bright Data API, processes data with OpenAI GPT-4 and LangChain, and stores results in Google Sheets. Includes customizable queries via form triggers for targeted job search automation.

name: Retell Call Data Auto-Saver
description: Automates saving Retell AI call analysis data from webhook into Airtable, Google Sheets, and Notion. Utilizes Retell webhooks, Airtable API, Google Sheets API, and Notion API to store call transcripts, summaries, sentiment, and cost details in structured databases.

name: Google Keep Notes to Google Sheets via AI
description: Automates exporting Google Keep notes stored as JSON files in Google Drive, filters, processes content with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini model via LangChain AI, and appends extracted data to Google Sheets. Uses Google Drive, Google Sheets APIs, and OpenAI for text extraction and data structuring.

name: Daily Exchange Rate Updater to Google Sheets
description: Automates daily retrieval of USD currency exchange rates via ExchangeRate-API, formats data, and updates & archives it in Google Sheets. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request, Code, Google Sheets, and Schedule Trigger nodes for seamless financial data management.

name: Daily Product Hunt Data Fetcher to Google Sheets
description: Automates daily retrieval of today's top Product Hunt posts using Product Hunt GraphQL API, processes product details, resolves website redirects, and stores enriched data into Google Sheets via service account. Built with n8n, HTTP requests, JavaScript code, and Google Sheets integration.

name: Telegram Meal Nutrient Logger
description: Automates logging meal nutrients from Telegram messages (text or voice). Uses Telegram API, OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) for transcription and nutrition analysis, Langchain for structured parsing, and stores data in Google Sheets.

name: Indeed Job Listing Scraper with Bright Data & LLM
description: Automates job search by scraping Indeed listings using Bright Data API. Integrates n8n for workflow, Google Sheets for storage, and OpenAI GPT-4 mini model to assess applicant-job fit. Uses form trigger for search parameters and polls for data readiness.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Ad Copy Generator
description: n8n workflow scraping Trustpilot competitor reviews via Bright Data API, storing results in Google Sheets, filtering negative reviews, summarizing with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and emailing ad copy suggestions for marketing campaigns.

name: Automated Invoice Data Extraction & Reconciliation
description: Automates extraction of invoice data from Gmail PDF attachments using LlamaParse PDF parser, OpenAI GPT-3.5 LLM for structured data extraction, and exports results to Google Sheets. Workflow manages email labeling to prevent duplicates and handles processing status polling.

name: Scheduled Website Uptime Monitor
description: An n8n workflow that checks website statuses every 6 hours using HTTP requests, reads target URLs from Google Sheets, logs uptime events back to Sheets, and sends alerts via Gmail and Slack upon downtime. Uses Google Sheets API, HTTP Request node, Gmail and Slack integrations.

name: Thai Line ChatBot with Google Sheets Memory
description: An automated Thai-language chatbot for LINE using Google Gemini AI and Google Sheets to store and retrieve user conversation history as context memory. Built with n8n, integrating LINE Messaging API, LangChain AI Agent, and Google Sheets API.

name: Zalando Price Monitor & Alert System
description: An n8n workflow that monitors Zalando product prices by scraping product pages, logging price history, updating product info in Google Sheets, and sending email alerts via Gmail when prices drop below user-defined thresholds. Uses Google Sheets API, HTTP Request, and Gmail API.

name: Printify Product Title & Description Updater
description: An automation workflow integrating Printify API, Google Sheets, and OpenAI to update product titles and descriptions. It uses AI to generate engaging ecommerce content following custom brand guidelines, syncing updates when sheet rows change.

name: Automated Alt Text Generator for Web Images
description: n8n workflow extracts images and alt texts from a webpage, then uses OpenAI GPT-4O to generate improved alt text for images with short descriptions. Results are stored and updated in Google Sheets for accessibility enhancement and SEO improvement.

name: Google Maps Lead Extraction to Google Sheets
description: Automates extraction of business leads from Google Maps using Dumpling AI API and logs them into Google Sheets. Includes place details like name, address, rating, website, phone, and booking links. Uses n8n HTTP Request, Split Out, and Google Sheets nodes.

name: Batch Import CSV Files to Google Sheets
description: Automates importing multiple CSV files from a folder into a Google Sheet using n8n. It reads CSVs, removes duplicate users, filters only subscribers, sorts by subscription date, and updates the sheet via Google Sheets API integration.

name: LLM Output Comparison with OpenRouter & Sheets
description: An n8n workflow to compare outputs of two language models via OpenRouter API, displaying results side-by-side in chat and logging them into Google Sheets. Features isolated model memory, supports OpenAI and Vertex AI, enabling manual or automated evaluation.

name: Vision-Based AI Web Scraper with Google Sheets
description: This n8n workflow uses Google Sheets, ScrapingBee API, and Google Gemini-1.5-Pro AI model to extract structured e-commerce data from website screenshots. It falls back to HTML scraping converted to Markdown for accuracy, outputting organized JSON results to Google Sheets.

name: LM Studio Multi-LLM Testing & Analysis
description: Automates testing and comparison of multiple local LLMs via LM Studio server. Uses HTTP requests, LangChain nodes, OpenAI API credentials, and Google Sheets for logging. Analyzes response metrics like readability, word count, and timing for informed LLM evaluation.

name: AI Email Auto-Reply and Feedback Logger
description: Automates email replies using OpenAI GPT via Gmail trigger; stores incoming emails, generated replies, and feedback in Google Sheets for fine-tuning. Utilizes Gmail OAuth2, OpenAI API, and Google Sheets OAuth2 for seamless AI-driven email handling and feedback recording.

name: Dialpad Call to Syncro Ticket Sync
description: An n8n workflow that integrates Dialpad webhook events with Syncro MSP API to sync call data and create/update support tickets automatically. Uses HTTP Request nodes for Syncro API, processes contact/customer data, and logs activities into Google Sheets.

name: Leadfeeder Leads Enrichment & Google Sheets Export
description: Automates lead retrieval from Leadfeeder API, enriches company data using Clearbit API, filters leads by employee count and engagement, and appends or updates results in Google Sheets. Utilizes Leadfeeder, Clearbit, and Google Sheets APIs for B2B lead management.

name: Icypeas Bulk Domain Scan from Google Sheets
description: Automate bulk domain scans using Icypeas API by reading company data from Google Sheets. Uses Google Sheets node, custom JavaScript for API auth with HMAC-SHA1 signing, and HTTP POST request for domain search tasks. Ideal for bulk domain research and verification.

name: G2 Competitor Review Monitor
description: Automates daily monitoring of competitor reviews on G2 using ScrapingBee API for scraping, extracts and converts review data to Markdown, stores results in Google Sheets, and sends new review alerts to Slack for real-time team updates.

name: Bulk CSV Contact Upload to Airtable
description: Automates bulk upload of contacts from CSV files into Airtable using Airtable API, CSV parsing, and file download. Tracks upload status (Processing, Uploaded, Failed) and integrates with Airtable Interface and Google Sheets templates.

name: Daily Crunchbase Fundraising to Google Sheets
description: Automates daily retrieval of recent Series A, B, and Seed fundraising data from Piloterr API (Crunchbase data) and enriches with company info. Data is processed and updated in Google Sheets. Uses n8n, Piloterr API, and Google Sheets integration for startup funding tracking.

name: AI Agent for Google Sheets Customer Queries
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Google Sheets API to create an AI agent that answers complex customer data queries by selectively retrieving column names, column values, or customer rows from a Google Sheet. Supports dynamic data fetching to handle large datasets efficiently.

name: Automated Customer Email Sender via Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow automating personalized Gmail email sending by retrieving customer message details from Google Sheets, filtering data by status and current date, sending emails using Gmail API, and updating the sheet with send status for organized outreach campaigns.

name: LinkedIn Email Finder & Enricher via Google Sheets
description: Automates enriching LinkedIn profile data by fetching contact details using Prospeo.io LinkedIn Email Finder API, triggered on schedule, reading/writing Google Sheets for scalable contact info updates with fields like email, name, gender, job title, skills, education, and picture.

name: PayCaptain Employee MCP Server
description: n8n workflow creates an MCP server for PayCaptain payroll, enabling employee search, lookup, and updates via the PayCaptain API. Uses MCP Server Trigger, HTTP Request, Google Sheets (for logs), and LangChain tool workflows. Ideal for payroll automation with audit logging.

name: AI-Driven Google Sheets Data Analyst
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain AI Agent, and Google Sheets API to analyze and query transaction data via chat. It filters by date, status, and product using Google Sheets OAuth, enabling dynamic, AI-powered data insights and calculations.

name: EU Sustainability Legislative Scraper & Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes EU parliamentary legislative procedures from an official site, uses OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo to classify sustainability-related items, records filtered results in Google Sheets, and creates Google Tasks for study reminders. Tech stack: HTTP request, HTML parsing, OpenAI API, Google Sheets, Google Tasks.

name: Lead Qualification in Google Sheets via GPT-4
description: Automates lead qualification by monitoring Google Sheets for new entries, using OpenAI GPT-4 (chat model) to evaluate leads based on business criteria, and updating the sheet with a rating. Integrates Google Sheets API and OpenAI's GPT-4 for seamless lead scoring.

name: Auto Google Doc Summarizer to Sheets
description: Automates summarizing new Google Docs uploaded to a Drive folder using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI and logs summaries with metadata into Google Sheets for easy management. Integrates Google Drive, Docs, Sheets APIs and Langchain AI tools for streamlined document insights.

name: Location-Based Work Attendance Logger
description: Automates work attendance tracking by logging check-in/check-out times via iPhone location-triggered webhooks to Google Sheets using Google Drive and Sheets APIs.

name: Email Verification Waitlist Automation
description: Automates user registration with email verification for a waitlist using n8n. Integrates Google Sheets for data storage, SMTP for sending verification codes, and n8n Forms for user input and validation, ensuring secure and organized waitlist management.

name: Multi-Step Newsletter Signup & Survey
description: This n8n workflow captures newsletter signups and further user details via chained multi-page forms, storing data in Google Sheets and sending Slack alerts. Tech stack: n8n built-in Form and FormTrigger nodes, Google Sheets API, Slack API. Ideal for onboarding and lead capture.

name: Google Search Console Data to Google Sheets
description: Automates fetching Google Search Console data (queries, pages, dates) using Google OAuth2 API, processes it in n8n, and updates Google Sheets reports regularly to track SEO metrics like clicks, impressions, CTR, and position.

name: Social Media Lead Analyzer & Email Generator
description: Automates lead outreach by extracting LinkedIn and Twitter posts via RapidAPI, analyzes data using OpenAI GPT-4, and generates personalized HTML cover letters sent via SMTP. Integrates Google Sheets for lead data and tracking, ideal for marketers and sales pros.

name: SuiteCRM Drive-To-Store Lead Automation
description: Automates lead generation for drive-to-store campaigns by integrating Google Sheets, SuiteCRM API (OAuth2), and webhooks. Checks duplicates, assigns coupons, and updates leads with custom fields to streamline CRM workflows.

name: YouTube AI News Playlist Creator
description: Automates daily creation of YouTube playlists from AI news channels using Google Sheets for channel management, YouTube API to fetch recent videos, and Telegram for notifications. Deletes previous playlists to keep updates fresh and organized.

name: Google Form Quiz Certificate Automation
description: Automates certificate generation for quiz takers using Google Forms (quiz mode), Google Sheets, Google Slides, Drive, and Gmail. It triggers on new form responses, evaluates scores, creates personalized certificates from a Slides template, converts them to PDF, and emails them to users.

name: CallForge AI Sales Call Processor
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gong API, Notion, Google Sheets, and OpenAI to automate extraction, enrichment, and processing of sales call transcripts for actionable insights and error correction in Gong calls.

name: Slack Water Drinking Reminder with AI Motivate
description: Automates water intake reminders via Slack using Google Sheets for logging, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for personalized motivational messages, and iOS shortcuts integration. Encourages healthy hydration with friendly AI-generated advice and tracks drinking habits.

name: ICP Company Scoring Automation
description: Automates Ideal Customer Profile scoring by extracting company data from Google Sheets, analyzing LinkedIn data via Airtop AI, and updating scores back to the sheet. Tech stack includes Google Sheets API and Airtop AI for detailed LinkedIn company profile analysis and scoring.

name: Shopify Customers to Google Sheets Exporter
description: Automates fetching Shopify customers via Shopify API, handles pagination, and appends/upserts customer data (email, first name, last name, ID) to a Google Sheets document. Uses n8n with Shopify API, Google Sheets OAuth2, JavaScript for pagination parsing.

name: AI-Powered HR CV Processing & Evaluation
description: Automates HR recruitment by extracting candidate info from PDF CVs via LangChain AI, evaluating fit against job criteria, and storing results in Google Sheets. Uses n8n workflow, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Google Drive, and Sheets APIs for streamlined candidate management.

name: Company Data Enrichment with OpenAI & Google Sheets
description: Workflow enriches company data from Google Sheets using ScrapingBee for homepage scraping and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for extracting business insights. It updates sheets with company business areas, offers, models, and ideal customer profiles automatically.

name: Amazon Product Price Tracker
description: Automates tracking Amazon product prices using ScrapeOps API, logging data to Google Sheets, calculating price changes, and sending alert emails when prices cross thresholds. Utilizes n8n workflow with Google Sheets, ScrapeOps HTTP API, and SMTP email integration.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Sentiment Analyzer
description: Automates scraping Trustpilot reviews using DeepSeek API, extracts detailed review info, analyzes sentiment via OpenAI, and stores results on Google Sheets for easy tracking and analysis.

name: Trustpilot Review Scraper & Sentiment Analyzer
description: Automates scraping of Trustpilot reviews using DeepSeek API, extracts detailed review info, analyzes sentiment with OpenAI, and stores results in Google Sheets. Ideal for companies monitoring customer feedback and sentiment analysis.

name: RetellAI Automated Lead Call & Scheduling
description: Automates outbound lead qualification calls and inbound appointment scheduling using RetellAI. Integrates Google Sheets (lead tracking), Twilio (SMS reminders), OpenAI GPT-4 (call summarization), and Gmail (email notifications) to streamline call workflows and post-call updates.

name: EU Sustainability News Daily Digest
description: Automates daily scraping of EU news, classifies sustainability articles using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain, records results in Google Sheets, and sends a curated HTML email digest via Gmail. Integrates HTTP Request, HTML parsing, AI classification, Sheets, and Gmail nodes for sustainable news curation.

name: Weekly SSL Expiry Monitoring & Alert
description: Automates weekly SSL certificate checks for URLs listed in Google Sheets using ssl-checker.io API and sends alert emails via Gmail if expiry is within 7 days. Built with n8n, Google Sheets API, ssl-checker.io, and Gmail API for proactive SSL management.

name: Automated Product Photo Enhancement & Storage
description: An n8n workflow that downloads product images from Google Sheets, uses OpenAI GPT models to analyze and create AI-generated professional product photography prompts, edits images with OpenAI's image editing API, then uploads results to Google Drive and updates the sheet. Tech stack: n8n, OpenAI GPT-4 & GPT-4O, OpenAI Image Edit API, Google Sheets, Google Drive.

name: HubSpot CRM Data Import via CSV
description: Automates importing CSV data into HubSpot CRM objects (companies, contacts, deals, leads, tickets) with field mapping and validation. Uses HubSpot API, Google Sheets for property management, and n8n for workflow orchestration.

name: Reddit Business Lead Finder & Summarizer
description: Automates extraction of Reddit posts from Entrepreneur subreddit using Reddit API, filters posts by engagement and recency, uses OpenRouter GPT-4.1 AI to identify business opportunities and summarize them, then appends results to Google Sheets for lead management.

name: Restaurant Order Chatbot to Google Sheets
description: Automates restaurant order taking via AI chat using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain. Extracts item names, quantities, and table numbers from chats, verifies input, then logs each order item with timestamp into Google Sheets for POS integration.

name: Daily Automated Customer Win-Back Offers
description: An n8n workflow that daily fetches customer churn risk data from Google Sheets, filters high-risk non-campaign customers, and uses Google Gemini (PaLM) AI to generate personalized win-back offers. It logs activity in Sheets and sends offers via Gmail for customer retention.

name: Automated Blog Post Creator for WordPress
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Sheets, OpenAI (OpenRouter), and WordPress XML-RPC API to automate blog post drafting, updating, and publishing based on a scheduled spreadsheet. Uses dynamic prompts and manages status logs for seamless content creation.

name: Form Data to Google Sheets & Airtable Pipeline
description: Automates data collection from an n8n form, extracting date/time, formatting inputs, saving to Google Sheets and Airtable, and sending personalized emails via Gmail. Utilizes n8n workflow with Form Trigger, Code node, Google Sheets, Airtable, and Gmail integrations.

name: AI-Powered Resume Review & Google Sheets Logging
description: Automates resume submission, extraction, and evaluation using a form, Google Drive, PDF text extraction, OpenAI GPT-4, and Google Sheets for record keeping. It extracts personal info and qualifications, summarizes candidate profiles, assigns HR ratings, and logs results for streamlined hiring.

name: JPG/PNG to WEBP Image Converter
description: Automates conversion of JPG and PNG images to WEBP using APYHub API. Retrieves image URLs from Google Sheets, converts images, uploads results to Google Drive. Tech stack: APYHub API, Google Sheets and Google Drive integrations, n8n workflow automation.

name: SSL Certificate Expiry Alert System
description: Automates weekly monitoring of SSL certificates for URLs listed in Google Sheets using SSL-Checker.io API. Updates sheet with validity and expiry info, and sends alerts via Gmail and Telegram for expiring or invalid certificates, ensuring proactive SSL management.

name: eCommerce Contact Form Text Classifier
description: Automates classification of contact form messages for eCommerce using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for text classification, Google Sheets for data storage, and SMTP for email notifications to respective departments (quotes, orders, etc.).

name: LINE to Google Drive File Upload & Logger
description: Automates saving files from LINE Messaging API to Google Drive with folder organization by date and file type. Logs file metadata to Google Sheets. Utilizes LINE API, Google Drive API, and Google Sheets API within n8n workflow for seamless file handling and user reply.

name: Doctor Appointment Booking Assistant
description: An AI-powered virtual assistant workflow that automates medical appointment scheduling for Dr. Hakim using OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, and Google Sheets. It handles patient interaction, checks availability, books slots, and logs data efficiently.

name: Email Invoice & Payment Extractor with LLM
description: Automates extraction of transaction details from labeled Gmail invoices and payment emails using n8n. Uses Gmail API triggers, PDF extraction, HTML parsing, Google Gemini and Groq LLMs with structured output parsers, then logs data to Google Sheets for finance management.

name: WhatsApp Business Appointment Bot
description: An n8n workflow automating WhatsApp appointment notifications and user message handling. Uses WhatsApp Business API, Google Sheets, and scheduled triggers to manage user opt-in, send templated messages, receive and reply to messages, and update statuses seamlessly.

name: Obsidian Notes to Podcast Feed Automation
description: Automates turning Obsidian notes into a podcast feed using OpenAI TTS for audio, Cloudinary for storage, and Google Sheets for episode metadata. Generates an RSS podcast feed compatible with major platforms. Integrates Obsidian, OpenAI, Cloudinary, Google Sheets, and n8n.

name: Printify Product Title & Description Updater
description: An n8n workflow automating product title and description updates for Printify shops using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini. Integrates Printify API, Google Sheets for trigger and record keeping, and AI-powered content generation to enhance eCommerce product listings efficiently.

name: Lead Capture & Validation Workflow
description: Automates capturing form leads with n8n Form Trigger, validates emails via Hunter API, updates Google Sheets, and notifies via Gmail and Discord webhook. Ensures authentic lead data management with seamless integration of form, email verification, spreadsheet, and messaging services.

name: Telegram-Based Delivery Tracking Assistant
description: Automates shipment tracking via Telegram bot integration, guiding drivers through delivery number input, GPS location sharing, photo uploads, and sends confirmations via Gmail. Uses Telegram API, Google Drive, Google Sheets, and Gmail within n8n workflow for logistics management.

name: Competitor Pricing Monitor & Alert System
description: Automates monitoring competitor pricing by fetching URLs from Google Sheets, using Airtop AI to summarize and compare pricing plans, filters changes, updates the sheet, and sends Slack alerts. Integrates Google Sheets API, Airtop AI, and Slack API.

name: Telegram AI Meetup Scheduler
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram bot with OpenRouter LLM and Google Sheets API to provide AI-driven meetup scheduling assistance. It processes chat inputs, retrieves schedules from Google Sheets, converts them to markdown, and responds intelligently via Telegram.

name: Exponential Backoff Retry for Google APIs
description: This n8n workflow implements an exponential backoff strategy to handle rate limits and errors when interacting with Google APIs (e.g., Google Sheets). It uses n8n nodes including Google Sheets API via service account, code node for backoff logic, wait node for delays, and error handling to retry up to 5 times with increasing delays.

name: Shopify Orders to Google Sheets Sync
description: Automates retrieving Shopify store orders using Shopify API, handles pagination with page_info, and appends/upserts order data (id, note, email, processed_at) into Google Sheets via Google Sheets API. Includes scheduling and manual triggers.

name: Squarespace to Mailchimp Contact Sync
description: Automates adding Squarespace newsletter signups to Mailchimp audience using Google Sheets and Mailchimp APIs. Scheduled or manual triggers ensure new contacts sync despite Squarespace-Mailchimp limitations, improving newsletter audience management.

name: Telegram Chinese Vocabulary Tutor Bot
description: An n8n workflow automating a Telegram bot to tutor users in Chinese vocabulary using Google Sheets for word lists, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain for interactive MCQs, with session memory and feedback. Ideal for language learners.

name: Automated Resume Screener from Gmail to Sheets
description: This n8n workflow automates screening resumes received as email attachments in Gmail. It extracts PDF text, uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Langchain to analyze and score resumes, extracts contact info, and saves results to a Google Sheets document. Tech stack: Gmail API, Google Sheets API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain integration.

name: Lead Capture & WhatsApp CRM Automation
description: An n8n workflow automating lead capture via webhook, logging leads in Google Sheets, adding contacts to FluentCRM via its API, sending welcome emails, and WhatsApp messages using Whinta API, then updating CRM tags. Streamlines lead nurturing for small businesses using Google Sheets, FluentCRM, SMTP, and Whinta.

name: Web Scraper & Product Extractor with GPT-4
description: Automates scraping product data via Brightdata API, cleans HTML, and extracts structured info using OpenRouter GPT-4.1 and Langchain parsers, storing results in Google Sheets. Ideal for e-commerce and market research workflows.

name: Clockify to Syncro Time Tracker Sync
description: Automates time entry synchronization from Clockify to Syncro MSP using n8n. It captures time tracking data via webhook, matches users, updates or creates timers on Syncro via API, and logs entries in Google Sheets. Tech stack: Clockify API, Syncro MSP API, Google Sheets, n8n workflow automation.

name: Google Sheets to Mautic Contact Sync
description: Automates syncing contacts from Google Sheets to Mautic CRM every 5 minutes using Google Sheets API and Mautic API via n8n workflow.

name: Google Sheets to Orbit Member Sync
description: Sync and upsert member and activity data from Google Sheets to Orbit workspace using Google Sheets API and Orbit API integration in n8n. Automates community metrics management with OAuth2 authentication and data merging by GitHub usernames.

name: Google Sheets to Mattermost Alert
description: Automates monitoring of a Google Sheet using OAuth2, checks for new entries every 45 minutes, and sends real-time Mattermost notifications with new data details. Utilizes n8n workflow nodes: Google Sheets API, custom JavaScript function, interval trigger, and Mattermost API.

name: Telegram AI Chatbot with Multi-Session Management
description: An AI-powered Telegram chatbot workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and Langchain for conversational AI, integrated with Google Sheets for multi-session management, command handling (/new, /current, /resume, /summary, /question), and context-based memory. Enables robust user chat experience via Telegram API.

name: AI Summary Generator for WordPress Posts
description: Automates adding AI-generated summaries to WordPress posts using OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. Converts post HTML to Markdown, classifies summarized content, updates posts via WP REST API, and logs activity efficiently.

name: AI-Powered HR CV Processing & Evaluation
description: Automates job application processing: candidates submit CVs via a form, PDFs are extracted, AI extracts qualifications and personal data using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, evaluates fit against a company profile, and logs results to Google Sheets. Integrates Google Drive and Sheets APIs.

name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates sentiment classification of customer feedback using an OpenAI API with form input, then logs categorized responses into Google Sheets for easy tracking and analysis.

name: Automated YouTube to X Post Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates fetching the latest YouTube videos, uses OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI to generate engaging X (Twitter) posts under 220 characters, and posts them automatically via the X API. It also logs posts in Google Sheets and supports Slack, Discord, and Gmail notifications.

name: Line Pay Slip Text Extractor with Gemini AI
description: An n8n workflow integrating LINE Messaging API, Google Gemini AI, and Google Sheets to extract and classify text from pay slip images or text messages. It auto-analyzes images with Gemini 2.0, parses key payment details, replies via LINE, and logs data into Google Sheets.

name: Webflow Form to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates capturing form submissions from Webflow via webhook, processes data with custom JS, and appends it to Google Sheets. Uses Webflow API, Google Sheets API, and n8n code node for seamless form data archival and timestamping.

name: Colombian Electronic Invoice Processor
description: Automates extraction and organization of Colombian electronic invoices from Gmail ZIP attachments. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via LangChain to parse PDF and XML invoice data, validates totals, saves PDFs to Google Drive, and logs details in Google Sheets for easy tracking.

name: Slack Ideas to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates idea collection from Slack via a slash command (/idea), storing submissions in Google Sheets. Utilizes Slack API for command triggers, Google Sheets API for data storage, and n8n webhook and workflow nodes for integration and automation.

name: Sync Customer Data to Google Sheets
description: Automates fetching customer data via n8n's Customer Datastore node, transforms fields using Set node, and upserts records into Google Sheets with OAuth2 API. Ideal for keeping customer info updated and organized in spreadsheets effortlessly.

name: Gumroad Sales to MailerLite & CRM Automation
description: Automates post-purchase workflows by capturing Gumroad sales, adding customers to MailerLite email groups for automated sequences, and logging sales data to Google Sheets CRM. Uses Gumroad webhook, MailerLite API, and Google Sheets API to streamline customer onboarding and sales tracking.

name: Typeform Feedback Collector
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Typeform feedback submissions, filters responses by usefulness score, and logs positive and negative feedback separately into Google Sheets using OAuth2 for authentication.

name: LinkedIn Profile Finder with Boolean Search
description: An n8n workflow that generates Boolean search strings using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI from job descriptions, performs authenticated Google searches, extracts LinkedIn profile URLs, and appends results to Google Sheets for sourcing candidates efficiently.

name: Google Sheets to Dropbox XLS Exporter
description: Automates exporting Google Sheets data to an XLS file and uploads it to Dropbox every 15 minutes. Uses Google Sheets API, n8n spreadsheet conversion, and Dropbox API to keep backups or share spreadsheet updates seamlessly.

name: Weekly Shopify Sales Report Automation
description: Automates weekly extraction of Shopify orders, calculates total orders and revenue, records data in Google Sheets, and posts a summary to a Slack channel. Uses Shopify API, Google Sheets API via OAuth2, Slack API, and n8n Cron trigger.

name: Email Enrichment & Lemlist Lead Import
description: Automates lead enrichment using Dropcontact API with data from Google Sheets, then imports enriched leads into Lemlist for email campaigns. Uses Google Sheets OAuth2, Dropcontact for contact verification, and Lemlist API to streamline B2B outreach.

name: Image Labeling & Cataloging Workflow
description: Automates image search via Google Custom Search API, analyzes image content with AWS Rekognition, and saves image titles, links, and detected labels to Google Sheets. Utilizes HTTP Requests, AWS Rekognition, and Google Sheets APIs for efficient image metadata extraction and storage.

name: Weekly Google Sheets to MySQL Importer
description: Automates weekly data import from Google Sheets to MySQL using Cron scheduling, Google Sheets API with OAuth2 for authentication, and MySQL node for insertion. Ideal for syncing spreadsheet data into a database automatically.

name: Bulk Email Verification with Icypeas & Google Sheets

description: This n8n workflow reads data from a Google Sheets spreadsheet using Google Sheets API, converts the data into a Bootstrap-styled HTML table using a custom function, and serves it as an HTML response via a webhook. Ideal for dynamic table generation from sheet data.

description: Automates syncing companies and contacts from a Google Sheet into Salesforce. Uses Google Sheets API and Salesforce API to read, search, create, and update accounts and contacts based on sheet data, ensuring no duplicates. Ideal for CRM data automation.

description: Automates extraction of company info from domains listed in Google Sheets. Uses HTTP requests, HTML extraction, OpenAI for AI-driven value proposition, industry, market & audience classification, then updates Sheet. Tech: Google Sheets API, OpenAI API, n8n nodes.

Includes manual trigger and data mapping via Set node.

name: Google Sheets to Discord Message Notifier
description: Automates sending updated Google Sheets rows as formatted ASCII tables to a Discord channel using Google Sheets API, a custom JavaScript code node, and Discord webhooks. Ideal for real-time collaborative update notifications.

name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates capturing customer feedback via an n8n form, analyzes sentiment using OpenAI API, merges results with form data, and appends entries to Google Sheets. Integrates n8n formTrigger, OpenAI sentiment classification, and Google Sheets for streamlined feedback management.

name: Google Sheets to Mailchimp Subscriber Sync
description: Automates syncing email addresses from a Google Sheets range to a Mailchimp mailing list. Utilizes Google Sheets and Mailchimp APIs within n8n, triggered at set intervals to keep subscriber lists updated seamlessly.

name: AI Agent for Interactive Google Sheets Chat

description: n8n workflow automates posting tweets by fetching texts from a Google Sheets document every 6 hours and posting them on X (Twitter) via API. It uses Google Sheets OAuth2 for reading and deleting rows and Twitter OAuth2 for posting tweets, enabling scheduled social media updates.

name: Google Sheets Data Management Workflow

name: YouTube Video URLs Sync to Google Sheets
description: Automates fetching YouTube video URLs from channel IDs stored in Google Sheets using YouTube Data API, then updates another Google Sheet with video titles, URLs, and publish dates. Built with n8n, Google Sheets API, and YouTube API for streamlined content tracking.

name: AI-Powered CV Screening Automation
description: Automates CV submission and screening for Software Engineer roles using n8n, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI for resume analysis, Gmail for notifications, and Google Sheets for candidate tracking. Streamlines HR processes with AI-driven candidate compatibility ratings and email alerts.

description: An n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI's GPT via LangChain to parse natural language expense entries from chat, convert them to structured JSON, and append them to a Google Sheets expense tracker. Integrates AI chat triggers, memory, and Google Sheets API for seamless expense logging.

description: Automates feedback summarization from Google Sheets form responses using n8n workflow. Integrates Google Sheets API to fetch data, OpenAI GPT-4 to generate summaries, Markdown-to-HTML conversion, and Gmail API to send summary reports via email.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Survey Bot with Redis & Google Sheets

name: Automated Online List Builder

name: Squarespace Orders to Google Sheets Sync
description: Automates retrieval of all Squarespace orders using Squarespace Commerce API and logs detailed order info into a Google Sheets spreadsheet via Google Sheets API. Supports filtering, pagination, and updates with an easy editable global config node.

name: Email to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates saving incoming Gmail emails into Google Sheets as new rows, capturing sender, subject, and snippet. Uses Gmail Trigger and Google Sheets API via OAuth2. Ideal for email logging, lead tracking, and structured email record-keeping.

name: XML to Google Sheets Data Importer
description: Automates downloading XML data from a URL, parses it, and imports the structured data into a new Google Sheets spreadsheet. Uses n8n with HTTP Request, XML, and Google Sheets nodes. Ideal for converting XML feeds to spreadsheets effortlessly.

description: An n8n workflow automating email campaigns using Gmail API and Google Sheets. It sends sequences of personalized emails with placeholders, follows up based on thread replies, and updates contact status in Sheets. Supports scheduling, weekend skipping, and multi-step email sequencing.

name: Squarespace to Shopify Customer Sync via Google Sheets
description: Automates conversion of Squarespace profile data to Shopify customer format using Google Sheets for data handling. Uses n8n webhook to receive submissions, processes data in batches, and updates Shopify customers and Squarespace profiles in Google Sheets seamlessly.

name: LINE BOT Receipt OCR to Google Sheets
description: Automates receipt image processing from LINE chat by extracting text via OCR Space API, then parsing transaction info. Uses LINE Messaging API, Google Drive for storage, and Google Sheets for recording data, enabling efficient financial record keeping.

name: Google Maps Email Scraper
description: An n8n workflow automating email extraction from Google Maps business listings. It uses HTTP requests to search Google Maps for queries, scrapes URLs and emails with regex, filters duplicates and irrelevant data, and saves results to Google Sheets.

name: Squarespace Blog to Google Sheets Sync
description: Automates fetching blog and event collections from a Squarespace site via HTTP API with pagination, and appends or updates the data in Google Sheets using Google Sheets OAuth2. Scheduled or manual trigger allows easy syncing of blog content to spreadsheets.

name: Random User Data to Google Sheets & CSV
description: Fetches random user data via the RandomUser API, extracts name and country, then appends it to a Google Sheets spreadsheet using OAuth2 authentication and also exports the data as a CSV file. Utilizes HTTP Request, Google Sheets, and Spreadsheet File nodes in n8n.

name: Auto Website Screenshot from Google Sheets
description: This n8n workflow triggers on new rows added in a Google Sheets document containing URLs. It captures website screenshots using a custom PDF Toolkit node and stores the images in a specified Google Drive folder. Useful for automated visual content archiving.

name: TwentyCRM Event Notifications to Email & Slack
description: An n8n workflow that receives event triggers from TwentyCRM via webhook, filters and logs event data to Google Sheets, and sends notifications to Gmail or Slack channels based on event type (e.g. deletion events emailed, others sent to Slack).

name: SyncroMSP Call Timer Sync
description: Automates call duration logging to SyncroMSP by syncing webhook call data with Google Sheets to find matching tickets, then adds timer entries via SyncroMSP API. Uses n8n, Google Sheets API, webhooks, and HTTP requests for efficient call tracking.

name: Random User Data to Sheets & Email
description: Automates fetching random user data from randomuser.me API, formats it, appends to Google Sheets via OAuth2, converts data to CSV and JSON files, saves locally, and emails JSON file using Gmail API. Integrates HTTP Request, Google Sheets, File, and Gmail nodes in n8n.

name: Weekly MySQL to Google Sheets Export
description: Automates weekly data export from a MySQL database to Google Sheets using n8n. Triggers every week at 5am, queries all records from 'books' table, and appends them to a specified Google Sheet via OAuth2 authentication.

name: Google Sheets Row Processing Automation
description: An n8n workflow that reads rows from a Google Sheets document every 5 minutes, checks if rows are unprocessed, executes actions on new data, marks them processed with timestamps. Utilizes Google Sheets API with OAuth2 for automatic data management.

name: Image Text Extraction and Logging Workflow
description: Automates downloading an image, extracting embedded text using AWS Rekognition OCR, processing the text with custom logic, and appending results to Google Sheets. Uses AWS Rekognition API, HTTP Request node, and Google Sheets API with OAuth2 for easy text extraction and data logging.

name: JSON to Google Sheets Append
description: Automates reading a local JSON file and appending its data to a Google Sheets spreadsheet using OAuth2 authentication. Utilizes n8n's Read Binary File, Move Binary Data, and Google Sheets nodes to streamline data synchronization.

name: Postgres to Google Sheets Lead Sync
description: Automates syncing qualified lead data from a PostgreSQL database to Google Sheets, filtering out internal emails. Uses Postgres Trigger, Filter, and Google Sheets nodes in n8n to enable real-time or manual lead data export for easy tracking and contact management.

name: Google Sheets to HTML Exporter
description: Automates exporting data from Google Sheets to an HTML file using n8n workflow. Utilizes Google Sheets API via OAuth2 credentials and n8n's spreadsheet file node to convert sheet data into an HTML document triggered by a webhook.

name: Book Info Scraper to Google Sheets
description: This n8n workflow scrapes book data from a website using HTTP request with Jina AI, extracts details via OpenAI-powered Langchain, and saves structured info (title, price, availability, image, link) into Google Sheets. Tech stack: n8n, Jina AI, OpenAI, Google Sheets API.

name: n8n Invite Users from Google Sheets
description: Automates inviting users to an n8n instance by syncing email addresses from a Google Sheet with existing n8n users. Uses Google Sheets API, n8n API, and supports pagination and scheduled or manual triggers for updates.

name: Session Feedback Reminder via Mattermost
description: Automates scheduled feedback requests by fetching session details from Google Sheets and posting a customized message with a feedback link to a Mattermost channel using n8n automation.

name: Bulk Telegram Message Sender from Google Sheets
description: Automates sending messages via Telegram bot to multiple chat IDs listed in a Google Sheets column. Utilizes Google Sheets API for data retrieval, Telegram API for messaging, batching with SplitInBatches, and timed delays to avoid flooding. Ideal for broadcast messaging.

name: Book Data Scraper to Google Sheets
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes book details from a website using HTTP request to Jina.ai endpoint, extracts structured info with OpenAI-powered Langchain nodes, and appends data (title, price, availability, image, link) into Google Sheets. Automates product price tracking.

name: Telegram Meetup Scheduler AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API, Google Sheets, and OpenRouter AI to provide meetup scheduling assistance. It fetches schedule data from Google Sheets, converts it to markdown, and uses LangChain with OpenRouter for AI-powered chat responses on Telegram.

name: n8n Keyword-Based Community Topic Tracker
description: Automates tracking of new topics matching a keyword on the n8n community forum using n8n workflows. Integrates HTTP API requests to n8n community search, Google Sheets for data storage, and optional Slack and email notifications. Ideal for monitoring community discussions.

name: CRM Contact Data to Spreadsheet
description: Automates loading mock HubSpot CRM contacts into a spreadsheet-like system. Uses n8n's manual trigger and function nodes to format data, ready for integration with Google Sheets, Airtable, or databases.

name: Google Sheets Data Fetch via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that exposes a webhook to fetch data from a Google Sheets spreadsheet (range A:D on 'Problems' sheet) via Google Sheets API. It enables integration of external apps with spreadsheet data retrieval through HTTP requests.

name: Instagram Stats Daily Report to Mattermost
description: Automates daily reporting of Instagram statistics using Google Sheets for data storage, formats date with n8n DateTime node, and posts formatted stats to Mattermost channel via API for team updates.

name: Telegram Journal Reply to Google Sheets
description: Automates saving Telegram reply messages as journal entries into a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Utilizes Telegram Trigger to capture replies, a Function node to parse message content, and Google Sheets API to append entries. Ideal for personal journaling via Telegram.

name: Append Data to Google Sheets Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that appends predefined data to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet using OAuth2 authentication. It triggers manually, sets data values, appends them to the sheet, and reads back the updated data, ideal for simple data entry automation with Google Sheets.

name: Periodic Google Sheets Sync
description: Automates syncing data within the same Google Sheets document every 2 minutes using n8n's Cron trigger and Google Sheets API nodes. It reads data from a specified range and updates two sheet areas simultaneously, ensuring data consistency and automation.

name: Retell Dynamic Variable Populator
description: An n8n workflow that handles Retell AI inbound call webhooks. It uses a POST webhook filtered by IP, fetches user data from Google Sheets by phone number, and returns dynamic variables for Retell voice agents. Uses Google Sheets API and webhook nodes.

name: AI TikTok/YouTube Shorts Reel Generator
description: Automates creation of POV short-form videos for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI's Flux & Kling for AI image and video generation, Eleven Labs for voiceover, Creatomate for video rendering, plus Google Sheets/Drive for data and file management.

name: AI Event Banner Generator with BannerBear
description: Automates creating event banners by capturing details via n8n form, generating images with OpenAI DALL·E 3, optimizing uploads on Cloudinary, designing banners using BannerBear templates, and posting to Discord channels. Uses n8n workflow for seamless event promotion.

name: AI-Powered Appointment Scheduling with Approval
description: Automate appointment requests processing with n8n multi-step forms, OpenAI AI text classification and summarisation, Gmail approval workflow, and Google Calendar integration for scheduling events. Provides user-friendly form UX and admin approval via email.

name: AI-Powered Job Application Automation
description: This n8n workflow automates job applications by accepting CV PDFs via form upload, using OpenAI LLM and text classification to validate and extract relevant candidate data based on a job posting, and saving to Airtable ATS. It enables a two-step form process with AI-assisted prefill and validation.

name: Social Media Multi-Platform Publisher
description: Automates posting photos/videos on TikTok, X, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Threads, LinkedIn via Upload-Post.com API. Uses n8n form trigger for uploads, then posts media with captions. Includes success/error feedback forms to users.

name: AI Job Hunt POV Video Creator
description: Automates creation of short-form job hunting videos using OpenAI for captions & scripts, PiAPI Flux for image generation, Kling for video, ElevenLabs for voiceovers, Creatomate for final rendering, Google Sheets for ideas, and uploads to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn via upload-post.com.

name: AI-Powered Job Application with CV Parsing
description: n8n workflow automates job applications by processing PDF CV uploads via form triggers, classifying documents with OpenAI, extracting relevant data using LLMs contextualized by job posts, and storing details including PDF in Airtable ATS. Includes multi-step user form with AI-assisted pre-fill.

name: Automated 9:16 AI Image & Video Content Creator
description: This n8n workflow automates creating 9:16 aspect ratio short-form video scripts and AI-generated images using Airtable for content management, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for script generation, and Leonardo.ai for prompt improvement and image generation. Perfect for branding and social media content production.

name: LinkedIn Job Scraper to Google Sheets
description: Automates scraping of live LinkedIn job posts using Bright Data Dataset API. Cleans and flattens job data, then appends it to Google Sheets for easy use in job hunting or sales prospecting. Tech stack: Bright Data API, Google Sheets API, n8n nodes (Form, HTTP Request, Code, Wait, If).

name: Lead Qualification & Slack Notification
description: Automates lead capture from a form, verifies email via Hunter API, scores leads using MadKudu API, and sends qualified lead alerts to Slack. Utilizes n8n form trigger, Hunter email verifier, MadKudu lead scoring, and Slack API integration for streamlined lead management.

name: Lead Capture & CRM Enrichment Automation
description: Automates lead capture via n8n Form Trigger, validates emails with Hunter.io, enriches lead data using Clearbit API, and manages contacts and organizations in Pipedrive CRM. Streamlines lead collection and data enrichment for sales pipelines.

name: URL & IP Threat Intel Scan and Report
description: An n8n workflow integrating VirusTotal and Greynoise APIs to scan URLs and IPs for threat intelligence. It accepts URLs/IPs via webhook or form, performs DNS lookups, submits to VirusTotal for URL scanning, queries Greynoise for IP context, merges results, and sends detailed reports via Slack and email.

name: AI Image Data Extraction API with Gemini
description: Creates an API endpoint that extracts structured data from images using Google's Gemini AI (Flash Lite) model. The workflow fetches an image URL, converts it to base64, calls the Gemini API for OCR, and returns custom JSON with extracted fields, ideal for document and form automation.

name: AI-Powered Content Generator & Organizer
description: Automates content creation using OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI API, organizing outputs in Google Drive and Google Sheets. Collects user inputs via web form, generates and formats article outlines and sections, uploads docs to Drive, and tracks with Sheets.

name: WP CF7 Contact Form Auto Response & Classification
description: Automates classification and drafting of responses to WordPress Contact Form 7 inquiries using Google Gemini AI and Gmail API. Saves categorized responses to Google Sheets, streamlining customer support for businesses handling diverse requests.

name: AI-Driven HR Job Application Workflow
description: Automates job applications with a custom form, uploads CVs to Google Drive, stores data in Airtable, uses OpenAI GPT for candidate scoring, generates interview questions, emails candidates, schedules interviews via Google Calendar, and tracks hiring stages.

name: Lead Scoring and Outreach Automation
description: Automates lead collection via an n8n form, validates emails using Hunter API, scores leads with MadKudu, manages contacts in HubSpot, and sends personalized Gmail outreach emails. Integrates MadKudu, Hunter, HubSpot OAuth2, Gmail OAuth2, and n8n Form Trigger nodes to streamline lead qualification and engagement.

name: TTS Voice & Email Verification Automation
description: Automates sending TTS voice calls via ClickSend API and email verification through SMTP for secure user verification. Features form input, code generation, voice & email code verification, and user feedback. Tech: n8n, ClickSend API, SMTP, JavaScript.

name: CRM Lead & Company Enrichment Automation
description: Automates lead enrichment and management by integrating ConvertKit form subscriptions with Clearbit for email and company data enrichment, and HubSpot CRM for searching, creating, updating companies and contacts. Filters out personal emails for targeted B2B outreach.

name: Email Lead Validation and Enrichment
description: n8n workflow that triggers from a form submission, verifies email validity using Hunter API, enriches person and company data via Clearbit, and adds valid leads to HubSpot CRM. Integrates Form Trigger, Hunter, Clearbit, and HubSpot with OAuth2 for smart lead collection.

name: B2B Lead Qualification & Email Response
description: An n8n workflow to capture business leads via a form, enrich contact and company data using Clearbit API, filter for B2B companies with over 499 employees, then send tailored Gmail responses. Tech stack includes n8n, Clearbit API, and Gmail SMTP.

name: YouTube Video Transcript Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that extracts and cleans YouTube video transcripts using the YouTube Transcript RapidAPI. It takes a video URL input via a form, fetches transcript data through API, processes and cleans the text for easy use. Stack: n8n, RapidAPI, HTTP Request Node.

name: AI-Powered Dynamic Clarification Form
description: This n8n workflow uses OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model to analyze open-ended form responses and dynamically generate follow-up questions to avoid redundancy, optimizing data capture. It combines n8n forms, Langchain output parsing, and filtering to create adaptive multi-step forms for AI consultancy lead qualification.

name: Lead Capture & Validation Workflow
description: Automates capturing form leads with n8n Form Trigger, validates emails via Hunter API, updates Google Sheets, and notifies via Gmail and Discord webhook. Ensures authentic lead data management with seamless integration of form, email verification, spreadsheet, and messaging services.

name: Indeed Job Listing Scraper with Bright Data & LLM
description: Automates job search by scraping Indeed listings using Bright Data API. Integrates n8n for workflow, Google Sheets for storage, and OpenAI GPT-4 mini model to assess applicant-job fit. Uses form trigger for search parameters and polls for data readiness.

name: ParquetReader File Converter to JSON
description: An n8n workflow that converts uploaded Parquet, Avro, ORC, and Feather files to JSON format using the ParquetReader API. It uses a webhook to receive files, sends them via multipart/form-data to the API, and parses the JSON response, enabling easy data transformation and integration.

name: Stripe Payment Link Creator
description: An n8n workflow that automates Stripe product creation and payment link generation. Utilizes Stripe API via HTTP Request nodes, with an input form trigger and automatic webhook redirect. Ideal for simple product monetization setups using Stripe.

name: AI-Powered Resume Review & Google Sheets Logging
description: Automates resume submission, extraction, and evaluation using a form, Google Drive, PDF text extraction, OpenAI GPT-4, and Google Sheets for record keeping. It extracts personal info and qualifications, summarizes candidate profiles, assigns HR ratings, and logs results for streamlined hiring.

name: Glassdoor Job Listings Scraper with Bright Data
description: Automates job prospecting by scraping Glassdoor job listings via Bright Data API, processes data with OpenAI GPT-4 and LangChain, and stores results in Google Sheets. Includes customizable queries via form triggers for targeted job search automation.

name: AI Style Transfer Image Generator
description: Automates image style transfer using Google Gemini 2.0 for visual style analysis and Imagen 3.0 for image generation. Inputs taken via a form, images uploaded to Cloudinary, optional email delivery via Gmail. Enables creative AI-driven logo and image remixing.

name: Form Data to Google Sheets & Airtable Pipeline
description: Automates data collection from an n8n form, extracting date/time, formatting inputs, saving to Google Sheets and Airtable, and sending personalized emails via Gmail. Utilizes n8n workflow with Form Trigger, Code node, Google Sheets, Airtable, and Gmail integrations.

name: Auto-Create Airtable Tables from Webflow Forms
description: Automates creating Airtable tables dynamically for each Webflow form submission using Webflow API trigger and Airtable API (Personal Access Token). Organizes submitted form data efficiently without manual table setup, ideal for Webflow sites needing structured data storage in Airtable.

name: WordPress Form Lead Capture to Mautic
description: Automates capturing leads from WordPress forms via webhook, normalizes data (name, email, mobile), validates emails, and creates contacts in Mautic CRM. Built using n8n workflow with WordPress webhook and Mautic API integration.

name: eCommerce Contact Form Text Classifier
description: Automates classification of contact form messages for eCommerce using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for text classification, Google Sheets for data storage, and SMTP for email notifications to respective departments (quotes, orders, etc.).

name: LinkedIn Profile Finder with Bright Data & GPT-4o-mini
description: Automates LinkedIn profile discovery by processing user form input with Bright Data for Google scraping and GPT-4o-mini for NLP. Extracts and filters LinkedIn search results, generates personalized outreach emails, and sends via SMTP. Ideal for sales prospecting automation.

name: Dynamic Form Builder for Airtable & Baserow
description: An n8n workflow that dynamically generates web forms from Airtable and Baserow table schemas using their APIs. It converts database fields to n8n form fields, handles form submissions to create/update records, and manages file uploads separately.

name: Multi-Step Newsletter Signup & Survey
description: This n8n workflow captures newsletter signups and further user details via chained multi-page forms, storing data in Google Sheets and sending Slack alerts. Tech stack: n8n built-in Form and FormTrigger nodes, Google Sheets API, Slack API. Ideal for onboarding and lead capture.

name: Google Form Quiz Certificate Automation
description: Automates certificate generation for quiz takers using Google Forms (quiz mode), Google Sheets, Google Slides, Drive, and Gmail. It triggers on new form responses, evaluates scores, creates personalized certificates from a Slides template, converts them to PDF, and emails them to users.

name: Auto Slack Channels for Webflow Forms
description: Automates creation of Slack channels named after Webflow forms, sending form submissions as Slack messages. Utilizes Webflow trigger and Slack API with Bot OAuth token. Also notifies #general channel for new channels, enabling seamless team communication.

name: SRT Subtitle File Translator
description: An n8n workflow automating SRT subtitle file translation using Google Translate API. It extracts text from uploaded SRT files, processes subtitle blocks, translates content to selected languages (e.g., EN, JP), then rebuilds and returns the translated SRT file. Utilizes n8n form triggers and file processing nodes.

name: Summarize Google Sheets Feedback with GPT-4
description: Automates feedback summarization from Google Sheets form responses using n8n workflow. Integrates Google Sheets API to fetch data, OpenAI GPT-4 to generate summaries, Markdown-to-HTML conversion, and Gmail API to send summary reports via email.

name: Typeform to Airtable with Slack Alert
description: Automates form submission handling by triggering on Typeform responses, extracting name and email, appending them to Airtable, and sending a Slack notification. Uses Typeform API, Airtable API, and Slack API for seamless data flow and real-time alerts.

name: Netlify Form Submission to Airtable
description: Automates capturing Netlify form submissions and appends extracted name, email, and role data to Airtable. Uses Netlify Trigger webhook, n8n's Set node for data mapping, and Airtable API integration for database storage.

name: Gravity Forms to KlickTipp Feedback Automation
description: Automates integration between Gravity Forms and KlickTipp using n8n. Captures form submissions, transforms data (phone format, UNIX timestamps, ratings), manages subscriber details and dynamic tag creation in KlickTipp. Ideal for streamlined feedback and contact management.

name: Email Validation & Mailing List Automation
description: Automates email capture and validation using n8n with Hunter.io for email verification and SendGrid to add valid emails to a mailing list, streamlining subscriber management via a custom form trigger.

name: Lead Qualification via Email Verification & Scoring
