description: Automates lead qualification by collecting business emails via n8n form trigger, verifying email validity with Hunter API, scoring leads with MadKudu API, and sending Gmail alerts for high-fit leads. Integrates n8n, Hunter, MadKudu, and Gmail for smart lead management.

name: Lead Qualification & Notification via Form
description: Automates lead capture from a web form using n8n Form Trigger, validates emails via Hunter API, scores leads with MadKudu API, and notifies qualified leads through Telegram. Ideal for smart B2B lead management and instant alerts.

name: n8n Workflow Auto-Documenter
description: This n8n workflow auto-generates concise documentation for n8n workflows using OpenAI's GPT-4. It accepts workflow JSON and title via a form, crafts a prompt, sends it to OpenAI API, and returns brief, SEO-friendly docs as HTML. Ideal for n8n users needing quick workflow summaries.

name: Webflow Form to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates capturing form submissions from Webflow via webhook, processes data with custom JS, and appends it to Google Sheets. Uses Webflow API, Google Sheets API, and n8n code node for seamless form data archival and timestamping.

name: Bulk File Upload to Google Drive
description: An n8n workflow for batch uploading multiple files via a form to Google Drive. It checks for an existing folder by name, creates the folder if missing, and uploads files preserving original names. Uses Google Drive API, n8n form trigger, and custom JS code for file handling.

name: Google Doc Auto-Fill from Web Form
description: This workflow collects form input via n8n Form Trigger, copies a Google Docs template, and replaces placeholders with submitted form data using Google Drive and Google Docs APIs. Enables dynamic document generation from user-submitted fields.

name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates capturing customer feedback via an n8n form, analyzes sentiment using OpenAI API, merges results with form data, and appends entries to Google Sheets. Integrates n8n formTrigger, OpenAI sentiment classification, and Google Sheets for streamlined feedback management.

name: Typeform to PDF Invoice Automation
description: Automates invoice generation by triggering on Typeform submissions and using APITemplate.io to create customized PDF invoices. Utilizes Typeform API for form data capture and APITemplate.io API for dynamic PDF creation and download.

name: AI Logo Sheet Extractor to Airtable
description: Automates extraction of tools and attributes from uploaded AI logo sheets using OpenAI GPT-4o and LangChain AI agent, then stores and updates records in Airtable with hashed IDs and links. Enables easy cataloging of product comparisons from images via form submissions.

name: AI-Powered HR CV Processing & Evaluation
description: Automates job application processing: candidates submit CVs via a form, PDFs are extracted, AI extracts qualifications and personal data using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, evaluates fit against a company profile, and logs results to Google Sheets. Integrates Google Drive and Sheets APIs.

name: Form Data Capture & Storage to Airtable
description: Automates capturing user-submitted form data via n8n's form trigger and stores it directly in Airtable. Utilizes n8n workflow nodes with Airtable API integration to streamline data collection for easy structured management and future use.

name: Invoice PDF Generator with JSReport & n8n
description: Automates invoice creation from form input using n8n workflows, JSReport API for PDF generation, and Gmail to email invoices. Integrates form-trigger, HTTP POST to JSReport (document template API), and Gmail OAuth2 for sending, streamlining billing tasks.

name: WhatsApp & Asana Customer Support Automation
description: Automates customer support by capturing form data via n8n form trigger, sending confirmation messages through WhatsApp Business Cloud API, and creating support tickets in Asana task management. Integrates n8n native forms, WhatsApp Business Cloud API, and Asana API for seamless support workflows.

name: Webflow Form to Discord Channel Automation
description: Automates sending Webflow form submissions to Discord by creating dedicated channels per form via the Discord Bot API and Webflow API. Dynamically manages channels and notifies #general with links using n8n workflow automation.

name: Twitter Sentiment Filter & Strapi Sync
description: Automates fetching recent English tweets about Strapi or n8n.io every 30 mins, filters out retweets/old tweets, analyzes sentiment using Google Cloud Natural Language API, and stores only positive sentiment tweets and form submissions into a Strapi CMS collection.

name: OpenAI Image Generator via Web Form
description: An n8n workflow that generates images using OpenAI's GPT-Image-1 model. It accepts prompt and size inputs through a web form, calls the OpenAI API, converts the base64 image data to a file, and returns the generated image for download. Uses OpenAI API and n8n form/webhook nodes.

name: Customer Feedback Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates sentiment classification of customer feedback using an OpenAI API with form input, then logs categorized responses into Google Sheets for easy tracking and analysis.

name: Text-to-Speech Voice Call Automation
description: Automates text-to-speech phone calls using the ClickSend API triggered by form submissions. Users input text, recipient number, voice, and language. Built with n8n using HTTP Request and formTrigger nodes for easy voice message delivery and notifications.

name: n8n Credential Transfer Between Instances
description: Workflow automates copying credentials from one n8n instance to another using n8n CLI exports, HTTP API POST requests with dynamic authentication, and user forms for selection. Utilizes n8n executeCommand, HTTP Request, Form, and Code nodes.

name: Dynamic Dropdown Form with Google Sheets Data
description: Automates updating an n8n form's dropdown field dynamically using values fetched from a Google Sheets document. Utilizes n8n API, Google Sheets node, and formTrigger for real-time dropdown updates, enabling seamless form customization and data-driven options.

name: n8n Tag-to-Folder Workflow Organizer
description: Automates organization of n8n workflows by converting tags into folders via n8n API. Uses n8n HTTP Request, Form Trigger, and Code nodes to login, fetch tags, create folders, and move workflows. Simplifies project management for personal owned projects.

name: Google Sheets & MySQL Event Inquiry Sync
description: An n8n workflow automating sync between Google Sheets (Google Sheets API) and MySQL database for event inquiries. It compares datasets, upserts new records, updates statuses, and schedules regular 30-min interval checks on weekdays. Ideal for managing event form data efficiently.

name: Multi-Image Upload to Instagram & TikTok
description: Automates uploading multiple images to Instagram and TikTok using the Upload-Post API. It fetches images, renames binary data for upload, merges files, and sends multipart-form requests with API key authorization, simplifying cross-platform social media posts.

name: Automated Posting to X via Airtop & n8n
description: Automatically post text content on x.com using Airtop API and n8n workflow automation. It creates a browser session, opens X, types a post, and publishes it. Triggered via form submission or another workflow for seamless marketing updates.

name: Typeform to Airtable Submission Logger
description: Automates capturing form responses from Typeform via webhook and appends them to an Airtable base for organized storage. Utilizes Typeform API trigger and Airtable API node in n8n. Ideal for streamlined data collection and management workflows.

name: Sign-in IPs Report & Email Automation
description: Automates retrieval of sign-in events via SaaS Alerts API, deduplicates IP data, converts to CSV, encodes base64, and emails the report using SMTP2Go. Includes an auth form for API key and email input for last 24h sign-in IP info delivery.

name: DigitalOcean File Upload via Form
description: An n8n workflow that accepts file uploads through a web form and uploads them to a DigitalOcean Spaces bucket using the S3 API with public read access. It then returns the public URL of the uploaded file. Uses n8n form trigger, S3 node, and form completion steps.

name: Webflow Form Submission Trigger
description: Automates receiving updates from Webflow form submissions using Webflow Trigger node with OAuth2 authentication in n8n workflow. Ideal for alerting or processing form data instantly from your Webflow site.

name: Dynamic NASA API Key Credentials
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating how to dynamically set NASA API credentials using form input expressions. Utilizes n8n Form Trigger, NASA API node, and Respond to Webhook to fetch and redirect to NASA's picture of the day. Great for learning dynamic credential handling.

name: Typeform to NextCloud Spreadsheet Sync
description: Automates data flow from Typeform submissions to NextCloud-stored Excel files. Uses Typeform Trigger to capture form responses, merges with existing spreadsheet data from NextCloud, updates the file, and uploads it back to NextCloud.

name: Mautic Form Submission SMS Alert
description: Automates sending SMS confirmations via Twilio when a form is submitted in Mautic. Uses Mautic API for form trigger and Twilio API to send personalized SMS notifications, ideal for webinar sign-ups or lead confirmations.

name: ConvertKit Form Subscriber Alert
description: An n8n workflow that triggers notifications when a new subscriber submits a specified ConvertKit form using ConvertKit API's webhook integration. Ideal for keeping track of list growth and automating subscriber management.

name: Wufoo Form Submission Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers an automation when a Wufoo form named 'n8n' is submitted. Uses Wufoo API webhook integration to receive real-time form submission data, enabling seamless triggering of further automations.

name: License Plate Number Extractor from Image
description: An n8n workflow that extracts license plate numbers from uploaded car images using OpenRouter's GPT-4o model within LangChain. Users upload an image via a form, and the AI processes the image prompt to return the license plate text, automating vehicle identification.

name: JotForm Submission Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new JotForm submissions via JotForm API webhook, automating follow-up actions upon form completion.

name: Simple HTML Response Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that creates a webhook endpoint (/my-form) which responds with a static HTML page styled using Bootstrap 5. It uses n8n's Webhook and Respond to Webhook nodes to deliver a basic "Hello, world!" webpage upon HTTP request.

name: Notion Daily Posts to LinkedIn
description: Automates fetching daily posts from a Notion database, formats content and images, then publishes them on LinkedIn. Uses Notion API, LinkedIn API, and n8n's schedule, code, HTTP request, and merge nodes for seamless content automation.

name: AI-Powered Telegram Bot with Memory
description: Automates Telegram conversations using OpenAI assistant with context memory via Supabase. Integrates Telegram Bot API, OpenAI Threads & Assistants API, and Supabase database for user session tracking, enabling personalized, context-aware chatbot replies.

name: Two-Way Sync Between Pipedrive and MySQL
description: Automates bidirectional data synchronization between Pipedrive CRM and a MySQL database. Utilizes n8n nodes including Pipedrive API, MySQL integration, dataset comparison, and conditional logic to create, update, and maintain consistent contact records.

name: AI SQL Query Generator from Database Schema
description: This n8n workflow uses MySQL to extract database schemas, stores them locally, and combines with OpenAI's GPT-4o via LangChain AI Agent to generate SQL queries based only on the schema and user chat input. It automates SQL generation without executing queries directly.

name: AI SQL Query Generator from DB Schema
description: An n8n workflow using MySQL, OpenAI GPT-4o, and LangChain to convert database schema into executable SQL queries via AI chat. It extracts schema from MySQL, stores locally, then generates SQL on chat input, executing queries and returning results seamlessly.

name: Local File AI Sync & Q&A with Qdrant & Mistral
description: Automates local folder monitoring and syncs file data as vector embeddings to Qdrant vector database. Uses Mistral Cloud AI for embeddings and chat model, enabling AI Q&A on updated files. Stack: n8n, Local File Trigger, Qdrant API, Mistral Cloud, Langchain nodes.

name: AI Exam Question Generator from Google Docs
description: Automates creating open and multiple-choice exam questions from Google Docs content using OpenAI embeddings, Google Gemini LLM, and Qdrant vector database for retrieval-augmented generation and question-answering.

name: Auto Sync Google Sheets to Postgres DB
description: Automates syncing specified Google Sheets data into PostgreSQL tables with dynamic schema detection. Uses Google Drive and Sheets APIs, PostgreSQL, plus Google Gemini LLM for natural language SQL queries and schema introspection, enabling conversational database querying.

name: AI-Powered Web Data to Vector DB Workflow
description: Automates extraction, formatting, and vectorization of web data using Bright Data API, Google Gemini models, Langchain nodes, and Pinecone vector database for building AI-ready datasets for LLMs.

name: AI-Powered JIRA Stale Issue Auto-Assignment
description: Automates assignment of stale JIRA issues using OpenAI embeddings and Langchain. Utilizes Supabase vector database to find similar resolved issues and identifies best suited team members by workload, auto-assigning and commenting in JIRA to keep backlog manageable.

name: Notion DB AI Assistant Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using URLs. Utilizes Notion API, Anthropic and OpenAI language models, LangChain agents, and advanced JSON validation. Automates creating custom AI chatbots for dynamic Notion DB schemas.

name: Notion AI Assistant Workflow Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using the provided URL. Utilizes Notion API, Langchain AI nodes (Anthropic and OpenAI), JSON validation, and chat triggers for interactive assistant creation.

name: WhatsApp AI Chatbot with Qdrant RAG
description: An AI-powered WhatsApp Business chatbot leveraging Meta Webhooks, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Qdrant vector database, and Google Drive for document retrieval. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system to answer customer queries about electronics products with contextual knowledge base support.

name: Movie Recommender Chatbot with Qdrant & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow to build a movie recommendation chatbot using GitHub-hosted IMDB movie data, OpenAI embeddings and GPT-4o-mini chat model, and Qdrant vector database for vector similarity search. It processes user requests, embeds them, queries Qdrant, and returns top-3 personalized movie recommendations.

name: AI Lead Processing & Email Notification System
description: Automates analysis of incoming lead notes, categorizes inquiries, finds appropriate contacts from a database, and generates email notifications. Integrates ERPNext for lead data, OpenAI for NLP analysis, Google Sheets for contact lookup, and Microsoft Outlook API to format/send emails.

name: AI Chat Agent for Supabase DB
description: N8N workflow integrating OpenAI and Supabase PostgreSQL to create an AI-powered chat assistant for database queries. It dynamically generates SQL based on user input, retrieves schema info, runs queries, and returns data via conversational AI.

name: Movie Recommender Chatbot with Qdrant & OpenAI
description: An n8n workflow that builds a conversational movie recommendation chatbot using GitHub-stored IMDb data, OpenAI embeddings and chat models, and a Qdrant vector database for similarity search to deliver personalized movie recommendations.

name: AI SQL Agent with Dynamic Charting
description: An n8n workflow that integrates OpenAI GPT-4 with a SQL database to answer user data queries. It dynamically determines if a chart is needed, generates Chart.js definitions via OpenAI, and produces visual charts using Quickchart.io for enhanced data analysis and visualization.

name: Notion-Triggered AI SEO Content Publisher
description: Automates creation and publishing of SEO-optimized blog posts by detecting Notion database updates. Integrates Notion API, Langchain AI, WordPress API, Gmail, and DeepSeek AI to write, publish, notify, and log content seamlessly.

name: AI-Powered SQL Query Chatbot with PostgreSQL
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4o-mini with a PostgreSQL database via Langchain AI Agent. It enables conversational SQL queries using chat input with in-memory context, ideal for interactive database exploration and querying.

name: SMS Course Assistant with Twilio & Airtable
description: An automated SMS chatbot workflow using Twilio for SMS triggers, OpenAI (GPT-4) for natural language understanding, and Airtable as a course database. It fetches and answers course queries, logs interactions, and provides up-to-date academic info for Northvale Institute students.

name: AI-Based SEO Seed Keyword Generator
description: Generates 15-20 targeted SEO seed keywords based on an Ideal Customer Profile using AI (Anthropic Claude 3.5). Utilizes n8n workflow nodes, Langchain AI agent, and requires user-defined ICP data and AI/database connections to automate SEO focus keyword creation.

name: Notion Knowledge Base AI Assistant
description: Automates search and summarization of knowledge from a Notion database using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. Utilizes Notion API for querying database contents and LangChain for managing AI agent memory and tool integration, enabling concise, fact-based Q&A from company knowledge bases.

name: Supabase Vector DB Q&A Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Drive, OpenAI embeddings and chat models, Supabase vector database for embedding storage/retrieval, and LangChain for recursive text splitting and QA. Enables document upload, vector embedding insertion/updating, and conversational Q&A on custom knowledge bases.

name: AI Texas Tax Code Assistant Chatbot
description: Automates extraction and querying of Texas tax codes using n8n. Downloads tax code PDFs, extracts sections, creates Mistral.ai embeddings, stores in Qdrant vector database, and enables an AI chatbot via OpenAI and Langchain to answer tax-related queries.

name: AI-Powered Social Media Link Scraper
description: An autonomous AI workflow using n8n, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Supabase to crawl websites from a database, extract all social media profile URLs, and store them in a structured format. It leverages HTML parsing, HTTP requests, LangChain tools, and data cleaning.

name: Error Logging with Rate-Limited Alerts
description: An n8n workflow that captures workflow errors, logs them into a PostgreSQL database (via NocoDB schema), and limits alert notifications (email and push) to one every 5 minutes to avoid overload. Includes manual cleanup and extensible error handling hooks.

name: Gmail to Notion Email Archiver
description: Automates archiving labeled Gmail emails to a Notion database by creating pages for new emails and removing labels when marked done. Uses Gmail API and Notion API, triggered every minute for timely email management and productivity.

name: Weekly Notion Ideas Summary to Slack
description: Automates weekly aggregation of new product ideas from a Notion database, filters by UX-related ideas, counts unique entries, and posts a summary message to a specified Slack channel. Utilizes Notion API, Slack API, and n8n's scheduling and data processing nodes.

name: Sync Jira Issues & Comments to Notion DB
description: Automates syncing Jira issue events (created, updated, deleted) with a Notion database, updating issue details and statuses in real-time. Utilizes Jira Webhooks, Notion API, conditional logic (IF, Switch nodes), and JavaScript for data transformation in n8n.

name: Weekly News Scraper & Summarizer
description: Automates weekly scraping of news posts from Colt's website without RSS feed. Uses CSS selectors for extracting titles, dates, and links, then summarizes and extracts keywords via OpenAI GPT-4 API. Stores results in a NocoDB SQL database for further processing.

name: Google Sheets to Postgres Sync Automation
description: Automates synchronization of data from Google Sheets to a Postgres database using n8n. Utilizes Google Sheets API and Postgres nodes to retrieve, compare, insert, and update rows on a scheduled hourly basis, ensuring database consistency with spreadsheet updates.

name: Qdrant MCP Server for Review Analysis
description: An n8n workflow implementing a customized MCP server to extend Qdrant's vector database features with review database management. Utilizes OpenAI for embeddings and Qdrant API for advanced search, grouping, and recommendation functionalities to handle, search, compare, and recommend customer reviews.

name: PostgreSQL MCP Server for DB Management
description: An n8n workflow acting as a PostgreSQL MCP server enabling secure database management operations (select, insert, update) via MCP clients like Claude Desktop. Uses n8n nodes (Postgres, LangChain MCP Trigger/Tools), avoids raw SQL for security and supports schema introspection.

name: AI Personal Shopper with RAG & WooCommerce
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI LLM, Qdrant vector database, Google Drive, and WooCommerce to build a personal shopper chatbot. It extracts user intents and product details from chat, queries WooCommerce for products, and uses RAG with store docs for general queries.

name: DMARC Report Email Parser & DB Logger
description: Automates processing of DMARC reports by monitoring IMAP email for XML attachments, unzipping and parsing them into JSON, mapping the data into a MySQL database, and sending notifications via Slack/email on SPF or DKIM failures. Uses n8n automation with email, compression, XML, MySQL, and Slack nodes.

name: Todoist to Notion Task Sync
description: Automates syncing of Todoist tasks labeled 'send-to-notion' into a Notion database, updating tasks with Notion links. Utilizes Todoist API (OAuth2) and Notion API, triggered on schedule to keep both apps aligned seamlessly.

name: Umami Analytics SEO Insights Automation
description: Automates fetching website traffic stats from Umami analytics API, uses Openrouter AI to generate SEO summaries & improvement suggestions, and stores results in Baserow database. Integrates Umami, Openrouter AI, and Baserow in n8n for weekly reporting and analysis.

name: Dropbox Folder Watch & New File Automation
description: An n8n workflow that monitors specified Dropbox folders using Dropbox webhooks and API, filters new files against a NocoDB database to exclude known files, and triggers subworkflows for new files processing. Uses Dropbox API, NocoDB, and n8n automation platform.

name: Notion Content Blocks Markdown Sync
description: Automates syncing Notion database updates by converting Notion blocks to Markdown and back. Uses Notion API, n8n Notion Trigger, HTTP Request, and custom JS code to preserve rich text formatting including headings, lists, and annotations for seamless content manipulation.

name: SQL Query Agent with Conversational Memory
description: An n8n workflow that enables conversational AI to query a local SQLite database using OpenAI's GPT-4-turbo model via LangChain. It fetches, extracts, and stores the Chinook sample SQLite DB, then allows interactive SQL queries with memory of previous interactions for better context.

name: SERPBear SEO Rank Analysis & Storage
description: Automates SEO keyword rank monitoring using SERPBear API. Processes ranking data with JavaScript, sends it to Meta-LLama AI for expert analysis, and stores insights in Baserow database. Utilizes n8n for scheduled triggers and API integrations, enabling easy SEO performance tracking.

name: Google Analytics SEO Insights Workflow
description: Automates weekly Google Analytics data retrieval and comparison using GA4 API, processes page engagement, search console metrics, and country views. Uses Openrouter AI (meta-llama model) for SEO analysis and stores results in Baserow database.

name: LinkedIn Profile Lead Collector via SerpAPI
description: Automates extraction of LinkedIn profiles by keyword and location using SerpAPI for Google search, OpenAI API for data enrichment, and NocoDB for storage. Outputs an Excel file and database-ready lead list for sales or marketing use. Ideal for lead generation with no-code tools.

name: Autonomous Social Media Profile Crawler
description: n8n workflow leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, Supabase DB, and built-in HTTP/HTML nodes to autonomously crawl company websites, extract and standardize social media profile URLs into JSON format, and store results back to a database. Highly customizable multi-page crawler.

name: Invoice Parsing & Database Entry Automation
description: Automates invoice processing: triggers on new Google Drive files, sends files to LlamaParse API for extraction, receives parsed data via webhook, then creates invoices and line items in a database. Uses Google Drive, webhook, LlamaParse API, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for data extraction and structuring.

name: Notion AI Knowledge Base Assistant
description: This n8n workflow creates an AI agent that queries and summarizes data from a Notion knowledge base using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. It integrates Notion API for database search and content retrieval, Langchain for AI memory and tool use, enabling concise, fact-based answers from Notion data.

name: Medoid Setup for Crop Anomaly Detection
description: An n8n workflow setting cluster centers (medoids) and threshold scores for anomaly detection on agricultural crop images. Uses Qdrant vector database for clustering and distance matrix APIs, Voyage AI multimodal embeddings, and Python scipy for sparse matrix operations.

name: AI-Powered Airtable MCP Server
description: This n8n workflow builds an MCP server integrating Airtable with AI tools from Langchain and OpenAI GPT-4o. It enables chat-triggered intelligent CRUD operations on Airtable records using AI agents, memory buffers, and real-time SSE endpoints. Ideal for automated database interactions.

name: Paul Graham Essays Vector Search with Milvus
description: Automates scraping latest Paul Graham essays, extracts and cleans text, creates embeddings with OpenAI, and stores them in Milvus vector database. Enables querying via chat with AI-powered citation retrieval using OpenAI GPT-4 model and LangChain integration.

name: AI-Driven SEO Seed Keyword Generator
description: An n8n workflow that uses AI (Anthropic Claude model) and Langchain to generate 15-20 SEO seed keywords based on an Ideal Customer Profile (ICP). It aggregates ICP data, prompts the AI agent, and outputs keywords for SEO strategies. Requires connection to AI API and database.

name: Google Drive to PGVector Loader
description: Automates loading of documents from Google Drive into a Postgres PGVector database with OpenAI embeddings. Supports PDF, text, and JSON files, uses Langchain nodes for processing, enabling vector search-ready storage and management.

name: Shopify Orders UTM Data to Baserow
description: Automates daily extraction of Shopify orders with UTM parameters using Shopify GraphQL API. Transforms and filters data, then stores enriched order details in Baserow database. Utilizes n8n integration workflows with Shopify API and Baserow API for marketing attribution tracking.

name: Batch Upload Images and Embed to Qdrant
description: Automates batch importing of crop images from Google Cloud Storage, creates multimodal embeddings via Voyage AI API, and uploads them to Qdrant vector database with cluster and payload indexing setup. Ideal for anomaly detection using agricultural crop datasets.

name: Google Firestore CRUD - Create, Update, Get
description: n8n workflow automates document creation, updating, and retrieval in Google Cloud Firestore using Firestore API and OAuth2 credentials. Ideal for backend data management and integration scenarios with Firestore database.

name: AI Chat Agent for Supabase PostgreSQL
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI and Supabase PostgreSQL to create an AI assistant that dynamically generates and executes SQL queries based on user chat input, enabling conversational database interaction and smart data retrieval without SQL expertise.

name: Google Ads SEO Keyword Volume Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow using Google Ads API to fetch SEO keyword monthly search volumes, historical trends, difficulty scores, and competition metrics. Ideal for keyword research automation with up to 20 keywords input and customizable database integration.

name: AI-Powered n8n Workflow Credential Query Agent
description: This n8n workflow extracts and stores workflow credential metadata from the n8n API into a SQLite database, then uses OpenAI's GPT model with Langchain integration to create an AI agent that can query these credentials via natural language. It enables users to find workflows by app credentials via AI-powered SQL querying using n8n, SQLite, and OpenAI APIs.

name: Slack Idea Capture to Notion Logger
description: An n8n workflow enabling Slack slash command /idea to capture user ideas and log them automatically into a Notion database. It uses Slack Webhooks, Notion API, and n8n automation to streamline idea collection and collaboration.

name: Sync Outlook Calendar with Notion Database
description: This n8n workflow automates syncing events from Microsoft Outlook Calendar to a Notion database. It fetches calendar events via Microsoft Graph API OAuth2, checks for existing pages in Notion, and creates or updates them accordingly.

name: GitHub Issues Notion Sync
description: Automates synchronization of GitHub issues with a Notion database using GitHub webhook trigger and Notion API integration in n8n. It creates, updates, archives, and manages issue states inside Notion, enabling seamless issue tracking within a Notion workspace.

name: Company Logo and Info to Airtable
description: Automates fetching company logos, icons, and details via Brandfetch API and stores them in Airtable. Includes n8n manual trigger, Brandfetch integration for company data, and Airtable append operation for database storage.

name: Weekly Missing Project Budget Alert
description: Automates weekly monitoring of open external projects with zero budgeted cost from a MySQL database. Uses n8n's MySQL, Switch node for cost center routing, and Microsoft Outlook API to send tailored HTML email alerts to respective cost center teams for timely budget updates.

name: Asana to Notion Task Sync
description: Automates syncing tasks from Asana to Notion via their APIs using n8n. Triggered by Asana updates, it creates or updates Notion database pages with task info and deadlines, ensuring task data consistency across both platforms.

name: Weekly Google Sheets to MySQL Importer
description: Automates weekly data import from Google Sheets to MySQL using Cron scheduling, Google Sheets API with OAuth2 for authentication, and MySQL node for insertion. Ideal for syncing spreadsheet data into a database automatically.

name: Calendly Leads to Notion via Dropcontact
description: Automates lead capture from Calendly invitees, enriches data using Dropcontact API, and logs detailed lead info in Notion database, including contact, company, and scheduling details. Integrates Calendly webhook, Dropcontact API, and Notion API for streamlined CRM.

name: Netlify Form Submission to Airtable
description: Automates capturing Netlify form submissions and appends extracted name, email, and role data to Airtable. Uses Netlify Trigger webhook, n8n's Set node for data mapping, and Airtable API integration for database storage.

name: AI Telegram Bot with Supabase Memory
description: An n8n workflow integrating Telegram Bot API, OpenAI Assistants (via HTTP API), and Supabase database to create a context-aware AI chatbot. It stores user sessions and conversation threads to maintain memory for personalized, continuous conversations in Telegram.

name: Calendly to Notion Contact Logger
description: Automates capturing new Calendly invitee info and logs it into a Notion database. Uses Calendly API webhook to trigger on invitee creation and Notion API to add pages with invitee name, email, and status for streamlined contact management.

name: Export Postgres Data to Excel File
description: This workflow connects to a PostgreSQL database to run a SQL query retrieving product names and EANs, converts the result into an Excel spreadsheet, and saves it as a binary XLS file locally. Utilizes Postgres node, Spreadsheet File node, and Write Binary File node in n8n.

name: Notion-SIGNL4 Alert Management Workflow
description: Automates alert handling by integrating Notion database monitoring with SIGNL4 incident management. Uses n8n to process incoming alerts via webhook, update Notion status fields, and send or resolve SIGNL4 alerts accordingly. Tech stack: n8n, Notion API, SIGNL4 API.

name: IoT Sensor Data Logger via MQTT & InfluxDB
description: An n8n workflow that uses MQTT to receive temperature and humidity data from a remote ESP32 with DHT22 sensor, processes the data with JavaScript, and stores it into an InfluxDB time-series database via HTTP API. Ideal for IoT sensor monitoring.

name: Spotify Monthly Playlist Updater
description: Automates creation and update of a Spotify monthly playlist by syncing liked tracks using Spotify API and storing data in NocoDB. Scheduled with n8n to maintain playlist freshness and database records.

name: Email Natural Language to SQL Query
description: An n8n workflow that converts natural language questions about a PostgreSQL email metadata database into SQL queries using the Ollama language model. It automates schema extraction, enforces strict schema adherence, and returns query results from the emails_metadata table.

name: AI-Powered US Grants Tracking & Alerts
description: Automates fetching, AI summarizing, eligibility analysis, and tracking of latest US AI grants from Grants.gov. Uses n8n workflows with OpenAI API for summaries, Airtable as database, and Gmail for email alerts to subscribers.

name: Notion Duplicate Page Archiver
description: An n8n workflow using Notion API and custom JavaScript to identify and archive duplicate pages in a Notion database based on a specified property. Triggers daily or upon page creation to maintain a clean database automatically.

name: Threads to Notion Post Archiver
description: Automates fetching recent Instagram Threads posts and comments using Threads API, filters and formats media and text content, then archives them into a Notion database with media embeds. Uses n8n, Threads API, and Notion API for seamless social media content archival.

name: Notion Task Reminders via Slack
description: Automates daily weekday reminders of incomplete tasks from a Notion database by sending personalized Slack direct messages. Uses Notion API, Slack API with OAuth2, and cron scheduling to match task assignees with Slack users for timely task alerts.

name: Webpage to Markdown & Links Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that uses the Firecrawl.dev API to convert web pages into markdown format and extract links. It handles batch processing with rate limiting and outputs data for further use. Integrates with your own URL database and output tools like Airtable.

name: Dynamic Form Builder for Airtable & Baserow
description: An n8n workflow that dynamically generates web forms from Airtable and Baserow table schemas using their APIs. It converts database fields to n8n form fields, handles form submissions to create/update records, and manages file uploads separately.

name: SERPBear SEO Analytics with AI Insights
description: Automates fetching SEO keyword rankings from SERPBear API, analyzes trends and performance with AI via OpenRouter, and saves actionable insights to Baserow database. Utilizes n8n for scheduling, HTTP requests, code processing, and cloud storage integration.

name: Sync New Clients from Notion to Clockify
description: Automate client management by syncing new clients from a Notion database to Clockify workspace using n8n. Utilizes Notion API as trigger and Clockify API to add clients automatically, streamlining project tracking setup.

name: AI Chatbot for PostgreSQL Database Queries
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4 with PostgreSQL to enable natural language chat-based querying. Uses Langchain agent with AI tools for schema exploration, table definition, and SQL execution to provide intelligent DB insights and responses in real-time.

name: AI-Powered Chat with PostgreSQL DB
description: This n8n workflow enables interactive chat with a PostgreSQL database using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model and LangChain agent. It automatically generates and executes SQL queries based on user prompts, fetching schema and table info dynamically for accurate DB responses.

name: AI Health Insurance Chatbot with Database
description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating OpenAI assistants, PostgreSQL chat memory, MySQL product querying, and external APIs for personalized health insurance advice. Designed to capture user data, maintain session context, query product offers, and respond via chat with dynamic knowledge base access.

name: CSV to Postgres Automatic Import
description: This n8n workflow automates importing CSV files stored locally into a PostgreSQL database. It uses a manual trigger, reads the CSV file, converts it into spreadsheet format, and inserts data into Postgres. Key tools: n8n, PostgreSQL, local file system.

name: Airtable Query & AI Response in Obsidian
description: This n8n workflow links Airtable data with Obsidian notes using OpenAI GPT-4 through an AI Agent. It automates querying Airtable and sends AI-processed answers back into Obsidian via webhook, enhancing note-taking with dynamic database insights.

name: Export PostgreSQL Table Data to CSV
description: An n8n workflow using PostgreSQL and Spreadsheet nodes to export data from a specified database table (e.g., booksRead) into a CSV file format with manual trigger execution.

name: ISS Position Logger to TimescaleDB
description: Automates fetching the International Space Station's live latitude, longitude, and timestamp every minute using the 'wheretheiss.at' API, then stores the data into a TimescaleDB database for time-series analysis.

name: Microsoft SQL Query Executor
description: n8n workflow to manually trigger and execute SQL queries on Microsoft SQL Server using n8n's built-in Microsoft SQL node. Enables easy database querying via automated workflows with manual control, ideal for database admins and developers.

name: Paul Graham Essays Milvus AI Agent
description: n8n workflow scrapes Paul Graham essays, extracts and processes text, loads to Milvus vector database, and enables AI chat with OpenAI GPT-4o mini model. Tech stack: HTTP requests, HTML parsing, LangChain tools, Milvus vector store, and OpenAI embeddings and chat APIs.

name: Postgres Sensor Data Ingestion
description: Automates ingestion of simulated sensor data into a PostgreSQL database every minute using n8n. Utilizes Cron for scheduling, a Function node to generate random humidity sensor readings with timestamps, and PostgreSQL node to insert data. Ideal for IoT data pipelines.

name: Quick Base Record CRUD Automation
description: Automates creating, updating, and retrieving records in Quick Base using n8n workflows. Utilizes Quick Base API and n8n built-in nodes like Set and Manual Trigger to manage database records efficiently.

name: Google Sheets & MySQL Event Inquiry Sync
description: An n8n workflow automating sync between Google Sheets (Google Sheets API) and MySQL database for event inquiries. It compares datasets, upserts new records, updates statuses, and schedules regular 30-min interval checks on weekdays. Ideal for managing event form data efficiently.

name: SQLite MCP Server for Database CRUD
description: Self-hosted n8n workflow acting as an MCP server to securely manage SQLite DB via CRUD operations. Utilizes SQLite3 Node.js lib, MCP server trigger, and Code + custom workflow tools for read, insert, update. Ideal for business intelligence tasks.

name: News Web Scraper with AI Summarization
description: Automates weekly scraping of news from Colt telecom site using HTML extraction and CSS selectors. Utilizes OpenAI GPT-4 API to generate concise summaries and technical keywords. Stores results in a NocoDB SQL database for easy management.

name: n8n Workflow Sync to Notion Database
description: Automates syncing of n8n workflows tagged 'sync-to-notion' with a Notion database. Uses n8n API to fetch workflows every 15 mins, then queries and updates or adds corresponding pages in Notion via Notion API. Ideal for workflow management and monitoring.

name: FlutterFlow Low-Code API Endpoint
description: n8n workflow provides a low-code API endpoint for FlutterFlow apps using webhooks, a customer datastore node, data aggregation, and response formatting. Easily customize with your database and serve GET requests for app data integration.

name: Google Drive to Notion File Logger
description: Automates logging of newly uploaded Google Drive files to a Notion database. Uses Google Drive API trigger to detect file uploads in a specific folder and Notion API to create database entries with file details and links. Ideal for file management and tracking.

name: Save URLs to Notion via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that uses a POST webhook to capture URLs and automatically saves them as pages in a specified Notion bookmarks database, enabling easy bookmarking and organization. Tech stack: n8n, Notion API, Webhook.

name: ISS Position Tracker to Firebase DB
description: An n8n workflow that fetches the International Space Station's geolocation every minute using WhereTheISS.at API, then saves latitude, longitude, and timestamp data to Google Firebase Realtime Database. Automates real-time ISS tracking and storage.

name: Twitter New Tweets to Airtable
description: Automates fetching the latest tweets about 'verstappen' using Twitter API and appends only new tweets to Airtable database. Uses n8n with Twitter and Airtable nodes to filter out duplicates and update records seamlessly.

name: Notion to Mattermost Meeting Alerts
description: Automates notifications in Mattermost when new meeting notes are added to a Notion database for the Marketing team. Uses Notion Trigger node to monitor Notion API, applies conditional logic, then sends formatted messages via Mattermost API to alert team members.

name: Snowflake CSV Data Importer
description: Automates importing CSV data from an HTTP URL into a Snowflake database table. Uses n8n nodes: HTTP Request to fetch CSV, Spreadsheet File to parse, Set to map fields, and Snowflake node to insert data.

name: URL to Notion Link Logger
description: This n8n workflow uses Webhook, HTTP Request, HTML Extract, and Notion API to capture URLs, fetch page titles, and add them as entries into a Notion database. It includes Discord reply confirmation. Automates link organization with webpage title retrieval.

name: Calendly to Notion Personality Sync
description: Automates the creation of Notion database pages with personality insights by triggering on new Calendly invitees, querying Humantic AI for detailed personality analysis, and storing results in Notion. Uses Calendly webhook, Humantic AI API, and Notion API.

name: User Signup & Notion Semester Tracker
description: Automates user signup via a secure HTTP webhook, extracts user name and email, checks existence in Notion database, creates new user if absent, and updates their associated semester info. Uses n8n with Notion API and basic auth for secure, streamlined academic user management.

name: Weekly MySQL to Google Sheets Export
description: Automates weekly data export from a MySQL database to Google Sheets using n8n. Triggers every week at 5am, queries all records from 'books' table, and appends them to a specified Google Sheet via OAuth2 authentication.

name: Clockify Invoice to Notion Logger
description: Automates logging of new Clockify invoices into a Notion database using Clockify webhook and Notion API. Captures invoice number, issue date, due date, and amount for centralized invoice tracking and management.

name: Postgres to Google Sheets Lead Sync
description: Automates syncing qualified lead data from a PostgreSQL database to Google Sheets, filtering out internal emails. Uses Postgres Trigger, Filter, and Google Sheets nodes in n8n to enable real-time or manual lead data export for easy tracking and contact management.

name: Excel to PostgreSQL Importer
description: Automates importing Excel spreadsheet data into a PostgreSQL database using n8n. Reads a binary XLS file, parses it, then inserts rows into a PostgreSQL 'product' table with columns 'name' and 'ean'.

name: MySQL Execution History Purge Workflow
description: Automates deletion of MySQL n8n execution logs older than 30 days to maintain database performance. Utilizes n8n's Cron trigger and MySQL node with SQL DELETE queries. Useful for n8n users managing execution history retention.

name: CSV Concert Data to MySQL Importer
description: Automates importing concert data from a local CSV file into a MySQL database using n8n. Utilizes n8n core nodes: Manual Trigger, Read Binary File, Spreadsheet File, and MySQL node to parse CSV and insert records into the 'concerts_2023_csv' table.

name: Postgres Table Setup and Data Retrieval
description: An n8n workflow automating creation of a PostgreSQL table, setting sample data, and retrieving this data. Uses PostgreSQL node with manual trigger and set node for data insertion and fetch, ideal for database initialization and testing.

name: Fetch and Count Customers from n8n Training DB
description: This n8n workflow manually triggers retrieval of all customer records from the n8n Training Customer Datastore using the built-in n8nTrainingCustomerDatastore node, then counts the total number of customers. Ideal for simple database fetch and count automation within n8n.

name: Manual Trigger to Postgres Data Fetch
description: Workflow triggered manually to execute a SELECT query on a PostgreSQL database using n8n's Postgres node, retrieving all records from a specified table. Useful for simple database querying and testing integrations.

name: Notion Daily Posts to LinkedIn
description: Automates fetching daily posts from a Notion database, formats content and images, then publishes them on LinkedIn. Uses Notion API, LinkedIn API, and n8n's schedule, code, HTTP request, and merge nodes for seamless content automation.

name: AI Competitor Research & Report Generator
description: Automates competitor analysis by finding similar companies via Exa.ai, scraping Crunchbase, WellFound, LinkedIn, and review sites using Firecrawl and SerpAPI. Uses OpenAI GPT-4o for extracting structured company, product, and review data, and compiles detailed reports into Notion.

name: Notion-Triggered AI SEO Content Publisher
description: Automates creation and publishing of SEO-optimized blog posts by detecting Notion database updates. Integrates Notion API, Langchain AI, WordPress API, Gmail, and DeepSeek AI to write, publish, notify, and log content seamlessly.

name: Google Drive Audio Transcription & Summary to Notion
description: Automates transcription of audio files uploaded to a Google Drive folder using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes content with GPT-4 Turbo, and sends structured summaries to Notion. Integrates Google Drive, OpenAI API, and Notion for efficient audio documentation workflows.

name: Notion DB AI Assistant Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using URLs. Utilizes Notion API, Anthropic and OpenAI language models, LangChain agents, and advanced JSON validation. Automates creating custom AI chatbots for dynamic Notion DB schemas.

name: Notion RAG Chatbot with OpenAI & Supabase
description: An n8n workflow that enables retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) from live Notion data. It uses Notion API to fetch updated content, OpenAI GPT-4 for embeddings and chat models, and Supabase as a vector store to index knowledge base for context-aware Q&A chatbot.

name: Auto-Resolve Long-Lived Jira Issues with AI
description: Automates detection, classification, and resolution of long-lived Jira issues using n8n workflows integrated with OpenAI GPT-4, Jira API, Notion, and Slack. Supports sentiment analysis, AI-driven knowledgebase search, and team notifications to improve customer support efficiency.

name: AI Calendar & Notion Task Manager
description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, and Notion APIs to automate scheduling events and managing tasks. It uses LangChain agents, chat triggers, and memory buffers to route user chat inputs to appropriate tools for calendar and task operations.

name: Notion AI Assistant Workflow Generator
description: Generates an n8n AI Agent workflow to query any Notion database using the provided URL. Utilizes Notion API, Langchain AI nodes (Anthropic and OpenAI), JSON validation, and chat triggers for interactive assistant creation.

name: Invoice to Notion Expense Tracker with AI & Telegram
description: Automates financial tracking by extracting invoice data from Telegram images using Google Gemini AI, storing structured expenses in Notion, and sending summarized reports with charts back via Telegram. Integrates Google Gemini, Notion API, Telegram Bot, and QuickChart.

name: Auto SEO Blog Writer with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
description: Automates full SEO blog content creation: collects fresh research via Perplexity API, generates SEO-optimized articles with GPT-4o, publishes to WordPress, sends Gmail & Slack notifications, and logs to Notion. Integrates OpenAI, Perplexity, WordPress, Gmail, Slack, and Notion via n8n.

name: n8n DeepResearcher Automated Research
description: Automates deep multi-step research using OpenAI (o3-mini) and Google Gemini LLMs, Apify web scraping, and Notion API to recursively generate, refine, and compile research insights into detailed reports in Notion. Ideal for complex topic exploration with configurable depth and breadth.

name: Automated AI-Powered JIRA Issue Resolver
description: An n8n workflow automates the management of unresolved JIRA issues using OpenAI GPT-4 models, Jira and Notion APIs, and Slack integration. It classifies issues, attempts AI-based resolution via knowledgebase search, performs sentiment analysis, posts comments, closes tickets, and notifies Slack channels, enhancing customer support efficiency.

name: Notion to Linear Issue Importer
description: Automates issue creation in Linear from Notion blocks. Uses Notion API to fetch tasks, OpenAI GPT-4 to shorten titles, and Linear GraphQL API to create issues and assign team members based on extracted data. Ideal for integrating task management between Notion and Linear.

name: Notion to Pinecone Vector Index via Google Gemini
description: Automates capturing new Notion pages, filters out non-text blocks, concatenates content, generates 768-dim embeddings using Google Gemini (PaLM) API, and inserts vectors with metadata into Pinecone vector store for semantic search and retrieval.

name: Automate LinkedIn Posts from Notion with AI
description: n8n workflow automates daily LinkedIn posts by fetching content and images from Notion databases, enhancing text using OpenAI's GPT, and publishing to LinkedIn. Includes scheduled triggers, OpenAI API, Notion API, and LinkedIn OAuth integration for seamless social media management.

name: Email to Notion Automation
description: Automates processing of incoming Gmail emails using OpenAI GPT-4, extracts tasks and summaries, and creates detailed pages in Notion databases. Uses Airtable to manage routing and labels to prevent duplicate processing.

name: AI-Powered Resume & Interview Screening
description: Automates hiring by extracting data from resumes submitted via forms, scoring candidates using Google Gemini LLM, ElevenLabs AI voice interviews, and updating Notion ATS & Google Sheets for holistic candidate evaluation and interview management.

name: Gmail to Notion Email Archiver
description: Automates archiving labeled Gmail emails to a Notion database by creating pages for new emails and removing labels when marked done. Uses Gmail API and Notion API, triggered every minute for timely email management and productivity.

name: Notion Knowledge Base AI Assistant
description: Automates search and summarization of knowledge from a Notion database using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. Utilizes Notion API for querying database contents and LangChain for managing AI agent memory and tool integration, enabling concise, fact-based Q&A from company knowledge bases.

name: Weekly Notion Task Summary Email & Push
description: Automates weekly retrieval of tasks from Notion, filters and sorts by deadlines, generates styled HTML emails grouping overdue and upcoming tasks, and sends updates via email and Pushover push notifications. Uses Notion API, SMTP, and Pushover within n8n.

name: Notion to Webflow Blog Post Sync
description: Automate syncing blog posts from Notion to Webflow using n8n. Converts Notion rich text blocks to HTML, manages slug uniqueness, updates or creates posts in Webflow, and sends Slack notifications. Integrates Notion API, Webflow API, Slack, and n8n workflow automation.

name: CallForge AI Sales Call Data to Notion
description: Automates extraction and organization of AI-processed sales call data into Notion. Integrates Gong AI transcripts, Notion databases, and handles product feedback and AI use cases with rate limiting and data validation for streamlined CRM insights.

name: Weekly Notion Ideas Summary to Slack
description: Automates weekly aggregation of new product ideas from a Notion database, filters by UX-related ideas, counts unique entries, and posts a summary message to a specified Slack channel. Utilizes Notion API, Slack API, and n8n's scheduling and data processing nodes.

name: Sync Jira Issues & Comments to Notion DB
description: Automates syncing Jira issue events (created, updated, deleted) with a Notion database, updating issue details and statuses in real-time. Utilizes Jira Webhooks, Notion API, conditional logic (IF, Switch nodes), and JavaScript for data transformation in n8n.

name: DeepResearcher: AI-Powered Notion Research
description: Automates deep topic research by querying web SERPs, extracting key learnings via OpenAI GPT and Google Gemini, and organizing findings into Notion. Integrates OpenAI and Google Gemini chat models with Notion API for structured expert-level research synthesis.

name: Retell Call Data Auto-Saver
description: Automates saving Retell AI call analysis data from webhook into Airtable, Google Sheets, and Notion. Utilizes Retell webhooks, Airtable API, Google Sheets API, and Notion API to store call transcripts, summaries, sentiment, and cost details in structured databases.

name: AI Sales Call Data to Notion DB
description: Automates extraction and organization of sales call insights like competitors, integrations, objections, and use cases using AI-generated data. Utilizes n8n with Notion API, handling data splitting, aggregation, and rate limiting to update multiple Notion databases for sales analytics.

name: Notion to Clockify Sync Automation
description: Automates synchronization of clients, projects, and tasks between Notion and Clockify using n8n. Employs Notion and Clockify APIs, scheduled triggers, webhooks, and dataset comparisons to ensure data consistency and archive outdated entries.

name: Notion AI Knowledge Base Assistant
description: This n8n workflow creates an AI agent that queries and summarizes data from a Notion knowledge base using OpenAI's GPT-4o model. It integrates Notion API for database search and content retrieval, Langchain for AI memory and tool use, enabling concise, fact-based answers from Notion data.

name: Notion Work Time & Break Tracker
description: Automates work time tracking by logging start, break, and end times in Notion using n8n webhook. Integrates Notion API with conditional logic for real-time updates, perfect for personal or team productivity monitoring.

name: Todoist to Notion Task Sync
description: Automates syncing of Todoist tasks labeled 'send-to-notion' into a Notion database, updating tasks with Notion links. Utilizes Todoist API (OAuth2) and Notion API, triggered on schedule to keep both apps aligned seamlessly.

name: Notion Content Blocks Markdown Sync
description: Automates syncing Notion database updates by converting Notion blocks to Markdown and back. Uses Notion API, n8n Notion Trigger, HTTP Request, and custom JS code to preserve rich text formatting including headings, lists, and annotations for seamless content manipulation.

name: CallForge AI Sales Call Processor
description: An n8n workflow integrating Gong API, Notion, Google Sheets, and OpenAI to automate extraction, enrichment, and processing of sales call transcripts for actionable insights and error correction in Gong calls.

name: CallForge Sales Call AI Summarizer
description: Automates extraction and organization of sales call data from Gong into Notion. Uses n8n with Notion API, Slack API, and AI subworkflows to analyze calls, update databases, and send progress alerts. Ideal for sales teams wanting streamlined call analysis and tracking.

name: Audio Transcription & Summarization to Notion
description: Automates transcription of audio files from Google Drive using OpenAI Whisper, summarizes content via GPT-4 Turbo, and stores structured summaries in Notion. Utilizes Google Drive Trigger, OpenAI API, and Notion API for seamless audio content management.

name: AI Sales Call Insights to Notion
description: Automates processing of AI-generated sales call data with Notion integration. Extracts Marketing Insights, Recurring Topics, and Actionable Insights from Gong calls, then organizes and updates them in separate Notion databases. Uses n8n workflow automation with Notion API.

name: Sync Notion Task Updates with ClickUp
description: Automates two-way synchronization between Notion and ClickUp task statuses using Notion API triggers and ClickUp webhooks. Ensures task updates in Notion reflect in ClickUp and vice versa for seamless project management.

name: Notion Team & Project Management Automation
description: Automates creation and management of team members, projects, and semesters in Notion. Uses n8n with Notion API, webhooks, and JavaScript for data processing. Ideal for educational or organizational project tracking and user-semester-project relations.

name: Gmail to Notion Automated Email Processing
description: Automates converting Gmail emails into structured Notion pages using Gmail API, Airtable for route management, OpenAI GPT-4o for email summarization and task extraction, and Notion API. Filters and labels emails to prevent duplicates, sends error notifications, and manages active workflows.

name: Typeform Feedback Sentiment & Task Automator
description: Automates processing of Typeform feedback by analyzing sentiment with Google Cloud NLP. Positive feedback triggers entries to Notion and Trello, and notifications sent via Slack. Integrates Typeform, Google Cloud Natural Language API, Notion, Trello, and Slack for streamlined feedback management.

name: Calendly to Notion Contact Logger
description: Automates capturing new Calendly invitee info and logs it into a Notion database. Uses Calendly API webhook to trigger on invitee creation and Notion API to add pages with invitee name, email, and status for streamlined contact management.

name: Notion-SIGNL4 Alert Management Workflow
description: Automates alert handling by integrating Notion database monitoring with SIGNL4 incident management. Uses n8n to process incoming alerts via webhook, update Notion status fields, and send or resolve SIGNL4 alerts accordingly. Tech stack: n8n, Notion API, SIGNL4 API.

name: Calendly Leads to Notion via Dropcontact
description: Automates lead capture from Calendly invitees, enriches data using Dropcontact API, and logs detailed lead info in Notion database, including contact, company, and scheduling details. Integrates Calendly webhook, Dropcontact API, and Notion API for streamlined CRM.

name: Asana to Notion Task Sync
description: Automates syncing tasks from Asana to Notion via their APIs using n8n. Triggered by Asana updates, it creates or updates Notion database pages with task info and deadlines, ensuring task data consistency across both platforms.

name: GitHub Issues Notion Sync
description: Automates synchronization of GitHub issues with a Notion database using GitHub webhook trigger and Notion API integration in n8n. It creates, updates, archives, and manages issue states inside Notion, enabling seamless issue tracking within a Notion workspace.

name: Notion Pages to Supabase Vectors with OpenAI
description: Automates storing Notion page texts as vector embeddings in Supabase using OpenAI API. Triggers on new Notion pages, fetches and filters content, summarizes text, generates embeddings, and saves them in a Supabase vector column for efficient semantic search.

name: Slack Idea Capture to Notion Logger
description: An n8n workflow enabling Slack slash command /idea to capture user ideas and log them automatically into a Notion database. It uses Slack Webhooks, Notion API, and n8n automation to streamline idea collection and collaboration.

name: Notion To Do to Slack Reminder
description: Automates daily checks of Notion to-dos assigned to a specific user, sending reminders via Slack DMs. Utilizes Notion API for task retrieval and Slack API for messaging, triggered every morning at 8AM to streamline task management and notifications.

name: Sync Outlook Calendar with Notion Database
description: This n8n workflow automates syncing events from Microsoft Outlook Calendar to a Notion database. It fetches calendar events via Microsoft Graph API OAuth2, checks for existing pages in Notion, and creates or updates them accordingly.

name: Hugging Face Paper Auto-Import to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of research papers from Hugging Face, uses HTML scraping, OpenAI GPT-4O for abstract analysis, and stores enriched metadata in Notion. Integrates Hugging Face API, OpenAI API, and Notion API for academic paper management.

name: Notion Empty Page Archiver
description: Automates daily archiving of empty pages in Notion databases using the Notion API. Checks all databases and pages, analyzes page content and properties, and archives those with no meaningful content to keep Notion workspace tidy.

name: Automated Company Review & News Insights
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT-4, SerpApi, and Notion API to automate gathering and analyzing company reviews, news, and product offerings. It scrapes review sites, summarizes pros/cons, tracks sentiment, and updates Notion for competitive analysis.

name: Threads to Notion Post Archiver
description: Automates fetching recent Instagram Threads posts and comments using Threads API, filters and formats media and text content, then archives them into a Notion database with media embeds. Uses n8n, Threads API, and Notion API for seamless social media content archival.

name: Notion Task Reminders via Slack
description: Automates daily weekday reminders of incomplete tasks from a Notion database by sending personalized Slack direct messages. Uses Notion API, Slack API with OAuth2, and cron scheduling to match task assignees with Slack users for timely task alerts.

name: Notion Duplicate Page Archiver
description: An n8n workflow using Notion API and custom JavaScript to identify and archive duplicate pages in a Notion database based on a specified property. Triggers daily or upon page creation to maintain a clean database automatically.

name: Sync New Clients from Notion to Clockify
description: Automate client management by syncing new clients from a Notion database to Clockify workspace using n8n. Utilizes Notion API as trigger and Clockify API to add clients automatically, streamlining project tracking setup.

name: Hugging Face Paper Summarizer to Notion
description: Automates daily extraction of new research papers from Hugging Face, analyzes abstracts using OpenAI GPT-4O, and stores structured summaries in Notion. Tech stack includes Hugging Face API, HTML extraction, OpenAI API (GPT-4O), and Notion API integration.

name: Notion to Supabase Vector Storage with OpenAI
description: Automates storing textual content from new Notion pages as vector documents in Supabase using OpenAI embeddings. Integrates Notion (page trigger, content retrieval), OpenAI (text embeddings), and Supabase (vector column storage) to enable efficient semantic search and organization.

name: Notion to Mattermost Meeting Alerts
description: Automates notifications in Mattermost when new meeting notes are added to a Notion database for the Marketing team. Uses Notion Trigger node to monitor Notion API, applies conditional logic, then sends formatted messages via Mattermost API to alert team members.

name: Calendly to Notion Personality Sync
description: Automates the creation of Notion database pages with personality insights by triggering on new Calendly invitees, querying Humantic AI for detailed personality analysis, and storing results in Notion. Uses Calendly webhook, Humantic AI API, and Notion API.

name: URL to Notion Link Logger
description: This n8n workflow uses Webhook, HTTP Request, HTML Extract, and Notion API to capture URLs, fetch page titles, and add them as entries into a Notion database. It includes Discord reply confirmation. Automates link organization with webpage title retrieval.

name: User Signup & Notion Semester Tracker
description: Automates user signup via a secure HTTP webhook, extracts user name and email, checks existence in Notion database, creates new user if absent, and updates their associated semester info. Uses n8n with Notion API and basic auth for secure, streamlined academic user management.

name: Google Drive to Notion File Logger
description: Automates logging of newly uploaded Google Drive files to a Notion database. Uses Google Drive API trigger to detect file uploads in a specific folder and Notion API to create database entries with file details and links. Ideal for file management and tracking.

name: Clockify Invoice to Notion Logger
description: Automates logging of new Clockify invoices into a Notion database using Clockify webhook and Notion API. Captures invoice number, issue date, due date, and amount for centralized invoice tracking and management.

name: Save URLs to Notion via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that uses a POST webhook to capture URLs and automatically saves them as pages in a specified Notion bookmarks database, enabling easy bookmarking and organization. Tech stack: n8n, Notion API, Webhook.

name: n8n Workflow Sync to Notion Database
description: Automates syncing of n8n workflows tagged 'sync-to-notion' with a Notion database. Uses n8n API to fetch workflows every 15 mins, then queries and updates or adds corresponding pages in Notion via Notion API. Ideal for workflow management and monitoring.

name: Property-Based Lead Qualification Workflow
description: Automates lead qualification by integrating CRM leads with BatchData's Property Lookup API. Fetches lead data, verifies property details, applies a scoring system, updates CRM, and routes high-value leads with Slack alerts and task creation. Uses webhook, HTTP requests, and code nodes.

name: Auto SEO Blog Writer with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
description: Automates full SEO blog content creation: collects fresh research via Perplexity API, generates SEO-optimized articles with GPT-4o, publishes to WordPress, sends Gmail & Slack notifications, and logs to Notion. Integrates OpenAI, Perplexity, WordPress, Gmail, Slack, and Notion via n8n.

name: Real Estate Market Scanner & Alert System
description: Automates real estate property scanning using BatchData API. Schedules hourly searches, compares new and changed listings, filters high-equity absentee owner properties, and sends detailed email and Slack alerts to sales teams. Built with n8n, BatchData API, email SMTP, and Slack API.

name: AI-Powered Topic Monitoring & Summarization
description: Automates monitoring of RSS feeds with AI using OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for relevance classification and article summarization, Jina AI for content extraction, Google Sheets for data storage, and Slack for delivering formatted summaries. Keeps teams informed about relevant topics efficiently.

name: Suspicious Login Detection Workflow
description: An n8n workflow for detecting suspicious logins using GreyNoise API for IP threat intelligence, IP-API for geolocation, UserParser for user agent analysis, and Postgres for login history. It prioritizes alerts and notifies via Slack and email for security response.

name: URL & IP Threat Intel Scan and Report
description: An n8n workflow integrating VirusTotal and Greynoise APIs to scan URLs and IPs for threat intelligence. It accepts URLs/IPs via webhook or form, performs DNS lookups, submits to VirusTotal for URL scanning, queries Greynoise for IP context, merges results, and sends detailed reports via Slack and email.

name: Slack to Google Calendar Event Automator
description: Automates event creation and attendee management by monitoring Slack channel invites with calendar emoji, using OpenAI, SerpAPI, and Google Calendar APIs to parse event details, create events, and sync attendee reactions efficiently.

name: IT Support Slack AI Bot
description: Automates IT support in Slack by integrating Slack Events API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Confluence KB via n8n. It filters bot messages, acknowledges queries, uses AI with memory buffer, and fetches contextual info from Confluence for precise IT assistance.

name: Slack-ServiceNow Incident Lookup
description: Automates incident retrieval from ServiceNow via Slack slash command using n8n workflow. Integrates Slack Webhook, ServiceNow API (Basic Auth), and conditional responses in Slack blocks, enabling seamless incident details inquiry and notifications directly in Slack channels.

name: Company Decision Maker Discovery Automation
description: Automates extraction and enrichment of company and decision-maker data using Apollo.io APIs, Google Sheets, Slack, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for department classification and company summarization. Outputs curated contact lists and weekly reports for sales/marketing lead generation.

name: Auto-Resolve Long-Lived Jira Issues with AI
description: Automates detection, classification, and resolution of long-lived Jira issues using n8n workflows integrated with OpenAI GPT-4, Jira API, Notion, and Slack. Supports sentiment analysis, AI-driven knowledgebase search, and team notifications to improve customer support efficiency.

name: Automated RFP Response Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates RFP processing by extracting questions from PDF RFP documents using LLMs, generating answers via OpenAI Assistants enriched with company data, and compiling responses into Google Docs. Notifications are sent via Gmail and Slack upon completion.

name: CrowdStrike Detection to Jira & Slack
description: Automates cybersecurity alert handling by fetching new CrowdStrike detections, enriching them via VirusTotal API, creating Jira tickets, and notifying teams on Slack. Built with n8n featuring CrowdStrike, VirusTotal, Jira, and Slack integrations for streamlined incident management.

name: Slack IT Support AI Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API, OpenAI GPT-4, and Confluence API to automate IT support queries via Slack. It verifies webhooks, filters bot messages, acknowledges user queries, fetches knowledge base results, and uses AI to generate tailored IT responses, improving IT helpdesk efficiency.

name: AI SEO Keyword Research Automation
description: Automates SEO keyword research using OpenAI GPT for topic expansion and competitor analysis, integrates DataForSEO API for keyword metrics, and manages workflow with NocoDB and Slack notifications. Generates actionable SEO strategies and content briefs for targeted content creation.

name: Slack AI Chatbot with RAG for Staff
description: An AI-powered Slack chatbot for company staff that uses OpenAI and Anthropic models with Qdrant vector search to retrieve and answer employee queries from internal documents. Integrates Slack API, Google Drive, and Langchain nodes for seamless RAG support and real-time help.

name: Slack to Linear AI Ticket Generator
description: Automates support ticket creation by scanning Slack #n8n-tickets channel for messages tagged with 🎫, uses OpenAI to generate ticket title, summary, priority, and suggestions, and creates tickets in Linear. Utilizes Slack API, OpenAI GPT, and Linear API.

description: Automates workflow for Stripe invoice payments: triggers on payment success, searches and updates HubSpot deals by PO number, and sends detailed Slack notifications to accounting team. Uses Stripe API, HubSpot API (OAuth2), and Slack for seamless payment tracking.

description: An AI-powered n8n workflow integrating Clockify API and Slack to manage time entries via conversational chat. Uses OpenAI GPT for natural language processing, supports creating, updating, deleting time logs with user confirmation, and includes tools for date conversion and calculations.

name: AI-Powered Outlook Calendar Assistant
description: Automate Outlook calendar management via Slack with an AI agent using OpenAI for natural language understanding and Microsoft Outlook API for calendar event search, creation, and retrieval. Enables conversational calendar assistance and event handling.

name: Slack Weekly Team Activity Report
description: Automates the creation of weekly team activity reports from Slack messages using Slack API and Google Gemini LLM. It fetches last week's messages, summarizes threads, generates individual and team reports, and posts them back to Slack every Monday at 6am.

name: Daily Meeting Summary with Gemini AI & Slack
description: Automates daily meeting summaries by retrieving Google Calendar events, processing them with Google Gemini AI model, and sending concise summaries to a Slack channel. Uses Google Calendar API, Google PaLM API, Slack API for seamless team communication.

name: Slack-ServiceNow Incident Search Bot
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API and ServiceNow API to let Slack users search for ServiceNow incidents by priority and state via a Slack modal interface. It sends incident summaries to a selected Slack channel or DM, enhancing IT service management communication.

name: Lead Qualification & Slack Notification

name: Lead Enrichment & Airtable Update Automation
description: Automates lead data enrichment from Typeform via Dropcontact, manages contacts in Airtable, and sends notifications on Slack. Integrates Typeform, Dropcontact API, Airtable, and Slack for streamlined lead capture and CRM updates.

name: Slack AI Assistant with Google Gemini
description: An n8n workflow that receives Slack messages via webhook, processes them with Google Gemini AI and Langchain memory, and sends contextual AI-powered replies back to Slack channels, enabling interactive and persistent AI assistance within Slack.

name: Slack to Linear AI Ticket Creator
description: Automates support ticket creation by monitoring Slack with ticket emoji, uses OpenAI GPT for summarizing, titling, prioritizing issues, and creates tickets in Linear. Tech: Slack API, Linear API, OpenAI (ChatGPT) via n8n nodes.

name: AI Topic Monitoring with RSS, OpenAI, Slack
description: Automates topic monitoring by fetching RSS feeds from Google Sheets URLs, classifying relevance with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, scraping content via Jina AI, summarizing articles for Slack, and storing metadata in Google Sheets. Ideal for professionals tracking AI-related news.

name: AI-Powered Incident Management with NocoDB
description: Automates incident ticketing by integrating NocoDB for data storage, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for AI-driven incident categorization, Slack and SMTP for notifications. Streamlines issue reporting, AI prioritization, and timely alerts for clients and assignees.

name: Daily Meeting Summarizer with Gemini AI & Slack
description: Automates daily retrieval and summarization of Google Calendar meetings using Google Gemini AI model and Langchain Calendar AI Agent, then posts concise summaries back to a Slack channel. Integrates Google Calendar API, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI, Slack API, and n8n automation.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to GitHub
description: Automates backing up all n8n workflows to a GitHub repo daily. Uses n8n API and GitHub API to export workflows as JSON files organized in YYYY/MM folders. Includes Slack notifications for start, completion, and failures, ensuring reliable versioned backup.

description: Automates vulnerability scan launching and monitoring using the Qualys API, converting XML to JSON in n8n. The workflow loops to check scan status until finished, posting summaries and links to Slack channels for real-time updates. Uses n8n, Qualys API, and Slack integration.

name: Qualys Report Automation & Slack Delivery
description: Automates Qualys security report generation using Qualys API and n8n. Fetches report templates, launches reports, polls for completion, downloads results, converts XML to JSON, and posts reports to Slack for SOC teams. Uses n8n HTTP, XML, Slack nodes.

name: Automated AI-Powered JIRA Issue Resolver
description: An n8n workflow automates the management of unresolved JIRA issues using OpenAI GPT-4 models, Jira and Notion APIs, and Slack integration. It classifies issues, attempts AI-based resolution via knowledgebase search, performs sentiment analysis, posts comments, closes tickets, and notifies Slack channels, enhancing customer support efficiency.

name: Discourse Lead Enrichment & Slack Notifier
description: Automates enrichment of new Discourse community members using Clearbit API, filters common personal emails, evaluates company data for lead value, and posts high-value lead info in Slack. Utilizes Discourse webhook, Clearbit enrichment, and Slack API integration.

name: AI Support Agent with Email Verification & Slack Alert
description: An AI agent workflow using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini and LangChain framework in n8n. It checks user input for an email, prompts for it if missing, or alerts a Slack channel for human support. Integrates chat triggers, memory buffer, and conditional logic for support escalation.

name: Airtable Automated Recurring Task Creator
description: Automates recurring task creation using Airtable API in n8n. It retrieves task templates, assignees, clients, calculates task dates, creates new tasks, updates automation records, and optionally notifies assignees via Slack.

name: G2 Competitor Review Monitor
