description: Automates daily monitoring of competitor reviews on G2 using ScrapingBee API for scraping, extracts and converts review data to Markdown, stores results in Google Sheets, and sends new review alerts to Slack for real-time team updates.

name: Weekly Notion Ideas Summary to Slack
description: Automates weekly aggregation of new product ideas from a Notion database, filters by UX-related ideas, counts unique entries, and posts a summary message to a specified Slack channel. Utilizes Notion API, Slack API, and n8n's scheduling and data processing nodes.

name: HubSpot & Lemlist Hiring Lead Automation
description: Automates hiring lead management by integrating Lonescale job intent webhook with Dropcontact enrichment, HubSpot CRM for company/contact handling, Lemlist campaigns, and Slack notifications. Tech stack: HubSpot API, Lemlist API, Dropcontact API, Slack API.

name: Pipedrive Organization Data Enrichment
description: Automates enrichment of Pipedrive organizations by scraping their website using ScrapingBee, summarizing company info with OpenAI GPT-4o, adding a detailed note in Pipedrive, and sending Slack notifications. Utilizes Pipedrive API, ScrapingBee API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Slack integration.

name: Competitor Pricing Monitor & Alert System
description: Automates monitoring competitor pricing by fetching URLs from Google Sheets, using Airtop AI to summarize and compare pricing plans, filters changes, updates the sheet, and sends Slack alerts. Integrates Google Sheets API, Airtop AI, and Slack API.

name: Venafi Slack CertBot: Automated Cert Requests
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API, Venafi TLS Protect Cloud, VirusTotal, and OpenAI to automate Certificate Signing Requests. Uses Slack modals for inputs, VirusTotal for domain risk analysis, AI for report generation, and conditionally auto-issues or requests manual approval.

name: Qualys Slack Bot for Vulnerability Scans & Reporting
description: Automates security operations by integrating Slack with Qualys API. Users trigger vulnerability scans and generate detailed reports via Slack modals. Employs Slack API for interactive workflows and Qualys for scanning and report generation, enhancing security task efficiency.

name: Slack Image Upload to S3 via Modal
description: n8n workflow automates Slack interactions to upload images (.jpg, .png, .pdf) to an S3 bucket. Uses Slack Events API and Modals for user input, downloads files from Slack, uploads to S3, and posts links back to a Slack channel, enhancing file sharing efficiency.

name: Slack AI Chatbot with n8n Slash Commands
description: This n8n workflow enables creating a Slack AI chatbot using slash commands, integrating Slack Webhook and Slack API with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini through LangChain nodes. It automates command handling, AI response generation, and posting messages back to Slack channels.

name: Daylight Saving Time Change Notifier
description: Automates detection of Daylight Saving Time changes for specified timezones. Uses n8n with JavaScript code for timezone handling, Slack API for notifications, and SMTP for email alerts. Helps users adjust schedules by notifying upcoming DST shifts.

name: Daily RSS to Slack Post
description: Automates fetching yesterday's RSS feed posts from a blog and posts them as formatted messages to a Slack channel every morning at 8 AM. Utilizes n8n workflow with RSS Feed Read, DateTime, Slack API, and custom JavaScript for message building.

name: HubSpot Email Validation & Alert Workflow
description: Automates validation of new HubSpot contact emails using HubSpot APIs and OneSimple API; sends Slack alerts for suspicious emails. Ensures contact email quality by checking deliverability, domain validity, and disposability, improving CRM data integrity.

name: Slack Webhook Signature Verification
description: An n8n workflow to securely verify Slack webhook signatures using HMAC SHA256 and Slack's signing secret. It ensures received requests are authentic by reconstructing the signature from headers and body, preventing forgery or unauthorized bots.

name: Typeform Issue Reporting & Notification
description: Automates capturing user feedback from Typeform, logs entries to Google Sheets, filters high-severity issues (severity >7), then sends alerts via Slack and email. Integrates Typeform API, Google Sheets API, Slack API, and SMTP for notifications, simplifying issue tracking.

name: AI-Generated LinkedIn Advice Contributor
description: Automates weekly Google search for LinkedIn advice articles, extracts article info, generates unique AI advice with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, then posts results to Slack and stores contributions in NocoDB. Integrates Google Search, HTML parsing, OpenAI, Slack, and NocoDB.

name: Slack Command Handler with Dynamic Workflow Calls
description: An n8n workflow integrating Slack API to process slash commands, validate incoming requests securely, and dynamically trigger sub-workflows based on commands. Uses Slack API, HTTP requests, and conditional logic to provide customizable bot commands and threaded conversations.

name: Pipedrive Lead Enrichment & Slack Alerts
description: Automates the enrichment of Pipedrive leads with Clearbit data and sends filtered high-value lead alerts to Slack. Utilizes Pipedrive API, Clearbit API, and Slack API, running every 5 minutes to update and notify sales teams about potential B2B leads with revenue and employee criteria.

name: CallForge Sales Call AI Summarizer
description: Automates extraction and organization of sales call data from Gong into Notion. Uses n8n with Notion API, Slack API, and AI subworkflows to analyze calls, update databases, and send progress alerts. Ideal for sales teams wanting streamlined call analysis and tracking.

name: Dropcontact Bulk Profile Enrichment
description: Automates enriching LinkedIn profiles without emails using Dropcontact API, PostgreSQL for profile data storage, Python for data transformation, and Slack notifications. Processes profiles in batches asynchronously, ideal for large-scale contact data enrichment.

name: Lemlist Reply Auto-Categorizer & Slack Alerts
description: Automate classification of Lemlist email replies using OpenAI GPT-4o and send structured Slack notifications. Features include auto-unsubscribe and marking interested leads via Lemlist API integration. Workflow uses n8n with Lemlist, OpenAI, Slack APIs.

name: GitHub Release Updates to Slack
description: Automates monitoring of GitHub repo releases using RSS feeds, caches release IDs in Redis, processes release notes with Google Gemini AI to extract and translate key info to Chinese, and posts formatted updates to Slack channels with error notifications.

name: Slack Water Drinking Reminder with AI Motivate
description: Automates water intake reminders via Slack using Google Sheets for logging, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for personalized motivational messages, and iOS shortcuts integration. Encourages healthy hydration with friendly AI-generated advice and tracks drinking habits.

name: HubSpot Deal Line Items Copier
description: Automates copying line items from a won HubSpot deal to a newly created deal using HubSpot API and n8n. It fetches deals, retrieves line items and SKUs, gets product info by SKUs, creates line items for the new deal, and sends Slack notifications.

name: CSV to JSON Conversion API
description: An n8n workflow that converts CSV files or raw CSV text to JSON format using webhook POST requests. It uses n8n nodes for file extraction, CSV parsing via JavaScript code, and conditional branching. Supports error handling with Slack notifications for conversion errors.

name: ServiceNow Incident Alerts to Slack
description: Automates fetching new ServiceNow incidents every 5 minutes and posts detailed incident notifications to a Slack channel. Utilizes ServiceNow API, Slack API, and n8n scheduling and sorting nodes for real-time IT incident monitoring and team alerting.

name: Linear Issue Sentiment Monitoring & Alerting
description: Automates monitoring of Linear app issues using GraphQL, performs sentiment analysis on issue comments via OpenAI's Chat Model, stores results in Airtable, and sends Slack alerts on negative sentiment transitions. Enables proactive issue management with n8n automation.

name: Multi-Step Newsletter Signup & Survey
description: This n8n workflow captures newsletter signups and further user details via chained multi-page forms, storing data in Google Sheets and sending Slack alerts. Tech stack: n8n built-in Form and FormTrigger nodes, Google Sheets API, Slack API. Ideal for onboarding and lead capture.

name: Linear to Productboard Sync Automation
description: Automates syncing project status and target end dates from Linear to Productboard features using their APIs. Updates Productboard features' status and timeframe, and sends notifications via Slack. Tech stack: n8n, Linear API, Productboard API, Slack API.

name: Productboard to Snowflake Data Sync
description: An n8n workflow automating import of Productboard notes, companies, and features into Snowflake data warehouse, using Productboard API and Snowflake DB nodes. Includes Slack notifications for weekly updates and Metabase dashboard linking.

name: Linear Issue Sentiment Monitoring & Alerts
description: Automates sentiment analysis on updated Linear.app issue comments using OpenAI, stores insights in Airtable, and sends Slack alerts on negative sentiment transitions, enabling proactive support issue management. Tech stack: Linear GraphQL API, OpenAI, Airtable, Slack, n8n.

name: BambooHR Webhook Testing with PostBin & Slack
description: This n8n workflow enables testing BambooHR webhooks without changing webhook URLs by using PostBin for request capturing and Slack for notifications. It integrates BambooHR API, PostBin API, Slack API, and OpenAI to monitor HR data changes and send welcome messages.

name: Auto Slack Channels for Webflow Forms
description: Automates creation of Slack channels named after Webflow forms, sending form submissions as Slack messages. Utilizes Webflow trigger and Slack API with Bot OAuth token. Also notifies #general channel for new channels, enabling seamless team communication.

name: Slack Notify & Jira Ticket for Quarantined Emails
description: Automates incident response by notifying quarantined email recipients via Slack using Slack API and Sublime Security API, and creates Jira tickets for opened suspicious emails. Integrates Sublime Security webhook, Slack user lookup, and Jira Software Cloud for security alert management.

name: DMARC Report Email Parser & DB Logger
description: Automates processing of DMARC reports by monitoring IMAP email for XML attachments, unzipping and parsing them into JSON, mapping the data into a MySQL database, and sending notifications via Slack/email on SPF or DKIM failures. Uses n8n automation with email, compression, XML, MySQL, and Slack nodes.

name: GitHub Multi-Repo Webhook Monitor
description: Automates monitoring of multiple GitHub repositories using GitHub Webhooks and n8n. Registers/deletes webhooks programmatically, listens to push and pull request events, and sends notifications via Telegram (Slack optional). Uses GitHub API and n8n HTTP, Webhook, and Telegram nodes.

name: Venafi Slack CertBot Automation
description: Automates SSL certificate requests via Slack using Venafi TLS Protect Cloud, VirusTotal for domain risk analysis, and OpenAI for risk summarization, enabling auto or manual CSR issuance with Slack modal interactions and security validation workflows.

name: Scheduled Website Uptime Monitor
description: An n8n workflow that checks website statuses every 6 hours using HTTP requests, reads target URLs from Google Sheets, logs uptime events back to Sheets, and sends alerts via Gmail and Slack upon downtime. Uses Google Sheets API, HTTP Request node, Gmail and Slack integrations.

name: Automated RFP Q&A Generator
description: Automates RFP responses by extracting questions from PDF RFPs using n8n with Langchain AI (OpenAI), creates Google Docs for answers, and sends notifications via Gmail and Slack. Enables efficient, AI-powered RFP answering and improves sales team productivity.

name: Notion to Webflow Blog Post Sync
description: Automate syncing blog posts from Notion to Webflow using n8n. Converts Notion rich text blocks to HTML, manages slug uniqueness, updates or creates posts in Webflow, and sends Slack notifications. Integrates Notion API, Webflow API, Slack, and n8n workflow automation.

name: Notion Task Reminders via Slack
description: Automates daily weekday reminders of incomplete tasks from a Notion database by sending personalized Slack direct messages. Uses Notion API, Slack API with OAuth2, and cron scheduling to match task assignees with Slack users for timely task alerts.

name: Weather Updates via Slack
description: Automates fetching weather forecasts using OpenStreetMap and US National Weather Service APIs, then posts detailed weather info to Slack channels via OAuth2 authentication. Ideal for real-time weather notifications triggered by Slack messages.

name: AI-Powered Linear Bug Ticket Team Classifier
description: This n8n workflow automates bug ticket triage in Linear by using OpenAI GPT-4 to classify tickets and assign them to the correct team. It integrates Linear API, OpenAI API, and Slack to streamline issue management and team notifications.

name: Urgent Bug Alert from Linear to Slack
description: Automates notifications for urgent bugs by triggering on Linear issue events, filtering by priority and label, transforming data, and sending alerts to Slack channels using Linear API, n8n workflow, and Slack API.

name: Zendesk Unassigned Tickets to Slack
description: Automates sending unassigned Zendesk tickets with status and subject to a Slack channel using Zendesk API, Slack API, and n8n workflow automation. Runs daily at 16:30 to keep teams informed about pending support tickets.

name: GitHub Repo Release Notifier with Slack
description: Automates daily checks of latest GitHub releases for specified repos (n8n-io/n8n, home-assistant/core) using GitHub API, and sends Slack notifications for new releases. Utilizes n8n workflow with HTTP Request, Schedule Trigger, Slack nodes.

name: Slack Command to ClickUp Task Creator
description: Automate task creation in ClickUp from Slack slash commands. Uses Slack Webhook API, n8n for workflow automation, and ClickUp OAuth2 API to create tasks with command text. Simplifies managing tasks across Slack and ClickUp for teams.

name: n8n Slack Error Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on any error in other workflows and sends a formatted alert message to a Slack channel (#alerts-n8n-workflows) using Slack API. Includes customizable error details and quick setup instructions.

name: Slack Ideas to Google Sheets Logger
description: Automates idea collection from Slack via a slash command (/idea), storing submissions in Google Sheets. Utilizes Slack API for command triggers, Google Sheets API for data storage, and n8n webhook and workflow nodes for integration and automation.

name: Slack to Linear Bug Reporting Workflow
description: Automates bug reporting by capturing Slack /bug commands and creating detailed issues in Linear via GraphQL API. Utilizes Slack Webhooks and Linear OAuth2 API for team and label management. Ideal for streamlined developer bug tracking.

name: HubSpot Lead Alerts to Slack
description: Automates lead monitoring by fetching new companies created in HubSpot within the last 5 minutes, filters those with annual revenue over $5M, and sends detailed Slack notifications to sales reps. Uses HubSpot API, Slack API, and n8n scheduling for real-time lead alerts.

name: Slack AI Agent with Gilfoyle Persona
description: An n8n workflow creating a Slack AI chat agent mimicking Gilfoyle's blunt persona from Silicon Valley. Uses Slack webhook, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, LangChain AI agent with SerpAPI and Wikipedia tools, plus memory buffer for conversation context retention. Filters bot messages and posts AI replies in Slack channels.

name: Automated Email Reply Handling & CRM Sync
description: This n8n workflow automates email reply categorization using OpenAI, managing leads in Lemlist and HubSpot, and notifying teams via Slack. It integrates Lemlist API, HubSpot CRM, Slack API, and OpenAI GPT for lead status updates, unsubscribes, deal creation, and follow-ups.

name: Upwork Job Scraper & Notifier
description: Automates scraping of fresh Upwork job posts using Apify API, filters based on working hours, stores unique jobs in MongoDB, and sends notifications to Slack #general channel. Utilizes MongoDB, Slack API, Apify, and n8n's scheduling for continuous job updates.

name: Zendesk to Slack Ticket Sync
description: Automates syncing of new Zendesk tickets to Slack threads using Zendesk API and Slack OAuth2. Creates or updates Slack threads with ticket info, keeping support communication organized across platforms.

name: Slack Channel Setup and Messaging Automation
description: Automates Slack workflow: creates a channel, invites users, posts a welcome message with attachments, and uploads files. Utilizes Slack API via n8n Slack nodes and HTTP Request node for fetching files. Ideal for team onboarding and communication setup.

name: Slack-Triggered GDPR Data Deletion
description: An n8n workflow automating GDPR data deletion requests via Slack slash commands. It validates tokens, parses 'delete <email>' commands, triggers deletion workflows for Paddle, Customer.io, Zendesk, logs results in Airtable, and responds back on Slack. Integrates Slack API, Airtable, and custom workflows.

name: Daily Google Calendar to Slack Reminder
description: An n8n workflow that fetches all events from a Google Calendar, filters events for today's date in Asia/Qatar timezone, formats event details, and sends a daily summary message to a specified Slack channel. Uses Google Calendar API and Slack API with timezone and date/time manipulations.

name: HubSpot Deal Automation & Notification
description: Automates HubSpot deal processing using HubSpot API triggers, categorizes deals by stage, creates tickets with priority in HubSpot, logs lost deals in Airtable, sends Slack notifications on deal closure, and generates Google Slides presentations for scheduled demos.

name: Calendly to Pipedrive + Slack Follow-up
description: Automates meeting logs and follow-up reminders by triggering on new Calendly invites, creating Pipedrive activities, scheduling a feedback reminder after the meeting, and notifying the sales team in Slack. Integrates Calendly API, Pipedrive API, Slack API, and n8n for workflow orchestration.

name: Weekly Shopify Sales Report Automation
description: Automates weekly extraction of Shopify orders, calculates total orders and revenue, records data in Google Sheets, and posts a summary to a Slack channel. Uses Shopify API, Google Sheets API via OAuth2, Slack API, and n8n Cron trigger.

name: Google Calendar Sync to Slack & Philips Hue
description: Automates syncing Google Calendar events to update Slack status and Philips Hue lights in real-time. Uses Google Calendar API, Slack API, and HTTP webhooks for Philips Hue integration. Ideal for visual and status-based meeting notifications in teams.

name: Auto-Update Zoom Meeting & WP Redirect
description: Automates creating Zoom recurring meetings via OAuth2, updates a WordPress page with a meta refresh redirect to the Zoom join URL, and notifies a Slack channel. Uses Zoom API, WordPress API, Slack API and a cron trigger for scheduling.

name: Slack Idea Capture to Notion Logger
description: An n8n workflow enabling Slack slash command /idea to capture user ideas and log them automatically into a Notion database. It uses Slack Webhooks, Notion API, and n8n automation to streamline idea collection and collaboration.

name: Notion To Do to Slack Reminder
description: Automates daily checks of Notion to-dos assigned to a specific user, sending reminders via Slack DMs. Utilizes Notion API for task retrieval and Slack API for messaging, triggered every morning at 8AM to streamline task management and notifications.

name: Automated YouTube to X Post Generator
description: This n8n workflow automates fetching the latest YouTube videos, uses OpenAI GPT-4O-MINI to generate engaging X (Twitter) posts under 220 characters, and posts them automatically via the X API. It also logs posts in Google Sheets and supports Slack, Discord, and Gmail notifications.

name: Slack AI Chatbot via Slash Commands
description: Creates an AI chatbot integrated with Slack using n8n workflows, Slack slash commands, and OpenAI GPT-4o-mini. Handles webhook triggers, command routing with switch nodes, AI response generation via Langchain/OpenAI, and sends messages back to Slack channels for interactive chatbot functionality.

name: Slack GitHub User Info Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that fetches GitHub user details including name, company, location, avatar, and emails via GitHub GraphQL API, triggered by Slack messages using Slack webhook and OAuth2 integration.

name: Confluence Knowledge Base Query Tool
description: Automates IT support by transforming Slack user queries using OpenAI GPT-4, then searching Confluence via its API to return relevant KB article titles, links, and excerpts. Integrates n8n, OpenAI, and Confluence APIs for efficient knowledge retrieval.

name: Twitter Sentiment ETL Pipeline
description: Automates fetching #OnThisDay tweets via Twitter API, storing texts in MongoDB, analyzing sentiment with Google Cloud Natural Language, saving results in Postgres, and alerting via Slack if sentiment score is high. Built with n8n for daily ETL workflow automation.

name: Pipedrive Org Data Enrichment with GPT-4 and ScrapingBee
description: Automates enriching new Pipedrive organizations by scraping their website with ScrapingBee, summarizing company info via OpenAI GPT-4o, creating detailed Pipedrive notes, and sending formatted Slack alerts. Integrates Pipedrive API, ScrapingBee API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and Slack API.

name: Slack-Qualys Vulnerability Scan Bot
description: Automates vulnerability scans and report generation in Qualys via Slack using Slack Events API, modals, and Qualys API integrations. Enables users to start scans and create detailed reports through interactive Slack modals with real-time feedback.

name: Linear Bug Ticket Auto-Classifier
description: Automates classification of bug tickets in Linear using OpenAI GPT-4. It filters issues that need triage, classifies bugs by team responsibility (customizable), updates Linear tickets, and notifies Slack if classification fails. Tech: Linear API, OpenAI GPT-4, Slack API, n8n automation.

name: Lemlist Reply Automation with Slack & OpenAI
description: Automates handling of Lemlist email replies using OpenAI GPT-4 for classification and sends categorized alerts to Slack. Also manages unsubscribe and interested lead statuses via Lemlist API. Integrates Lemlist, OpenAI GPT-4, Slack, and n8n automation.

name: Slack Command to Generate Google Meet Links
description: Automate instant Google Meet link creation from Slack using n8n. Integrates Slack slash commands, Google Calendar API (with Google Meet conferencing), and Slack API for messaging. Creates temporary calendar events, shares meet links in Slack channels, then deletes events automatically.

name: AI Summary Generator for WordPress Posts
description: Automates adding AI-generated summaries to WordPress posts using OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. Converts post HTML to Markdown, classifies summarized content, updates posts via WP REST API, and logs activity efficiently.

name: Typeform to Airtable with Slack Alert
description: Automates form submission handling by triggering on Typeform responses, extracting name and email, appending them to Airtable, and sending a Slack notification. Uses Typeform API, Airtable API, and Slack API for seamless data flow and real-time alerts.

name: Typeform Feedback Sentiment & Task Automator
description: Automates processing of Typeform feedback by analyzing sentiment with Google Cloud NLP. Positive feedback triggers entries to Notion and Trello, and notifications sent via Slack. Integrates Typeform, Google Cloud Natural Language API, Notion, Trello, and Slack for streamlined feedback management.

name: WooCommerce New Product Alert to Slack
description: Automates notifications in Slack for new WooCommerce product creations. Utilizes WooCommerce API webhook trigger to capture new product events and Slack API to send detailed messages including product name, price, sale price, link, and creation date to a specified Slack channel.

name: WooCommerce New Order Alert to Slack
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new WooCommerce orders over $100 and sends detailed notifications to a Slack channel. Integrates WooCommerce webhook API with Slack API to automate real-time order alerts for efficient sales tracking.

name: Twitter Sentiment ETL Pipeline
description: Automates daily extraction of #OnThisDay tweets via Twitter API, stores raw tweets in MongoDB, analyzes sentiment using Google Cloud Natural Language API, saves enriched data in PostgreSQL, and sends positive sentiment alerts to Slack. Built with n8n integration platform.

name: Invoice Email Alert & Approval Automation
description: Automates invoice detection from Gmail using IMAP, extracts total amounts with Mindee Invoice API, sends Slack alerts, and emails finance manager for high-value invoices above $1000. Integrates Gmail, Mindee, Slack, and SMTP for seamless invoice workflow.

name: Twitter Mention Alert to Slack
description: Automates monitoring Twitter for mentions of a specified company every 10 minutes using Twitter API; formats tweet info and posts alerts to Slack channel. Utilizes n8n, Twitter OAuth1 API, Slack API.

name: Daily Birthday Reminders from Google Contacts to Slack
description: Automates daily retrieval of Google Contacts with birthdays, filters for today's birthdays, and sends reminders to Slack channels using Google Contacts API and Slack API. Scheduled to run at 8 AM daily, ideal for team and personal birthday notifications.

name: GitHub Release Notifier to Slack
description: Automates notifications of new GitHub releases from Mesdocteurs/mda-admin-partner-api repository by triggering on release events and sending detailed messages to Slack channel 'extranet-md' using GitHub API and Slack API integration in n8n.

name: Redis Locking Workflow for Webhook Concurrency
description: An n8n workflow that uses Redis to implement distributed locking for webhook handling, preventing concurrent or duplicate executions. It parses Slack webhook payloads, checks and acquires Redis locks, conditionally executes workflows, and releases locks after completion.

name: Netlify Deploy Failure Alert to Slack
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Netlify deploy failures and sends detailed alerts to a Slack channel. Integrates Netlify webhook events with Slack API to notify teams about deployment errors instantly.

name: n8n Keyword-Based Community Topic Tracker
description: Automates tracking of new topics matching a keyword on the n8n community forum using n8n workflows. Integrates HTTP API requests to n8n community search, Google Sheets for data storage, and optional Slack and email notifications. Ideal for monitoring community discussions.

name: Daily ProductHunt AI Launch Monitor
description: This n8n workflow monitors daily ProductHunt launches related to specified products like AI Agents using Airtop API for web extraction, and sends the curated list via Slack. Automates product discovery using ProductHunt, Airtop API, and Slack integration.

name: Uber Eats Email Expense Logger
description: Automates extraction of Uber Eats order details from Gmail emails and sends formatted expense info to Slack with Moze app links, using Gmail and Slack APIs within n8n workflow for seamless delivery expense tracking.

name: Mautic Contact Email Validation Alert
description: Automates validation of new Mautic contacts' emails using One Simple API. Triggers on new contact creation, verifies email quality and domain, and sends alerts to Slack for suspicious addresses. Integrates Mautic, One Simple API, and Slack for lead quality control.

name: WooCommerce Refund Alerts to Slack
description: Automates notifications for WooCommerce store refund events over $100 by sending detailed alerts to a Slack channel. Utilizes WooCommerce API as the trigger and Slack API to deliver refund info, streamlining refund monitoring for e-commerce teams.

name: TwentyCRM Event Notifications to Email & Slack
description: An n8n workflow that receives event triggers from TwentyCRM via webhook, filters and logs event data to Google Sheets, and sends notifications to Gmail or Slack channels based on event type (e.g. deletion events emailed, others sent to Slack).

name: GitHub Stars Slack Notifier
description: Automates Slack notifications for GitHub star events on n8n's repository, using GitHub Trigger and Slack API nodes. It alerts the #general Slack channel when someone stars or unstars the repo, showing user info and star count.

name: Orlen Invoice Auto Archiver
description: Automates extraction of Orlen invoice emails, saves attachments to date-organized Google Drive folders, marks emails as read, and sends Slack notifications. Uses Gmail API, Google Drive API, Slack API, and cron scheduling in n8n.

name: XML to JSON Conversion API
description: An n8n workflow webhook that converts uploaded XML files or XML text payloads into JSON. Uses n8n's Extract From File and XML nodes, supports binary file uploads and text input, sends JSON responses, and logs errors to Slack.

name: Download Image and Post to Slack
description: An n8n workflow that downloads an image file from a specified URL using HTTP Request and then posts it to a designated Slack channel via Slack's API with OAuth2 authentication. Automates file sharing seamlessly between web and Slack.

name: Onfleet Driver Signup Slack Notification
description: Automates notifications to Slack when a new driver signs up in Onfleet. Uses Onfleet API trigger to detect new driver creation and Slack API to send messages to a specific channel, enhancing team awareness instantly.

name: HubSpot New Company Domain Validator & Alert
description: Automates monitoring of new HubSpot companies by validating their website domains via HTTP request. Suspicious or unreachable domains trigger alerts posted to Slack. Integrates HubSpot API for company data and Slack API for real-time notifications.

name: Slack Error Notification Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on any error event and sends a formatted alert to a specified Slack channel using the Slack API. It helps teams quickly identify failed workflow executions with direct links for troubleshooting.

name: Automated Email Excuse Responder
description: This n8n workflow automatically reads emails from a specific IMAP inbox, filters emails from a particular sender, generates randomized excuses using data from an Excel spreadsheet, replies to the sender via SMTP, and sends notifications to Slack channels. It integrates Email (IMAP/SMTP), Excel parsing, Slack API, and custom JavaScript logic to automate personalized email replies.

name: Notion-Triggered AI SEO Content Publisher
description: Automates creation and publishing of SEO-optimized blog posts by detecting Notion database updates. Integrates Notion API, Langchain AI, WordPress API, Gmail, and DeepSeek AI to write, publish, notify, and log content seamlessly.

name: AI-Powered Scheduled WordPress Blog Publisher
description: Automates generation, scheduling, and publishing of SEO-optimized WordPress blog posts using GPT-4o for content, Pexels API for images, and Google Sheets for data management. Features randomized delay for natural posting cadence.

name: SEO-Optimized WordPress Blog Generator
description: Automates SEO-optimized blog post creation for WordPress using Perplexity.ai for research, OpenAI GPT-4 mini for writing and HTML generation, WordPress API for publishing, and Telegram for success notifications. Ideal for content marketers and bloggers.

name: AI-Powered On-Brand Blog Article Generator
description: Automates generating brand-consistent blog drafts using n8n workflows. It scrapes latest articles from a blog, converts content to Markdown, analyzes style and voice with OpenAI LLMs, and creates new drafts saved to Wordpress for review.

name: AI Summary Automation for WordPress Posts
description: Automates creating AI-generated summary blocks for WordPress posts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, WordPress REST API, Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. It fetches posts, checks summary existence, generates summaries in HTML bullet format, updates posts, logs data, and alerts teams.

name: WordPress Automated SEO Content & Image Creator
description: Automates SEO-friendly WordPress blog posts creation using Google Sheets for ideas, DeepSeek AI for article and title generation, OpenAI DALL-E 3 for cover images, and WordPress API for publishing and media uploading. Ideal for blog content managers.

name: WordPress Content Chatbot with OpenAI & Supabase
description: An n8n workflow integrating WordPress API, OpenAI embeddings & GPT-4o-mini, and Supabase vector DB. It fetches, filters, converts WP posts/pages to markdown, embeddings for search, and enables AI chat with website content using stored vectors and Postgres memory.

name: AI-Powered WordPress Blog Post Optimizer
description: Automates WordPress blog content creation and SEO optimization using Google Sheets, OpenAI (DeepSeek), WordPress API, and Langchain. Generates titles, articles, images, drafts posts, and SEO meta tags, updating all data back to Google Sheets seamlessly.

name: WordPress SEO Content Automation with DeepSeek & DALL-E
description: Automates blog content creation for WordPress using DeepSeek R1 AI for SEO-friendly articles, OpenAI DALL-E 3 for cover images, and Google Sheets for idea input. Integrates WordPress API to publish drafts and update editorial plans seamlessly.

name: AI Brand Voice Content Generator
description: Automates creation of on-brand blog articles by analyzing existing content from n8n.io blog. Uses n8n nodes with OpenAI API for LLM analysis, HTML extraction, Markdown conversion, and Wordpress draft publishing. Captures article style, structure, and voice.

name: AI WordPress Post Creator
description: Automates creating SEO-friendly WordPress draft posts using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for article and chapter generation, Wikipedia for fact verification, and DALL-E for featured image creation in n8n workflow.

name: AI Auto-Tagging for WordPress Posts
description: Automate blog post tagging in WordPress using n8n with OpenAI for AI-generated tags. Uses RSS feed triggers, WordPress REST API, and Langchain nodes for content analysis to enhance SEO and content categorization without manual input.

name: AI-Powered WordPress Post Creator
description: Automates creation of SEO-friendly WordPress draft posts from keywords using OpenAI GPT-4 for text and DALL-E for featured images, integrates Wikipedia for fact-checking, and uploads content and images via WordPress API.

name: Auto SEO Blog Writer with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
description: Automates full SEO blog content creation: collects fresh research via Perplexity API, generates SEO-optimized articles with GPT-4o, publishes to WordPress, sends Gmail & Slack notifications, and logs to Notion. Integrates OpenAI, Perplexity, WordPress, Gmail, Slack, and Notion via n8n.

name: AI Social Media Publisher from WordPress
description: Automates social media posting from WordPress content using AI-generated, platform-tailored captions and images. Integrates WordPress, Google Sheets, OpenRouter (Gemini 2.0), OpenAI, and APIs for X (Twitter), Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for multi-platform publishing.

name: Automated WordPress Blog Creator with GPT
description: An n8n workflow automating WordPress blog posts using OpenAI GPT-4 for content and titles, PostgreSQL to track category usage, and WordPress REST API to publish posts and upload media automatically on a schedule.

name: WP CF7 Contact Form Auto Response & Classification
description: Automates classification and drafting of responses to WordPress Contact Form 7 inquiries using Google Gemini AI and Gmail API. Saves categorized responses to Google Sheets, streamlining customer support for businesses handling diverse requests.

name: PDF to WordPress Blog Creator with Human Approval
description: Automates converting PDFs into SEO-friendly WordPress blog drafts using OpenAI GPT for content, Pollinations.ai for images, with Gmail for human approval and Telegram notifications for publishing updates.

name: Automated Blog Writer & Publisher
description: An n8n workflow automating blog content creation and publishing. Uses Google Sheets for scheduling/configuration, OpenAI (via OpenRouter) for AI content generation, and WordPress XML-RPC API for posting. Includes data preprocessing, content merging, and status logging to Sheets.

name: WordPress AI Content Creator with Multi-Level Rewrites
description: Automates creating WordPress blog drafts using OpenAI GPT models for structured content generation and rewriting at Grade 2, 5, and 9 reading levels. Integrates Pollinations.ai for featured image creation, Google Drive for backups, and Telegram for notifications.

name: WordPress RAG & GenAI Content Chatbot
description: An n8n workflow integrating WordPress API, OpenAI embeddings (text-embedding-3-small), GPT-4o-mini chat model, Supabase vector DB, and Postgres for chat memory. It automates content embedding, updates, and provides a semantic search chatbot using website content.

name: AI-Driven WordPress Post Categorizer
description: Automates WordPress blog post categorization using OpenAI's language model integrated via n8n. Fetches posts, classifies by predefined taxonomy, and updates categories natively in WordPress. Ideal for content strategists seeking efficient organization and SEO improvements.

name: WordPress Form Lead Capture to Mautic
description: Automates capturing leads from WordPress forms via webhook, normalizes data (name, email, mobile), validates emails, and creates contacts in Mautic CRM. Built using n8n workflow with WordPress webhook and Mautic API integration.

name: Automated Blog Post Creator for WordPress
description: An n8n workflow integrating Google Sheets, OpenAI (OpenRouter), and WordPress XML-RPC API to automate blog post drafting, updating, and publishing based on a scheduled spreadsheet. Uses dynamic prompts and manages status logs for seamless content creation.

name: WordPress Blog Post Automation from Airtable
description: Automates posting AI-generated markdown blog posts from Airtable to WordPress. Converts markdown to HTML, uploads featured images from Pexels API, and updates Airtable status. Utilizes n8n, Airtable, WordPress API, Pexels API for seamless content publishing.

name: Automated Q&A Generator for n8n Integrations
description: This n8n workflow automates the creation of FAQ templates for various service integrations using Google Sheets, OpenAI GPT-4, and Google Drive. It reads integration data from Sheets, generates and enhances Q&A pairs with AI, and saves results to Drive for CMS use (e.g., Wordpress, Webflow, Strapi).

name: AI Auto-Categorize WordPress Posts
description: Automate WordPress blog post categorization using OpenAI's language model with n8n. This workflow fetches all posts, applies AI-based taxonomy classification, and updates categories via the WordPress API, streamlining content organization for bloggers and marketers.

name: Export WordPress Posts to Google Drive CSV
description: This n8n workflow exports published WordPress posts by fetching them via WordPress API, adjusts relevant fields, converts data to CSV, and uploads the file to Google Drive using service account authentication. Ideal for automated WordPress content backups or integrations.

name: AI Summary Generator for WordPress Posts
description: Automates adding AI-generated summaries to WordPress posts using OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), Google Sheets for tracking, and Slack for notifications. Converts post HTML to Markdown, classifies summarized content, updates posts via WP REST API, and logs activity efficiently.

name: WordPress Article Text-to-Speech Automation
description: Automates retrieval of WordPress articles, generates summaries or transcriptions with OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, converts text to speech using Eleven Labs API, uploads MP3 to WordPress, and updates the post. Integrates WordPress API, LangChain, OpenAI, and Eleven Labs TTS.

name: WooCommerce Rank Math SEO Updater
description: Automates updating Rank Math SEO metadata on WooCommerce products via WordPress REST API. Utilizes n8n workflow with HTTP Request node and WordPress API credentials to set SEO title, description, and canonical URL, improving product SEO efficiently.

name: Auto-Update Zoom Meeting & WP Redirect
description: Automates creating Zoom recurring meetings via OAuth2, updates a WordPress page with a meta refresh redirect to the Zoom join URL, and notifies a Slack channel. Uses Zoom API, WordPress API, Slack API and a cron trigger for scheduling.

name: WordPress to Medium Blog Publisher
description: Automates fetching latest blog posts from a WordPress site (using HTTP Request and HTML extraction), parses post titles and content, and publishes them on Medium via its API. Ideal for automated blog cross-posting and content repurposing.

name: WordPress Posts to CSV Exporter
description: Automates exporting all WordPress posts using WordPress API, converts them to CSV via n8n spreadsheet node, and saves a local CSV file. Ideal for non-coders needing quick WordPress content exports as CSV files.

name: WordPress Post Create and Update Workflow
description: Automates creating and updating WordPress posts using the WordPress API nodes in n8n. Triggered manually, it first creates a post with a title, then updates its content. Useful for content management automation with WordPress and n8n.

name: Post WordPress Blog via XML-RPC HTTP Request
description: An n8n workflow to post blog entries on Wordpress.com using XML-RPC protocol via HTTP Request node. It uses JavaScript code to prepare XML payload, handles XML response, and supports posting with a manual trigger. Tech stack: n8n, Wordpress XML-RPC API.

name: Fetch All Wordpress Posts
description: An n8n workflow using Manual Trigger and Wordpress API to fetch all posts from a Wordpress site. Ideal for automating content retrieval from Wordpress blogs or websites.

name: AI Triathlon Coach with Strava & Gemini
description: Automates personalized triathlon coaching by analyzing Strava activity data using Google Gemini (PaLM) AI. Generates detailed, motivational feedback and improvement plans for swimming, cycling, and running, then formats and sends insights via email or WhatsApp.

name: AI WhatsApp Customer Support Assistant
description: An AI-powered customer support chatbot for WhatsApp that dynamically crawls and extracts real-time website info using Langchain tools (list_links, get_page), OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, and Postgres memory. Enables brands to deliver on-demand, accurate support directly on WhatsApp.

name: AI-Powered ERPNext Recruitment Automation
description: Automates candidate screening and job application processing by integrating ERPNext ERP, Google Gemini AI, and communication tools like WhatsApp and Outlook. Extracts resume text, evaluates fit via AI scoring, updates ERPNext with decisions, and notifies applicants.

name: WhatsApp AI Sales Agent with Product Brochure
description: Automate customer support on WhatsApp using n8n integrated with OpenAI GPT-4 and vector search. Extracts Yamaha product brochure PDF, creates an in-memory vector store knowledge base, and runs an AI Sales Agent to answer customer queries via WhatsApp text messages.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that creates an AI chatbot for WhatsApp using WhatsApp API, Google Gemini (PaLM) for multimodal AI (audio, video, image), Langchain AI Agent, and Wikipedia tool integration. It processes and responds to varied message types intelligently.

name: WhatsApp AI Chatbot with RAG Knowledge Base
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp Business API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Langchain agent, Qdrant vector DB, and Google Drive to build an AI-powered chatbot for electronics stores. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to provide accurate product info & support via WhatsApp.

name: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp API with Google Gemini AI and Langchain tools to handle, analyze, and respond to various message types (audio, video, image, text) in WhatsApp chats using AI transcription, summarization, and multimodal content description.

name: AI Pre-Meeting Assistant with Gmail, Google Calendar, LinkedIn
description: Automates pre-meeting notifications by checking Google Calendar for upcoming events, extracting attendee info, summarizing recent emails (via Gmail) and LinkedIn activity (via Apify scraper), then sending concise, AI-generated WhatsApp reminders using OpenAI GPT models.

name: AI WhatsApp Chatbot: Text, Voice, Image, PDF
description: An AI-powered WhatsApp chatbot built with n8n integrates WhatsApp API, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for chat, image analysis, audio transcription, and PDF extraction. It processes text, voice, images, and PDFs to generate intelligent, context-aware replies for versatile user interactions.

name: Automated Candidate Shortlisting for ERPNext
description: n8n workflow automates recruitment by integrating ERPNext with AI models (Google Gemini) to evaluate resumes against job descriptions, scoring and justifying candidate fit. Uses PDF extraction, HTTP API, and communication via Outlook and WhatsApp.

name: AI Meeting Prep & WhatsApp Notification
description: Automates meeting preparation by checking upcoming Google Calendar events, extracting attendee details from invites, summarizing recent Gmail and LinkedIn correspondence using OpenAI GPT-4, and sending concise WhatsApp pre-meeting notifications. Integrates Google Calendar, Gmail, Apify web scraping, and WhatsApp API.

name: WhatsApp AI Chatbot with Qdrant RAG
description: An AI-powered WhatsApp Business chatbot leveraging Meta Webhooks, OpenAI GPT-4o-mini, Qdrant vector database, and Google Drive for document retrieval. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system to answer customer queries about electronics products with contextual knowledge base support.

name: Typeform Leads to WhatsApp via Twilio
description: Automates sending Typeform survey leads directly to a WhatsApp number using Twilio. Utilizes Typeform webhook trigger, data parsing with n8n Set node, and Twilio API for messaging. Ideal for instant lead notification and follow-up.

name: Lead Capture & WhatsApp CRM Automation
description: An n8n workflow automating lead capture via webhook, logging leads in Google Sheets, adding contacts to FluentCRM via its API, sending welcome emails, and WhatsApp messages using Whinta API, then updating CRM tags. Streamlines lead nurturing for small businesses using Google Sheets, FluentCRM, SMTP, and Whinta.

name: WhatsApp AI Sales Chatbot with Vector Store
description: An n8n workflow integrating WhatsApp API, OpenAI GPT-4o, and in-memory vector store to build an AI Sales Agent chatbot. It processes product brochure PDFs, creates embeddings and vector store for product catalog, handles WhatsApp messages, and replies with AI-powered responses.

name: WhatsApp & Asana Customer Support Automation
description: Automates customer support by capturing form data via n8n form trigger, sending confirmation messages through WhatsApp Business Cloud API, and creating support tickets in Asana task management. Integrates n8n native forms, WhatsApp Business Cloud API, and Asana API for seamless support workflows.

name: AI Triathlon Coach Using Strava & Gemini AI
description: Automates triathlon coaching by analyzing Strava activity data with Google Gemini AI. It provides personalized, data-driven training insights and motivational feedback for swimming, cycling, and running. Sends structured HTML reports via Email or WhatsApp. Tech stack: Strava API, Google Gemini (PaLM) AI, Gmail, WhatsApp API.

name: WhatsApp Campaign Automation with KlickTipp
description: Automates personalized WhatsApp outreach using WhatsApp Business Cloud API integrated with KlickTipp for subscriber-triggered campaigns. Features message filtering, template messaging, opt-out management, and dynamic content insertion via n8n workflow.

name: Clinic Appointment & Reminder Assistant
description: Automates clinic appointment management and reminders using OpenAI GPT-4, Google Calendar, Google Tasks, Telegram, WhatsApp (Evolution API), and Postgres. Handles patient rescheduling, confirmation, shopping lists, and escalations for a streamlined healthcare workflow.

name: WhatsApp Business Appointment Bot
description: An n8n workflow automating WhatsApp appointment notifications and user message handling. Uses WhatsApp Business API, Google Sheets, and scheduled triggers to manage user opt-in, send templated messages, receive and reply to messages, and update statuses seamlessly.

name: WhatsApp Echo Bot via Meta API
description: Automates WhatsApp messaging using Meta's WhatsApp API with n8n. Verifies webhook, listens for incoming messages, checks message presence, and echoes text back to the sender. Ideal for building interactive WhatsApp bots with webhook and API integration.

name: Encrypted WhatsApp Flow Handler
description: n8n workflow for secure WhatsApp interactions using hybrid RSA-AES decryption. It decrypts encrypted webhook payloads, parses user state ('screen'), applies conditional routing, extracts appointment or seat data, then encrypts and responds via API. Utilizes n8n nodes, Node.js Crypto, and webhook integration.

name: Selenium Web Scraper with OpenAI Analysis
description: An advanced n8n workflow integrating Selenium via Docker, Google Search, and OpenAI GPT-4 to extract, analyze, and retrieve web data even behind login or restricted access. Supports cookie injection, screenshots, proxy use, and AI-based info extraction for dynamic web scraping.

name: AI Meeting Prep & WhatsApp Notification
description: Automates meeting preparation by checking upcoming Google Calendar events, extracting attendee details from invites, summarizing recent Gmail and LinkedIn correspondence using OpenAI GPT-4, and sending concise WhatsApp pre-meeting notifications. Integrates Google Calendar, Gmail, Apify web scraping, and WhatsApp API.

name: n8n DeepResearcher Automated Research
description: Automates deep multi-step research using OpenAI (o3-mini) and Google Gemini LLMs, Apify web scraping, and Notion API to recursively generate, refine, and compile research insights into detailed reports in Notion. Ideal for complex topic exploration with configurable depth and breadth.

name: AI Chatbot with Jina.ai Webpage Scraper
description: An AI-powered chatbot workflow integrating Langchain and OpenAI's gpt-4o-mini model with Jina.ai's real-time web scraping tool. It scrapes live website data from user-supplied URLs, retains conversation memory, and delivers accurate, context-aware answers dynamically, ideal for research and support.

name: AI-Powered Company Data Enrichment Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates company research by leveraging OpenAI GPT-4, SerpAPI, and web scraping (ScrapingBee). It enriches Google Sheets rows with structured info like domain, LinkedIn URL, pricing, API availability, market type, and integrations, running on schedule or manual trigger.

name: API Schema Crawler, Extractor & Generator
description: Automates researching, scraping, extracting, and generating API schemas from service websites using Google Search API, Apify web scraping, Google Gemini LLM, Qdrant vector DB, Google Sheets and Drive integration for managing and storing API documentation data and custom schemas.

name: n8n Ultimate Selenium Web Scraper
description: Automates advanced web scraping with Selenium and OpenAI GPT-4 integration. Uses Selenium Chrome container, residential proxies, Google search, cookie injection for session-based scraping, and AI-driven info extraction from screenshots and text for data on dynamic or login-protected websites.

name: YCombinator News Scraper & Emailer
description: Automates fetching latest news from YCombinator using HTTP Request and HTML Extract nodes, merges data, exports to spreadsheet, and sends via email. Built with n8n workflow automation, utilizes web scraping and SMTP email delivery.

name: Yelp Review Extractor & Summarizer with LLM
description: Automates extraction of Yelp business reviews using Bright Data API and processes data with Google Gemini LLM for structured analysis and summarization. Integrates web scraping, AI parsing, and webhook notifications for streamlined review insights.

name: Airtable Product Data Enricher with AI Vision & Web Agent
description: This n8n workflow automates enrichment of product data in Airtable from photos using OpenAI's GPT-4o vision model, SERP API for reverse image search, and Firecrawl.dev for web scraping. It intelligently analyzes images, performs internet research, and updates Airtable records with detailed product attributes.

name: AI Agent for Web Scraping & API Data Fetch
description: An n8n workflow integrating OpenAI Langchain agents with API tools like Firecrawl for web scraping and Bored API for activity suggestions. Enables AI-driven data retrieval, parsing, and dynamic interaction via custom HTTP calls to enhance automation tasks.

name: AI-Powered Web Scraper with Bright Data & Google Gemini
description: An automated web scraping system integrating Bright Data's MCP SDK for data extraction, Google Gemini AI for query understanding, and n8n workflows. It scrapes webpages as Markdown or HTML, triggers webhooks with results, and saves data locally for analysis.

name: LinkedIn Company Story Generator with AI & Bright Data
description: Automates company story creation from LinkedIn data using Bright Data's web scraping API and Google Gemini AI models for extraction, formatting, and summarization. Combines HTTP requests, recursive text splitting, and AI-driven language modeling for detailed and concise narratives.

name: Scheduled Website Scraper with Scrappey API
description: An automated workflow using n8n that triggers on schedule to scrape any website via the Scrappey API, avoiding anti-bot blocks. It uses n8n's Schedule Trigger, HTTP Request node with Scrappey API, and customizable URL input for scalable web scraping tasks.

name: Shopify Order Automation Workflow
description: Automates Shopify order processing integrating Zoho CRM, Trello, Gmail, Mailchimp, and Harvest. It updates CRM contacts, creates tasks, sends conditional emails, tags customers, and generates invoices to streamline order management.

name: Sync Stripe Charges to HubSpot Contacts
description: Automates syncing of Stripe charge data with HubSpot contacts using Stripe API to fetch charges and customers, then updating/creating HubSpot contact fields with total spend via HubSpot API. Includes scheduling, deduplication, and field management.

name: Shopify Fulfillment to Onfleet Task Automation
description: Automates task creation in Onfleet upon new Shopify fulfillment via Shopify Trigger node and Onfleet API. Seamlessly integrates Shopify and Onfleet for streamlined delivery task management in n8n workflow.

name: Extract PDF & Image Text to CSV via Vertex AI
description: Automate extracting text from PDFs and images stored in Google Drive, using Google Vertex AI (Gemini) and Openrouter LLM APIs, converting data into categorized CSV files, then uploading results back to Drive for streamlined data processing.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to GitHub
description: Automates backup of all n8n workflows to a GitHub repository using GitHub API, HTTP requests, and internal subworkflows. It compares existing backup files with current workflows, creates or updates JSON files named by workflow ID, supporting version control and easy restore.

name: Company Docs RAG Chatbot (Google Drive + Pinecone)
description: Automates retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for company documents stored in Google Drive. Uses Google Gemini (PaLM) for embeddings and chat, Pinecone for vector storage, and n8n workflow triggers for live updates. Enables AI chat assistant to answer HR queries from internal docs.

name: Zoom AI Meeting Assistant
description: Automates Zoom meeting transcription processing to create summaries, action items, and schedule follow-ups using Zoom API, Anthropic Claude AI, ClickUp, and Microsoft Outlook integrations with n8n workflow automation.

name: Automated Weekly Reddit Trend PR Report
description: Automates weekly discovery of trending Reddit posts on chosen topics. Extracts top comments, performs sentiment and content analysis with Anthropic Claude AI, enriches with article content via Jina API, then generates and uploads comprehensive PR story reports to Google Drive and shares via Mattermost. Tech stack: Reddit API, Anthropic Claude, Jina AI, Google Drive, Mattermost webhook.

name: Google Drive File Deduplication Automator
description: Automates detection and handling of duplicate files in Google Drive using Google Drive API with n8n. Features configurable options to keep first or last duplicate and either flag by renaming or move duplicates to trash, improving file organization and storage efficiency.

name: Invoice Extraction from Outlook Emails
description: Automates extraction of invoice data from Outlook emails using Microsoft Outlook API and Google Gemini 2.0 for AI-based document classification and OCR. Extracted invoice details are saved to Microsoft Excel, streamlining accounts receivable processing.

name: AI-Powered Document Note Generator
description: Automates note creation by watching a folder for new files, extracting content from PDF/DOCX/TXT, summarizing and vectorizing using Mistral Cloud and Qdrant, then generates study guides, timelines, and briefing docs via AI agents.

name: Google Drive PDF Auto Translator with DeepL
description: Automates translation of PDF documents in a specified Google Drive folder using the DeepL API. It downloads PDFs, sends them to DeepL for translation, polls for completion, and uploads translated PDFs back. Uses Google Drive OAuth2 and DeepL HTTP APIs.

name: GitLab Merge Request Auto Review & Risk Assessment
description: An n8n workflow automating GitLab MR review by fetching diffs, using Anthropic Claude AI for risk assessment, issues, recommendations, and test case generation, then posting comments and emailing relevant dev & QA teams. Integrates GitLab API, Anthropic AI, and Gmail.

name: Daily Financial News Summary Emailer
description: Automates daily extraction of top financial news from ft.com using HTTP request and CSS selectors, summarizes with Google Gemini AI, and emails a structured HTML recap via Microsoft Outlook. Ideal for investors seeking concise market updates.

name: Airtable to telli AI Voice Call Automation
description: Automate scheduling AI voice-agent calls by syncing Airtable CRM contacts with telli's API. Uses Airtable Trigger node, HTTP requests to telli's /add-contact and /schedule-call endpoints. Ideal for lead qualification, reminders, and feedback calls.

name: AI-Powered Blog Content Creator
description: Automates blog writing by combining the Tavily search API for real-time web data with Anthropic's AI language model to craft well-structured, SEO-optimized HTML content with proper citations and a natural tone.

name: Incident Management: PagerDuty, Jira & Mattermost
description: Automates incident lifecycle by integrating PagerDuty, Jira, and Mattermost. Creates Jira issues from PagerDuty incidents, updates statuses on acknowledgment & resolution, and posts real-time messages with interactive buttons in Mattermost channels.

name: PDF & Image Text Extraction to CSV via Vertex AI
description: Automate extraction of text from PDFs and images stored in Google Drive using Vertex AI (Google Gemini) and Openrouter APIs. Converts extracted data into categorized CSV files and uploads them back to Google Drive, streamlining document data processing workflows.

name: Adaptive RAG Query Processor
description: An n8n workflow utilizing Google Gemini and Qdrant vector store to classify user queries into Factual, Analytical, Opinion, or Contextual types, and adaptively retrieve and generate precise answers with tailored strategies for each query type.

name: Spotify to YouTube Playlist Sync
description: Automates one-way synchronization from a Spotify playlist to a YouTube playlist using Spotify, YouTube Data API v3, and Supabase. It matches tracks by title, artist, and duration, updates playlists, manages deletions, and stores data persistently, with optional Discord notifications.

name: Automated Website Content SEO Audit
description: This n8n workflow generates a detailed SEO content audit report for up to 1000 pages of any website using DataForSEO On-Page API and Google Search Console API. It analyzes technical SEO, content quality, metadata, linking, and performance, delivering a branded HTML report with key recommendations.

name: AI-Powered Visual Regression Testing Workflow
description: Automates visual regression testing by comparing webpage screenshots using Google Gemini AI vision model, Apify screenshot API, Google Drive & Sheets, and Linear for issue tracking. Detects UI changes and reports them automatically.

name: Service Page SEO Blueprint Generator
description: An n8n workflow that analyzes competitor service pages and user intent using Jina Reader API and Google Gemini AI. It generates a detailed SEO content blueprint with competitor insights, user intent analysis, gap identification, and optimized page outline to maximize conversions.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to GitLab
description: Automates backup of n8n workflows to GitLab repository using n8n API and GitLab API. Supports manual and scheduled triggers, compares existing files, and updates or creates workflow JSON files tagged for backup.

name: Palo Alto Security Advisory Monitor
description: Automates monitoring of Palo Alto Networks security advisories via RSS feed, filters for relevant products, creates Jira issues for critical alerts, and emails customers. Utilizes RSS Feed, Jira API, Gmail API, and dynamic filtering for streamlined security alert management.

name: Weekly Shodan IP & Port Security Monitor
description: n8n workflow that weekly checks specified IPs and ports via Shodan API for unexpected open ports, formats results in Markdown tables, and sends alerts to TheHive security platform. Uses HTTP Request, Markdown, and TheHive nodes for automation.

name: Airflow DAG Run Trigger & Monitor
description: An n8n workflow to trigger Apache Airflow DAG runs and monitor their state using Airflow REST API with HTTP Basic Auth. It supports waiting with retry logic until the DAG run succeeds or fails, returning task results via XCom. Useful for automating Airflow DAG execution and status retrieval.

name: Restore n8n Workflows from GitHub Backup
description: Automates restoring n8n workflows by fetching JSON backup files from a specified GitHub repository path using GitHub API and n8n native nodes. It requires GitHub API credentials and n8n API to recreate workflows seamlessly.

name: Line AI Chatbot with Groq & Llama3
description: An n8n workflow integrating LINE Messaging API with Groq's Llama 3.3 AI model for conversational AI responses. It handles user messages from LINE, sends them to Groq's API, and replies with AI-generated content. Uses HTTP webhook and REST APIs for automation.

name: Multipage Website Scraper with Jina.ai & Google Drive
description: This n8n workflow scrapes multipage websites using sitemap XMLs, processes content with Jina.ai's no-API-key web scraper, extracts titles and markdown, and saves them to Google Drive. It automates website content collection and organization efficiently.

name: Brand Content Extraction & Sentiment Analysis
description: Automates brand content extraction from websites via Bright Data Web Unlocker API, uses Google Gemini AI for textual data extraction, summarization, and structured sentiment analysis, and sends results through webhooks and files.

name: PDF Digital Certificate & Signing Service
description: n8n workflow automating PDF digital signing with key generation using node-forge and @signpdf libraries, plus API endpoints for uploading, signing, and downloading PDFs securely. Supports PFX cert creation and handles file management in a server environment.

name: n8n Gmail Error Notification Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on workflow errors (execution and trigger-level) and sends detailed error notification emails via Gmail. Includes error details, stack traces, and direct links to workflows and executions. Uses n8n Error Trigger and Gmail nodes for robust error handling.

name: Crop Image Anomaly Detection Tool
description: An anomaly detection tool for crop images using Qdrant Cloud for vector search and Voyage AI multimodal embeddings API. It identifies if an input image URL depicts a known crop or an anomaly against a prepared agricultural crops dataset. Built with n8n workflow automation.

name: Medoids Setup for Crop Anomaly Detection
description: n8n workflow sets cluster centers and thresholds for anomaly detection in agricultural crop data using Qdrant vector DB, Voyage AI multimodal embeddings, and Scipy. Enables precise identification of cluster representatives and scoring for anomaly detection with Qdrant Cloud API.

name: KNN Image Classifier for Land Types
description: An n8n workflow that classifies satellite land-use images using KNN. It embeds images via Voyage AI's multimodal embeddings API, queries Qdrant vector DB for nearest neighbors, and applies majority voting with tie resolution to output land type classes.

name: Proxmox API AI Agent Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating Proxmox VE API with Google Gemini LLM for conversational management of virtualization tasks. Utilizes Proxmox API, Gemini AI, HTTP requests, and structured output parsing to convert natural language into valid Proxmox API commands for VM lifecycle and cluster management.

name: OpenID Connect (OIDC) Authentication Flow
description: An n8n workflow implementing OpenID Connect client login using OAuth2 with PKCE. Utilizes webhook, HTTP requests to auth, token, and userinfo endpoints, and dynamic HTML responses for login and welcome pages. Supports Keycloak and similar providers.

name: Stripe Payment Order Sync & Customer Info Extraction
description: Automates syncing Stripe payment events, auto-retrieves detailed customer info and product purchased from Stripe API using webhook triggers and HTTP requests in n8n for seamless order data handling.

name: Spotify Downloads Playlist Automator
description: Automates Spotify by creating and maintaining a 'Downloads' playlist with the latest liked tracks. Uses Spotify API via n8n nodes, scheduled triggers, and code filters to sync and limit songs, optimizing offline listening with defined limits.

name: Shopify to Odoo Customer Sync
description: Automates syncing of new Shopify customers to Odoo CRM contacts using Shopify webhook trigger and Odoo API integration for contact creation and deduplication.

name: FLUX Image Inpainting Editor
description: An n8n workflow integrating FLUX-Fill API for advanced image inpainting. Provides a web-based editor using Konva.js and img-comparison-slider to edit images with mask and prompt inputs, then processes via FLUX-Fill, returning edited images seamlessly.

name: Nextcloud Folder & File Move Automation
description: Automates moving folders and all their files/subfolders within Nextcloud using Nextcloud API. Supports recursive subfolder processing, folder structure replication, and sequential file moves to handle rate limits in external storage.

name: Structured Data Extraction & AI Analysis Workflow
description: An n8n workflow for structured data extraction using Bright Data Web Unlocker API, processed by Google Gemini PaLM AI models for topic extraction, sentiment analysis, and trend clustering by location and category. Saves results to files and supports webhook notifications.

name: Shopify Inventory Alert to Discord
description: Automates Shopify inventory monitoring via webhooks and GraphQL API. Sends low stock or out-of-stock alerts with product info and images to Discord channels using Discord Bot API, enabling timely inventory management.

name: Cloudflare KV Namespace Manager
description: An n8n workflow integrating Cloudflare KV storage API to manage namespaces and key-value pairs. Supports creation, deletion, renaming namespaces, plus read/write/delete of KV pairs with metadata. Utilizes HTTP Request nodes, Cloudflare API, and n8n's set and manual trigger nodes.

name: Meraki Network Latency & Loss Alert System
description: Automates monitoring of Cisco Meraki networks by fetching orgs, networks, and uplink latency/loss data via Meraki API. Calculates 5-min averages, filters problematic sites, avoids duplicate alerts using Redis, and notifies teams through Microsoft Teams.

name: Switchy.io URL Shortener with Meta Parsing
description: An advanced n8n workflow integrating Switchy.io API, OpenGraph.xyz, Dub.sh, Norton, Bitdefender, and PhishTank to parse URL metadata, check safety, generate screenshots, and create or update short URLs with rich preview images and branding options.

name: Intercom User Enrichment with ExactBuyer API
description: Automates enriching new Intercom user profiles by receiving webhook events, fetching detailed contact info from ExactBuyer API, and updating Intercom contacts with social profiles, phone, location, and avatar data via HTTP requests.

name: Automated HubSpot Deal Assignment
description: This n8n workflow automates the assignment of unassigned HubSpot deals to sales reps based on deal region (US, Germany, others) and company size using HubSpot CRM API. Runs on scheduled trigger every 2 days. Includes data fetching, filtering, and updating HubSpot deals via OAuth2.

name: CRM Auto-Update from Calendly with Clearbit & HubSpot
description: Automates CRM updates by triggering on Calendly bookings. Uses Clearbit API to enrich contact and company data, filters personal emails, then upserts leads and companies in HubSpot CRM via OAuth2. Streamlines lead management and data accuracy.

name: n8n Workflow Visualizer with Mermaid.js
description: Visualize and explore your n8n workflows as interactive flowcharts using Mermaid.js. It uses the n8n API to fetch workflows, aggregates data, and dynamically renders diagrams with custom node shapes via Mermaid.js and Bootstrap for UI.

name: n8n GitHub Credential Backup Workflow
description: Automates backing up all n8n instance credentials to a GitHub repo by exporting decrypted credentials via CLI, formatting JSON, and saving/updating files in GitHub using GitHub API nodes. Scheduled to run every 2 hours.

name: Image Object Detection & Elasticsearch Indexing
description: Automates image processing by detecting objects in a source image via Cloudflare's Detr-Resnet-50 AI model, cropping detected objects, uploading them to Cloudinary, and indexing metadata in Elasticsearch for granular image search.

name: [OPS] Restore n8n Workflows from GitHub
description: Automates restoration of n8n workflows backed up on GitHub. Uses GitHub API to list and fetch workflow JSON files, compares with existing n8n workflows via n8n API, and creates missing ones. Ideal for workflow backup and recovery.

name: Qualys Report to TheHive Automator
description: Automates fetching finished vulnerability scan reports from Qualys via API, converts them from XML to JSON, filters new reports, creates matching cases in TheHive SOC platform, and attaches downloaded reports. Uses Qualys API, TheHive API, and n8n workflow automation.

name: Jira Ticket Creator from Splunk Alerts
description: Automates creation and updating of Jira tickets based on Splunk alert webhook data. Uses Splunk webhooks, Jira Cloud API, and n8n workflow automation to search for existing tickets, create new ones, or add comments to avoid duplicates, improving SecOps incident management.

name: Batch Upload Multiple Files to GitHub Repo
description: n8n workflow automating simultaneous file uploads to GitHub repos using GitHub REST API. It bypasses the native single-file limitation by creating a new git tree, commit, and updating the branch. Uses GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication.

name: Elevenlabs Text-to-Speech API Webhook
description: This n8n workflow creates a POST webhook to convert text to speech using Elevenlabs.io API. It checks input parameters, sends requests with custom API key authentication, and streams back the generated audio. Ideal for automating voice content creation.

name: Auto Resume Disabled n8n Workflows
description: An n8n workflow that automatically resumes disabled workflows tagged with 'auto_resume:true' every 4 hours using n8n API nodes, schedule triggers, and filters. Ensures continuous automation by activating paused workflows in n8n.

name: Daily Weather Data Fetch & Store
description: Automates daily fetching of weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API and stores temperature, humidity, wind speed, and location info in Airtable for historical tracking.

name: Matomo Analytics Visitor Insights
description: Automates gathering of Matomo analytics visitor data (visits>3) via API, analyzes it using Meta LLaMA AI on Openrouter, and stores SEO insights in Baserow. Uses n8n to schedule, process JSON, and integrate Matomo, Openrouter AI, and Baserow for actionable website visitor behavior analysis.

name: Global SMS Sender via ClickSend API
description: Automate sending SMS worldwide using the ClickSend API with n8n. This workflow sets SMS content and recipient, then sends the message via HTTP POST with Basic Auth. Ideal for global SMS notifications with easy setup instructions included.

name: URL Shortener and Click Tracker with Airtable
description: An n8n workflow that creates short URLs by hashing long URLs using SHA256 and stores them in Airtable. It redirects short URLs to the original URLs while tracking click counts. Includes a dashboard displaying total links, clicks, and hosts. Uses Webhooks, Airtable API, and built-in crypto node.

name: GitHub to TravisCI CI Trigger
description: An automated CI workflow using n8n that triggers TravisCI builds on GitHub push or pull request events. Integrates GitHub webhook via OAuth2 and TravisCI API to automate build triggers based on repository activity for n8n-io/n8n.

name: Mattermost Standup Bot Workflow
description: Automates daily standup meetings in Mattermost using n8n. Utilizes Mattermost API, webhooks, and cron schedules to prompt users with configurable questions, collect responses, and publish summarized reports in channels. Includes config dialogs and direct messaging.

name: Airtable Batch Upsert/Insert/Update Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to batch process Airtable records with modes for upsert, insert, and update. Utilizes Airtable API via HTTP requests, handles rate limits with wait retries, supports batching to avoid throttling, and merges outputs for efficient Airtable data management.

name: Smart Factory Sensor Monitoring & Incident Alert
description: n8n workflow integrating AMQP for real-time factory sensor data, converting °C to °F, conditionally triggering PagerDuty incidents for temps ≥50°C, and storing machine & incident data in CrateDB for smart factory monitoring and alerting automation.

name: HelloFresh Recipe Recommendation Bot
description: An n8n workflow that uses Mistral large language model API, Qdrant vector search, and SQLite to recommend recipes from HelloFresh's current weekly menu. It processes user inputs, queries recipe data, and provides tailored meal suggestions while excluding off-menu items.

name: Shopify to HubSpot Order Deal Sync
description: Automates syncing of Shopify order updates with HubSpot CRM by creating/updating contacts and deals using Shopify API, HubSpot API and OAuth2. Ensures orders in Shopify reflect as deals in HubSpot, streamlining ecommerce sales workflows.

name: Zendesk to Pipedrive Ticket Assignee Sync
description: Automates updating Zendesk tickets by assigning them to the Pipedrive contact owner. Uses Zendesk API to fetch tickets and requester data, Pipedrive API for contact and owner info, and merges agent data to reassign tickets every 5 minutes.

name: Zendesk-Pipedrive Ticket Comment Sync
description: Automates syncing Zendesk ticket comments as Pipedrive notes by checking ticket updates daily at 09:00. Uses Zendesk API for ticket and comment retrieval, Pipedrive API for person search and note creation, handling emails as sync keys.

name: Spreadsheet File Processing & Upload Automation
description: An n8n workflow template for loading, converting, manipulating, and saving Excel and CSV spreadsheet files. Utilizes HTTP Request, Google Drive, Microsoft OneDrive, and SFTP nodes to fetch and upload files. Supports local, public URL, and cloud sources. Automates processing and storage of spreadsheet data in various formats.

name: Todoist Task Snooze Automator
description: Automates moving tasks between Todoist projects based on due dates to simulate snoozing. Uses Todoist API, scheduled triggers at 5am and every 5 minutes, date calculations, and HTTP requests to move tasks back to inbox or snoozed project automatically.

name: YouTube Engaging Moments Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that extracts engaging moments from YouTube videos using the YouTube 'mostReplayed' API endpoint. It filters moments with intensity above 0.6, removes close timestamps, and returns human-readable links with timestamps. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request, Filter, Split, and Webhook nodes.

name: S3 Folder Bulk Download and ZIP Compressor
description: Automates downloading all files from a specified AWS S3 bucket folder, aggregates them into one item including binaries, and compresses the collection into a ZIP file using n8n's AWS S3 and Compression nodes for easy retrieval or further processing.

name: Google Docs Image Replacer & Downloader
description: Automates replacing images in Google Docs templates using image URLs from a datasource. Utilizes Google Docs and Google Drive APIs to copy templates, replace images by ID, make files shareable, and download as PDF or Docx. Ideal for batch processing dynamic documents.

name: Local Folder to Qdrant AI Bank Statement Expert
description: Automates monitoring of a local folder for file changes, syncing bank statement files with Qdrant vector store using Mistral AI embeddings, and provides a Q&A AI agent for querying the documents. Uses n8n workflows, local file trigger, Qdrant API, and Mistral Cloud AI.

name: Parallel Sub-Workflow Execution Manager
description: An n8n workflow to start multiple sub-workflows asynchronously using HTTP webhooks, wait pseudo-synchronously for all to finish, and coordinate completion tracking with retry. Uses n8n nodes: HTTP Request, Webhook, Wait, Code, Manual Trigger for parallel task orchestration.
