name: Webinar Registration to KlickTipp Sync
description: Automates processing of webinar registrations from JotForm, transforms data (phone, date, URLs), and subscribes contacts with custom tags in KlickTipp CRM for targeted marketing. Uses JotForm API and KlickTipp API integrated within n8n for error-free lead management.

name: Typeform to KlickTipp Quiz Integration
description: Automates quiz submission processing by integrating Typeform with KlickTipp. It formats quiz data, manages subscriber info including tags dynamically in KlickTipp, and supports seamless lead capture and segmentation. Uses Typeform API and KlickTipp API within n8n for workflow automation.

name: Stripe to QuickBooks Payment Sync
description: Automates syncing Stripe payment intents to QuickBooks Online sales receipts. Uses Stripe webhooks & API to retrieve customer and payment details, checks/creates customers in QuickBooks via its API, then posts sales receipts. Tech: Stripe API, QuickBooks Online API, n8n.

name: HTML to PDF Conversion via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that receives HTML content through a webhook, converts it to PDF using the CustomJS HTML to PDF API, and responds with the PDF file. Tech stack includes n8n automation, CustomJS PDF toolkit, and webhook handling for dynamic PDF generation.

name: Invoice PDF Generator via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that converts invoice data into a styled HTML invoice and generates a PDF. It uses custom JS for HTML-to-PDF conversion, processes invoice details, and responds via webhook. Ideal for automated invoice creation using n8n and a custom JS PDF toolkit.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to Nextcloud
description: Automates backup of all n8n workflows by fetching them via n8n REST API every 6 hours or on manual trigger, then saving JSON backups to Nextcloud cloud storage. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request, Function, Merge, and Nextcloud nodes for seamless workflow export and cloud backup.

name: n8n Error Notification via Line
description: This n8n workflow triggers on flow errors and sends detailed notifications via the Line Messaging API using HTTP requests and header-based authentication. It enables real-time error alerts for efficient monitoring and quick response.

name: Fal.ai Flux Image Generation to Google Drive
description: Automates AI image creation using Fal.ai Flux API with customizable prompts, dimensions, steps, and guidance. Downloads generated images and uploads them to Google Drive. Utilizes HTTP requests, manual triggers, wait nodes, and Google Drive API integration in n8n.

name: AI-Driven Local Folder Organizer
description: Automates local folder organization by monitoring changes and using Mistral AI to suggest file categorization into subdirectories. Utilizes n8n Local File Trigger, shell commands, and Mistral Cloud Chat Model to intelligently move files, enhancing file management efficiency.

name: Secure Webhook with Auth & Payload Check
description: An n8n workflow that protects a webhook endpoint by verifying a Bearer token and validating required fields in the JSON POST body. Uses native n8n nodes for webhook, conditional checks, JavaScript code, and structured JSON responses for 200, 400, and 401 HTTP codes.

name: IKEA Remote to Spotify Control
description: Automates Spotify playback control via MQTT messages from an IKEA 5-button switch using n8n workflows. Integrates Spotify OAuth2 API and MQTT to handle play, pause, volume, track navigation, and playlist actions on a specified playback device.

name: n8n Workflow Version Control with GitLab
description: This n8n workflow automates version control of n8n workflows by syncing them with GitLab. It retrieves all workflows from n8n, compares each with corresponding JSON files in a GitLab repo, and creates or updates files accordingly. It uses n8n API and GitLab API for integration.

name: Google Analytics SEO Data Analysis
description: Automates weekly Google Analytics data retrieval using GA4 API, compares current and past week SEO metrics, queries an AI model via Openrouter for SEO insights, and saves results in Baserow. Integrates Google Analytics, Openrouter AI, and Baserow within n8n.

name: Local Ollama Vision Models Image Analyzer
description: Automates detailed image analysis using multiple locally hosted Ollama Vision LLMs, downloading images from Google Drive and saving markdown-formatted results to Google Docs. Ideal for developers needing exhaustive contextual and object insights with Google Drive and Docs integration.

name: Entra to Zammad User Sync Automation
description: Automates synchronization of Microsoft Entra (Azure AD) group users with Zammad user records via Microsoft Graph API and Zammad API. Manages user creation, update, and deactivation to keep Zammad in sync with Entra group memberships.

name: Discord MCP Server Automation
description: An n8n workflow that automates Discord server management using Discord Bot API and custom API calls. It enables sending messages to channels or users, waiting for replies, managing roles, and fetching servers, channels, and members. Integrated with MCP trigger for flexible event-driven automation.

name: Adobe PDF Services API Workflow
description: n8n workflow that automates Adobe PDF Services API integration for PDF processing. It performs OAuth2 authentication, uploads PDFs, processes extraction/splitting requests, waits for completion, and downloads processed results. Uses Adobe API, Dropbox for test files, and HTTP requests.

name: Local Ollama LLM Prompt Router
description: An n8n workflow that uses local Ollama LLM models to dynamically route user prompts to the best specialized AI model (text, code, vision) for task-specific responses. It ensures privacy by running entirely on local Ollama API with memory buffers for chat context.

name: Shopify to D365 Business Central Order Sync
description: Automates syncing Shopify orders to Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central by creating sales orders or invoices via Business Central REST API. Utilizes n8n, Shopify API, and OAuth2-secured Business Central endpoints for customer lookup, order processing, and fulfillment integration.

name: LinkedIn Companies to Airtable CRM Automation
description: Automates searching LinkedIn companies via Ghost Genius API, filters by criteria, checks duplicates, and adds new companies to Airtable CRM. Uses n8n with HTTP requests, batch processing, and Airtable integration for streamlined lead management.

name: Amazon Data Scraper with Bright Data API
description: Automates structured bulk data extraction from Amazon using Bright Data's Web Scraper API via HTTP requests in n8n. Waits for snapshot readiness, aggregates JSON results, writes data to disk, and triggers webhook notifications. Ideal for data analysts and engineers.

name: Google Drive Image Background Remover
description: Automates background removal for images in Google Drive using the PhotoRoom API. Downloads new images, removes or changes backgrounds with padding and size options, then uploads them back to Drive. Built with n8n, Google Drive API, and PhotoRoom API integration.

name: AI-Powered Local Folder Organizer
description: Automates file organization in a local folder using n8n. It monitors a target directory with a local file trigger, lists files via shell commands, and uses Mistral Cloud AI to suggest subfolder categorization. Files are then moved accordingly with execute command nodes.

name: FLUX-fill Image Editor & Inpainting API
description: An n8n workflow integrating FLUX-fill API for interactive image editing and inpainting. Uses Konva.js and img-comparison-slider in an HTML editor, with webhook-triggered image processing, mask and prompt inputs, and real-time generation via FLUX-fill API.

name: n8n Subworkflow Dependency Graph & Auto-Tagging
description: Automatically builds a dependency graph of n8n workflows to identify and visualize which workflows call others. Uses n8n API, JavaScript code nodes, HTTP Requests, MermaidJS, and chart nodes to provide dependency insights and auto-tagging of sub-workflows for easier management.

name: Batch Upload Crop Images to Qdrant with Embeddings
description: An n8n workflow that imports crop images from Google Cloud Storage, creates embeddings using Voyage AI API, and batch uploads them to a Qdrant Cloud collection. It includes collection management, filtering for anomaly detection, and payload indexing for efficient queries.

name: Prompt-Based Object Detection with Google Gemini 2.0
description: An n8n workflow leveraging Google Gemini 2.0 API for prompt-based object detection in images. It downloads an image, extracts dimensions, queries Gemini for bounding boxes of specified objects, rescales coordinates, and draws boxes on the image using n8n's Edit Image node.

name: Automated Discord Channel Cleanup
description: This n8n workflow automates daily cleanup of Discord channels by deleting messages older than 7 days. It uses Discord API, scheduled triggers, batching, filtering, and waits to respect rate limits, ensuring efficient and compliant channel management.

name: Asana Task Rescheduler & Cleaner
description: Automates Asana task management by rescheduling overdue open tasks to today's date and deleting completed tasks. Uses Asana API with n8n scheduling and conditional logic nodes to keep workspace organized and up-to-date daily.

name: n8n Google Drive Workflow Backup Automation
description: Automates nightly backups of n8n workflows to Google Drive using Google Drive and n8n APIs. It manages backup folders, moves old backups, and purges backups older than 30 days automatically.

name: Calendly-KlickTipp Booking & Cancellation Sync
description: Automates the sync of booking and cancellation data from Calendly to KlickTipp. Converts Calendly event info, manages invitee and guest subscriptions, handles rescheduling, and updates contact lists in KlickTipp using APIs. Streamlines event-based subscriber management.

name: Prompt-Based Object Detection with Google Gemini 2.0
description: This n8n workflow uses Google Gemini 2.0 API to perform prompt-based object detection on an image, detecting specific objects (e.g., rabbits) with bounding boxes. It fetches an image via HTTP, gets image info, calls Gemini 2.0 for detection, rescales coordinates, and draws boxes using n8n's Edit Image node.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to GitHub
description: Automates backup of all n8n instance workflows to a specified GitHub repo. Uses n8n API to fetch workflows, GitHub API to retrieve and update files, and compares JSON content to avoid duplicates or unnecessary overwrites. Runs on schedule or manual trigger.

name: BBC News to Podcast Script & TTS
description: An n8n workflow that fetches BBC news, classifies headlines using Google Gemini LLM, extracts details, and converts multiple news articles into a natural podcast script. The script is formatted for Hugging Face text-to-speech synthesis, enabling automated news podcast creation.

name: CallForge Gong Call Data Processor
description: Automates processing Gong call data integrated with Salesforce. Uses Salesforce and Gong APIs in n8n to fetch, filter, and format call records by stage and opportunity, then passes them for AI-based call preprocessing, enabling sales insights extraction.

name: CallForge AI Gong Sales Call Processor
description: An n8n workflow that extracts and enriches Gong sales call transcripts with Salesforce data using Gong API, Salesforce API, and advanced data transformation nodes. It segments speakers, enriches call metadata, and formats data for AI analysis.

name: Google Gemini AI Media Analyzer Workflow
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating 5 methods to analyze images and PDFs using Google Gemini AI (PaLM API), Unsplash image source, and direct API calls. Automates media content understanding with dynamic prompts, batch processing, and data transformations in n8n.

name: Mistral OCR Document & Image Parsing
description: An n8n workflow integrating Mistral Cloud API for advanced OCR of PDFs and images. It supports public URL input or private file uploads via Google Drive and Mistral signed URLs, offering document parsing, text extraction, and document question answering capabilities.

name: HIBP New Breach Alert Automation
description: Automates monitoring of new data breaches from HaveIBeenPwned API every 15 minutes. Caches last breach info locally, compares for new incidents, and triggers alerts for new breaches. Built with n8n using HTTP Request, file operations, and conditional logic nodes.

name: Bank Statement OCR to Data Extraction
description: Automates extraction of deposit data from bank statements by converting PDFs to images, then transcribing pages to markdown with Google Gemini VLM, finally extracting structured data. Uses Google Drive API, Stirling PDF API, and n8n nodes for PDF/image processing.

name: Indeed Company Data Scraper & AI Summarizer
description: Automates scraping company profiles from Indeed using Bright Data Web Unlocker, extracts and converts markdown data, then summarizes with Google Gemini AI models. Integrates Airtable for URL input and webhook notifications for processed summaries.

name: Clockify Monthly Report Backup to GitHub
description: Automates backup of monthly Clockify detailed time reports by retrieving data via Clockify API, comparing with existing JSON files in GitHub repo, and creating or updating report files. Built with n8n using Clockify, GitHub API, HTTP Request, and data processing nodes.

name: Hourly Automated n8n Error Retry
description: Automates retrying failed n8n workflow executions every hour. Uses n8n API for fetching error executions, logs into n8n via HTTP request, filters successful retries, and retries failed executions automatically. Ideal for improving workflow reliability.

name: Shopify-Mautic Marketing Consent Sync
description: Automates syncing customer marketing consent and segment membership between Shopify and Mautic using Shopify webhooks, Mautic API (OAuth2), Shopify GraphQL API, and webhook signature validation for secure marketing preference management.

name: Odoo Product Image Importer from Google Drive
description: Automates importing product and template images from Google Drive into Odoo ERP using Google Drive API and Odoo API integration in n8n. Filters image files, updates records in Odoo, cleans up old files, and sends Google Chat notifications for completed updates.

name: Automated Paddle Invoice PDF Saver
description: This n8n workflow automates processing Paddle invoice emails received in Gmail. It filters Paddle invoices, extracts invoice URLs from emails, converts them to PDFs using pdflayer API, uploads to Google Drive, renames and organizes files in specified Drive folders.

name: AI Style-Based Image Generator
description: n8n workflow integrating Huggingface FLUX API and Cloudflare R2 for AI-driven image creation. Users submit prompts and select artistic styles (e.g., Neon Fauvism, AI Dystopia). Images are generated, uploaded to S3-compatible storage, and served with recent renders showcased.

name: Bank Statement OCR to Markdown with Google Gemini
description: Automates bank statement processing by downloading PDFs from Google Drive, converting PDF pages to images via Stirling PDF API, transcribing images to markdown with Google Gemini Vision LLM, and extracting deposit data as structured JSON. Uses n8n automation with Google Drive API, Stirling PDF, and Google Gemini (PaLM) API.

name: Adobe PDF Services API Automation
description: n8n workflow automates Adobe PDF Services API to authenticate, upload a PDF, process it (e.g., extract text and tables), and download results. Integrates Dropbox for fetching test PDFs. Uses HTTP Request nodes with OAuth2 and Header Auth for Adobe API calls.

name: Stripe Invoice PDFs to AWS S3
description: Automates monthly exporting of Stripe invoice PDFs to an AWS S3 bucket with configurable folder structure by year and month. Utilizes Stripe API, n8n workflow automation, and AWS S3 for cloud storage. Scheduled trigger ensures monthly syncs or manual runs.

name: Squarespace Order Fulfillment Automation
description: Automates fetching and fulfilling Squarespace orders using Squarespace Commerce API with OAuth2 and API key authentication. Supports filtering by fulfillment status, pagination, and automated notification sending to customers.

name: GitHub Issue Management via MCP Server
description: An n8n workflow implementing a custom MCP server to manage GitHub issues and comments. It uses n8n MCP Trigger, GitHub API nodes, and custom tool workflows to get latest issues, fetch issue comments, and add comments. Secure, extensible, and ideal for interactive GitHub repo support.

name: Google Drive Nested Folder Creator
description: Automates the creation of nested folders in Google Drive from a slash-separated path string. Uses Google Drive API via n8n nodes, and JavaScript code nodes to iterate and check folder existence, creating missing folders step-by-step until the full path is built.

name: n8n Workflow Backup to Google Drive
description: Automates scheduled backups of all n8n workflows to a specified Google Drive folder using n8n API, Google Drive API, Gmail for notifications, and Discord for status alerts. Enables reliable versioned backups and timely notifications on success or failure.

name: INSEE Data Enrichment for Agile CRM
description: Automate enrichment of Agile CRM company data with official French company info from the INSEE OpenData API. This workflow integrates Agile CRM and INSEE APIs to update company addresses and add SIREN identifiers, improving CRM accuracy with verified government data.

name: Prevent Concurrent Runs with Redis Lock
description: n8n workflow to prevent concurrent executions using Redis for distributed locking. It uses Redis keys to track workflow states (set, get, unset) and manages workflow concurrency by erroring if already running. Useful for critical or long-running tasks to avoid overlaps.

name: n8n LLM Chaining Workflow with Anthropic
description: Automates multi-step content analysis using n8n, Anthropic Claude 3.7 LLM, HTTP scraping, Markdown conversion, and memory management. Processes webpage content via chained and parallel LLM calls for detailed insights and humor generation.

name: n8n Workflow Management & Backup Automation
description: Automates listing, detailed retrieval, file backup, and metadata updating of n8n workflows using n8n API, Airtable, Dropbox, and Cron. Supports batch processing and triggers; ideal for managing and backing up workflows systematically.

name: Instagram AI Comment Responder
description: Automates Instagram comment replies using Instagram Graph API, OpenRouter AI (Google Gemini 2.0), and n8n workflow. It filters comments, generates context-aware responses in Brazilian Portuguese for AI/automation content, and posts replies automatically.

name: Pipedrive OAuth2 Token Refresh Workflow
description: Automates OAuth2 token refresh for Pipedrive API using n8n, Supabase DB for token storage, and HTTP/webhook nodes. Enables secure storage and refreshing of access tokens for reliable API calls with Pipedrive integration.

name: Sports Betting Data Automation with TheOddsAPI & Airtable
description: Automates daily retrieval and updating of sports betting events and results using TheOddsAPI for data fetching and Airtable for record management. Includes scheduled triggers for morning event pulls and evening score updates, customizable for any sport.

name: Open Source Project Metrics Dashboard
description: Automates collection and updating of development metrics from GitHub, Docker Hub, npm, and Product Hunt APIs to a custom dashboard using n8n workflow automation with HTTP Requests, GitHub node, and JavaScript functions.

name: Google Sitemap Index URL Re-indexing
description: Automates fetching and parsing sitemap.xml URLs, checks indexing status via Google Indexing API, and updates Google with new or modified URLs for faster re-indexing. Uses HTTP requests, XML parsing, Google OAuth2 API in n8n workflow.

name: Auth0 OAuth2 User Login Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates user authentication via Auth0 OAuth2. It uses Auth0's OAuth2 API to authorize users, exchange authorization codes for access tokens, and retrieve user info. Includes webhook triggers and HTTP Request nodes for secure login flow.

name: PUQ Docker NextCloud Deployment API
description: This n8n workflow automates deployment and management of NextCloud instances in Docker for WHMCS/WISECP through an API backend. It uses Docker, docker-compose, SSH, nginx-proxy, and PowerDNS API to manage containers, DNS records, NGINX config, user accounts, and disk mounts.

name: Spotify Liked Songs to Playlist Sync
description: An n8n workflow that automates syncing Spotify Liked Songs to a specified playlist by adding missing tracks and removing unliked ones. Utilizes Spotify API for data fetch and modification and Gotify for notifications. Runs on a scheduled trigger, ideal for music playlist management.

name: Airtable Multi-Method API Endpoint Template
description: An n8n workflow providing a RESTful API for Airtable with full CRUD operations via multi-method webhooks. It uses Airtable API and n8n webhook/respond nodes to create, read (single/all), update, and delete customer records in Airtable.

name: Amazon Best Seller Electronics Data Extractor
description: Automates extraction of Amazon Electronics best seller data using Bright Data API for scraping and Google Gemini LLM for structured information extraction, delivering product rankings, ratings, and offers as structured JSON.

name: Indeed Company Info Extract & Summarize
description: Automates extraction and summarization of company data from Indeed using Bright Data's Web Unlocker API and Google Gemini LLM. Converts markdown data to text and HTML, formats results via AI agent, and sends summarized insights via webhook for HR and engineering use.

name: Line Bot Chinese Translator
description: n8n workflow integrating Line Messaging API and OpenRouter.ai LLM to translate text and image content to Chinese with pinyin and English. Supports text, image input via Line webhook, uses OpenRouter's qwen models, sends replies back via Line API.

name: LinkedIn Likes to Airtable Content Hub
description: Automates extraction of insightful LinkedIn post likes from the last 7 days via RapidAPI, filters and formats them into content ideas, then stores these ideas in Airtable for content planning. Uses LinkedIn API (via RapidAPI) and Airtable integration with n8n automation.

name: Entra Contacts to Zammad User Sync
description: An n8n workflow to synchronize Microsoft Entra contacts with Zammad user accounts. It uses Microsoft Graph API to fetch contacts and Zammad API to create, update, or deactivate users. Automates user management by merging, filtering, and comparing datasets.

name: KNN Image Classifier for Land Use
description: An n8n workflow that classifies satellite images into land use types using Voyage.ai for image embeddings and Qdrant vector search for KNN classification with majority voting and tie resolution loops.

name: Google SERP Extraction & Summarization with Bright Data
description: Automates Google Search scraping using Bright Data API, processes results with Google Gemini AI for extraction and summarization, then sends formatted data via webhook. Utilizes n8n, Bright Data, and Google Gemini PaLM API for advanced search analysis.

name: Billbee Address Validation Automation
description: Automates address validation for Billbee orders using Endereco API. Fetches shipping data from Billbee, validates and corrects addresses via Endereco service, updates Billbee, and applies tags for validation status. Uses Billbee API, Endereco API, and n8n automation.

name: Auto-Optimize Images Uploaded to Google Drive
description: Automates image optimization by watching a specified Google Drive folder for new images, downloading them, sending them to TinyPNG API for compression, and saving the optimized images back to a chosen Google Drive folder. Integrates Google Drive and TinyPNG APIs.

name: Sync New Pipedrive Products to Stripe
description: Automates product sync from Pipedrive CRM to Stripe. Uses Pipedrive trigger node, processes product data with Function and Set nodes, and creates products and prices via Stripe API calls. Ideal for streamlining e-commerce product management.

name: Excel to Salesforce Account & Contact Sync
description: Automates syncing company accounts and contacts from Microsoft Excel to Salesforce using n8n. It reads Excel data, searches Salesforce for existing accounts, merges data, creates new accounts, and upserts contacts via Salesforce API.

name: Excel to Salesforce CRM Importer
description: Automates importing company and contact data from an Excel spreadsheet into Salesforce. Uses HTTP request to download the file, spreadsheet parsing, Salesforce API to search, create, and update accounts and contacts, deduplicating data along the way.

name: Shopify to Zendesk Order Ticket Sync
description: Automates creation and tracking of Zendesk support tickets for updated Shopify orders using Shopify webhook and Zendesk API. Checks existing tickets by order ID to avoid duplicates, creating new tickets for new orders to streamline customer support workflows.

name: Zendesk to Asana Task Sync Automation
description: Automates creation and updating of Asana tasks from new Zendesk tickets using Zendesk and Asana APIs via n8n workflow. It checks for existing tasks and appends comments or creates new tasks accordingly, streamlining ticket-to-task management.

name: Mautic to Monday.com Contact Sync
description: Automates contact creation in Monday.com from new Mautic leads using n8n. Integrates Mautic webhook trigger and Monday.com API to sync lead names and emails as board items, enabling CRM task automation and enhanced contact management.

name: Zendesk to GitHub Issue Sync
description: Automates syncing Zendesk tickets with GitHub issues by creating issues or comments when new tickets are received. Uses Zendesk API, GitHub API, and n8n workflows for seamless ticket and issue management.

name: Zendesk to Jira Issue Synchronizer
description: Automates synchronization between Zendesk tickets and Jira issues using n8n. It creates Jira issues for new Zendesk tickets or adds comments if an issue exists. Integrates Zendesk API and Jira Cloud API to keep data consistent.

name: Sync HubSpot Companies with Zendesk Organizations
description: Automates syncing of recently modified HubSpot companies to Zendesk organizations every 5 mins using HubSpot and Zendesk APIs. Checks if organization exists to update or create. Uses n8n with HubSpot App Token and Zendesk API credentials.

name: Zendesk-HubSpot Ticket Sync Automation
description: Automates synchronization of support tickets and contacts between Zendesk and HubSpot using their APIs. Periodically updates or creates tickets in HubSpot from Zendesk tickets, manages contact data, and keeps external IDs in sync timestamps to enable seamless cross-platform support management.

name: RabbitMQ to SMS Alert System
description: An n8n workflow that listens to a RabbitMQ queue for temperature readings and sends SMS alerts via the Vonage API when a threshold is exceeded. It automates message processing using RabbitMQ trigger, conditional logic, and SMS notification.

name: WooCommerce Product CRUD Workflow
description: Automates creating, updating, and retrieving WooCommerce products using n8n's WooCommerce node and API integration. Enables manual execution to add a product, update its stock, and fetch product details seamlessly.

name: WooCommerce to Mattermost Order Alert
description: Automates sending a message on Mattermost when a new WooCommerce order is created. Uses WooCommerce API trigger and Mattermost API for real-time order notifications, improving team awareness and response speed for e-commerce operations.

name: Export SQL Table to CSV File
description: An n8n workflow that fetches data from a Microsoft SQL Server table and saves it as a CSV file. Utilizes Microsoft SQL API for querying, n8n spreadsheet node for CSV export, and supports further automation like emailing or uploading the file.

name: Sync Airtable Users to Mailchimp
description: Automates user data synchronization by retrieving contact details from Airtable and creating subscriber entries in Mailchimp using n8n automation. Utilizes Airtable API, Mailchimp API, and a Cron trigger for scheduled execution to keep mailing lists updated.

name: SMS Broadcast via Airtable & Twilio
description: Automates sending personalized SMS messages using Airtable to store contacts and Twilio API for messaging. Users trigger the workflow manually in n8n, which fetches phone numbers and names from Airtable and sends custom SMS via Twilio, streamlining bulk communication.

name: Google Drive Folder File Sharing & Link Generator
description: Automates listing files from a specified Google Drive folder, changes their sharing status to public, and generates direct download links. Uses Google Drive API and n8n workflow automation to batch process files and produce shareable URLs efficiently.

name: Spotify Discover Weekly Auto-Archiver
description: Automates weekly archiving of unique tracks from Spotify's Discover Weekly playlist to a user-created Archive playlist. Built with n8n using Spotify API, Cron scheduling, and data merging to prevent duplicates. Enhances music discovery management effortlessly.

name: Strava to Beeminder Activity Logger
description: Automates adding datapoints to Beeminder goals when new activities are created in Strava using Strava Trigger and Beeminder API nodes in n8n. Ideal for fitness tracking and goal monitoring.

name: Google Contacts: Create, Update & Get Contact
description: Automates creating, updating, and retrieving a contact in Google Contacts via n8n using the Google Contacts API with OAuth2. Enables workflow automation for managing contacts seamlessly within Google ecosystem.

name: HubSpot Contact Outreach Automation
description: Automates daily outreach emails to uncontacted HubSpot leads using Gmail and records engagement in HubSpot. Utilizes HubSpot API with OAuth2 for contact retrieval and engagement logging, plus Gmail API for sending personalized cold emails.

name: HubSpot Contact Follow-Up Automation
description: Automates follow-up outreach emails for HubSpot contacts using Gmail and HubSpot APIs via OAuth2. Runs daily at 9 am, filters contacts last contacted over 30 days ago with only one prior engagement, sends personalized emails, and records engagement in HubSpot CRM.

name: Google Indexing API Sitemap Automation
description: Automates website URL indexing by extracting sitemap URLs, converting XML to JSON, and submitting each URL to Google's Indexing API with batch control and quota limit error handling. Tech: n8n, Google Indexing API, XML, HTTP Request.

name: Euro Exchange Rate Webhook API
description: An n8n workflow that fetches the latest Euro foreign exchange rates from ECB's XML API, converts the data to JSON, filters by requested currency via a webhook query, and responds with current exchange rate. Utilizes HTTP Request, XML to JSON conversion, and webhook triggers.

name: Todoist Daily Task Automator
description: Automates daily task creation in Todoist by copying template tasks with custom due dates from descriptions. Uses Todoist API, JavaScript for parsing, and n8n scheduling and filtering nodes to manage recurring daily tasks.

name: Groundhogg CRM Mailing Address Verifier
description: An n8n workflow that verifies new contact mailing addresses in Groundhogg CRM using Lob API for US address validation. It triggers via webhook, checks address deliverability, and updates the CRM by tagging verified or unverified addresses to streamline contact data accuracy.

name: Google Slides Dynamic Image Replacer
description: Automates replacing images in Google Slides via a webhook. Uses Google Slides API and n8n workflow to identify images by alt text and update them dynamically with new URLs. Ideal for updating presentations programmatically with OAuth2 authentication.

name: Elevenlabs Text-to-Speech Webhook
description: API workflow in n8n converting text to speech using Elevenlabs API. Accepts POST requests with voice_id and text, returns generated speech binary. Uses custom HTTP auth and webhook nodes for seamless TTS automation.

name: Keap Contact Address Verification Automation
description: Automates mailing address verification for new Keap CRM contacts using Lob API via webhook triggers. Tags contacts as deliverable or non-deliverable to trigger follow-up actions. Tech stack: Keap CRM webhook, Lob address verification API, n8n workflow automation.

name: Airtable SEO Meta Tag Auto-Fill
description: Automates filling missing SEO title tags and meta descriptions in Airtable by fetching URLs, scraping their HTML title and meta description using Airtable API and HTTP Request node in n8n. Updates Airtable records, streamlining SEO data management.

name: Google Drive to Pipedrive Lead Importer
description: Automates importing leads from Google Drive spreadsheets into Pipedrive CRM. Uses Google Drive Trigger, Spreadsheet File parser, and Pipedrive API to create organizations, persons, leads, and notes, streamlining lead management and CRM updates.

name: Stripe to Pipedrive Charge Logger
description: Automates logging of successful Stripe charges to Pipedrive CRM by fetching charges since last run, enriching with customer and organization details via Stripe and Pipedrive APIs, then creating notes in Pipedrive. Scheduled daily at 8 AM using n8n workflow.

name: Stripe Checkout Sessions Fetch & Filter
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all Stripe checkout sessions from the last 20 days using Stripe API, paginates results, then splits and filters them by custom fields like nickname and job title for easy data processing and visualization.

name: Pipedrive to Stripe Customer Sync
description: Automates syncing updated Pipedrive deals with Stripe by checking deal won time changes, retrieving organization details, searching Stripe customers, and creating new customers if needed using Pipedrive and Stripe APIs in n8n.

name: ConnectWise New Ticket Alerts to Teams
description: Automates fetching new tickets from ConnectWise API, filters out previously sent tickets using Redis, groups them by company, and sends alert messages to Microsoft Teams chat. Uses n8n, ConnectWise API, Redis, and Microsoft Teams integration.

name: ISS Position Updates via ActiveMQ Every Minute
description: Automates fetching the International Space Station's real-time position every minute using WheretheISS.at API, processes the data with n8n nodes, and sends updates to an ActiveMQ topic via AMQP protocol for real-time tracking workflows.

name: ISS Position to AWS SQS Queue
description: Automates fetching real-time ISS location using 'wheretheiss.at' API every minute and sends latitude, longitude, timestamp, and name details to AWS SQS queue. Tech stack: n8n, HTTP Request, AWS SQS, Cron node for scheduling.

name: ISS Location Logger to BigQuery
description: Automates fetching ISS real-time position via 'wheretheiss.at' API every minute, formats data, and stores name, latitude, longitude, and timestamp into Google BigQuery. Built with n8n workflows using HTTP Request, Cron, Set, and Google BigQuery nodes.

name: AWS S3 to Transcribe Audio Workflow
description: Automates transcription of audio files stored in AWS S3 using AWS Transcribe with automatic language detection. Built in n8n with AWS S3 and AWS Transcribe nodes, triggered manually to process all files in a specified bucket.

name: Daily Weather Updates via LINE Message
description: Automate sending daily weather updates at 9 AM via LINE messenger using OpenWeatherMap API and n8n Cron trigger. Fetches Berlin temperature and sends a personalized notification via LINE Notify OAuth2 integration.

name: Fetch & Merge Multiple RSS Feeds
description: This n8n workflow fetches RSS feeds from specified URLs (Medium and Dev.to for n8n content), reads and batches them, checks completion, and merges all feed items into a single dataset. Tech stack: n8n native nodes (RSS Feed Read, Function, IF, SplitInBatches) to automate RSS aggregation.

name: HubSpot Contacts Pagination Fetcher
description: n8n workflow to fetch HubSpot CRM contacts with automatic pagination handling using HubSpot API. It manages API keys, handles rate limiting by waiting between requests, and combines all paged results into a single dataset for further processing.

name: n8n GitHub Workflow Backup Automation
description: Automates daily backup of n8n workflows to a GitHub repository. Uses n8n HTTP Request nodes with basic auth to fetch workflows, GitHub API nodes to create/edit JSON files, and cron scheduling. Ensures versioned workflow backups with commit metadata.

name: Typeform to HubSpot Lead Automation
description: Automates lead capture from Typeform surveys into HubSpot CRM, updating contact info and lifecycle stage, then sending a personalized Gmail follow-up. Uses Typeform API, HubSpot API, and Gmail OAuth2 for streamlined lead management and nurturing.

name: GitHub Issue Auto-Assignment
description: Automates assignment of GitHub issues using GitHub API and OAuth2. Listens to issue and comment events, assigns issues to creators or commenters who request assignment via keywords. Built with n8n workflow automation, improving GitHub repository management.

name: Zendesk Ticket Creator
description: An n8n workflow to create Zendesk support tickets manually. Uses n8n's Manual Trigger node to initiate and the Zendesk node to create tickets via Zendesk API. Ideal for quick ticket generation in customer service automation.

name: GitHub Issue Auto-Assignment Bot
description: Automates GitHub issue assignment using n8n with GitHub OAuth2 API. Listens to issue and comment events, assigns issues based on 'assign me' comments, and adds labels/comments accordingly to streamline issue management.

name: HubSpot Contact Enrichment with Clearbit
description: Automates enriching HubSpot contacts using Clearbit API. When a HubSpot contact event triggers, it fetches contact details, retrieves extra data from Clearbit (job title, company, city), and updates the HubSpot contact. Uses HubSpot OAuth2 & Clearbit APIs.

name: Product Hunt Top 5 Posts to Discord
description: Automates hourly fetching of the top 5 Product Hunt posts via GraphQL API, processes post data, and sends formatted summaries to a Discord channel using webhook. Uses n8n automation with Cron, GraphQL, Item Lists, Set, and Discord nodes.

name: Onfleet Task Creation from Spreadsheet
description: Automates creating Onfleet delivery tasks using data from Excel spreadsheets. Utilizes n8n nodes for reading binary files, parsing spreadsheets, and Onfleet API integration. Ideal for logistics teams to streamline task imports from customer or delivery data sheets.

name: Fal AI Flux Image Generator to Google Drive
description: Automates image creation using Fal AI Flux API with customizable prompts, size, steps, and guidance. Retrieves generated images, downloads them, and saves to Google Drive. Utilizes HTTP requests with header auth and Google Drive OAuth2 in n8n workflow.

name: Webhook JSON to XLSX Exporter
description: An n8n workflow that accepts JSON data via a POST webhook, splits items in the JSON body, converts them into an XLSX spreadsheet file, and returns it as a downloadable binary response. Uses n8n built-in nodes: Webhook, Item Lists, Spreadsheet File, Respond to Webhook.

name: Monthly Financial Metrics to Mattermost
description: Automates monthly retrieval of financial metrics from ProfitWell API and posts key data (active customers, recurring revenue, growth rate) to a Mattermost channel using n8n workflow triggered by a cron schedule.

name: Crypto Portfolio Value Updater
description: Automates hourly updates of cryptocurrency prices and portfolio values using CoinGecko API and Airtable. Retrieves portfolio data, fetches current prices, updates records, and calculates total portfolio value for easy tracking and reporting.

name: Onfleet to QuickBooks Invoice Automation
description: Automates invoice creation in QuickBooks Online upon new Onfleet task creation using Onfleet Trigger and QuickBooks API integration. Streamlines billing by triggering an invoice every time a delivery or task is initiated in Onfleet.

name: Google Drive File Update to Onfleet Task
description: Automate task creation in Onfleet when a specific Google Drive file is updated using Google Drive Trigger and Onfleet API in n8n workflow. Useful for seamless delivery or service task management linked to file changes.

name: Manage Cases in TheHive via n8n
description: Automates creation, updating, and retrieval of cases in TheHive using n8n workflow. Utilizes TheHive API to handle case lifecycle from creation to modification and fetching detailed info, ideal for cybersecurity incident management.

name: GitLab Backup Automation
description: Automates backing up n8n workflows and credentials by exporting them, then committing and pushing changes to a GitLab repo using command line and cron scheduling.

name: User Request Management via Typeform & ClickUp
description: Automates workflow for managing user requests by integrating Typeform forms with ClickUp task management. It routes request types (document, presentation, update, workflow) to corresponding ClickUp lists using OAuth2 API. Enhances task tracking and team collaboration.

name: HTTP Requests & Pagination Demo Workflow
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating common HTTP request use cases: fetching data from APIs (GitHub, Wikipedia, JSONPlaceholder), handling pagination, scraping HTML content, and splitting response bodies for easier data handling. Tech stack: n8n nodes (HTTP Request, HTML Extract, If, Set), GitHub API, Wikipedia, JSONPlaceholder REST API.

name: Typeform to Pipedrive Lead Automation
description: Automates capturing Typeform survey responses to create and map leads, organizations, persons, and notes in Pipedrive CRM. Uses Typeform webhook trigger, JavaScript mapping for company size, and Pipedrive API nodes for CRM data entry.

name: Daily HubSpot to Mailchimp Contact Sync
description: Automates daily syncing of new HubSpot contacts (created in the last day) to a Mailchimp mailing list using OAuth2 authentication for both APIs, triggered every day at 07:00 via n8n's cron node.

name: Sync Mailchimp Contacts to HubSpot Daily
description: Automates daily synchronization of updated Mailchimp members to HubSpot contacts using Mailchimp and HubSpot APIs. Tracks last execution timestamp to fetch only recent changes. Built with n8n workflow automation tool and cron scheduling.

name: DOCX to PDF File Converter
description: Automates converting DOCX documents to PDF using ConvertAPI. Downloads a DOCX file, sends it to ConvertAPI for format conversion, and saves the resulting PDF to disk. Utilizes HTTP requests, file handling, and ConvertAPI authentication.

name: Google Drive to AWS S3 Sync
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Google Drive file updates in a specific folder and syncs files to an AWS S3 bucket with AES256 encryption. Uses Google Drive API, AWS S3 API, and n8n nodes for seamless cloud file synchronization.

name: Confluence Page Creator from Template
description: Automates creating Atlassian Confluence pages using REST API. Fetches a template, replaces placeholders with webhook input data, and posts a new page to a target space. Uses HTTP Basic Auth with Atlassian API keys and supports dynamic content generation.

name: Receipt Data Extraction via Mindee API
description: Automates extracting detailed information from receipt images using Mindee OCR API. Retrieves an image via HTTP request, then extracts structured data like totals, dates, and vendor info. Useful for expense tracking and accounting automation.

name: n8n Workflow GitHub Backup Sync
description: Automates backup and synchronization of n8n workflows to a GitHub repo using n8n HTTP Request, GitHub API, and JavaScript. It detects new, changed, or identical workflows and updates GitHub accordingly. Scheduled to run daily for workflow backup automation.

name: Daily Weather Push Notifications via Pushcut
description: Automates sending daily 9AM weather updates for Berlin using OpenWeatherMap API and Pushcut push notifications in n8n. Ideal for timely personalized weather alerts leveraging cron scheduling and No-Code automation.

name: Matrix Room Creation & Invitation Workflow
description: Automates creating a Matrix chat room, inviting members from another room, and sending a welcome message. Utilizes Matrix API for room and user management, with conditional logic to avoid re-inviting the creator, enabling seamless community onboarding.

name: WooCommerce Customer Sync to Mautic
description: Automates syncing WooCommerce customers to Mautic CRM using WooCommerce webhooks and Mautic API with OAuth2. Checks if customer exists in Mautic, then creates or updates contact. Ideal for seamless marketing integration and CRM updates.

name: Daily Weather SMS via Vonage
description: Automates sending daily weather updates for Berlin at 9 AM using OpenWeatherMap API and Vonage SMS service via n8n workflow with Cron scheduling.

name: AI Chat Enhancer with Bright Data Search
description: Enhances chat responses by integrating Google Gemini AI with real-time web search via Bright Data MCP Client tools (Google, Bing, Yandex). Automates AI agent queries, uses memory buffering, and sends notifications via webhook. Ideal for informed, dynamic chat assistants.

name: Daily Weather Push Notification
description: Automates daily weather updates for Berlin via OpenWeatherMap API, sending temperatures as push notifications using Pushover. Triggered by a Cron job running at 9 AM. Ideal for users wanting timely, automatic local weather alerts on their devices.

name: SecurityScorecard Report Automation
description: An n8n workflow automating the generation and download of full SecurityScorecard reports for a given domain using the SecurityScorecard API. It triggers manually and sequentially fetches, limits, then downloads JSON scorecard data for security insights.

name: Weather Info via Webhook API
description: An n8n workflow that provides current weather data via a webhook. Utilizes OpenWeatherMap API to fetch temperature and 'feels like' info based on city query parameters, returning formatted weather details in English.

name: Wise Transfer Event to Airtable Logger
description: Automates logging of Wise money transfer events into Airtable by triggering on transfer state changes using Wise API, then fetching transfer details and appending structured data (ID, date, reference, amount) to Airtable. Integrates Wise API and Airtable with n8n workflow.

name: Stock Earnings Report RAG Analysis Workflow
description: Automates financial analysis of Google's last 3 quarters earnings by loading PDFs from Google Drive, creating embeddings via Google Gemini, storing/retrieving with Pinecone vector DB, and generating detailed markdown reports saved to Google Docs using AI agents.

name: Typeform Feedback Sentiment to Mattermost
description: Automates sentiment analysis of event feedback submitted via Typeform using Google Cloud Natural Language API, then sends a sentiment score and message to a Mattermost channel. Integrates Typeform, Google NLP, and Mattermost for real-time feedback monitoring.

name: Bing Copilot Search Results Summarizer
description: Automates extraction and summarization of Bing Copilot search results using Bright Data API for data scraping and Google Gemini AI for natural language processing and structured data formatting. Delivers structured JSON data and concise summaries via webhooks.

name: AI Passport Photo Validator
description: n8n workflow that imports portrait photos from Google Drive, resizes images, and uses Google Gemini AI vision model to validate passport photo compliance against UK government criteria. Includes structured output parsing for automation.

name: Auto Remove & Replace Image Backgrounds on Google Drive
description: Automates background removal and replacement for images in Google Drive using Photoroom API and Google Drive integration. It watches a folder, processes images with customizable settings (background color, padding, output size), and uploads the results back to Drive.

name: n8n Workflow Deployment Automation
description: Automates deployment of n8n workflows by monitoring a Google Drive folder for JSON workflow files. Uses Google Drive API, n8n API with authenticated requests to create workflows, apply tags, and move files between Drive folders, streamlining workflow management.

name: Bitrix24 Chatbot Webhook Automation
description: This n8n workflow implements a chatbot for Bitrix24 using webhook integration. It handles events like message addition, bot joining chat, app install, and bot deletion through Bitrix24 REST API. It validates tokens, processes messages, and registers the bot, enabling custom conversational automations within Bitrix24.

name: Image Object Extraction and Elasticsearch Indexing
description: Automates image processing by using Cloudflare Detr-Resnet-50 AI to detect objects in images, crops identified objects, uploads them to Cloudinary, and indexes them in Elasticsearch for advanced image search by object. Built with n8n, Cloudflare Workers AI, Cloudinary, and Elasticsearch.

name: AI Resume Screening with Multimodal LLM
description: Automates candidate resume evaluation by converting PDF resumes from Google Drive into images via Stirling PDF API, then analyzing them using Google's Gemini multimodal language model to determine candidate fit for a role and detect AI bypass attempts.

name: n8n Workflow Statistics Dashboard
description: Generates a detailed dashboard summarizing n8n workflows including nodes, tags, webhooks, and global stats. Uses n8n API, JavaScript, JMESPath, Luxon, XML/XSLT, and Bootstrap for interactive reporting and visualization within n8n.

name: Automated Custom Presentation Creator for Leads
description: This n8n workflow automates the creation of personalized Google Slides presentations for each new sales lead by integrating Google Drive, Sheets, and Slides APIs. It imports lead data from CSV files, creates new Sheets, copies presentation templates, and customizes content dynamically to streamline sales outreach.

name: Automated PDF Scans Upload to Nextcloud
description: Workflow automates copying scanned PDF files from a local ScanServJS API to Nextcloud. Uses HTTP Request nodes to fetch file lists and files, Nextcloud node for uploading, and Schedule Trigger for hourly automation. Ideal for managing scanned documents efficiently.

name: Lead Generation & Enrichment Workflow
description: An n8n workflow for automated lead scraping and enrichment using HTTP API calls to fetch personal and work emails, filters leads with valid emails, and saves detailed lead info to Airtable. Ideal for marketers and sales teams.

name: PDF Data Extraction via Claude & Gemini APIs
description: n8n workflow automates downloading a PDF from Google Drive, converts it to base64, and extracts data using Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Google Gemini 2.0 Flash AI models with custom prompts. Enables comparison of extraction accuracy, latency, and cost.

name: Self-hosted LLM Personal Data Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that uses a self-hosted Mistral NeMo LLM via Ollama API to extract structured personal data from chat messages. It features error auto-correction, structured JSON schema parsing, and real-time chat triggers for reliable data extraction.

name: Umami Analytics SEO AI Report Generator
description: An n8n workflow that connects Umami analytics API with Openrouter AI and Baserow to automate SEO data analysis. It fetches weekly website stats, sends them to an AI model for SEO insights and improvement suggestions, then saves the summarized reports in Baserow for easy management.

name: NetSuite SuiteQL API Query Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating NetSuite REST API to run SuiteQL queries via a webhook or manual trigger. It leverages n8n's NetSuite node to fetch and respond with dynamic query results, enabling automated and real-time data retrieval from NetSuite ERP systems.

name: Daily Backup of n8n Workflows to Bitbucket
description: Automates daily backup of all n8n workflows to a specified Bitbucket repository. Uses n8n API to fetch workflows, Bitbucket API for storage, and handles rate limiting with dynamic wait times to ensure smooth, uninterrupted backups.

name: Flux AI Image Generator Webform
description: An n8n workflow that creates an AI-powered image generator webform using Huggingface's text-to-image models (e.g., FLUX.1-schnell), allows users to select artistic styles, processes prompts, uploads results to Cloudflare R2 S3 storage, and serves a styled webpage with recent image renders.

name: Daily Language Learning with Hacker News
description: Automates daily extraction of top 3 Hacker News article titles, extracts and translates unique words to German using LingvaNex API, stores results in Airtable, and sends a curated vocabulary list via SMS with Vonage API.

name: Automated Backup of n8n Workflows to Gitea
description: This workflow automates backing up n8n workflows to a Gitea Git repository every 45 minutes. It uses the n8n API to fetch workflows, compares changes, encodes them in base64 using Python code nodes, and manages files via Gitea's API with HTTP Request nodes secured by Personal Access Tokens.

name: Receipt OCR to Airtable Logger
description: Automates receipt data extraction using Mindee OCR API from uploaded receipts via webhook, then logs categorized expense details like merchant, date, total, and currency into Airtable. Uses n8n webhook, Mindee OCR, and Airtable API for expense tracking automation.

name: Google Autocomplete Keyword Generator A-Z
description: An n8n workflow that generates keyword queries by appending each letter A-Z to a base keyword, queries Google Autocomplete API to retrieve popular search suggestions, and aggregates results. Utilizes n8n code nodes, HTTP request node, and batch processing to prevent API blocking.

name: Automated Alert to Azure DevOps Task
description: n8n workflow automates querying Elasticsearch daily at 12:15 to detect alerts and creates work items in Azure DevOps if alerts exist using Cron, Elasticsearch API, and Azure DevOps REST API with Basic Auth.

name: Weather SMS Notification via Webhook & Airtable
description: n8n workflow receives POST webhook with user data, stores it in Airtable, fetches current weather via OpenWeatherMap API for the specified city, then sends weather details by SMS using Twilio. Integrates Webhook, Airtable, OpenWeatherMap, and Twilio APIs.

name: Sync YouTube Playlist Tracks to Spotify
description: An n8n workflow to automate syncing tracks from a YouTube playlist to a Spotify playlist, avoiding duplicates. Uses YouTube and Spotify APIs with OAuth2, batch processing, dataset comparison, and track search for seamless playlist updates.

name: n8n Workflow GitHub Backup
description: Automates backup of n8n workflows to a GitHub repository using n8n API and GitHub API. Periodically fetches workflows, checks for changes, and commits new or updated JSON files to GitHub for version control and safe storage.

name: Automated Weekly Dinner Meal Planner
description: Scheduled weekly automation using n8n to create dinner meal plans from Mealie API. It fetches recipes by category, randomly selects configured number, and posts meal plans with configurable offsets. Utilizes HTTP authentication and JavaScript code for randomization.

name: GitLab Merge Request Automation
description: An n8n workflow automating GitLab merge request lifecycle: checks, creates MRs, adds comments, closes or merges them. Uses GitLab API via HTTP Requests and includes scheduling, conditional logic, and wait timers for pipeline completion.

name: Google Drive Workflow Backup Automation
description: Automates scheduled backups of n8n workflows by exporting workflow data as JSON files and saving them into date-stamped folders on Google Drive. Utilizes n8n API, Google Drive OAuth2, and scheduled triggers for streamlined backup management.

name: Automated n8n Workflow Backup to Google Drive
description: This n8n workflow automatically backs up all n8n workflows daily at 01:30 by retrieving them via the n8n API, encoding the data into JSON files, and uploading them to a specified Google Drive folder. Tech stack: n8n, n8n API, Google Drive API.

name: Shopify Automated Fulfillment Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating Shopify order fulfillment by fetching unfulfilled orders, filtering those older than 24 hours, retrieving fulfillment orders via Shopify API, and marking them fulfilled with customer notification. Uses Shopify REST API and n8n core nodes.

name: Incident Resolution & Notification Automation
description: Automates incident status updates by integrating PagerDuty, Jira, and Mattermost via n8n. Resolves incidents in PagerDuty, updates Jira issue status, and posts closure notifications to Mattermost channels, streamlining IT incident management workflows.

name: Dynamic Line Chart Generator with Google Drive Upload
description: Creates a dynamic line chart from JSON data using QuickChart API in n8n and uploads the image to Google Drive. Includes a manual trigger, customizable input data, and flexible chart options for easy visualization and sharing.

name: Error Notification via Mattermost & Twilio
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on errors, sends detailed error notifications to Mattermost, and then sends an SMS alert via Twilio. Utilizes n8n errorTrigger node, Mattermost API, and Twilio API to provide real-time monitoring and multi-channel alerting.

name: Upload Photo to SharePoint via Microsoft Graph
description: Automates uploading a photo to a SharePoint folder using Microsoft Graph API with OAuth2 client credentials. Utilizes HTTP Request and Set nodes in n8n to authenticate, fetch test image, set destination, and upload binary data securely.

name: PDF Data Extraction with Claude & Gemini
description: An n8n workflow that downloads a PDF from Google Drive, converts it to base64, and extracts data using AI models Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Google Gemini 2.0 Flash. Enables prompt customization to tailor extraction, comparing results from two top NLP APIs seamlessly.

name: Automated PDF to HTML Converter
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new PDFs in Google Drive, uses PDF.co API to convert PDFs to HTML, and saves the HTML back to Google Drive. Automates document conversion using Google Drive and PDF.co API for efficient web-ready file creation.

name: CFP Submission Selection & Visualization
description: An n8n workflow integrating Airtable, Bannerbear, and Trello to automate selection and visualization of conference talks scoring above 15. It pulls submissions from Airtable, creates custom banners via Bannerbear API, and organizes selected proposals on Trello boards.

name: Candidate Resume AI Qualification
description: Automates candidate resume screening by downloading PDFs from Google Drive, converting them to images via Stirling PDF API, then analyzing with Google's Gemini multimodal LLM to assess fit for a specific role. Uses n8n, Google Drive, Stirling PDF API, and Google Gemini.

name: NameCheap Dynamic DNS Updater
description: Automates updating DNS records on NameCheap via their Dynamic DNS API. Uses n8n workflow with Cron for scheduling, IP check to avoid redundant updates, and HTTP Request nodes for API calls. Ideal for users managing dynamic IPs on multiple subdomains.

name: Weather Info Fetcher via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that fetches current weather data for a specified city using OpenWeatherMap API triggered by a webhook. It extracts temperature, humidity, wind speed, description, and city info, delivering structured weather details. Built with n8n, OpenWeatherMap API.

name: Product Feedback Collector & Manager
description: Automates collecting product feedback via Typeform, stores responses in Airtable, and routes low-score feedback to Trello for team review. Integrates Typeform API, Airtable API, and Trello API to streamline feedback management and prioritize action items efficiently.

name: Workflow Failure SMS Alert via Twilio
description: This n8n workflow uses an Error Trigger node and Twilio API integration to send an SMS notification when any workflow fails. It helps monitor workflow executions by alerting users immediately via SMS, ensuring quick response to failures.

name: Automated Receipt Expense Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that automates expense tracking by capturing receipt images via Typeform, extracting details with Mindee's OCR API, and storing expenses in Airtable for easy management and review.

name: Figma to Jira Auto Version Commenter
description: Automates updating Jira issues with design version info from Figma using n8n. Integrates Figma webhook (file version updates) and Jira Cloud API to find issues and add version comments. Requires Figma Commit Plugin and Jira credentials configured.

name: Zammad Support Tickets Summary
description: Automates daily retrieval and categorization of Zammad support tickets using Zammad API, filtering by status, and sends a summary notification to Zulip chat for customer support teams, scheduled via cron for standup meetings.

name: Google Webpage Entity Extraction
description: Extract named entities from any webpage by sending its URL to a webhook that fetches content and uses Google Natural Language API. Tech stack: n8n, HTTP Request, Google Cloud Natural Language API. Returns structured entity data like people, locations, orgs with salience.

name: Shopify to Odoo Product Sync
description: Automates syncing of new Shopify products to Odoo ERP by detecting new product creation events via Shopify API webhook and updating/creating matching products in Odoo using its API. Built with n8n using Shopify Trigger, Odoo nodes, and custom JS code.

name: Crosspost Articles to Medium & Dev.to
description: Automates posting of articles received via webhook to Medium (using Medium API) and Dev.to (using their REST API). Uses n8n webhook node for data intake and formats posts in Markdown for seamless cross-platform publishing.

name: TheHive & SIGNL4 Alert Automation
description: An automated security alert system using TheHive API for incident management and SIGNL4 for alert notifications and resolution. It includes webhook triggers, conditional checks, and supports efficient security operations automation.

name: Asana Task Creation via Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that creates Asana tasks triggered by HTTP requests via webhook using Asana's OAuth2 API. It automates task creation and returns a confirmation URL. Useful for integrating external systems with Asana task management.

name: Webhook to PostHog Event Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that receives events via a webhook and sends them to PostHog analytics using the PostHog API. Useful for real-time event tracking with no-code automation.

name: Chat with Local LLMs via n8n & Ollama
description: Interact with self-hosted Large Language Models (LLMs) using n8n workflow and Ollama API. This system captures user chat input, sends it to a local Ollama-powered LLM, and returns AI responses seamlessly within n8n, enabling private, customizable AI chats.

name: Create Task in Asana
description: Automates creation of tasks in Asana using n8n workflow with manual trigger and Asana API integration. Ideal for streamlined task management within teams.

name: Random Cocktail Recipe Translator
description: n8n workflow fetches a random cocktail recipe via TheCocktailDB API and translates the instructions to French using the DeepL API, automating cocktail content localization.

name: Matrix Virtual Coffee Group Organizer
description: Automates weekly virtual coffee meetups by grouping Matrix chat room members into randomized small groups. Utilizes Matrix API, cron scheduling, and custom JavaScript to fetch members, shuffle, and announce groups in the room every Monday at 10 AM.

name: Line Messaging API Auto Reply & Push
description: n8n workflow leveraging Line Messaging API to automatically reply to incoming Line messages using reply tokens and send push messages with user-specific Line UID. Integrates webhook listener, conditional checks, and HTTP requests for interactive chat automation.

name: Typeform Feedback Sentiment Alert
description: Automates sentiment analysis on Typeform event feedback using AWS Comprehend and sends negative feedback alerts to Mattermost. Integrates Typeform API, AWS Comprehend for sentiment detection, and Mattermost API for messaging.

name: GitHub Daily Top 13 Trending Repo Scraper
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes GitHub's trending page to extract details of the top 13 repositories daily using HTTP Request and HTML Extract nodes. It parses repository info like author, title, URL, description, and language, enabling automation of GitHub trend data collection.

name: n8n Workflow Auto On/Off Scheduler
description: Automates activation and deactivation of an n8n workflow daily at 08:00 and 20:00 using n8n API node and cron-based schedule triggers. Ideal for controlling workflow operation hours in DevOps setups with custom API credentials.

name: SQL Dataset Comparison Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to compare two SQL datasets using MySQL queries and the Compare Datasets node. It fetches aggregated payment data for customers from overlapping years and identifies differences based on customerNumber and year fields.

name: Webpage to Markdown & Link Extractor
description: n8n workflow that uses Firecrawl.dev API to convert webpage HTML into markdown and extract all links. Supports batch processing with rate limiting and integrates with custom data sources for input/output. Ideal for content extraction and AI preprocessing.

name: Docker WHMCS/WISECP API Backend
description: An n8n workflow providing an API backend for managing Docker containers via WHMCS/WISECP integrations. Uses SSH to run bash scripts on Docker servers, managing container lifecycle, disk mounts, NGINX config, and user/password operations for containerized n8n instances.

name: PDF Merge Automation with ConvertAPI
description: This n8n workflow automates downloading two remote PDF files, merging them into one using ConvertAPI's PDF merge endpoint, and saving the result locally. It integrates HTTP Request nodes for file download and the ConvertAPI for file merging, requiring API key authentication.

name: Squarespace Code Injection Backup to GitHub
description: Automates backing up Squarespace header and footer code injections to a GitHub repository using n8n workflow. Utilizes Squarespace HTTP API, GitHub API, and cheerio for HTML cleaning. Enables scheduled and manual backup to organized repo folders.

name: GetBible Scripture Retrieval
description: An n8n workflow that fetches Bible verses from the GetBible API v2 using JSON input with references, translation, and version. It processes scripture references, queries the API, and returns standardized scripture texts for dynamic integration in faith-based apps or projects.

name: Personal Data Extractor with Self-Hosted LLM
description: An n8n workflow that extracts structured personal data from chat messages using a self-hosted Mistral NeMo LLM via Ollama API. It includes auto-fixing output parser and JSON schema validation to ensure precise extraction of user info like name, contact, and communication details.

name: Amazon Keyword Suggestion & Storage Workflow
description: This n8n workflow automates fetching Amazon keyword suggestions via Amazon's Completion API, cleans and aggregates keywords, and stores them in Airtable. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request, Airtable integration, and JavaScript code node for keyword processing.

name: PDF Text Extraction & HTML to PDF
description: An n8n workflow using CustomJS PDF Toolkit nodes to convert HTML to PDF and extract text from PDFs via URL or direct input. It automates PDF content extraction and generation steps with manual trigger initiation, suitable for document processing tasks.

name: GoToWebinar Webinar Automation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating webinar management in GoToWebinar API: creates a webinar, updates its description, and fetches webinar details using OAuth2 credentials. Ideal for automating webinar setups and updates seamlessly.

name: TechCrunch Latest Articles Scraper
description: n8n workflow scraping the latest 20 articles from TechCrunch using HTTP Request and HTML parsing nodes. Extracts post metadata, detailed content, images, and timestamps for use in content aggregation or analysis.

name: Weather Alert Notification via SIGNL4
description: Automates weather monitoring for Berlin using OpenWeatherMap API, triggers a SIGNL4 alert if the temperature drops below 25°C. Utilizes n8n's schedule and conditional nodes for timely notifications.

name: Clockify Project, Tag & Time Entry Automation
description: Automates workflow in Clockify by creating a project, adding a tag, creating a time entry with details, and updating it with the project ID. Utilizes Clockify API through n8n nodes for seamless time tracking and project management automation.

name: Raindrop Bookmark CRUD Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating bookmark create, update, and retrieve operations using Raindrop API with OAuth2 authentication. It manages bookmark collections and individual bookmarks like creating a collection, adding docs link, updating title, and fetching bookmark details.

name: Typeform to Demio Webinar Registration
description: Automates webinar sign-ups by triggering on Typeform submissions and registering users to Demio events using their APIs. Streamlines lead capture from surveys or signup forms directly into webinar platform.

name: NextCloud Image Download & Upload
description: Automates downloading an image from a URL and uploading it to NextCloud folders using n8n workflow. Utilizes HTTP Request and NextCloud API nodes to manage files seamlessly.

name: PDF Merge Automation
description: Automates downloading two PDF files via HTTP requests, merges them using a custom JS PDF toolkit in n8n, and writes the merged PDF to disk. Utilizes n8n's HTTP Request, custom JS node, and file system nodes for seamless PDF processing.

name: Contentful Data Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that fetches all entries from Contentful CMS using its API, triggered manually. Useful for automating content retrieval from Contentful for various applications without coding.

name: Fetch Completed Orders from Unleashed Software
description: n8n workflow to manually trigger and fetch all completed orders from Unleashed Software API using the Unleashed Software node. Ideal for inventory or order management automation setups.

name: Download and Upload File via FTP
description: Automates downloading a file via HTTP request and uploads it to an FTP server, then lists files on the FTP. Uses n8n's HTTP Request and FTP nodes. Enables simple file transfer automation between web and FTP storage.

name: Salesforce Lead Creation and Update Workflow
description: Automates lead creation in Salesforce, updates lead details (city), and adds a note marking 'Deal Won!'. Uses n8n with Salesforce OAuth2 API integration to streamline CRM lead management tasks.

name: Microsoft Teams Channel Setup & Messaging
description: n8n workflow automates creating and updating a Microsoft Teams channel and sending a message using Microsoft Teams OAuth2 API. Triggered manually, it integrates Microsoft Teams operations to manage team channels and post messages efficiently.

name: LinkedIn Image Post Automation
description: An n8n workflow that automates posting an image with text on LinkedIn. It downloads an image via HTTP request from a URL and then publishes it as a post on a LinkedIn profile using LinkedIn API and OAuth2 authentication.

name: Weather Alert SMS Notification
description: Automates sending SMS alerts via Twilio based on current Berlin weather from OpenWeatherMap. Uses n8n with Cron trigger, weather API, conditional logic, and Twilio messaging to notify if 'feels_like' temperature is under 18°C.

name: Taiga Project Event Update Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers notifications upon events in a specific Taiga project using the TaigaCloud API. Ideal for automating project update alerts and integrations within team workflows.

name: BTC Price Alert via SMS
description: Automates BTC price monitoring in EUR using CoinGecko API every minute; sends an SMS alert via Twilio if the price is >= 9000 EUR. Uses cron scheduling, conditional logic (IF node), and Twilio API for messaging.

name: Web Page Scraper with FireCrawl API
description: An n8n workflow that takes a URL input and uses the FireCrawl API to scrape the webpage content in markdown format. It automates fetching web page data via HTTP requests and processes it for reuse in AI agents or other applications.

name: Sitemap Reader and URL Filter
description: An n8n workflow that fetches a sitemap.xml via HTTP, converts its XML to JSON, splits URLs, and filters them by criteria (e.g., PDFs). Main tools used: HTTP Request, XML node, Split Out, and Filter nodes. Useful for automated URL extraction and filtering.

name: YouTube Playlist to Raindrop Bookmarks
description: Automates saving new videos from a specified YouTube playlist to Raindrop.io as bookmarks every 30 mins. Uses YouTube API with OAuth2, filters new videos via workflow static data, and creates bookmarks with tags and titles in Raindrop via its OAuth2 API.

name: Disk Usage Alert via Twilio SMS
description: This n8n workflow monitors hard disk usage on the host machine twice daily using a shell command, and sends an SMS alert via Twilio if usage exceeds 80%. It automates system resource monitoring and alerting with Cron, Execute Command, IF, and Twilio nodes.

name: Zoom Meeting Creation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates creating a Zoom meeting using the Zoom API. Triggered manually, it leverages the Zoom node with OAuth2 authentication to set up meetings instantly within automation pipelines.

name: Create Jira Issue on Manual Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that creates a new issue in Jira Software Cloud when manually triggered. It uses the n8n Jira node connected to Jira Software Cloud API, enabling quick issue creation with specified project, summary, and issue type.

name: ISS Real-Time Position Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that fetches the current International Space Station (ISS) position using the whereistheiss.at API every minute, filters out duplicate timestamps, and outputs new coordinates with timestamps for monitoring ISS position changes in real time.

name: New RSS Feed Fetcher with Images
description: Automates fetching of only new articles from The Verge RSS every 5 minutes, extracts titles, authors, publication dates, content snippets, and images using n8n nodes like Cron, RSS Feed Read, HTML Extract, and Function to filter duplicates.

name: Reddit Post and Comment Automation
description: Automates creating a Reddit post, fetching it, and adding a comment using n8n's Reddit node with OAuth2 credentials. Ideal for Reddit content automation workflows using n8n's automation platform and Reddit API.

name: Tapfiliate Affiliate Management Workflow
description: Automates affiliate creation and tagging in Tapfiliate using n8n. Includes manual trigger, affiliate creation, metadata tagging, and program assignment via Tapfiliate API integration, streamlining affiliate program management.

name: Monday.com Subitem & Linked Items Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that integrates with Monday.com API to retrieve an item's details, its subitems, and linked pulses by parsing specific columns. Uses JavaScript code nodes, splitOut, and API calls to fetch and merge detailed relational data from Monday.com boards.

name: n8n Workflow Outdated Node Checker
description: Checks n8n workflows for nodes with outdated versions by comparing each node's type and version to the latest available via the n8n API. Uses n8n's HTTP Request, Aggregate, If, and Code nodes with n8n API key authentication to identify nodes needing updates.

name: Namesilo Bulk Domain Availability Checker
description: Automates checking domain name availability in bulk using Namesilo API. Supports batches up to 200 domains with rate-limit handling. Outputs results as Excel file. Built with n8n workflow using HTTP Request, JavaScript code, Wait, and Convert to Excel nodes.

name: n8n Workflow Nodes Update Notifier
description: Automates checking and updating outdated nodes in n8n workflows using n8n API and Gmail for summary emails. Identifies outdated nodes, prepends symbols, optionally adds updated nodes to canvas, and notifies via Gmail. Helps maintain workflow health.

name: Monday.com Full Item Data Fetcher
description: n8n workflow to fetch comprehensive data for a specific Monday.com board item, including all columns, subitems, and board relations. Utilizes Monday.com API nodes, JavaScript code nodes for data processing, and merging/aggregation nodes for structured JSON output.

name: Bitrix24 Task Widget with Webhook Integration
description: Automates Bitrix24 task widget app installation and task data retrieval using webhooks, HTTP requests, and file handling within n8n. Integrates with Bitrix24 REST API to manage widget placement, installation responses, and display task details dynamically.

name: Automated n8n Workflow Backup to Dropbox
description: This n8n workflow automates backing up current workflows by exporting them as JSON files to Dropbox, organizing backups into folders, and purging backups older than 30 days. It uses n8n API, Dropbox API, and date-time nodes for scheduling and maintenance.

name: Contabo VPS Snapshot Automation
description: Automates daily backup snapshots for Contabo VPS instances using Contabo API, UUIDGenerator for unique request IDs, and n8n nodes. Handles authorization, instance listing, snapshot checking, deletion, and creation with scheduled and manual triggers.

name: Webhook.site to Local n8n Relay
description: Automates receiving public webhooks via webhook.site API and forwards them to a local n8n workflow. Utilizes schedule triggers, key-value storage (@horka.tv/n8n-nodes-storage-kv), HTTP requests, and custom JavaScript for filtering and processing. Ideal for testing and local webhook processing.

name: Customer.io Unsubscribe Event Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that uses the Customer.io Trigger node to automatically capture and respond to customer unsubscribes in real time via Customer.io API, enabling automated actions upon unsubscribe events.

name: Linux Filesystem MCP Server
description: An n8n workflow implementing a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Linux filesystem. It enables remote MCP clients to list, search, read, create directories and files securely on the host machine using n8n's MCP trigger and Execute Command tools. Ideal for file management automation.

name: Retell Voice Agent Booking Webhook
description: An n8n workflow that connects Retell AI Voice Agents with custom logic via webhooks. It captures booking requests, processes data, and sends confirmation responses in real-time.
