Tech stack includes Retell AI, n8n webhook and respond nodes, with potential for API integrations and AI enhancements.

name: Google News RSS Decoder to Clean Article Links
description: An n8n workflow that reads Google News RSS feeds (customizable by language), decodes obfuscated Google News URLs via reverse-engineered POST requests, and outputs clean, direct article links. Uses RSS Feed, HTTP Request, HTML extraction, and JavaScript code nodes.

name: Automated Bluesky Thread Creator
description: An n8n workflow that authenticates to Bluesky via API and automates creation of threaded posts (initial post, replies, siblings) on schedule. Uses Bluesky's xrpc API with HTTP Request and JavaScript code nodes to build and post multi-level conversation threads daily at 9 AM.

name: Docker InfluxDB WHMCS API Backend
description: Automates Docker-based InfluxDB container management for WHMCS/WISECP. Uses n8n workflow with Webhook API (Basic Auth), SSH for Docker commands, Docker Compose, and nginx-proxy configs to deploy, start, stop, suspend, and monitor InfluxDB containers per client domain.

name: Centroid Calculator for Vector Sets
description: An n8n workflow that receives vector arrays via webhook, validates uniform dimensions, computes their centroid by averaging each component, and returns the result. Uses n8n's Webhook, Set, Code, and Respond nodes for API-driven vector centroid calculations.

name: Crop Image Anomaly Detection Workflow
description: An n8n workflow detecting anomalous crop images using Voyage.ai embeddings and Qdrant vector search. It compares image embeddings to cluster medoids of a crops dataset and flags unknown or rare crops. Tech: Voyage AI API, Qdrant Cloud, Python code for scoring.

name: Docker MinIO WHMCS API Deployment
description: An n8n workflow to deploy and manage MinIO Docker containers for WHMCS/WISECP integration. Utilizes SSH for Docker commands, Basic Auth API webhook, dynamic Docker Compose and NGINX config generation, and supports lifecycle actions like deploy, start, stop, suspend, and ACLs.

name: Zammad Data Export to Excel
description: An n8n workflow that exports users, roles, groups, and organizations from Zammad via API calls authenticated by token. It transforms data into universal objects and converts them into Excel files (XLSX). Ideal for helpdesk admin reporting and data management.

name: Scaleway Servers Info Retrieval & Filter
description: An n8n workflow that fetches and aggregates Scaleway instance and baremetal server details across multiple zones using Scaleway API. It supports dynamic filtering by tags, name, public IP, or zone and returns results via authenticated webhook. Built with HTTP Request, Code, Switch, and Webhook nodes.

name: Immich Docker Deployment API Backend
description: n8n workflow deploying and managing Immich Docker containers via API webhook. Integrates SSH for remote Docker commands. Supports container lifecycle, disk mounting, ACL management, NGINX config, and admin user operations. Designed for WHMCS/WISECP integration by PUQcloud.

name: Bluesky Auto Welcome Message Sender
description: Automate sending personalized welcome DMs to new followers on Bluesky social. Uses Bluesky API to track followers, store follower data in JSON files, detect new followers, and send predefined private messages with links at hourly intervals.

name: n8n Async Workflow Coordination Example
description: Demonstrates asynchronous workflow coordination in n8n using manual triggers, HTTP webhooks, wait nodes, and HTTP requests. Integrates with an external JokeAPI and simulates independent workflows communicating via resume URLs for joined execution flow handling.

name: Ko-fi Payment Webhook Handler
description: An n8n workflow that receives Ko-fi payment webhooks, validates verification tokens, and categorizes payments into Donations, Subscriptions or Shop Orders for further automation. Uses n8n webhook, if and switch nodes for processing Ko-fi webhook JSON data.

name: Zoho CRM Data Fetch Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers manually to fetch all records from Zoho CRM using Zoho OAuth2 API. Useful for integrating and automating CRM data retrieval.

name: n8n Workflow Cloner Between Instances
description: Automates cloning of n8n workflows from one instance to another using n8n API and HTTP requests. Syncs workflows and assigns them to projects, leveraging native n8n nodes and API calls for efficient workflow migration between environments.

name: Bluesky Image Post Creator
description: Automates posting image posts on Bluesky by downloading images from URLs, uploading as blobs via Bluesky API, and creating posts with captions. Utilizes HTTP Request and Code nodes in n8n for session creation, image handling, and feed posting.

name: Forward Netflix Emails via Gmail and Mailjet
description: Automates forwarding Netflix emails from a Gmail account to multiple recipients using Gmail API and Mailjet. Detects Netflix emails via Gmail trigger, splits recipient list, and sends personalized forwards via Mailjet SMTP API for seamless multi-recipient delivery.

name: CSV to Excel Converter from URL
description: Automates downloading a CSV file from a public URL, imports it using n8n's HTTP Request and Spreadsheet nodes, and converts it to an Excel (.xlsx) file. Utilizes n8n native nodes with no external APIs, ideal for data processing automation.

name: API Uptime Monitor with SMS Alert
description: Automates API uptime checks using scheduled HTTP requests and Twilio SMS alerts when the API status code is not 200. Built with n8n automation, leveraging HTTP Request and Twilio nodes for timely service downtime notifications.

name: Conditional Retry Workflow with Known Error Handling
description: An n8n workflow for retrying failed API calls up to 3 times, except for specific known errors (e.g., 'could not be found'). Uses wait and counter logic with Manual Trigger, If and Set nodes to manage retries and error handling, ensuring robust error flow control.

name: Perplexity AI Q&A with n8n
description: This n8n workflow automates querying Perplexity AI's chat completions API using HTTP requests, setting system and user prompts, and cleaning responses. It uses generic HTTP header authentication and enables retrieval of AI-driven answers filtered by search domains, ideal for dynamic Q&A automation.

name: Multi-file Zip Compressor
description: An n8n workflow that compresses multiple input files (images, PDFs, CSV/XLSX) into a single ZIP archive. Uses n8n's Execute Workflow Trigger, JavaScript code node for binary handling, and Compression node to produce a dated zip file as output.

name: Git Commit and Push Automation
description: Automates adding files, committing with a message, and pushing changes to a Git repository using n8n's Git nodes, triggered manually to streamline version control operations.

name: n8n Workflow Export to Google Drive
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all workflows from an n8n instance via HTTP API with Basic Auth, processes the data, and uploads each workflow as individual JSON files to Google Drive. Uses n8n core nodes including HTTP Request, Cron, Function, Merge, and Google Drive integration for automated daily export.

name: Gmail Bulk Delete Automation
description: An n8n workflow that connects to Gmail via OAuth2, retrieves all emails excluding chats and unsubscribe content, and deletes them in batches of 100. Automates inbox cleanup using Gmail API within n8n automation platform.

name: Daily Weather Updates via Gotify
description: Automates sending daily weather updates for Berlin at 9 AM using n8n. Utilizes OpenWeatherMap API to fetch current temperature and Gotify API to deliver messages. Ideal for users wanting automated, timely weather notifications.

name: Strapi Entry CRUD Automation
description: Automates creating, updating, and retrieving blog posts in Strapi CMS using n8n. Utilizes n8n's Strapi nodes with manual trigger, Set nodes for data, and sequential API operations to streamline content management workflows.

name: Plex Qbittorrent Throttle Automator
description: Automates bandwidth throttling of qBittorrent based on Plex media playback events using n8n workflow. Integrates Plex webhook triggers, qBittorrent API authentication, and speed limit toggling to optimize network usage during media consumption.

name: Random Cocktail Suggestion to Mattermost
description: This n8n workflow triggers via a POST webhook, fetches a random cocktail recipe from TheCocktailDB API, and sends a formatted message with recipe details and image to a Mattermost channel. Integrates webhook, HTTP Request, and Mattermost API for cocktail recommendations.

name: SWIFT Code Scraper & MongoDB Importer
description: An n8n workflow automating extraction of banking SWIFT codes by country from theswiftcodes.com. Uses HTTP Request & HTML Extract nodes for scraping, uProc API for country normalization, and MongoDB for storing parsed data. Efficiently handles pagination and batch processing.

name: DigitalOcean Droplet Snapshot Manager
description: An n8n workflow that automates DigitalOcean Droplet snapshot management using the DigitalOcean API. It runs every 48 hours, lists droplets, deletes oldest snapshots if over 4, and creates new snapshots to maintain up-to-date backups.

name: Scheduled SharePoint List Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that periodically retrieves SharePoint list items using OAuth 2.0 client credentials flow. It integrates Microsoft Azure AD for token generation and SharePoint REST API for data fetching, automating secure SharePoint data access.

name: Zendesk Support Updates Listener
description: Workflow listens for real-time support ticket updates via Zendesk API using n8n Zendesk Trigger node to automate support workflows and notifications. It captures events as they happen to streamline customer support processes.

name: BetterStack Log Sender Workflow
description: n8n workflow to send log messages from other workflows to BetterStack Logs via HTTP POST with header authentication. Supports manual testing and embedding. Utilizes n8n executeWorkflow nodes and HTTP Request node for log forwarding.

name: Philips Hue Light On & Brightness Set
description: Automation workflow using n8n to turn on a Philips Hue light and set its brightness via Philips Hue API. Triggered manually, it sets brightness level to 90 for light ID 123. Useful for smart home lighting control with Philips Hue OAuth2 integration.

name: PDFMonkey Callback PDF Downloader
description: n8n workflow automates PDFMonkey webhook callbacks by receiving PDF generation status, verifying success, and downloading the generated PDF via HTTP request. Integrates PDFMonkey API and n8n webhook for seamless PDF retrieval upon generation completion.

name: n8n Workflow: Export Executions to CSV
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all workflow executions via the n8n API, converts the data into a CSV file for easy parsing, and prepares it for export to a cloud storage or other destination. Utilizes n8n manual trigger, n8n API node, and file conversion tools.

name: Web Page Content Scraper via FireCrawl API
description: This n8n workflow fetches webpage content in markdown format using FireCrawl API. It accepts a URL as input, triggers an HTTP POST request to FireCrawl, and extracts markdown content for reuse. Ideal for automating web data extraction leveraging n8n and FireCrawl API.

name: Shopify Campaign Image Uploader
description: Automates updating Shopify theme assets by uploading campaign images via Shopify GraphQL and REST APIs using n8n. Integrates Baserow webhook for triggers and supports dynamic content injection into Liquid templates.

name: Clockify Ticket Status Sync
description: An n8n workflow that syncs ticket statuses with Clockify projects via webhook triggers. It uses the Clockify API to archive or unarchive projects based on ticket status updates, automating time tracking project management for support tickets.

name: Country Info Lookup via GraphQL API
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves country details (name, phone code, emoji) using a GraphQL query to the countries.trevorblades.com API. It accepts a country code from a webhook, processes the response, and returns a formatted summary string.

name: Shopify Products Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that triggers manually to fetch all products from a Shopify store using Shopify API credentials. It helps automate retrieval of product data for e-commerce operations.

name: Monday.com Error Logging Automation
description: Automates error detection in n8n workflows by triggering on errors, extracting stack traces via JavaScript, and logging detailed error records into a specified Monday.com board with timestamps. Integrates n8n, Monday.com API, and custom code for workflow error management.

name: PagerDuty Incident Create, Update, and Retrieve
description: An n8n workflow automating PagerDuty incident management with create, update, and get operations. Uses PagerDuty API via n8n nodes to streamline incident lifecycle management triggered manually.

name: URL Job Analysis with Cortex API
description: This n8n workflow triggers manually to analyze a URL using Cortex's Abuse Finder analyzer and retrieves detailed job results. It integrates n8n with the Cortex API to automate URL threat detection and forensic job data collection.

name: TheHive Event Update Notifier
description: An n8n workflow using TheHive Trigger node to receive real-time updates for any event occurring in TheHive security incident response platform. Enables automation based on security event notifications via webhooks.

name: Kafka Temperature Alert via SMS
description: An n8n workflow that listens to a Kafka topic for temperature readings, checks if the temperature exceeds 50, and sends an alert SMS via Vonage API. Integrates Kafka, conditional logic, and Vonage SMS for real-time temperature monitoring alerts.

name: Shorten URL & Fetch URL Stats with YOURLS
description: An n8n workflow to create short URLs using YOURLS API and retrieve their statistics. It uses n8n's manual trigger and YOURLS nodes to automate URL shortening and stats fetching, ideal for tracking short link performance.

name: Factory IoT Data Generator with AMQP
description: Generates synthetic smart factory data including machine ID, temperature, uptime, and timestamp at regular intervals using n8n. Sends data via AMQP to a specified queue for IoT or monitoring integrations. Tech: n8n workflow, JavaScript, AMQP protocol.

name: Manage Ghost Posts via Admin API
description: Automates creating, updating, and fetching posts on Ghost CMS using n8n. Utilizes Ghost Admin API and n8n's Ghost node to streamline content management workflows with manual trigger initiation.

name: Airtable Data Insert and Update Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating Airtable API to append, list with filter, and update records in an Airtable base. It automates managing data rows programmatically via manual trigger, ideal for streamlined data syncing and updates.

name: Snowflake Table Create & Upsert Workflow
description: Automates creation of a Snowflake table and performs insert and update operations using n8n with Snowflake API integration. Ideal for managing and updating data programmatically with no manual SQL needed.

name: Automate Twist Channel Creation & Messaging
description: n8n workflow using Twist API to create and update channels, add users, and send custom messages with action buttons linking to docs. Integrates Twist OAuth2 for secure access to workspace, streamlining team communications and onboarding.

name: Customer Data Filtering & Branching Demo
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating conditional filtering and routing of customer data from a custom datastore using If and Switch nodes. Highlights multi-condition logic with AND/OR combos and branching by country (US, CO, UK, others). Ideal for learning data-driven workflow branching.

name: Customer Messaging Approval Workflow
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating batch message sending with rate limiting, waits for external approval via webhook, and simulates sending approval URLs to merchants. Uses n8n core nodes, custom Customer Datastore & Messenger, wait, splitInBatches, and webhook nodes.

name: GitHub Fork Leads to Pipedrive Automation
description: Automates lead creation in Pipedrive CRM from GitHub fork events using GitHub API and Pipedrive API. Detects fork, retrieves user info, checks/creates person in Pipedrive, creates lead and note linking GitHub URL. Tech stack: n8n, GitHub Trigger, HTTP Request, Pipedrive nodes.

name: Mattermost Channel Setup and Welcome Message
description: Automates Mattermost by creating a new channel, adding a specific member, and posting a welcome message using Mattermost API within n8n workflow. Ideal for onboarding and team collaboration setup.

name: Podcast RSS Feed Generator from Web Episodes
description: An n8n workflow that scrapes podcast episode data from ardaudiothek.de, parses JSON metadata from episode pages, and generates a valid RSS feed. Utilizes HTTP Requests, HTML extraction, JSON parsing, and custom JS code to create podcast RSS XML feeds dynamically.

name: Export MySQL Table to XLSX File
description: An n8n workflow to export data from a specified MySQL table into an XLSX spreadsheet file using MySQL and spreadsheet nodes. Triggered manually, it allows easy saving of SQL table data for sharing or backup.

name: Gender Inclusive Language Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that listens for messages containing gendered terms via a webhook and sends a Mattermost bot suggestion to use gender inclusive language alternatives like "folks" or "y'all". Uses n8n Webhook and Mattermost API integration.

name: MySQL Products to XML File Exporter
description: Automates extraction of 16 random product records from MySQL, formats data with or without XML attributes, converts to XML, and saves as files. Utilizes n8n with MySQL node, JSON to XML conversion, and file writing for easy product data export.

name: Website Screenshot Capture with Bright Data
description: An n8n workflow to capture website screenshots using Bright Data's Web Unlocker API and save them locally. Utilizes HTTP requests with authenticated headers, proxy zone configuration, and file system write operations to automate web page capture.

name: Website Availability Monitor with Discord Alerts
description: An hourly website content monitor using n8n's HTTP Request node to check for specific text ('Out Of Stock'), conditionally triggering Discord notifications via webhook. Integrates Cron for scheduling, IF node for logic branching, and Discord nodes for alerting.

name: Azure DevOps PR to DingTalk Notifier
description: Automates notifications on new Azure DevOps Pull Requests by sending customized DingTalk messages. Uses Azure DevOps webhook, MySQL for user mapping, and DingTalk's robot webhook API to notify correct users in group chats.

name: Airtable to Mattermost Notification
description: This n8n workflow automates notifications by triggering on new data entries in Airtable and sending formatted messages to a Mattermost channel. It integrates Airtable API and Mattermost API for real-time alerts, facilitating team collaboration and data monitoring.

name: Daily Weather Push Notifications with Spontit
description: Automates daily weather updates for Berlin using OpenWeatherMap API and sends them as push notifications via Spontit. Scheduled with n8n Cron node for daily delivery at 9 AM, ideal for keeping users informed about temperature changes.

name: GitLab Release to Outline Document
description: Automates creating published documents in Outline from GitLab release tag pushes. Uses GitLab Trigger node for tag_push events, IF node to filter release events, and HTTP Request node to call Outline API to create release notes automatically.

name: Chargebee Event Updates Receiver
description: An n8n workflow using the Chargebee Trigger node to listen for all Chargebee subscription and billing events in real-time, enabling automated processing and integration with other systems.

name: TOTP Code Generator in n8n
description: This n8n workflow demonstrates generating Time-based One-Time Passwords (TOTP) using the n8n TOTP node with a configured TOTP account credential. It includes a manual trigger node to test the workflow and is ideal for implementing 2FA code generation within automation processes.

name: Bitwarden Group & Member Management
description: Automates Bitwarden password manager group creation, lists all members, updates group members, and retrieves group members. Uses Bitwarden API via n8n nodes. Ideal for managing Bitwarden user groups programmatically and synchronizing member access.

name: Daily Weather SMS Alert via Plivo
description: Automates sending daily SMS weather updates for Berlin at 9 AM using OpenWeatherMap API for temperature data and Plivo API for messaging, orchestrated by n8n's Cron node for scheduling.

name: Webflow CMS Item Create & Update Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating creation and update of CMS items in Webflow using Webflow API. It triggers manually, creates a new item, then updates it with additional fields including an avatar URL, ensuring content management automation.

name: Orbit Member Management Workflow
description: Automates creating and updating members in Orbit using its API. It adds notes and posts linked to members in a workspace. The workflow triggers manually and sequentially manages member data, notes, and posts via Orbit API within n8n.

name: ClickUp Task Creator
description: An n8n workflow to automate task creation in ClickUp using ClickUp API. Trigger tasks manually and create tasks in specified ClickUp spaces, folders, and lists. Useful for streamlining project management with no-code automation.

name: ISS Position Publisher via MQTT
description: Automates fetching the current ISS location every minute using the WhereTheISS.at API and publishes latitude, longitude, and timestamp data to an MQTT topic for real-time tracking. Built with n8n, integrating Cron, HTTP Request, Set, and MQTT nodes.

name: Gmail Attachment to Google Drive Link
description: Automates retrieving Gmail messages with a specific label, uploads their attachments to Google Drive, and outputs the file link. Uses Gmail and Google Drive APIs within n8n workflow to streamline attachment management and sharing.

name: Add a Book Volume to Google Bookshelf
description: This n8n workflow uses Google Books API with OAuth2 to fetch a specific book volume by ID and add it to a chosen Google Bookshelf. It automates managing your digital library inside Google Books, simplifying book collection updates.

name: ClickUp Event Updates Receiver
description: An n8n workflow using the ClickUp Trigger node to receive real-time updates for all events in a ClickUp workspace. Integrates with ClickUp's API to automate task and project monitoring efficiently.

name: Product Label Generator with DB & API Integration
description: Automates product label creation by integrating n8n webhook, MySQL and PostgreSQL databases, and a local HTTP API for print configuration. Retrieves detailed product, fabric roll, and composition data to generate comprehensive labels for inventory management.

name: UptimeRobot Monitor Create-Update-Get
description: Workflow using UptimeRobot API in n8n to create a monitor for n8n.io, update its friendly name, and retrieve monitor details. Ideal for website uptime tracking automation with UptimeRobot API credentials.

name: Microsoft To Do Task Automator
description: Automates creation and status update of tasks in Microsoft To Do using n8n workflow with manual trigger and Microsoft OAuth API integration. Simplifies task management by creating, updating to 'inProgress', and retrieving tasks seamlessly.

name: Get and Update Contacts from GetResponse
description: Workflow to fetch all contacts from GetResponse using its API, check their campaign association, and update the campaign ID if it differs. Built in n8n automation platform, it uses manual triggers, GetResponse API integration, conditional logic, and updates contacts accordingly.

name: Syncro to OpsGenie Alert Sync
description: Automates alert creation and closure in OpsGenie from Syncro MSP by receiving webhook notifications. Utilizes Syncro webhooks and OpsGenie API with HTTP Request nodes for real-time incident management and status synchronization.

name: Steam Phishing Domain Reporter
description: Automates detection and reporting of Steam phishing domains via webhook. Uses DNS dig commands to validate domain and Cloudflare nameservers, then sends alert emails via Mailgun API to Steam and Cloudflare security teams.

name: Segment Event Tracking Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to track custom events in Segment using the Segment API. It triggers manually and sends event data to Segment's tracking endpoint, enabling user behavior data collection for analytics and marketing automation.

name: API Rate Limiter with Airtable Data Fetch
description: n8n workflow implements an API rate limiting system using Redis for per-minute and per-hour limits with secured webhook authentication. It fetches Pokemon data from Airtable and returns it if limits are not exceeded, ensuring controlled API usage and data delivery.

name: AWS Textract Invoice OCR Workflow
description: Automates OCR extraction of invoice data from an image stored in AWS S3 using AWS Textract API. Triggered manually in n8n, processes 'Rechnung.jpg' from 'textract-demodata' bucket to extract text for further workflows, leveraging AWS cloud services.

name: GitLab Issue for New GitHub Release
description: Automates weekly checks of the latest GitHub release of a repo and creates a new GitLab issue if no corresponding issue exists. Uses n8n with GitHub API (releases), GitLab API (issues), and cron scheduler to sync release tracking.

name: Website Analytics to Airtable Logger
description: Automates fetching Google Analytics data (sessions by country over a date range) and appends it into an Airtable base for easy tracking. Utilizes Google Analytics API, Airtable API, and n8n automation platform for seamless data integration.

name: City Weather Info via OpenWeatherMap API
description: An n8n workflow that receives a city name via webhook and fetches current weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. It extracts temperature and weather description to return concise weather info dynamically. Tech stack: n8n, Webhook, OpenWeatherMap API.

name: G Suite Admin User Management Workflow
description: Automate creation, updating, and retrieval of G Suite users using the n8n G Suite Admin node with OAuth2 authentication. Ideal for managing Google Workspace users programmatically within n8n workflows.

name: RSS to Mastodon Auto Poster
description: Automates posting new RSS feed items to a Mastodon instance using n8n. Utilizes RSS Feed Read, Cron scheduling, Function node for deduplication, and HTTP Request node to post updates via Mastodon API every 10 minutes.

name: Syncro Tickets to Clockify Timer
description: Automates time tracking by creating Clockify entries from Syncro ticket data via a webhook. Uses n8n workflow with Syncro webhook POST input and Clockify API to log work sessions efficiently.

name: PDF Downloader and Merger Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates downloading multiple PDF files from URLs, merges them into a single PDF using a custom PDF Toolkit node, and writes the merged file to disk. Uses HTTP Request, Split Out, and file system nodes with custom-js PDF merge API.

name: Customer.io: Create Customer & Add to Segment
description: An n8n workflow using Customer.io API to create a new customer with custom properties and add them to a specific segment. Utilizes manual trigger and Customer.io nodes for customer management and segmentation automation.

name: Sensor Alert System with PostgreSQL and Twilio
description: Automates monitoring of sensor data in PostgreSQL, sending SMS alerts via Twilio for readings above a threshold. Uses n8n Cron to schedule, queries the DB, sends notifications, and updates alert status to avoid duplicates.

name: Gumroad Sale Notification Trigger
description: This n8n workflow listens to Gumroad sales using the Gumroad API webhook trigger to notify users in real-time when a sale is made. It enables automated updates for sales events, ideal for creators and sellers using Gumroad.

name: PagerDuty Incident Acknowledge Notifier
description: An n8n workflow that listens for POST webhook calls, acknowledges PagerDuty incidents via their API, and posts confirmation messages to Mattermost channels. Utilizes PagerDuty and Mattermost APIs for incident management and team notifications.

name: HTML to Compressed PDF Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates converting HTML content to PDF and compresses PDFs. Utilizes CustomJS PDF Toolkit nodes for HTML-to-PDF conversion and PDF compression, plus manual trigger and code nodes. Useful for content generation, document processing automation.

name: HTML to PDF and PDF to PNG Converter
description: An n8n workflow using CustomJS PDF Toolkit to convert HTML content to PDF and transform PDFs (from generated output or URL) into PNG images. It automates document format conversions with HTML input, manual trigger, and URL-based PDF input.

name: n8n Auto-Start Workflows by Tag
description: Automates activation of n8n workflows tagged with 'Auto start' via n8n API integration. Runs post-start to ensure tagged workflows are activated automatically, ideal for auto deployment pipelines and containerized n8n setups.

name: DigitalOcean Droplet Creation via API
description: An n8n workflow that automates creating a DigitalOcean droplet using HTTP Request node. It sends a POST request to DigitalOcean API with droplet details (name, region, size, image) and requires a personal access token for authorization.

name: Wit.ai Speech-to-Text from WAV File
description: An n8n workflow that reads a WAV audio file and sends it to the Wit.ai speech recognition API for transcription. Utilizes the Read Binary File node and HTTP Request node with audio/wav content type to convert speech to text.

name: Weekly Cocktail Recipe Poster
description: Automates fetching random cocktail recipes from TheCocktailDB API, generates a custom image with Bannerbear API, and posts it weekly to Rocket.Chat. Uses n8n workflow automation with HTTP Request, Bannerbear, Cron, and Rocket.Chat nodes.

name: GitHub Notifications to Discord Alert
description: This n8n workflow fetches GitHub notifications every minute using GitHub API with Basic Auth, processes them to create a summary report, then sends the report as a tagged message to a Discord channel. Utilizes Cron, HTTP Request, Function, IF, and Discord nodes.

name: Asana Event Update Notifier
description: Workflow that triggers notifications on updates within Asana's Engineering workspace using n8n's Asana Trigger node. Ideal for automating task/event updates by leveraging the Asana API to monitor changes in real-time.

name: Wallabag Auto-Starred RSS Importer
description: Automates fetching starred articles from Tiny Tiny RSS and posts them to Wallabag. Uses TTRSS API for authentication & retrieving articles, Wallabag API for OAuth2 token and posting. Enables scheduled article archival every 10 minutes.

name: Mailchimp Subscribe Event Listener
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on Mailchimp subscribe events using Mailchimp API credentials. It listens to new subscribers from multiple sources (API, admin, user) for a specific list ID, enabling automated responses or actions on subscriber signup events.

name: MQTT Message Receiver
description: An n8n workflow using MQTT Trigger node to receive messages from an MQTT queue. It listens to MQTT broker messages and can be extended for IoT, messaging, or automation projects requiring MQTT integration.

name: Hacker News Feed Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that fetches the latest stories from Hacker News using the native Hacker News node triggered manually. It provides a simple way to retrieve news data for automation or integration purposes.

name: GitHub Repository Event Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that listens to all event types on the n8n-io/n8n-docs GitHub repository using GitHub API via webhook trigger. Ideal for automating actions based on repo activity.

name: Invoice Ninja Data Fetcher
description: Automates fetching all invoices from Invoice Ninja using its API triggered manually in n8n workflow. Useful for financial data retrieval and integration with other systems.

name: Set Default Error Workflow in n8n
description: Automates updating the default error workflow ID in n8n workflows stored in a Postgres DB. Uses n8n API to fetch workflows, filters by tags, and updates workflow settings via Postgres node. Scheduled every 4 hours or manually triggered.

name: SIGNL4 Alert Automation
description: This n8n workflow triggers hourly to read alert data from a JSON file, sends or resolves alerts via the SIGNL4 API, and updates the stored alert status. It uses n8n nodes like Cron, file read/write, JSON-binary conversion, and SIGNL4 integration to automate alert management.

name: Eventbrite Order Event Listener
description: An n8n workflow to listen for Eventbrite order events (placed, updated, refunded) using Eventbrite API via webhook trigger. Ideal for automating responses to ticket sales and order changes in an Eventbrite organization.

name: Perplexity AI Q&A with n8n
description: Automates sending system and user prompts to Perplexity AI's Sonar model via HTTP API in n8n, processing answers and citations. Uses n8n workflows with HTTP Request node and Generic Header Authentication to query AI-driven chat completions for knowledge comparison.

name: HTML to PDF Conversion with ConvertAPI
description: Automates conversion of a simple HTML document to PDF using ConvertAPI via HTTP request, with file handling in n8n. Demonstrates use of manual trigger, code node for binary conversion, and authenticated API request to create a PDF file.

name: Sentry Release Management Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates creating a new release and retrieving all releases in Sentry.io using its API. Triggered manually, it integrates with the Sentry API to manage software release versions and track project releases efficiently.

name: HighLevel Contact Address Verifier
description: Automates verification of mailing addresses from HighLevel CRM contacts using Lob API. It triggers via webhook, verifies address deliverability, and tags contacts in HighLevel accordingly for follow-up or confirmation. Integrates HighLevel CRM, n8n workflow, and Lob address verification API.

name: Grist Record Transfer with Confirmation
description: An n8n workflow that uses a Webhook and Grist API to transfer records from a source to a destination table only when a 'Confirmed' boolean flag is true. It prevents duplicate entries by checking existing records before creating new ones, ensuring manual confirmation triggers the process.

name: Automated Mautic Contact Unsubscribe via Gmail
description: This n8n workflow automates unsubscribing contacts in Mautic based on unsubscribe emails received in Gmail. It uses Gmail API to trigger on new emails, parses sender emails, searches Mautic contacts via Mautic API, updates contact segments (unsubscribe and newsletter), and replies with a confirmation message.

name: Redis Workflow Lock for Scheduled Runs
description: An n8n workflow that uses Redis to lock execution status, preventing concurrent runs of a main workflow triggered on a set schedule. It checks and updates workflow state as 'running' or 'idle' to ensure serialized runs, using scheduleTrigger, Redis, and executeWorkflow nodes.

name: DOCX to PDF Conversion Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that converts DOCX files to PDF using ConvertAPI service. It fetches a DOCX file from a URL, sends it to ConvertAPI with query authentication, and saves the resulting PDF locally. Ideal for automated document format conversion.

name: XLSX to PDF Conversion Workflow
description: Automates downloading an XLSX file, converts it to PDF using ConvertAPI's API, and saves the PDF locally. Utilizes n8n, HTTP Requests, and file handling nodes to streamline document format conversion.

name: PPTX to PDF Conversion Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that automates downloading a PPTX file, converting it to PDF using ConvertAPI's API, and saving the result locally. Utilizes HTTP Request nodes and file system operations with authentication via ConvertAPI query credentials.

name: PDF Password Protect and Save Workflow
description: An n8n automation workflow that downloads a PDF, applies password protection using ConvertAPI, saves it locally, and uploads to Google Drive. Utilizes ConvertAPI for PDF processing and Google Drive API for cloud storage.

name: Webpage to PDF Converter
description: Convert any webpage URL into a downloadable PDF file using ConvertAPI via HTTP request, with automated file saving on disk, triggered manually in n8n workflow.

name: Shopify New Order Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that uses Shopify API to trigger on new orders creation in a Shopify store. It leverages Shopify webhook to automate workflows based on new order events, useful for order processing and notifications.

name: Image to PDF Conversion Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that downloads an image from a URL, converts it to PDF using ConvertAPI, then saves the PDF locally. Utilizes HTTP Request node with ConvertAPI for file conversion, manual trigger to start, and file system write node for output.

name: Systeme.io Contacts & Tags Management
description: Automate retrieval and management of contacts and tags using Systeme.io API in n8n. Includes pagination and rate limiting handling for full data sync, plus batch adding contacts with custom fields via HTTP requests.

name: Zigbee2MQTT Weekly Backup to SFTP
description: Automates weekly Zigbee2MQTT backups by triggering an MQTT request every Monday at 2:45 AM, receiving the base64 backup response, converting it to a ZIP file, and uploading it securely to an SFTP server. Utilizes MQTT, SFTP, JSON parsing, and n8n scheduling.

name: TOTP 2FA Code Validation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to validate 6-digit TOTP codes using Python in a function node without creating credentials. It runs a time-based one-time password algorithm for 2FA verification, suitable for secure authentication systems.

name: Image Overlay Watermark Automation
description: Automates overlaying a watermark or logo image onto a background image using n8n nodes like HTTP Request, Edit Image, and Code. Downloads images, extracts metadata, calculates center position, and composites them. Useful for branding and watermarking.

name: Xero Webhook Verification & FileMaker Sync
description: Automatically verifies Xero webhook payloads using HMAC SHA256 and syncs data to FileMaker. Utilizes n8n's webhook, crypto, and FileMaker nodes to securely validate and store webhook events with custom script execution.

name: Access Token Management with Static Data
description: An n8n workflow to manage expiring API access tokens using static data storage. Uses Webhook and Schedule Trigger nodes, HTTP Request to fetch new tokens, JavaScript code nodes to store tokens and timestamps globally, and conditional logic to validate token expiry before reuse.

name: BlueSky Auto Post from RSS Feed
description: Automates posting new RSS feed items to BlueSky social. Uses BlueSky API (session creation, image upload, post creation) and n8n workflow nodes to download images, upload blobs, and create posts with text, images, and metadata. Ideal for content syndication.

name: n8n Cleanup Old Workflow Executions
description: This n8n workflow uses n8n API and scheduling to automatically list and delete workflow executions older than 10 days. It includes manual and scheduled triggers, conditional date checking, and execution deletion to keep the n8n instance clean and performant.

name: PDF to PDF/A Conversion Workflow
description: Automates downloading a PDF file, converting it to the PDF/A standard using ConvertAPI, and saving the result locally. Utilizes n8n, HTTP Request nodes, and ConvertAPI's authenticated REST API for file conversion.

name: SMS Sending with MessageBird
description: Automate SMS sending via MessageBird API using n8n. This workflow triggers manually and sends customizable SMS messages through the MessageBird node. Ideal for quick integration of SMS notifications in automation pipelines.

name: Hubspot Contacts Export Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers manually to fetch all contacts from Hubspot CRM using the Hubspot API. Ideal for syncing or exporting contact data for further processing or analysis.

name: Medium Publication Post Publisher
description: An n8n workflow to publish posts directly to a Medium publication using the Medium API. Triggered manually, it streamlines content publishing by automating the posting process to a specified Medium publication.

name: Fetch CircleCI Pipeline Data
description: An n8n workflow to manually trigger and retrieve pipeline details from CircleCI using the CircleCI API. Ideal for developers and DevOps teams to automate CI/CD monitoring and integration tasks seamlessly.

name: Intercom New User Creation
description: Automatically create a new user in Intercom via n8n workflow using Intercom API triggered manually. Enables seamless user onboarding and management through API integration.

name: Current Weather Fetch for a City
description: Fetch current weather data for a specified city using n8n and OpenWeatherMap API. Triggered manually, it retrieves weather info like temperature, humidity for cities like Berlin. Useful for weather monitoring and integration workflows.

name: Image Fetch and Dropbox Upload Zip
description: An n8n workflow that downloads two images via HTTP requests, compresses them into a ZIP archive, and uploads the ZIP file to Dropbox. Utilizes n8n HTTP Request, Compression, and Dropbox nodes for efficient file handling and cloud storage automation.

name: Post Message to RocketChat Channel
description: An n8n workflow that posts a predefined message to a specified RocketChat channel using RocketChat API credentials. Triggered manually, it automates simple communication tasks in team chat using n8n's RocketChat node.

name: Taiga Issue Create-Update-Get Workflow
description: Automates issue management on Taiga using n8n nodes. It creates an issue, updates its description, and retrieves the issue details via Taiga Cloud API, triggered manually in n8n. Useful for project tracking automation.

name: Restore n8n Credentials from GitHub Backup
description: An n8n workflow that automates restoration of instance credentials from GitHub repo backups using GitHub API and n8n API. It fetches credential JSON files from a specified GitHub repository path, converts them, and restores them into n8n for seamless credential recovery.

name: HubSpot Contact Change Trigger
description: Triggers workflows based on HubSpot CRM contact changes using HubSpot Developer API in n8n. Ideal for automations reacting to contact updates or creations via webhook integration.

name: Save Random Cocktail Data as JSON File
description: This n8n workflow fetches a random cocktail recipe from the CocktailDB API using an HTTP Request node, converts the JSON response to binary data, and writes it to a local JSON file named cocktail.json. Useful for drink recipe collection and automation.

name: Upload & List Files in S3 Bucket
description: Automates downloading a file via HTTP, uploading it to an Amazon S3 bucket, then retrieving and listing all files in that bucket using n8n's HTTP Request and S3 nodes.

name: Affinity List Creation Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers when a new list is created in Affinity CRM. It uses the Affinity API via a webhook to receive real-time updates, enabling automated responses to list creation events.

name: Stackby Data Insert and Retrieve
description: An n8n workflow that inserts a record with ID and Name into a Stackby table and then lists all records. It uses n8n's manual trigger, Set node for data setting, and Stackby API to manage table data seamlessly.

name: HelpScout Customer Created Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new customer creation events in HelpScout using the HelpScout OAuth2 API. It listens for 'customer.created' events via a webhook to automate updates or integrations when a new customer is added.

name: Dropbox File Fetch and List Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating Dropbox operations: fetching a folder, downloading a file from URL, uploading it to Dropbox, then listing folder contents. Utilizes Dropbox API and HTTP Request node to manage files programmatically.

name: GitHub Repository Profile Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves detailed profile information of a specific GitHub repository using the GitHub API. Triggered manually, it fetches data for the 'n8n-io/n8n' repository via authenticated API credentials, enabling integration in automation pipelines.

name: Send SMS via Mocean API
description: This n8n workflow sends SMS messages using the Mocean API. It starts with a manual trigger and connects to the Mocean node to dispatch SMS by specifying recipient, sender, and message content. Useful for integrating SMS alerts or notifications in automation.

name: Jira Event Listener Trigger
description: An n8n workflow node that listens to all Jira events via Jira Software Cloud API webhook integration. It triggers automation whenever any event occurs in Jira, enabling real-time Jira activity monitoring and workflow automation using n8n.

name: HelpScout Mailbox Fetcher
description: n8n workflow uses HelpScout API via OAuth2 to retrieve all mailboxes on manual trigger, enabling streamlined support mailbox management and automation.

name: Send SMS Alert When Leaving Home
description: Automates sending an SMS via Twilio whenever the Pushcut app triggers the "Leaving Home" action. Integrates Pushcut API for location-based triggers and Twilio API for messaging to notify a specified phone number in real-time.

name: Wise Transfer Automation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating Wise money transfers: it creates a quote, then a transfer, executes it, and retrieves transfer details using Wise API credentials. Useful for automating EUR currency transfers with a preset profile and target account.

name: Website Availability & Metadata Checker
description: An n8n workflow that checks if a given website URL is available using Peekalink API, then fetches detailed metadata if available. Useful for monitoring website status and extracting info. Implements manual trigger, conditional logic, and Peekalink API integration.

name: Multi-Source RSS Feed Reader
description: An n8n workflow that reads RSS feeds from two sources (Medium and Dev.to) using built-in RSS Feed Read node, triggered manually and looped over URLs defined in a JavaScript Code node for scalable feed retrieval.

name: Dub.co URL Shortener Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating URL shortening via the Dub.co API. It creates or updates short links using Dub.co's REST API with customizable slugs, domains, and project slugs. Includes manual triggering and HTTP request nodes for seamless link management.

name: US Phone Number Formatter
description: An n8n workflow that cleans, validates, and formats US phone numbers. It strips input formatting, verifies country code and number length, and outputs several standardized formats (E.164, national, international). Uses n8n nodes without external APIs.

name: Dataset Comparison with n8n
description: An n8n workflow to compare two datasets of fruit attributes using the built-in Compare Datasets node, triggered manually. Utilizes JavaScript code nodes to supply datasets and analyzes differences and matches. Useful for data reconciliation and validation tasks.

name: n8n v1 Upgrade Expression Checker
description: An n8n workflow to scan active workflows for parameters using expressions affected by n8n v1 changes. Utilizes n8n API and custom JavaScript code to identify impacted expressions like beginningOf, endOfMonth, plus, minus, helping ensure workflow stability post-upgrade.

name: Seatable Webhook HMAC SHA256 Validator
description: An n8n workflow to securely validate Seatable webhooks using HMAC SHA256 authentication. It verifies webhook payloads by hashing with a shared secret, comparing to x-seatable-signature header, then conditionally responding with 200 OK or 403 Forbidden. Uses n8n Webhook and Crypto nodes.

name: Used Car Sale Price Estimation Bot
description: Automates used car price estimation via web interaction with Peddle.com. Uses Airtop API for browser automation including session management, clicks, typing, screenshots, and AI-driven page analysis to extract offer prices from the site in a dynamic workflow.

name: TOTP Code Generator Workflow in n8n
description: An n8n workflow automating Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) generation using the built-in TOTP node with configured TOTP credentials. Triggered manually, it produces secure, time-sensitive codes for multi-factor authentication setups.

name: Trello List Change Updates Listener
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on changes in a specified Trello list using the Trello API, enabling automation based on Trello list updates. Ideal for task and project management notifications.

name: Trello Card Creation Workflow
description: Automates creating a new card in Trello using n8n's manual trigger node and Trello API integration. Triggered manually, it adds a card with defined title and description to a Trello list. Useful for task automation within Trello boards.

name: Mautic Contacts Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that fetches all contacts from Mautic CRM using OAuth2 authentication. Triggered manually, it connects n8n with Mautic API to retrieve contact data for marketing automation workflows.

name: Strava Activity Management Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that connects to Strava API using OAuth2 to create, update, and retrieve running activity data. Automates managing Strava activities by creating a run, updating its description, and then fetching its details.

name: Excel Data Fetch on Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all data from a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet using Microsoft Excel OAuth2 API upon manual trigger. Ideal for automating data extraction from Excel files into connected systems.

name: Icypeas Domain Search Automation
description: Automates single domain/company scans using Icypeas API. Utilizes HTTP POST requests with API key, secret, and user ID authentication via custom HMAC-SHA1 signature generated in n8n code node.

name: Send Message in Lark Suite via API
description: Automates sending text messages in Larksuite chats using Larksuite Open API. Uses HTTP requests to obtain tenant access token and send messages. Includes manual trigger and environment input setup for app_id, app_secret, chat_id, and message text.

name: Scheduled URL Pinger
description: An n8n workflow that pings a predefined list of URLs every 15 minutes using HTTP requests. It uses Schedule Trigger to automate, Set node for URL list, Split Out to iterate, and HTTP Request node to check each URL status.

name: Humantic AI Profile Management Workflow
description: An n8n workflow integrating Humantic AI API to create, update, and retrieve LinkedIn-based user personality profiles. Utilizes manual triggers, Humantic AI nodes, and HTTP requests to automate profile handling and enhancement.

name: Bitrix24 Chatbot with Webhook Integration
description: An n8n workflow implementing a Bitrix24 chatbot using webhook to handle events like messages, joins, installs, and deletes. Utilizes Bitrix24 REST API for bot registration and message sending with token validation to enable interactive communication within Bitrix24 chats.

name: Zammad User Role Reset to Default
description: This n8n workflow automates resetting all users' roles in Zammad ticketing system to default values via Zammad API, using HTTP requests and manual triggers with role and user data processing in JavaScript expressions.

name: ISS Position Updates to Kafka Every Minute
description: This n8n workflow fetches the International Space Station’s current position every minute using the public 'wheretheiss.at' API, processes the latitude and longitude data, and publishes updates to a Kafka topic 'iss-position'. Tech stack: n8n, HTTP Request, Cron, Kafka nodes.

name: Agile CRM Contact Creation
description: Automates creation of new contacts in Agile CRM using n8n's manual trigger and Agile CRM API integration. Enables users to add contacts with basic info efficiently, streamlining CRM management without coding.

name: AMQP Trigger for ActiveMQ Queue
description: An n8n workflow with an AMQP Trigger node that listens and receives messages from an ActiveMQ queue using the AMQP protocol. Useful for integrating messaging systems in automation workflows. Utilizes n8n's AMQP node to connect and trigger on message arrival.

name: Monday.com Board Data Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that manually triggers a data retrieval from a specified Monday.com board using the Monday.com API credentials, aiming to fetch and use project management data easily within automation pipelines.

name: SpaceX Launches Data Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow that fetches the latest 5 SpaceX launches using the SpaceX GraphQL API. It retrieves mission details, launch dates, sites, rocket info, payload, and ship data, triggered manually via n8n's Manual Trigger node.

name: Pipedrive Change Updates Listener
description: Automate receiving real-time updates for all changes in Pipedrive using the Pipedrive API and n8n's Pipedrive Trigger node. Ideal for syncing CRM updates or triggering workflows on any change inside Pipedrive accounts.

name: Cocktail Instructions Translator with LingvaNex
description: An n8n workflow that fetches a random cocktail recipe from TheCocktailDB API and translates its instructions into Italian using the LingvaNex translation API. Automates multilingual cocktail instruction delivery via API integration and workflow automation.

name: Webhook HMAC SHA256 Token Validator
description: An n8n workflow that receives webhook requests, uses a Crypto node to compute HMAC SHA256 of incoming crc_token values with a secret key, and sets the response token for validation. Uses n8n built-in Webhook, Crypto, and Set nodes for secure token verification.

name: Baserow Blog Releases to RSS Feed
description: Automates fetching and parsing Baserow blog release posts using HTTP requests and HTML extraction in n8n, then formats them into an RSS 2.0 feed served via webhook. Tech stack: n8n, HTTP Request, HTML Extract, JavaScript function nodes.

name: XML Fetch Edit & Dropbox Upload
description: Fetches XML from httpbin.org, converts it to JSON for modification (changes title), converts back to XML, and uploads to Dropbox. Uses n8n nodes: HTTP Request, XML, Set, and Dropbox API integration for XML data processing and cloud storage.

name: Toggl New Time Entries Trigger
description: This n8n workflow uses the Toggl Trigger node to automatically fetch new time entries from the Toggl API in real-time. Ideal for integrating time tracking data into other systems or automations, it simplifies monitoring and processing of time logs.

name: Company Info Lookup via UpLead
description: An n8n workflow that fetches detailed company information using the UpLead API. Triggered manually, it retrieves data for companies like Apple, enabling easy integration of business data enrichment in automation setups.

name: Create Company in Salesmate CRM
description: An n8n workflow to create a new company record in Salesmate CRM using manual trigger. Integrates with Salesmate API for CRM automation, ideal for sales and marketing teams to streamline company data entry.

name: Create Contact in Drift via API
description: An n8n workflow that creates a new contact in Drift CRM using Drift API. It is triggered manually and requires Drift API credentials. Ideal for automating lead management and contact creation in sales processes.

name: Webhook to Netlify Site Creator
description: Automates creation of Netlify sites via POST webhook. Uses n8n, Netlify API; receives JSON with site title and triggers site creation. Useful for integrating custom site deployment workflows or CMS systems.

name: Phone Number Validation Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that verifies phone numbers using the Uproc API. It creates a phone item, parses and validates the number, and checks validity in an automated flow triggered manually. Useful for data quality and contact management.

name: CSV to JSON Spreadsheet Converter
description: n8n workflow that converts a CSV spreadsheet file to JSON format using native n8n nodes: manual trigger, read binary file, spreadsheet file parser, binary data mover, and write binary file. Automates file format transformation locally.

name: Publish Storyblok Stories Starting with 'release'
description: An n8n workflow that fetches all Storyblok stories with names starting with 'release' using Storyblok Management API and publishes them automatically. Utilizes manual trigger and Storyblok nodes to automate content deployment in Storyblok CMS.

name: Workflow Update Notification via Mattermost
description: An n8n workflow that triggers upon workflow updates and sends notifications to a Mattermost channel using Mattermost API. It includes a webhook that sets a message and a workflow trigger that detects updates, automating alert delivery for workflow changes.

name: Emelia Replies to Mattermost Alerts
description: n8n workflow that triggers on Emelia campaign replies and sends customized notifications to Mattermost channels. Uses Emelia API for webhook triggers and Mattermost API to post messages, enabling real-time campaign response alerts.

name: Chargebee New Customer Creation
description: Automates creating new customers in Chargebee using the Chargebee API and n8n workflow automation. Triggered manually, it captures customer details and creates a customer record in Chargebee for subscription billing management.

name: Google Slides Thumbnail Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that uses Google Slides API via OAuth2 to retrieve all slides from a specific presentation and download their thumbnails automatically upon manual trigger. Ideal for quick slide image extraction and automation.

name: Insert Row into Coda Table
description: Automates inserting data into a new row of a Coda table using n8n. Utilizes the Coda API and n8n's Manual Trigger and Set nodes to define column values and push them into a specified Coda document and table.

name: Merge Interviewers and Employee Records
description: An n8n workflow that merges interviewers' scheduling data with employee records by matching unique IDs. Uses built-in function and merge nodes to convert and combine JSON arrays, enabling synchronized personnel and interview data management in workflows.

name: Todoist Task Creator
description: Automates creating new tasks in Todoist using n8n with manual trigger and Todoist API integration. Enables easy task management by adding tasks on demand through a simple workflow.

name: SurveyMonkey Response Listener
description: Automates workflows triggered by new SurveyMonkey survey responses using SurveyMonkey Webhook and OAuth2 authentication. Ideal for instantly processing or forwarding fresh survey data via n8n automation platform.

name: Shopify Tag Updater on Onfleet Delayed Tasks
description: Automates updating Shopify product tags based on Onfleet delivery task delays using Onfleet webhook triggers and Shopify API integration to synchronize delivery status with product metadata.

name: DNS Records Retrieval Workflow
description: n8n workflow automating DNS record retrieval for a domain using uproc API and function node. Triggered manually, it creates a domain item, then queries DNS entries for automation and monitoring purposes.

name: n8n Merge Node Data Aggregation Demo
description: Demo workflow showcasing n8n's Merge node with code-generated datasets to simulate SQL joins and unions in data aggregation. It uses n8n core nodes (Code, Merge) illustrating inner, left, and union joins with example data for ingredients and band members.

name: Dynamic Text Overlay on Image via Webhook
description: This n8n workflow fetches an image from a public URL, then overlays dynamic text received via webhook query parameter onto the image using built-in HTTP Request and Edit Image nodes, enabling automated personalized image generation.

name: ISS Position Updates via RabbitMQ
description: Automates retrieval of the International Space Station's position every minute via the 'wheretheiss.at' API and publishes latitude, longitude, and timestamp updates to a RabbitMQ queue. Utilizes n8n Cron trigger, HTTP Request node, Set node, and RabbitMQ node for real-time messaging.

name: Paddle Coupon Creator
description: An n8n workflow that creates discount coupons on Paddle using its API. Triggered manually, it automates coupon generation with customizable codes and discount amounts, ideal for e-commerce promotions.

name: Xero Data Fetch on Manual Trigger
description: This workflow uses n8n's Manual Trigger node to initiate and connects to the Xero API via OAuth2 to fetch all organization data. It automates retrieving accounting data from Xero on-demand using n8n integration.

name: Calendly Event Webhook Listener
description: An n8n workflow using the Calendly API to trigger actions upon invitee creation or cancellation events. It listens to Calendly webhooks and enables automation based on scheduling changes, ideal for appointment management integrations.

name: Invoice Ninja Invoice Creation Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers actions when a new invoice is created in Invoice Ninja using its API webhook integration. Designed to automate workflows based on invoice creation events in Invoice Ninja accounting software.

name: TravisCI Build Trigger Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to manually trigger builds on TravisCI using the TravisCI API. It features a Manual Trigger node and TravisCI node, enabling easy integration with continuous integration pipelines for automated build execution.

name: HackerNoon Article Extractor
description: An n8n workflow that fetches HackerNoon homepage HTML via HTTP Request, then extracts article titles and URLs using HTML Extract nodes. Useful for content aggregation or monitoring HackerNoon articles without coding.

name: ActiveCampaign Contact Upsert Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers manually to add or update a contact in ActiveCampaign via API, using the manual trigger node and ActiveCampaign node to manage contacts efficiently.

name: Twilio SMS Sending Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that sends SMS messages using the Twilio API. It triggers manually and connects n8n's Manual Trigger node to the Twilio node, enabling easy SMS automation with Twilio credentials.

name: Send SMS via MSG91
description: An n8n workflow that sends SMS using the MSG91 API. It uses a manual trigger node to start the flow and the MSG91 node to dispatch messages. Suitable for automating SMS notifications or alerts with MSG91's messaging platform.

name: Text-to-Speech Audio Generator
description: An n8n workflow that converts text to speech using a Python script (voicegen.py) and plays the resulting audio file. It uses local Python execution for TTS and reads an MP3 output file for playback, automating voice generation from specified text inputs.

name: Twitch Stream Online Status Checker
description: Checks if a specified Twitch user is currently streaming live using Twitch's GraphQL API. Utilizes n8n nodes for GraphQL queries and conditional logic to determine online status based on stream data.

name: GitHub Update Trigger to Home Assistant Light
description: n8n workflow triggering on any GitHub repository update using GitHub API. Automatically turns a specified Home Assistant light red via Home Assistant API. Ideal for developers wanting visual notifications of repo changes.

name: Image Text Overlay from Internet URL
description: An n8n workflow that downloads an image via HTTP request and adds custom text using the built-in Edit Image node. Automates adding text overlays on images from any URL quickly without coding.

name: Airtable Image URL to Attachment Updater
description: Automates moving image URLs to attachment fields in Airtable. Uses Airtable API nodes in n8n to fetch records with image URLs and update attachment fields, making image management in Airtable seamless and automated.

name: USDT TRC20 Wallet Tracker
description: An n8n workflow that tracks USDT TRC20 token transfers for a specified wallet using TronScan API. It fetches recent transactions, filters for incoming transfers within the last 15 minutes, formats and aggregates data. Built with n8n nodes, HTTP Request to TronScan API, and schedule trigger.

name: Batch Download and Merge Files
description: n8n workflow that downloads multiple files from predefined URLs using HTTP Request nodes, then merges them into one item with multiple binary objects for streamlined processing.

name: Dynamic Image Generator Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that generates custom images via a dummyjson.com API, allowing dynamic setting of size, colors, text, font, and output type. Utilizes Manual Trigger, Set, and HTTP Request nodes for creating images with personalized properties.

name: Add Task to Google Tasks List
description: An n8n workflow that adds a new task to a specified Google Tasks list using Google Tasks API with OAuth2. Triggered manually, it allows users to quickly create tasks in their Google account tasklist through seamless automation.

name: Automated Node.js Library Installer
description: An n8n workflow that automates installing Node.js libraries using npm. It processes a comma-separated string of library names (e.g., axios, cheerio, node-fetch), splits them, and runs shell commands to install each library if not already installed.

name: Image Fetch and Info Extraction
description: Automates fetching a random image from Picsum.photos and extracting image info using n8n's HTTP Request and Edit Image nodes. Ideal for workflows requiring quick image data retrieval and processing without coding.

name: Bitbucket Repo Push Trigger
description: An n8n workflow with Bitbucket Trigger node that activates upon repository push events. It uses Bitbucket API credentials to listen for 'repo:push' events on a specific repo named 'test', enabling automation workflows on code pushes.

name: GitLab Repository Event Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers automation on any event within the 'n8n-docs' GitLab repository using GitLab API webhooks. It listens to all repository events and requires GitLab API credentials for seamless integration.

name: Acuity Appointment Scheduled Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers automation when an appointment is scheduled in Acuity Scheduling using its API. It listens for 'appointment.scheduled' events via webhook to initiate further actions.

name: Clockify Time Tracking Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers every minute using the Clockify API to monitor time entries in a specific workspace. Ideal for automating time tracking data capture and workflow integration using Clockify and n8n's native trigger node.

name: Copper CRM Project Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers actions when new projects are created in Copper CRM using the Copper API. Ideal for automating workflows based on project creation events within Copper.

name: Trigger Rundeck Job Manually
description: An n8n workflow that triggers a Rundeck job manually using the manual trigger node and Rundeck API integration. It automates execution of predefined Rundeck jobs by leveraging n8n's Rundeck node and API credentials for job orchestration.

name: Bannerbear Image Generator Triggered Manually
description: An n8n workflow that manually triggers image generation using Bannerbear API. It customizes a template with text and color modifications and waits for the image to be created. Ideal for automated graphic content creation with Bannerbear integration.

name: Keap Contact Retrieval Workflow
description: An n8n workflow triggered manually to fetch all contacts from Keap (Infusionsoft) CRM using its OAuth2 API. Enables easy integration and automation of contact data retrieval for business CRM tasks.

name: Keap Contact Add Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on new contact additions in Keap CRM using its webhook API. It listens for 'contact.add' events via Keap OAuth2 credentials, enabling automated actions immediately after a new contact is created.

name: CocktailDB JSON to XML Converter
description: This n8n workflow fetches a random cocktail recipe from the CocktailDB API and converts the JSON response into XML format using n8n's HTTP Request and XML nodes. Useful for data format transformations and API integrations.

name: Box Folder Event Trigger
description: An n8n workflow using Box API to trigger automation on folder events like move or download within Box cloud storage using OAuth2 authentication.

name: OneDrive Folder Creator Triggered Manually
description: This n8n workflow creates a folder named 'n8n-rocks' in Microsoft OneDrive upon manual execution. It uses n8n's manual trigger and authenticates via Microsoft OneDrive OAuth2 API to automate folder creation in the cloud storage.

name: Disqus Forum Details Fetcher
description: An n8n workflow to retrieve detailed information about a Disqus forum using the Disqus API. Triggered manually, it fetches data for a specified forum ID (e.g., 'hackernoon') to help users monitor forum stats easily.

name: PDF Text Extractor from Local File
description: An n8n workflow that triggers manually to read a PDF file stored locally (/data/pdf.pdf) using built-in nodes: Manual Trigger, Read Binary File, and Read PDF. Extracts and outputs text content from a PDF for further automation or processing.

name: CrateDB Table Create & Insert Demo
description: An n8n workflow demonstrating CrateDB integration: it creates a table, inserts a record with id and name, and retrieves the data. Utilizes manual trigger, CrateDB node for SQL operations, and data setting within n8n.

name: Wekan Board and Card Automation
description: Automates creation of a Wekan board with 'To Do' and 'Done' lists, adds a card in 'To Do', then moves it to 'Done'. Uses n8n workflow with Wekan API to streamline task management board setup and card handling.

name: File List Processor and Logger
description: An n8n workflow that reads a text file containing filenames, splits them into an array, and sequentially logs each filename to an output file. Utilizes n8n's Read Binary File, Function, Execute Command, and IF nodes to automate file processing and command execution on Linux.

name: Send SMS via sms77 API
description: An n8n workflow that sends SMS messages using the sms77 API. It triggers manually and sends a customizable text message through the sms77 integration. Ideal for quick SMS notifications or alerts, leveraging n8n automation capabilities.

name: English to German Text Translator
description: An n8n workflow that uses Google Translate API via OAuth2 to translate fixed English text into German on manual trigger. Ideal for automating simple language translation tasks using Google Translate within n8n.

name: Discourse Post Create-Update-Get Workflow
description: n8n workflow automates Discourse forum interaction by creating a post, updating it, and retrieving the updated post using Discourse API nodes triggered manually. Ideal for managing forum content programmatically via the Discourse API.

name: Create Organization in Affinity CRM
description: Automates organization creation in Affinity CRM via API using n8n's manual trigger and Affinity node. Enables quick setup of new organizations in Affinity for relationship intelligence and pipeline management.

name: Batch Processing Loop with Manual Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that creates 10 items via a JavaScript function, processes them one by one in batches, and uses a conditional check to detect when all items are processed. Utilizes n8n nodes: Manual Trigger, Function, SplitInBatches, and IF node to control flow.

name: FileMaker Contacts Data Extraction
description: An n8n workflow extracting and processing contacts data from FileMaker Data API. It uses FileMaker Data API simulated responses and n8n nodes to parse and return detailed contact info in JSON, suitable for automation and data integration tasks.

name: Extract PDF Pages from URL
description: Workflow that downloads a PDF from a specified URL using HTTP Request and extracts specific pages (2-3) with a custom PDF toolkit node. Utilizes n8n's manual trigger, HTTP Request node, and a custom-js PDF extraction tool for selective page extraction.

name: Merge Multiple Data Runs into One Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to retrieve all customer records from a datastore, process them in batches with delay, and merge all batch outputs into a single consolidated dataset. Utilizes n8n nodes: Manual Trigger, Custom Customer Datastore API, SplitInBatches, Wait, NoOp, If, and Code node for aggregation.

name: Download Google Drive File to Local
description: An n8n workflow that downloads a specific file from Google Drive using Google API with service account credentials and saves it locally as a binary file. Triggered manually to automate file retrieval and storage.

name: Cockpit CMS Data Fetch Trigger
description: n8n workflow that triggers manually to fetch data from Cockpit CMS using Cockpit API. Designed for easy retrieval of content from a 'samplecollection' collection in Cockpit for further automation or processing.

name: Manual PayPal Payment Trigger
description: An n8n workflow that triggers a PayPal payout using a manual trigger node and the PayPal API. It enables sending payments programmatically with minimal setup, ideal for automating payout processes using n8n's built-in PayPal integration.

name: Manual Trigger to AWS Lambda Call
description: An n8n workflow that triggers an AWS Lambda function via manual execution. It connects a manual trigger node to an AWS Lambda node using AWS credentials to call a specific Lambda ARN, enabling simple serverless function invocation within automation.

name: Flow Task Updates Receiver
description: An n8n workflow using the Flow Trigger node to receive real-time updates for specified tasks via the Flow API. It enables automation based on task changes, suitable for integrations and monitoring task progress.

name: AWS SNS Trigger Listener
description: An n8n workflow that triggers on AWS SNS topic events using AWS SNS Trigger node. Utilizes AWS SNS API for real-time event-driven automation. Ideal for integrating AWS notifications with other automation tasks.

name: n8n Mattermost Startup Notification
description: This n8n workflow sends a Mattermost message notification when the n8n instance starts. It uses the n8n trigger node to detect the init event and the Mattermost node to post a message including the startup timestamp, leveraging Mattermost API for team communication.

name: FileMaker Record Create-Edit-Get Workflow
description: An n8n workflow automating data handling in FileMaker: creates a record with first and last name, edits the record to add a country field, then retrieves the record. Uses FileMaker API and manual trigger for process start.

name: Standup Bot Initialization Workflow
description: An n8n workflow to initialize Standup Bot configuration for Mattermost integration, setting default tokens and URLs, converting JSON config to binary and saving it. Uses n8n core nodes and works with Mattermost API for bot setup.

name: ActiveCampaign Admin Account Add Alert
description: An n8n workflow that triggers real-time notifications when an admin adds a new account in ActiveCampaign using the ActiveCampaign Trigger node. Enables seamless monitoring of account creations via the ActiveCampaign API.

name: Create Deal in Pipedrive CRM
description: n8n workflow to manually create a new deal in Pipedrive CRM using the Pipedrive API. Triggered manually to add deal info seamlessly to Pipedrive for sales pipeline management.

name: Webhook JSON to XML Converter
description: An n8n workflow that listens on a webhook, sets static JSON data, converts it to XML format using the XML node, and responds with XML content. Useful for converting JSON to XML via HTTP requests.

name: Batch Post Customer Data via HTTP
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all customer records from a datastore, processes them one-by-one in batches, and sends each record as a POST request to a public JSON placeholder API. Uses n8n core nodes: Manual Trigger, Customer Datastore, SplitInBatches, HTTP Request, and Wait for pacing.

name: Zulip Private Message Sender
description: Automates sending private messages on Zulip using n8n workflow with manual trigger and Zulip API integration. Ideal for quick, programmable direct messaging within Zulip chat environments.

name: Create User Profile in Vero
description: Automates creation of user profiles in Vero via API using n8n workflow with a manual trigger and Vero node integration. Ideal for marketers managing customer engagement through Vero's platform.

name: Retrieve All Tasks from Flow App
description: An n8n workflow to fetch all tasks from the Flow API using a manual trigger. Enables easy task management automation by connecting n8n with Flow's task system through its API.

name: Customer Data Fetch & Forward Workflow
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves all customer records from a custom datastore using n8nTrainingCustomerDatastore node, authenticates with an API key set manually, and posts each customer's name to a specified webhook URL via HTTP POST requests. Designed for easy triggering and API integration.

name: Harvest Client Creation Workflow
description: Automates client creation in Harvest using n8n workflow with the Harvest API and manual trigger. Simplifies adding new clients to Harvest time tracking software without manual input.

name: German Word Synonym Finder
description: An n8n workflow that retrieves synonyms for German words using the OpenThesaurus API. Triggered manually, it helps users find alternative German terms quickly, leveraging n8n's manual trigger and OpenThesaurus integration for language enrichment tasks.

name: n8n Workflow Connection Integrity Checker
description: This n8n workflow identifies potentially broken multi-output node connections caused by version 0.214.3 upgrade issues. Using the n8n API, code logic, and a webhook, it scans all workflows, detects affected nodes, and serves an HTML report listing them for manual inspection.

name: PayPal Billing Plan Activation Trigger
description: n8n workflow using PayPal API webhook to receive real-time updates when a billing plan is activated in PayPal accounts. Useful for automating billing processes and integrations.

name: Webhook Reception and Adobe Sign Data Extraction
